Reviews.Title: “Best customer service and hotel accomendations”
Reviews.Author: Cynthia T
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff were freindly, quick at providing services and gave you the kindsess that you deserve after traveling on the road. I love the fact that the hotel have emenities that are neederd.I did not have to ask for accomendations for medication that needed refrigeration, so there was no worry about getting up in the night to make sure that my medication was stored properly. The representative answered me quickly when I asked about a regrigerator. She responded with a smile stating that this was not a problem, my room had this equipment. This felt great to know. The staff was friendly and the rooms, bed and bathrooms were comfortable and clean. I really enjoy staying at this hotel whenever I am in the florida area.

Reviews.Title: “The best choice one can ever make”
Reviews.Author: MaxAlexander
Reviews.Content: I have stayed 3 nights there with a family group. Everything was nice from the beginning. Do not forget to use the swimming pool as it was very quiet and we felt it was like our private pool. There was a big mall sticked to the hotel which has a large food court with the best quality and fair price possible. The staff were very polite. All Disney facilities and Universal Studio's are pretty close either.

Reviews.Title: “Conference Stay”
Reviews.Author: johnnice18
Reviews.Content: During my stay at the Conference Center, the staff was very friendly and the food in Marcel's was great. It is conveniently located in the mall. The hotel also had unlimited complimentary internet which was great because I was on a business trip. I would definitelyrecommend this hotel to anyone visiting the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “"Shopping Excursion"”
Reviews.Author: Marshall B
Reviews.Content: We chose to stay at this hotel at the beginning of our vacation to be able to do some shopping at our favorite Mall in Orlando. We were quite happy with our overall experience at this hotel. Check in was quick and staff were friendly and helpful.The room accommodated us well (2 adults and 2 teenagers). We especially enjoyed the pool! It was never busy during the times we used it and I loved the water temperature (on the warm side). The staff in the dining room went out of their way to be friendly and our breakfast buffet was very good. Areas of the hotel that we used were all clean and well maintained. Our purpose for this hotel stay was to shop and it was so convenient to be so close to the Mall and to be able to just shop for a while, maybe have a swim, shop some more, have dinner, shop some more - you get the idea! Would definitely stay here again for same purpose.

Reviews.Title: “Choral Group's Visit”
Reviews.Author: Sandpiper_Director
Reviews.Content: For the past 29 years, every 4 years, I take my Choral Students to Orlando. This was my third time staying in this hotel. This is by far the Best in the Area for convenience. They are always very accommodating for our group. The location literally has an entrance inside the mall. I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: correacarmen1960
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect place to spend a vacation, a weekend getaway or to relax. It is close to the parks, restaurant and other entertainment. Florida Luxuary Hotel has all amenities and next to the best Mall in all Florida. The service is excellent, clean room. I wish my home was like that. I recomend this Hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Work Related”
Reviews.Author: Angela B
Reviews.Content: I was asked to accompany dsome co-workers on a business trip to Orlando, Fl. On this trip, we were invited inside to the hotel and greeted by a guest service employee. She was real pleasant and gave me a lot of information about things to do and places to visit. When we got to our room, they were cool and ready for guest. Each day the breakfast was pleasant and our waiter was nice. He even pulled the chair out for me. I was pleased.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: JLarnold
Reviews.Content: I stay here a lot on business and I have to say the staff here are fantastic! Always makes me feel like I'm home from home

Reviews.Title: “An Enjoyable Event”
Reviews.Author: William M
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Florida Hotel and Confernece Center going to and returning from a cruise. Our first impression was the positive attitude demonstrated by the hotel staff we came into contact wth (Reception, House Keeping and Dinning). Upon arrival at our room we found it to be of the highest quality. Additionally, members of the staff contacted us to ensure that all was well. The facility is located as part of a very large shopping mall which affored us the opportunity to take advantge of some last minute purchases for our cruise to included a visit to Macy's; sporting goods store; JC Penny; Apple to see the new IPad, etc. The staff that supports the dinning operation made the meals most enjoyable with the excellent food preparation and presentation of meals. I highly encourage others to take advantage of this excellent facility.

Reviews.Title: “Training Seminar”
Reviews.Author: diving44
Reviews.Content: First trip to the Florida Hotel and Conference Center, very impressed with the facilities but even more moved by the friendly staff. The staff was extremely responsive to conference requests and I received excellent service throughout the hotel. A great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Shop Until You Drop in Your Hotel Room in Florida Mall”
Reviews.Author: Floridabluemacau
Reviews.Content: If you are on a big Orlando shopping trip, Florida Mall offers values and so does its indoor-hotel, Florida Hotel. Basic hotel, clean and staff is average. Biggest advantage is staying in the mall--literally.

Reviews.Title: “A great addition to our vacation”
Reviews.Author: Ashley D
Reviews.Content: We stayed at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center pre-cruise. Our cruise line booked our night at this hotel and we were not disappointed with their recommendation. The hotel is a short taxi ride from Orlando Airport. The hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. Since we booked through our cruise line we were given 2 queen sized beds. We asked the front desk and they switched us to a king bed immediately. The room and bathroom was clean and roomy. The bed is comfy with lots of pillows. The only complaints I have about our stay was that we had several interruptions in our sleep. The alarm clock was not reset from the last guest and went off at 5:30 am, and someone on our floor set off their smoke alarm so all the alarms had to be reset at 2:30 am. The interruption of sleep did not change our opinion of our overall stay. There are several bonus features of staying at this hotel. It is close to area attractions and has the Florida mall attached to the hotel. If you forgot to pack anything for your trip the mall is right there! The hotel and mall both have Starbucks for an early morning breakfast. We are coffee people and were super excited to have our morning Starbucks. The Hotel also has a really fun bar. The bar staff were knowledgeable and friendly. They have a happy hour with buy one get one drinks and apps until 9pm! We had a total of 6 drinks, and two huge apps and with tip spent less than $30! We would definitely stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center again if our travels brought us to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Military Order of the Purple Heart Annual Training Event”
Reviews.Author: fvanhoy
Reviews.Content: Once again, the Florida Hotel staff and management did a first class job in hosting the Military Order of the Purple Heart's Annual National Service Officer Training Seminar. The upgraded hotel facilities further enhanced our week-long stay. It's a real pleasure to be greeted by the always friendly and helpful staff. This being our third year at this facility, we have gotten to know the staff by first name, and they us. It's always a pleasure to 'come home' to The Florida Hotel and Conference Center in Orlando, FL.

Reviews.Title: “Luxury accommodations on a working man's budget!”
Reviews.Author: Steven H
Reviews.Content: I received first class treatment by people who treated me like family.

Reviews.Title: “Lead on Site Tour Guide”
Reviews.Author: eugene w
Reviews.Content: This was my third trip to the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. This time was even better than the other two times. The facilities were nicer and as always to staff was great to work with in all areas. I look forward to our next event there in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Had a ball”
Reviews.Author: ladykb
Reviews.Content: Since I am a shopper, I enjoyed having the mall attached to the hotel. I also enjoyed the Starbucks in the hotel that I woke up to. The ability to hang out at the mall and have a pedicure, drink coffee, go to happy hour (to have a few drinks) all without moving my car at my hotel was definitely a plus for me!!! The hotel restaurant was good, just a bit pricey. However, since I was in the mall, I had several other options. Front desk seemed to always be busy but they were always professional and courteous.

Reviews.Title: “Unusually Good Hotel in a Florida Mall”
Reviews.Author: Krister H
Reviews.Content: Being part of a large shopping mall has its ups and downs, but... I have stayed at this place several times while attending a small international conference. Convenient to the airport. Nicely run. Pleasant rooms and good service. Food in the restaurant and the bar is good and very reasonably priced. The Crickets bar runs Happy Hour daily from 3:00 pm until 9:00 pm with half price appetizers, drafts, house wine and well drinks which is a bargain. No need to eat in a fancy restaurant every day... It is not a resort and there is not a lot of entertainment or diversions (other than the Florida Mall) around, but there is convenient Lynx public bus service at low cost from the mall parking lot to both Disney and Universal and the trip takes less than 1 hour.

Reviews.Title: “THE FLORIDA HOTEL AND CONFERENCE CENTER”
Reviews.Author: jerrysgram
Reviews.Content: As always a great stay - love the pool - greatest happy hour in Orlando

Reviews.Title: “Greate stay and good hotel, I like it very much”
Reviews.Author: Gabriel L
Reviews.Content: I was in the hotel for a business trip, and my room was ready at my arrived, what was my sorprise that the room was very good, the bed is fantastic, the internet conecction as well, al the staff at the hotel was very good, I will go back at the same hotel if I could.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: m g
Reviews.Content: The front desk staff was exceptional friendly and helpful. I checked in, went up to my room and the phone showed that I have 1 message. It was the lady at the front desk's message wishinging my family to have a great stay and if we need anything just call front desk number. On the night before we checked out I got an envelope from the general manager asking for comment and feedback. I am very happy with this hotel and the staff. They seems to care for guests opinions. Oh, and if you don't want room service for a day they would give you a voucher for Starbuck or breakfast or something. I think it is a great idea. Strongly recommend others to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, would stay again”
Reviews.Author: cellini03
Reviews.Content: Just stayed here last week while on business in Orlando. Arrived late and checked out early so didn't get much use of the room. However, the room was a good size, good bathroom, clean and tidy and functional. Ordered room service which was good and prompt. Had breakfast in the hotel restaurant downstairs. Good selection on offer on the buffet. Staff were friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location very convenient!!”
Reviews.Author: cfedition
Reviews.Content: this hotel has a great location is part of a mall that could be very useful.. a lot of restaurants around and just a short distance from universal studios.. the rooms are very clean and the staff is very helpful

Reviews.Title: “Solid 3 Star Hotel Attached To A Shopping Mall”
Reviews.Author: deorr
Reviews.Content: There is nothing particularly offensive or remarkable about the Florida Hotel. The hotel offers comparable rooms and facilities to the large 3 star chains (i.e. Hilton, Sheraton, and Marriott). The rear of the hotel is attached to a shopping mall so there are no nice views, but ample shopping opportunities. There are also a number of chain restaurants nearby, and the Orlando Airport, Universal, and Disney are all about a 20 minute drive. Our room had a flatscreen tv, refrigerator, coffee service, and fold out couch. A service fee is charged to cover newspapers, WiFi, and other common amenities, but is included in many online bookings. WiFi clocked at 920 kpbs in the room and the lobby. The Florida Hotel advertised a generous loyalty program of one night free for every three paid nights if you book through their website or by phone. Something to keep in mind if you are consudering multiple trips. It's not luxury, but it's certainly not bad.

Reviews.Title: “very pleased”
Reviews.Author: aaybee83
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a conference and was very pleased. Rooms were clean, staff was very friendly. I also felt very safe. You need your key card to get on elevator and out to the pool. Our faucet in shower was broken and someone was up to room within 15mins. to fix. The Florida Mall is attached to the hotel so if you want to do some shopping or just get a bite to eat this is very convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Not just a great place - great people!”
Reviews.Author: Curtis C
Reviews.Content: I stayed three nights at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center in October, 2011. I was there as a presenter for the Native American Vocational Rehabilitation Coaliton. My room was comfortable and the cleanest I have stayed in. The over-all hotel facility was top-notch, from the expansive and welcoming lobby to the conference rooms. However, the BEST part of the entire experience was the people on staff. They were not just accommodating, they were genuinely looking for ways to make my stay comfortable and enjoyable. I felt like a special guest. From the moment I entered and went to the registration desk, to the very last moments while I was waiting for a shuttle to the airport, the staff made it clear they were delighted to serve my needs. A case in point: as I was waiting for the shuttle, one of the bellmen came over and checked to be sure I was taken care of, and even offered to go and get me a bottle of water. It reminded me of the Scripture passage that begins: "If just a cup of water ..." I will definitely look forward to the next time I am in Orlando, and another really great stay at this welcoming place.

Reviews.Title: “A Mother and Daughter tradition”
Reviews.Author: Janstroh
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I have been staying at this hotel Christmas time for over 15 years ! We started this when my daughter was in High School and we thought it would be a FUN thing to do ! Well, obviously we must enjoy it because we've done it every Christmas since. Just the 2 of us...NO husbands...NO kids ! The staff at the hotel have always been friendly and accommodating. We are so into tradition that we always ask for the same ROOM....the staff goes above and beyond to try to accommodate us... We even went the year my daughter was 8 1/2 months pregnant and could barely walk! The staff was very sympathetic and helped with all her packages and luggage ! I hope that someday my daughter will carry on this tradition with HER daughter ! In this time when there are so many fractured families....maybe this would be a good tradition for them to start ! Good Job to all the Staff !!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not the best hotel I have stayed at, but not the worst”
Reviews.Author: Beansquean04
Reviews.Content: Cons - This hotel was plain average. The beds were small and uncomfortable. They have shampoo and conditioner dispenser which were poor in quality. Luckily I brought some with me. They did not supply an lotion either. We have to use the same bar of soap for both the shower and sink. You could see where the cleaning crew wiped around items on the counter instead of picking them up and wiping underneath. Pros- It is attached to the mall so that was convenient. The hotel lobby was very pretty and they have a StarBucks. The pool is quite big and heated. The price was reasonable. I wish there was a microwave in the room to heat up leftovers form area restuarants.Also it was very quite with little traffic down the halls. Overall- Good hotel if you are not expecting that vacation feeling.

Reviews.Title: “Seminar Weekend”
Reviews.Author: TRKJKY
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for the weekend 09 - 11 March 2012 and had a great time. Food was good, room was comfortable and over all a great experience. Drinks and meals are pricey but that is to be expected in a higher end hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Okay for business travel”
Reviews.Author: SouthMiami
Reviews.Content: The property is located at the Florida Mall. I have to disagree with other recent reviews about this hotel. Honestly, the rooms are average and better suited for business travel than for leisure travel. I suppose they have tried to keep the property up to date, but you can defenitely tell the difference between a full update and a partial update. Some of the features are dated (hallway carpets). With just a little bit of research it is possible to find a better property for the same price in the Orlando area at just about any time of the year. If the purpose of your trip is to shop, this is where you want to be because the hotel is located at a mall with some great stores. Hotel staff are generally friendly and try their best to provide a positive guest experience. The hotel has been around for a long time and needs some TLC.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: ejbtampa
Reviews.Content: A girl friend booked this hotel through Orbitz for a "runaway" weekend for us Moms! Great experience this weekend there! Nice rooms, clean and customer service was outstanding! From the front desk to the maintenence engineer, to the wait staff...all were so happy and eager to offer great service! Marcelo's (right there in the hotel) offers a great breakfast...it is not cheap ($13.99) but those were the best made to order omelettes I have had in years! (And the chef has been there some 22 years!) Cricket's (there too) was great after our all day shopping in the Florida Mall. 2 for 1 appetizers and drinks...in a contemporary and relaxed setting. Perfect for tired feet and lighter wallets! We were both amazed at how happy the staff were...many have been there for YEARS! they spoke of great management and a great owner...and believe me it showed! Would stay there again!!!! As a heads up, if you plan to attend Cirque De Soleil...make sure to either eat close by to it or plan ahead for traffic! the I-4 traffic was so bad they we almost didn't make the 9:00pm show...Don't miss that show if you are in Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “Great place away from the crowds”
Reviews.Author: Clubworldfan
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on 2 separate occasions in January while in transit from UK to California and again after a visit to Melbourne Beach. Hotel is located slap bang in the middle of the Florida Mall shopping centre, so always somewhere to eat or drink out of the hotel itself. Rooms were comfortable, housekeeping staff seem to work all through the day so the corridors can sometimes be noisy and full of carts. There is a great bar in the lobby area called Crickets, great staff, very friendly with decent beer and food. Free parking in the general parking lot, or valet parking available.

Reviews.Title: “Conference visit”
Reviews.Author: Malin N
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel! Clean, up to date and very friendly hotel and conference staff. My company hired conference equipment which was delivered on time and set up exactly according to our needs.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing Daytona 500 trip”
Reviews.Author: condodweller206
Reviews.Content: Stayed there as a package deal with Daytona tickets. Knowing what I do now, I would have bought the tickets separate and stayed elsewhere. The meals were very pricey and i would have liked to have had a microwave in the room for convenience.However the staff were excellent and friendly.Prices a little high for the average middle income.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bill53
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for the Daytona 500, the food was very good and being attached to The Florida Mall is convenient. The front desk staff could not have been any more pleasant and helpful. The rooms are large, very clean and comfortable. Each room has wired high speed internet that worked fine but the wireless service was poor.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place!”
Reviews.Author: YYCTravelGirl
Reviews.Content: Nice place to stay if you are not in town to visit Disney or Universal. Hotel was part of my Daytona 500 weekend package and it had a lot of pluses. The $15 resort fee was included in my package, so I would not likely be as enthusiastic about this hotel if I had to pay it. This fee did cover parking, Wi-Fi, Business Center and water in the room. I loved the Starbucks in the lobby and the mall attached to the hotel. The front desk staff was lovely, but housekeeping was rude. The rooms were nice for the price, but the bathroom fixtures were dirty. The pool is basic and there is a nice restaurant in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Ellen S
Reviews.Content: This hotel is beautiful, clean, and the staff are friendly and very accommodating. They respond quickly to any requests and are very service-oriented. Their fitness center is very well equipped -- they recently relocated it and expanded the space so there are lots of different types of equipment. A huge plus is their location. They are only 10 or 15 minutes from the airport and, being attached to the Florida Mall allows you easy access to many places to eat with a great variety of choices, wonderful shopping opportunities, and a way to just relax and just walk around if you want to get out for awhile.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Location - Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Gregori P
Reviews.Content: We statyed at the Florida Hotel & Conference Ctr for 7 nights. First stay was 3 nights then we went on a Disney Cruise and came back for more. Next stay was 4 nights. Great hotel, awesome location. Rooms are spacious. The fact that you are practically inside a shopping mall is really good. People are friendly and nice. We would stay there again for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: NewHampshireDiane
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for the daytona 500, the food was very good, the hotel staff was very nice,it is connected to the florida mall which was very convienient .

Reviews.Title: “Review of stay at Florida Hotel & Conference Center”
Reviews.Author: Dominique S
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice hotel, conveniently located, and very clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for the money.”
Reviews.Author: Mike D
Reviews.Content: With the mall attached should you forget to pack something or want to take a day out of the Orlando heat you are covered here. Room was immaculate and up to date in every way. The staff were very pleasant and helpful. Should you not want to drive or take a cab to the amusement parks, there are Lynx bus stops within walking distance for cheap and reliable transportation.

Reviews.Title: “A great place for a meeting!”
Reviews.Author: kharth
Reviews.Content: The renovations to the lobby are beautiful. The meeting rooms provide a variety of sizes and locations within the hotel. The new restaurant has great ambiance and my salmon was delicious. The staff, as always, were friendly and went out of their way to make our conference a success. Everyone, from the general manager to the folks setting up our breakfast, made an effort to welcome us and make us feel at home. Thank you to everyone at The Florida Hotel for another great conference!

Reviews.Title: “Little pricey for the hype!”
Reviews.Author: J M
Reviews.Content: It was ok. No microwaves in the room was a pain. Breakfast buffet will run you 15 dollars. Were talking eggs people. I've paid less at better hotels and breakfast included. A 134 dollar room will run you about $151.00 with hidden fees and taxes. Housekeeping was hit and miss over the 2 week period. No coffee one day, ice bucket not cleaned, no cups for coffee just little things on a daily basis. Toiltet took forever to flush and you had to hold it down to do it. Finally fixed flapper and it helped a little. Still took too long to flush. People smoking on the floor, reported it but they still did it. But after two weeks your bound to peel back the layers of nice. They did take dogs which is good. Food at bistro was good and priced fair except breakfast, were talking eggs people. Overall ok.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Florida Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: John D
Reviews.Content: The hotel was immaculate, the staff was very friendly and the food was great. The hotel was located near many of the Orlando attractions and I will definitely return with my family and hopefully with future business trips.

Reviews.Title: “A Splendid Time is Guaranteed for All”
Reviews.Author: TheoTrost
Reviews.Content: Consistently the staff was attentive to the guests' needs. Room service stood out as timely and concerned to deliver the best of service -- calling back after food was delivered to make sure all was satisfactory. Even the personnel in the Starbuck's franchise inside the hotel were trained in name recognition techniques (addressing conventioneers by the names that appeared on conference badges); they exuded general friendliness.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: KarenS571
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with my stay at the hotel. The staff was extremely friendly and the location was great. Rooms were clean and updated. The hotel had access to the mall and shuttle to and from airport. The pool was large and heated. I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel for shopaholics”
Reviews.Author: Carol-Bermuda
Reviews.Content: Being a shopaholic I only stay at this hotel but apart from that they have a great staff (their bell boys are the best they can't do enough for you) and now they have a great restaurant - I try to stay there at least 3 times a year - hotel is excellent

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: grandslam941
Reviews.Content: This hotel has nice spacious rooms, a nice lobby, and friendly staff. The one glitch was shortly after I checked in I received a call askeing me how lI liked it, and offering me a free coupon for an appretizer in the hotel restaurant. The staff member at the front desk had no idea what was going on, made a phone call, couldn;t find the cards, and eventually wrote one out by hand. Then I walked over the the restaurant, and they had just closed for lunch. That evening, upon seeing the prices, and the emptiness of the hotel resturant, I decided the free appetizer wasn;t worth it. The rooms are pleasant, and represent good value for the Orlando area. The upkeep is good as well, often a problem with Orlando properties. The Florida Mall was jammed it was a weekend, so it can be plus or a minus, especially since Millennia Mall is close by, and much nicer. The hotel assured me that security was in place, though their hotel is attached to the mall, and also has several meeting rooms on the second floor, allowing a significant amount of public access, more so than many properties. The hotel is attractive. The location, on Orange Blossom Trail, and Sand Lake, means you have to ready to deal with traffic every time you leave the place. But the Turnpike is nearby, as are other through streets that are easier to avoid traffic. Web access was good, cleanliness was good, and it is convenient to many Orlando attractions. It was pleasant because you did not see many families with small children, at least when I was there. it seems remarkably grown-up place for Orlando. On some trips that's the atmosphere you seek. Dining opportunites in the mall, aside from a food court where there are never free tables, are scant. So be prepared to get into the car for dinner. Orange Blossom Trail is not the place to dine, iit;s one of Orlando;'s messiest streets, When a resturant has no customers on a satirday night, my thought was that hotel restuarant, at that price point, wasn;t worth chancing. beds are a bit on the hard side, for those like me, who like soft ones. Linens were nice and fresh. The strong lighting on the poles on the parking lot means you ahve play with drapes a bit to make sure the room is reasonably dark enough to sleep in, but no big deal.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: abbyLondon
Reviews.Content: Just returned Afew days ago from Orlando. Stayed previously before in 2008. Check in was smooth and we were a little early but didn't have to wait long to get checked in. Staff friendly and welcoming. Room clean and big I requested 2 double beds. Bathroom a great size, housekeeping fantastic. Great bonus as it's attached to the Florida mall which is huge. The only thing I dont like is the resort fee 13 dollars a day which I know includes 2 bottles of water and use of gym and pool which I didn't get chance to use. Overall I love this hotel and have recommended to family and friends. Will return again :)

Reviews.Title: “A great place for mall shoppers to stay!”
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: If you are going to shop the Florida Mall, this is a perfect place to stay. The rooms are spotless, just not brand new. Staff was friendly, restaurants and room service were top notch and the valet service was very slow. The ability to shop and then walk to your room to drop off your purchases was worth the price of the room.

Reviews.Title: “A day of rest between flying from Montreal to cruising from Port Canaveral”
Reviews.Author: Gilles NoÃ«l R
Reviews.Content: This luxurious Hotel was chosen by the Cruise Line. An excellent choice indeed for their overall services. The porter impressed us, fast, helpful, friendly. The room was perfect, clean, accessories etc. A small problem with the TV functionning . The Front desk sent me a technician in 5 minutes! The Restaurant and Bar Grill, the food just like home and the prices reasonable, Service fast and friendly, What is great is leaving the Hotel and entering the huge shopping center. In the evening or morning you can look out from you room window and admire the wonderful surroundings of Palm trees, huge pools and spas, beds of carefully arranged flowers. We shall remember this Hotel because you are like a King or Queen in a Castle.

Reviews.Title: “A week in paradise”
Reviews.Author: Bryant W
Reviews.Content: The staff was the friendliest i have seen. Very helpful and courteous. Willl stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Stellar service and location!”
Reviews.Author: Steve_Bohlen
Reviews.Content: Rarely when you have a hotel and a conference center do you find both to be of high-quality, but I stayed here in connection with a 3-day business conference and found both the conference center and lodging accommodations to be top-notch. From the bellman to the cleaning staff to the restaurant host/hostess to the bartender, I found excellent customer service to the be the norm at this facility. I would absolutely stay here again given the opportunity.

Reviews.Title: “I recommend!”
Reviews.Author: Marcos B
Reviews.Content: I frequently stay in this hotel due to its conveniently location that helps my business trip run more smoothly. Free internet access as well as nice customer service must be mentioned. Beline

Reviews.Title: “I found the cleaning staff to be very frendly and accommodating, was very pleased.”
Reviews.Author: NanaDuncan
Reviews.Content: It was a very nice stay. Cleaning staff was wonderful, along with all staff throughout the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great customer service”
Reviews.Author: Petr S
Reviews.Content: Overall, a nice hotel, very clean, nice warm pool ... Everybody (front desk, cleaning staff, store/bar people, etc.) were supper nice. I felt a really exceptional level of customer service -- every request was taken very seriously and everybody tried to make me, the customer, satisfied. I mostly dealt with people at the front desk and they all were very helpful. I asked for a room change (our first room was too close to the elevator), I asked for a $5 voucher (I forgot to put "No room service needed" card on my door), I asked that my TV remote got fixed (it probably ran out of bateries). All my wishes were granted! You may think it's trivial but I had a very different experience in similar situations in Hillton, Waikoloa on the Big Island, where my requests were mostly denied ... The only thing I did not like was that it felt over-airconditioned. Also, you need to be aware that the hotel is in the middle of nowhere - 15 minutes from the airport, 25 minutes from Disney World. The only fun/good thing nearby is the Florida Mall, that's it. If you are OK with that, you'll enjoy your stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Rhonda H
Reviews.Content: Business trip on a tight schedule - but the staff was terrific - very accomodating and helpful for whatever I needed. The rooms were nice and clean. I ate in both of the hotel restaurants, and was very pleased with the service and the food.I seldom get the opportunity to shop, so being right there, as part of the mall, was really nice. Thanks to all!

Reviews.Title: “Had a Great Stay.”
Reviews.Author: steven c
Reviews.Content: Great staff, very clean, close to the airport (but not to close), alot of places to eat with in a short distance, nice workout equipment, nice pool. Would stay here again if in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Once again, an incredible stay!”
Reviews.Author: Sylvia J
Reviews.Content: This is my third time staying at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center for meetings and each time the experience improves. The meeting space was very accommodating and the IT staff made sure all our electronic requests were filled without a hitch! The guest service is phenomenal throughout the hotel and they go out of their way to fulfill your needs, even those with developmental disabilities. The location is perfect for "work" and "play"! I will be bringing my very picky daughter with me for trip number four so that she can spend her time at the mall, dining, or just relaxing while I work. It seemed unfair to constantly treat myself and not treat her too.

Reviews.Title: “Not cheap, but absolutely worth the money”
Reviews.Author: Stoffel1965
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center had been a perfect base for our relaxing but exciting Florida vacations. We used the hotel as a hub for starting early travelling around and returning late in the evening. After 5 days we checked out but left most of our luggage at the hotel as we were planning to return after our few-days-trip to the Keys. Upon our return our suitcases had been stored properly and were available at the spot. Also we received an other room than we had before which was even better located (nice pool and fountain view). The service was very good, we "stupid" germans had a lot of questions and requests but there was always someone at the reception who gladly helped us. This was my 4th stay at this hotel and I would recommend it also to my best friends.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly,clean, convienent. My husband I and our kids enjoyed the stay.”
Reviews.Author: Makey00
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for a weekend. The staff was friendly the prices were not bad. We utilized room service and valet parking. The service was excellent. We would recommend this hotel to anyone. Hope there stay will be as pleasant as ours was.

Reviews.Title: “Phenomenal staff. You will struggle to find staff as efficient and friendly.”
Reviews.Author: sammiexxxx
Reviews.Content: I stay at this hotel on a very regular basis. The staff from the bell men to the cleaners to the reception staff, even the starbucks staff. Everyone is beyond helpful. They can't do enough for you and every request is dealt with efficiently and always with a smile. Great location. Great hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Killed several birds with one stone!”
Reviews.Author: gailpatel
Reviews.Content: I loved everything about the hotel, and if you have teenagers, they will love you more for staying in this hotel with a mall at your fingertips! The buffet breakfast was the best selection I have ever had at a hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Location for Training”
Reviews.Author: MSIInstructor
Reviews.Content: The National Guard have hosted training courses for the past 7 years, The location in relation to the Orlando Airport and attacment to the Florida Mall makes it an outstanding location for training presentation. The students are able to eat lunch in the mall food court and get back to the training venue in a short period of time. Other locations require vehicle transport to eating establishments and delay the training. The Hotel staff have been great to work with and responds to our every requirement. The hotel and meeting rooms are modern and well appointed. I give this hotel a thumbs up. Great value!

Reviews.Title: “Good Value in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: ColonelBangkok
Reviews.Content: I stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center every year when I am in the area for an antique car auction. There are many hotels/motels in the Orlando area and I have always found the Florida Hotel offers a good value and provides the right blend of service and amenities I require. The local is convenient - right off the Florida Turnpike and there are many choices of restaurants close by. The hotel is attached to a shopping mall with food court and just about anything you would require if you are going to be there during business hours. The staff is well trained and friendly and the parking valets/bellmen provide concierge services. When we pulled up the first night we were running late and the valet got us restaurant reservations, expedited our check-in and made sure our bags were put in the proper room. It was done seamlessly and we were off to dinner. A nice touch.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant hotel, great location, super staff!”
Reviews.Author: Kelly L
Reviews.Content: I stay in many hotels for work and this one is great, the rooms are a good size, with wifi and in room internet plus busines centre, nice gym and pool. Breakfast was great and the bar is good too, plus it has a Mall attached to the rear of it, which is very handy!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for a Conference”
Reviews.Author: Leamon D
Reviews.Content: Had a great conference here over a three and half-day period. The hotel staff is great and very accomodating. The location is good as it is connected to The Florida Mall. I want to focus particularly on the Audio/Visual portion. We had three separate conferences going on at the same time. Mr. Perez, the A/V manager on-site is the best! He and his staff made aboslutely sure all of my A/V requirements were met daily and responded immediately to the very minor issues we encountered. He made daily checks every morning before each session began and throughout the day...very thorough, very professional, and very accomodating of all my conference A/V needs. Thanks for the outstanding support!

Reviews.Title: “Very corteous staff / excelent location”
Reviews.Author: SMResstel
Reviews.Content: If you want/like shopping, this hotel can`t be beat. Practlically inside the awesome Florida Mall, it gives you the great benefit of having your room right next door to the stores. Disney world and Universal were a little further away, but we had rented a car, so it was no big deal. The staf was extremelly courteous and payed attention to all our needs. We had packages shipped to the Hotel for us and the staff was very nice in tracking them down and delivering to us (there is a surcharge for that). Rooms are clean, bathroom is spacious, no complaint at all. The hotel was undergoing renovations when we were there, but we weren`t disturbed at all. Everything was extremelly well signalled, despite the noise during business hours. We recomend it and will definatelly be going back and staying at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: docriffel
Reviews.Content: I recently had the privilege of speaking at a conference held at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. I had two huge suitcases, a rolling computer bag and a large purse. The minute I was dropped off by my driver I was treated like a queen. Immediately, someone was there to help me with my bags. When I got up to my room, my bags were quickly brought up. Every time I ordered room service, I was told my food would take 30 minutes and it was there in less time than I was told. The staff called to make sure my food was prepared as I had asked. I have very special dietary concerns and they cooked everything the way I asked. The hotel called to ensure that everything in the room was satisfactory. I had excellent service from the staff for setting up my presentation equipment. The rooms were wonderful and there was no "bleed through" sound from the adjoining rooms. I've been in conference centers before where I had to speak over the speaker in the room next to me. We had a minor glitch where something happened with a light bulb in the back of the room and the staff were there immediately to take care of the issue. I would definitely come back to this hotel. It is connected to the Florida Mall. I was worried it might be noisy- but the rooms were quiet and convenient. The elevators were quick. It just is a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Not even 1million words could explain how good this hotel is!”
Reviews.Author: NicolasSalomon
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great because of many reasons but the reason that I think is the biggest is that it is just next to the Florida Mall and there is even an exit connecting the Hotel to the mall that closes 1 hour later than the time that the mall closes. Other reasons are that the rooms are big and comfortable A/C works, bathroom is clean, equipped, and big, and in my opinion it is great!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfortable & Convenient”
Reviews.Author: 45_North
Reviews.Content: We stayed here mid December on a business trip and found the place to be clean, comfortable and convenient, not just that it's within a few minutes drive from the airport but my wife was thrilled to find that the Hotel is part of a really nice Mall. As for the Hotel itself, the rooms were modern and clean{exactly as seen in the photo's}, the rates were very competitive, the reception staff were helpful and friendly but a special mention has to be given to Morna and Asbert the breakfast staff. You're guaranteed to start your day the right way if Morna is serving you breakfast, she is attentive, friendly and a bunch of fun, a really nice person. Then there's Asbert, they best omelet man in Florida, like Morna he was always pleased to serve you and always with a bright smile. Folks like Morna & Asbert are more than breakfast staff, they are Ambassadors for this Hotel. We travel {from Nova Scotia, Canada} to Florida a number of times a year, and we have stayed in lots of Hotels, most of them very good, no complaints with any of the ones we have chosen thanks to Tripadvisor, but there's only one place we will stay when we are in Orlando, ours was a 5 Star stay, your's should be too.

Reviews.Title: “If you are staying offsite while at Disney this is the place!”
Reviews.Author: LastFlightOut21
Reviews.Content: If you are in Orlando and going to Disney, Epcot, Universal but are not staying onsite, then this is the place to stay. Convenient short drive to all the attractions, clean, excellent staff, and connected to the Florida Mall which eliminates extra tips when you have to buy something - this is the place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Frequent Business Traveler”
Reviews.Author: Charlotteonweb
Reviews.Content: As a business traveler the free WiFi, the Starbucks and the connection to the mall make this a great location. They even have a sundries shop where the nicest woman works. The only recommendation I have is to add a covered seated area for the smokers that visit. I love non-smoking hotels but this would be a nice addition for those great Florida evenings after a long meeting to enjoy a drink outside.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: Tom B
Reviews.Content: Great hotel,freindly staff,nice business ceter,bar in hotel and starbucks++++++++

Reviews.Title: “Nice vacation in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: memberCuracao
Reviews.Content: The property was nice but the nicest part was the accesibility to the Florida mall, we were actually in the mall, with a starbucks very near and of course the foodcourt and last but not least the shopping...., ok about the hotel itself its quite nice but, please review and double check about your reservation to avoid "miscommunications" what looked like to be a very dissapointed hotel stay, turned out to be quite nice thanks to the manager Tara who did a great job. The rooms are well kept but the full size beds are on the small side. Anyway we enjoyed our christmas vacation in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: mohamedramdan76
Reviews.Content: I like it and the stay was very nice and I enjoyed a lot the accommodation and i met very helpful people

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly and helpful”
Reviews.Author: Trevor S
Reviews.Content: After an abscence of 10 years or so I have returned to this hotel. The ownership of the hotel has changed but I have no complaints. The rooms are clean and quiet. The location is excellent. The staff were very helpful and very friendly. I will return again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent property - adjoining the mall is a nice plus”
Reviews.Author: Hokiechip
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a business conference in early January. The hotel staff was very good, rooms are fairly quiet, and the fact it adjoins the shopping mall is a nice bonus. I ate breakfast in the restaurant each morning and wasn't overly impressed with that part of the property, but there is a Starbucks in the lobby and the rooms have refrigerators so it's not a biggie. There's not a hotel shuttle for the airport but you can get the Means hotel shuttle for $18.

Reviews.Title: “conference fascility”
Reviews.Author: Ann W
Reviews.Content: I attended a business conference here and we also had rooms in the Hotel. ALL of the accomodations, business and the personal rooms, was fabulous! Extremely comfortable, the staff was always smiling and courteous. It was just an all around good experience. I would definitly go back!

Reviews.Title: “My dream Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mariela d
Reviews.Content: The location and the shops around is someting i like. No needs to go anywhere everything is located around. You can relax enjoy an it has someting very romantic around there/ What i can tell i will be ther soon. I dond have photo .

Reviews.Title: “January 1st at the Florida Mall Hotel”
Reviews.Author: nino91
Reviews.Content: Best place in Orlando for bussiness, shopping and close to the attractions

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel next to Florida Mall and short distance from attractions”
Reviews.Author: Blanky B
Reviews.Content: Excellent accomodations and location. Next to Florida Mall and major attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Experience!!”
Reviews.Author: jumperwife
Reviews.Content: My company stayed here for a work conference. From the time we pulled through the valet to stay until the time we left....exellent. Very courteous staff, clean hotel, most comfortable beds/pillows ever and food for our functions excellent. We ventured into various spots in the hotel and the staff working these venues were kind, courteous and aware of all our needs. Also love the fact that the mall is attached as we didn't have a lot of time to go elsewhere while in Orlando. This gave us a little side venture for our spare time!! Would definitely stay again!! :)

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: SenaNole
Reviews.Content: My husband has stayed here on business several times and really liked it. I stayed with him a few times, and found everything to be exemplary, especially the location - great shooping at The Florida Mall! Recently, we were in Orlando for the Champs Sports Bowl (GO 'NOLES!!!) and stayed for 1 night. Everything was fantastic. LOVE the attached Starbucks! The rooms are SO nice, and the staff was very friendly and welcoming, and funny! We got in very late, but were welcomed warmly despite the late hour. We wanted to sleep in the next day given our late arrival and the fact that we rarely get time away together (we have 3 very sweet but demanding children!!), and the hotel did not hesitate to give us a late checkout of 2 more hours! I was onlly going to ask for 1 more hour, but they offered 2! How awesome is THAT!!

Reviews.Title: “lovely and friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: pamela d
Reviews.Content: From the minute we checked in til our departure, we received superior service and accommodations at this hotel. Rooms were comfortable and attractive. The front desk always had courteous and very helpful staff. Crickets, the hotel pub, had delicious food and charming waiters. The restaurant had delicious breakfasts, and the BEST waitress, Morna!! We would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel & Location”
Reviews.Author: BV S
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights (21-22 Dec) and had a great experience. The rooms were spacious and very comfortable; the staff were extremely helpful, friendly and accommodating and believe they exhibited a professionalism that made one feel quite welcomed and at home. Conveniently located withi the Florida Mall and with surround big name stores/shops located nearby and within walking distance, makes this hotel a place where we will visit again when in the Orlando area. BVS&VGS

Reviews.Title: “A fablous all round hotel”
Reviews.Author: Dolly123_12
Reviews.Content: I found this hotel excellent and have stayed here with work previously. The whole experience of staying here is enjoyable, with all your needs met by excellent modern facilities and helpful pleasant staff. The check In process is is delt with efficiently with friendly staff, who go that extra mile in helping with any information etc that you may need to make your stay in The Florida area more comfortable. The rooms are comfortable and spacious and you are provided with extra things such as water, a fridge and wifi. During my last stay i was plesently supprised at the refubished lobby area and the opening of the new restraunt (can recommend breakfast) There is also a Starbucks on site too The other facilities such as the pool and the gym which are also new, are excellent too This is a great all round hotel, where the facilities provide everything you need. The staff are friendly and helpful and go that extra mile to ensure you enjoy your stay

Reviews.Title: “Big rooms”
Reviews.Author: leandquach
Reviews.Content: We stayed here from 28-31 Dec and had a great time. The rooms were very large, clean and comfortable. The hotel is very conveniently located within the Florida Mall, where you can grab a bite to eat or stroll around the many many shops. We enjoyed valet parking and wifi access. We paid around 220 USD per night (which included valet and wifi)!

Reviews.Title: “Surprising...in a good way!”
Reviews.Author: Marilia v
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed there for 3 nights during christmas eve and christmas. We arrived a little late but the staff was none the less friendly and helpful. The room was wonderful and the bed was just right. And while the hotel is connected to the Florida Mall, you wouldn't know it until you went through the entrance, that's to say that it was very quiet and relaxing. We're disney annual pass holders and we go to orlando quite a bit. Usually we stay on property but we wanted something a little less expensive this time around and the hotel was a good choice since they had a deal going. While there is a resort fee, the good internet connection itself is worth it. We also enjoyed the serenity of no doors slamming or kids running and screaming in the halls. We ate only one meal in the hotel and it was decent, but with the mall and the food court literally steps away, it makes dining very convenient, especially if you have a party with different cravings. The hotel is surrounded by lots of stores and restaurants and we're tempted to try their thanksgiving/black friday special. The location is also conveniently located by the Florida turnpike and the airport expressway and if you want to shoot over to I-4 and then the parks, it's only a 20-30 minute drive. While the maps say that the expressway is a toll road, the portion between the hotel and I-4 both coming and going is free so no need to bother with busy side streets. The area is also less touristy than the closeby International Drive.

Reviews.Title: “A Fun Way to Shop til You Drop!”
Reviews.Author: NellieTG
Reviews.Content: Florida hotel was great. Food at Crickets was really good, and great prices - buy one get one free appetizers. Yay! The staff members were very nice. Camilla day spa was a relaxing way to end a good of shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Great First Stay”
Reviews.Author: Alphonso S
Reviews.Content: I am not one for reviews but my stay at this hotel deserves a review. Getting to the hotel was quite easy and the welcome at reception was great. The room was very nice and comfortable. The location for shopping is perfect and ideal. The friendliness of the staff was great and very helpful. The overall experience was a very good one and I shall recommend staying here. Good job

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel”
Reviews.Author: Salth20girl
Reviews.Content: Beautiful hotel with friendly staff. Starbucks and grab-n-go right there in the lobby. Valet parking available. Mall enterance right from lobby. Only negative is the parking/traffic around mall. There is not a specific parking area for only hotel patrons. So basically you are parking at a mall... Otherwise, the hotel is beautiful and I really enjoyed the stay.

Reviews.Title: “Best shopping”
Reviews.Author: Hans S
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located right in the middle of Florida Mall - fantastic. Lots of free parking and a really friendly staff. NIce, clean rooms with bathrooms in black marbel.

Reviews.Title: “Lawford”
Reviews.Author: Lawford R
Reviews.Content: Hotel is perfect, especially during the holidays! Very nice customer service especially in Marcelo's Bistro with Monique and Marcelo both are exceptional employees. Just a little disppointed with the comfort of the bed itself, Woke up with neck and back pains everyday. Think they need to update the comfort of the beds. Also the charges at the end of your stay for the wii fi and water is disapointing. Overall had a great time!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay, shop, and eat!”
Reviews.Author: kneebrdr
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Florida Hotel which is attached to the Florida Mall in Orlando. The staff was superb, the rooms were updated and very clean. With the hotel being attached to the mall, it was easy to run out and do a little Christmas shopping and grab dinner at one of the restaurants. I will definitely stay at the Florida Hotel again next time I am in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Great location - average hotel”
Reviews.Author: Gbraverman
Reviews.Content: We moved to this hotel after not being able to find parking the previous day..my kids loved the access to the mall and the ability to drop off items during xmas shopping. The hotel itself is unremarkable in every sense with nothing great or terrible to report. they were working on the lobby during our visit- which was both noisy and annoying, but the rate was good and we were spent little time at the hotel itself.

Reviews.Title: “Marcelo's Bistro Excellent Food and Service - The Florida Hotel & Conference Center, Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Mia T
Reviews.Content: Marcelo's Bistro just opened at The Florida Hotel & Conference Center located in the Florida Mall, Orlando. I had the hamburger with sweet potato fries and it was delicious. What a treat after a day of shopping. Their sweet potato fries are the best I have ever had. The restaurant was quiet and the service great. Our waiter was Marcelo himself a long time employee of the hotel that the owner named the restaurant after him. What a great testament to this establishment that they honor an employee and leave a legacy for his service. I will definately go back on my next visit to the mall.

Reviews.Title: “A must for shoppers !”
Reviews.Author: Julie C
Reviews.Content: Great location for shoppers, Hotel restaureant and bar had great service. Breakfast was fantastic. Hotel was under renovation when I stayed there but this did not affect me in any way, disruption was kept to a minimum and guests were kept well informed. I found the staff to be very friendly, courteous and efficient. I loved the idea of the daily cash back if you didn't have your room serviced.

Reviews.Title: “A Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Mark N
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had a great stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center - I attended a workshop during the day and my wife had the opportunity to shop!!

Reviews.Title: “Very low quality hotel and poor customer service”
Reviews.Author: Kiddv
Reviews.Content: Me and my family just stayed there for Christmas and after having spent 4 nights in the Hilton Orlando we moved to this hotel trusting on the various reviews. The truth was that this was a terrible mistake, as this hotel is no more than a 2 stars as compared to the Hilton Orlando that is a great hotel with excellent service, and very easily a 5 stars. Prices are very similar and there are hidden charges of 11 dollars per day that they can't even explain. when we arrived we were told that it was not possible to have the rooms next to each other, when we had the bookings with that request. Additionally we were explained that there was an additional 11 per night which included the self parking, when in reality the self parking is parking in the mall. The room was very two stars nothing special, small but clean. Beds were small at least, but again nothing as the pillow tops in the Hilton beds. We requested late check out as our flight was delayed and were told there was no way to get it as the hotel was full... Not even for one room. As I am I requested to talk to a manager who was able to accommodate this late check out request. In sum the staff is pretty much incompetent and we felt as if they thought they were doing us a favor. When leaving the valet parking person stared at us while we were loading our bags... I mean they did not even tried to be helpful, not even for a tip. Honestly never again. If you want really good service don't go to this hotel as they still have a lot to work on. We were attended by Latoya at check in and also when trying to do the late check out, terrible service. I give a 2 based on the fact that the rooms were clean, but that was it. Go to Hilton Orlando, you won't regret it

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable hotel especially if you need to be near the Florida Mall”
Reviews.Author: Floridalorax
Reviews.Content: Our son recently got a job at one of the major retailers in the Florida Mall so we decided to stay there for a night when visiting him, especially because the hotel has an entrance directly into the Mall. The hotel room was very comfortable and well appointed with a nice bathroom, a flat screen panel television and a very spacious and modern elongated desk system that would have accommodated well a business traveler.

Reviews.Title: “What a great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Jessie V
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here and we loved it. Unfortunately, we only stayed one night but we will definitely be back. The mall is literally connected to the hotel so you don't have to deal with driving and parking. We bought a bunch of Christmas gifts during our short stay. I wished we had hotel like that here in San Juan!

Reviews.Title: “I don't understand why this is so highly rated.”
Reviews.Author: NixonKitty
Reviews.Content: They offered a coupon through tripadvisor. I showed the coupon to the front desk on my iPhone but he wouldn't accept it unless I printed it. The irony is they had one of those "green" signs in the bathroom about the towels. The hotel is acceptable. I've stayed in a LOT nicer places. What really burned me is when I went to iron my shirt the iron stained it. I really had no backup for my business meeting. With all the options in FL I wouldn't recommend this place, and I can't figure out why it's rated so highly???

Reviews.Title: “Close to Airport”
Reviews.Author: kingbon
Reviews.Content: Stayed at hotel prior to departing from Orlando Airport to come home. Never stayed in hotel with door bell and maid service light on outside of room. The room was clean and the services were excellent. Front desk person, Latoya did a excellent job and even remembered my name latter in the day. Hotel is connected to large Florida Mall - excellent shopping. Price was also good. Did pay resort fee of $11.00 but excellent internet service was part of fee. Don't have free transportation to airport but offer through a service. Would stay here again for sure. Hotel has 511 rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Cory S
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hotel for business the room was very clean and quite. The conference center staff was excelent, food and cervice was great.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay at The Florida”
Reviews.Author: leneanne
Reviews.Content: I feel that the most important job in a hotel is the employee at the Front Desk. We were greeted by an exceptional servcie minded receptionist who made us feel welcomed immediately. We were even allowed to check in at 10 AM. Wow. Room was fine . Be warned though that in addition to the room price and taxes , a service fee of 19 usd was added on for each day. When I called to ask what this was about, I was told it covered the water bottles in the room, and newspaper in the lobby. Unusual, as I was told this was free

Reviews.Title: “Great!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Lilian84
Reviews.Content: ItÂ´s my third stay at this hotel , one stay is better than the other. The staff is friendly, we have the mall in the hotel so it is very easy and convenient for shopping. The rooms are very clean and all the staff is helpful and kind. I love this hotel and I will return every year. (my english is not so good)

Reviews.Title: “Second visit to the hotel”
Reviews.Author: Liliana S
Reviews.Content: I went with my mother. The staff was friendly and always willing to help. Also the service at the restaurant was great. I want to thank specially the bellboy and the waitress.

Reviews.Title: “Our 2 day stay in the Florida Hotel in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Murray T
Reviews.Content: I spent a couple of days with my family on Thanksgiving day and the day after as we wanted to take advantage of the GREAT location (Connected to Florida Mall) and take advantage of the Midnigt store openings and not have to worry about parking or traffic for our Christmas shopping. The suite was FANTASTIC, it was roomy, clean and bright. It had 2 tv's which allowed the kids to watch tv in the bedroom while my wife and I relaxed in the separate living room area watching our own program. We had our Starbucks in the morning since is conveniently located in the lobby of the Hotel, and had a wonderful lunch and dinner at "Marcelo's" the Hotel restaurant, It was a very pleasent experience after spending several hours of shopping. THe Hotel service was EXCELLENT! Since the moment that you walked into the Hotel, the service is very friendly. . My family and I can't wait to repeat our experience and enjoy our stay in the very near future.

Reviews.Title: “Bussiness trip”
Reviews.Author: VSPE
Reviews.Content: I was staying at the hotel for five nights on a recent conference trip and found hotel to be a good hotel and a good value. The hotel has some unique features that typical hotels oes not have - its connected to large shopping mall with a more than few high end stores. The hotel is clean and rooms were large and comfortable. Internet was free and had very good speed. The restaurant on a ground floor has good and tasty menue and good personnel. The hotel staff is very friendly. The passage to the shopping mall is right from hotel (closed at night) and you are few steps away from food court of shopping mall with selection of restaurants good enough for breakfast or lunch. With exception of few, I would not recommend them for a dinner. The parking for hotel guest is same parking as for shopping mall and its not secure at night, even you see a security cars driving around. The hotel conference rooms are very cold with temperature in mid 60F. The room temperatures are individually controlled and thermostat was working. Its a really excelent hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A comfrtable, relaxing Hotel with a wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: moinalmasri
Reviews.Content: I am a memeber of the HHonors and I have been staying at the Hilton for a number of years. I thought that the service rendered by the Hilton is unmatched until I stayed at the Florida Hotel wherein experience proved that Florida Hotel provides the same if not a better service. I would really advise all friends, co-workers and relatives to experience and explore that hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great!!!”
Reviews.Author: Sandi0907
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center twice. Both of my visits were very enjoyable. It was very clean and comfortable. The Staff was very friendly and outgoing.

Reviews.Title: “Quality Service and Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: Isaac C
Reviews.Content: My recent stay with my wife at the Florida Hotel was memorable. The quality and level of service met and exceed our expectation. The staff is friendly, professional and very helpful. The location is ideal for shopping. The hotel is attached to the Florida Mall and is very convienient for a hassle free shopping experience.

Reviews.Title: “Service Rating”
Reviews.Author: Kofi-Kakraba A
Reviews.Content: I was happy to have stayed at the Florida Hotel & Conference center, just 3 weeks ago and enjoyed every bit of thier service and hospitality.The rooms were always neat and well kapt, personnel were warm and happy to be doing thier job. One piece of my luggage did not arrive for 2 full days and when I finally approached reception , I was assisted to have a shave stick and accesories. Being new to Florida even though I have previously travelled to other US cities, I needed a taxi and again the front desk helped me get a cab driver by name -Carlos ( he was such an excellent person ).The support the hotel gave to my organisation - The International Sports Coalition to put up an excellent conference impressed me very much .

Reviews.Title: “exellent holiday hotel”
Reviews.Author: lindsay b
Reviews.Content: well positioned hotel right on the mall yet quiet with a great pool to relax at . Hotel staff were very helpful and the bar meals of a very good standard . A good place for a holiday . L Browne Glasgow

Reviews.Title: “VERY GOOD”
Reviews.Author: ALEXANDRE V
Reviews.Content: .Was very good in all apects, very good all services hotel,for exemple, person,room services,plenary sites always clean and all palces too, easy acess to output in the mall,easy acess to get hotel with bus o car ,

Reviews.Title: “Good "standard" hotel”
Reviews.Author: DAAFY
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed here for 3 nights; I was on a business trip to Orlando that included a black-tie dinner event at Walt Disney, and so chose this based on location, convenience and price. I was not disappointed. Location-wise, the hotel is 10 minutes from the international airport, and 10 minutes from the parks. It is right inside the Florida Mall, which offers the convenience of access to a pretty good shopping center (Apple Store inside!), a Starbucks and general goods store downstairs, access to various restaurants, etc. It has all the necessary conveniences (flat screen TV, in-room fridge, OK bed, good AC, etc.) without being "wow" luxurious, and its pricing is very good. Above all, it's practical. For example it has great WiFi, ample parking (it's part of a mall), and for everything it charges you $11 per night in "service fees". Much better than other hotels that are charging $15 just for WiFi, and $30 for parking. I appreciated the in-shower shampoo/conditioner dispenser. Not pretty, but much better from an ecological sense than those tiny plastic bottles that are probably fast filling up our Nation's landfills. So no, it's not a luxury resort, but it more than serves the purpose of having a good place to stay, convenient access to major highways, etc., whether you are here on business, or pleasure.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ronaldo C
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel. Excellent convenience of having a shopping center next door. Good accommodation. The staff of Marcelo's Bistro is lovely.

Reviews.Title: “breathtaking”
Reviews.Author: Rhoda J
Reviews.Content: This hotel is amazing, the beds are wonderful, comfortable, cozy. The staff does an excellent job in cleaning and room service. I would recommend this hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: snowbirdy
Reviews.Content: My husband, son and I stayed one night at this hotel prior to catching an early flight the next day. The location is very near the airport which was very helpful. The room and especially the bathroom was very clean and the beds were comfy. Check in was quick and the gentleman who checked us in (Kenny?) was very helpful in giving us directions and such. The best part of our stay was being able to swim in the heated (90 degree!!!) pool in spite of the fact that it was rainy and out of the ordinary chilly for Florida. Having the Florida mall adjacent to the hotel was a bonus because we were able to get dinner (without going outdoors in the rain) at the mall's foodcourt. This hotels a/c system was very quiet. I usually have a hard time sleeping through the night in hotels because the a/c system wakes me up everytime it turns on throughout the night but that was not the case in this hotel. We enjoyed our stay and would definetely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “good,cleaning&convenient”
Reviews.Author: Yingjie Z
Reviews.Content: giving chance, i will book it again the view is beautifulï¼Œ food is good and the price is fair frontdesk is warmly and make you feel good

Reviews.Title: “Just beautiful!”
Reviews.Author: Joann B
Reviews.Content: I attend a conference at this hotel in 2009 and was very impressed with the rooms, the staff, the easy check-in, check-out - and of course the beautiful Florida scenery. I will certainly keep this hotel on my list for the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great Conference Facilities, handy location, great for shoppers!”
Reviews.Author: onions25
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel for the last three years for a minimum of 10 days at a time for an annual conference, ranging from 200-550 delegates. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful, willing to accommodate our requests and find solutions. Being greeted by the doormen who remember us from previous visits is a real testament to the quality of the staff. The hotel is progressively undergoing upgrades, so be aware there may be some work around but they are handling it well, and the changes are well worth it. Crickets is a lovely place to relax and have a drink or light snack and the new restaurant in the lobby serves superb food and has attentive waitstaff. Being situated right with the Mall is very handy for shopping also. The beds are super comfy! Housekeeping kept our rooms clean and tidy and were always ready to provide anything additional. I would recommend this hotel for your next function or conference, or just as a great base for a holiday.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: RGFVANDERKOLK
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, good service and very nearbt The Florida Mall

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay and shop.”
Reviews.Author: kristi r
Reviews.Content: kristi-and-steve very nice place to stay .service was great .very friendly service.went out the way to help in any way.will be back again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: Cubs_Fan_In_Florida
Reviews.Content: I thought the hotel was clean. Room was decent size but beware of the double beds--too small to comfortably share. Engineer working on elevator introduced himself and said he was on duty all night if there were any problems with my room. Really convenient being attached to the mall. I paid $80/night.

Reviews.Title: “Conference”
Reviews.Author: Maxime F
Reviews.Content: The Hotel staff is very courteous. The rooms are spacious and clean, with the cleaning staff very good. The men at the door are very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “matthew r”
Reviews.Author: m r
Reviews.Content: one of the best hotels i have stayed in.very friendly staff warn the hotel has a good vibe and feels grand the gym is realy good.perfect

Reviews.Title: “Business and shopping”
Reviews.Author: Alain H
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with the services and facilities, and I actually enjoyed the friendly efficient service so much, the clean comfortable accommodations. This Hotel is and convenient for business and conference, with lots of extra rooms. And you can do all kinds of shopping on the go just around the Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and service.”
Reviews.Author: Susan C
Reviews.Content: This hotel is attached to The Florida Mall, making it an excellent destination for shoppers. It is near enough to the Orlando attractions and international airport to be convenient for travelers. It has an international flavor with visitors from all over the world staying here. The staff were courteous, friendly and efficient. Rooms are outstanding in cleanliness and amenities such as coffee, tea, and internet connectivity. I would also commend the restaurant and bar staffs for their attentive service.

Reviews.Title: “Summer Vacation For Several Nights”
Reviews.Author: Kevin S
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very well situated as it is actually attached to the Florida Mall. You walk straight from the lobby through to the Mall with great stores and an excellent food court. The hotel staff are very friendly, courteous and oblidging and the rooms are very comfortable with their own fridges. The swimming pool is also great - a standard rectangular shape, deep at one end and shallow with walk down steps at the other end. The entrance to the hotel with it's outside fountain and clean open plan reception area is quite grand with a high ceiling and beautiful chandelier. If you have your own transport, getting to the parks and International Drive is straight forward and there are lots of good restaurants close by - Outback Steakhouse, The Olive Garden, Chilli's, Panera Bread to name just a few.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, Fun Hotel with a thoughtful "green" option”
Reviews.Author: Aussieforestgirl
Reviews.Content: My stay at the Florida Hotel was for a conference that was also held at the hotel. The hotel claims it's a friendly one, and they are not kidding! The staff are, without exception, friendly and helpful, from housekeeping and front desk to the porters (Hi Clim and Joey), to the CEO! This is my second stay and I saw many of the same staff again, they have a great rapport with international guests, making all of us as comfortable as possible, I was there for nearly 2 weeks, wish I'd had my family with me then I wouldn't have rushed home! Breakfast at Marcellos is wonderful, Crickets bar is a great way to wind down at the end of the day (Hi Yvette). Looking forward to a visit in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: rbatson
Reviews.Content: From the moment my sister and I arrived, until we departed, EVERYTHING was awesome! Valet, the convenience of the fabulous Mall, the bartender, the PERFECT place for a girls night out! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed my stay!”
Reviews.Author: Linda W
Reviews.Content: We were there for a church conference. The only complaint that two couples had was that they had two beds instead of a king size bed. The hotel staff took care of the problem in a matter of minutes. We will come back again.

Reviews.Title: “My stay at Florida Hotel and Conference Cntr”
Reviews.Author: Carmen C
Reviews.Content: I travel frequently on work and personal trips. I have such a difficult time choosing a hotel because it is important to me to stay in a room that has a clean feeling. This hotel was great! The rooms were very clean, the work out facility was awesome and the hotel staff went above and beyond to make you feel welcome. It is located in an area that is very convenient to shopping and restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: Vzlagirl
Reviews.Content: I had the best experience in this hotel, great location, big rooms, very clean and near the Florida Mall. The service is excellent as well and the frontdesk and bell boys are very nice and helpful. I totally recommend the breakfast buffet, as well as the appetizers for a nice dinner option. I will definItely stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel and Conference Center”
Reviews.Author: midepy
Reviews.Content: the friendly efficient service, the clean comfortable accommodations, and our convenient location

Reviews.Title: “Shopper's Paradise”
Reviews.Author: Clerk96
Reviews.Content: I have stayed over 10 times at this hotel. It is fantastic. Huge rooms; plenty of free parking; lots of conference facilities and attached to the Florida Mall. You never have to go outside the hotel to enter the mall. Best nights' sleep ever!

Reviews.Title: “Business experience”
Reviews.Author: Gwen K
Reviews.Content: I had the most excellent services at this hotel. The area was nice and having every store just in walking distance was helpful. My visit to Starbucks and the mini store in the hotel, were always greeted with a super friendly staff. On my trip I spent many days ordering room service. The food was perfect, they a had fast delivery time, and a lot of options. Thank you again to all the staff you did a great job :)

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: karensolihull
Reviews.Content: Spent just 1 night at the Florida Hotel but would happily have stayed longer. Hotel was easy to find at the Florida Mall with lots of free parking. Next to the mall with lots of shops and fast food options. Check in was good and the first impressions of the hotel were lovely. Room was nice with big comfy beds and a great bathroom. Pool area was nice with thick padded cushions on the chairs which made for a very comfortable day in the sun. The daily happy hour is good value for drinks and appetisers and we ate in the bar. However our waitress was awful, she ignored us for ages as there was a large group from an airline in there. Food was good and cheap when we were eventually served but then she kept getting the bill wrong - overcharging us for everything which we found suspicious. We decided not to tip her as she was so bad!
