However, when we got the bill the next morning we found that she had added a tip on for herself - we obviously weren't happy so complained to the manager at check out - she then refunded the entire cost of our meal which was brilliant and more than made up for the dreadful waitress. Overall our short stay was good and we would stay again - thanks to the manager!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable Stay....”
Reviews.Author: S T
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, location & value! Strongly recommend for business or pleasure!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service and location”
Reviews.Author: Islander111
Reviews.Content: Hotel is close to everything in Orlando and attached to a large shopping mall for those rainy days. Check in was easy and when I got to the room and decided it was too close the elevators the desk staff was very accomodating in changing my room. Happy hour and the breakfast buffet are good choices to try. Overall a very positive experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Claire S
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for two nights. Found everything excellent from check in to check out. Staff were polite and courteous. Rooms are modern and extemely comfortable and well furnished. Everything on hand in this hotel, Starbucks in the main reception and a huge food court in the ajoining mall as well as plenty of shops to look around. Also on a main bus route for Disney and Shopping outlets - Would highly recommend and would have no hesitation staying again

Reviews.Title: “Christa's Review”
Reviews.Author: Christa T
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed my stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference. It has been one of the nicest rooms i have ever stayed in. The mall was just right there. Chili's and other places were right in walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “great customer service and conference facilities”
Reviews.Author: alex s
Reviews.Content: I attended a 3 day conference here and they were responsible for the facilites and breakfast, some lunches and a reception one evening. the room was clean and very nice, had a desk and office chair (leather i think), excellent bathroom, comfortable bed, flat screen tv, but not in HD, closet space was ample and had an iron and plenty of hangers also a fridge,. So the room was just fine, the location is at a large mall, so parking was no problem and there is a food court less than 3 minutes away, they also have their own restaurant and even a starbucks inside the hotel plus a bar. great for shopping, i had my hair cut at the mall too. the conference facilities are excellent, all on floor 2, plenty of space and at least 6 different rooms of all sizes, adapatable to any need i would think. The food was excellent, breakfast was either continental or scrambled eggs, home fries, bacon, sausage, bread rolls, croissants, coffee or cold drinks, the luncheon was chicken breast or beef, yams, potatoes, vegetables all salad items, buffet style but with a touch of class, employees to take away used plates and flatware, cloth napkins, nice ambiance about the whole place, the reception was superb for food, scallops wrapped in bacon, chicken breasts, ham, sushi, bread, salad, desserts, but i guess you get what you pay for, altogether a great experience. it didnt hurt that british airways or virgin had all their hostesses and pilots staying there!! the room service and housekeeping staff were terrific, so friendly.. i would definitely go back again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Hattie L
Reviews.Content: This was the second opportunity that I had to stay at this hotel. Both visits were for business and I was very pleased with the service from the time I entered the hotel until I checked out. Accommodations were spacious and spic and span. Of course, the shopping was great, too. I also would like to say how accessible it is from the turnpike. I definitely hope I get the chance to visit again......maybe next time just for pleasure.

Reviews.Title: “Top notch hotel get away”
Reviews.Author: Tammy C
Reviews.Content: It was my first time staying at this hotel, but it will not be my last. I found the staff to be most helpful and courteous. Accomodations were top notch, very clean and spacious. A variety of shopping and dinning locations without every having to leave the premisis. Would recommend this hotel to friends and family going to the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Okay, but noisy”
Reviews.Author: JCZKUSA
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel for one night, would probably not stay there again. I was given a room right next to the elevators, you could hear the elevator every time it went up and down. They were also working on the hotel while I was there. It was fun being right next to the mall, but I didn't come to FL to go shopping, so this was not really a big plus for me. The room was clean, but very small. The wall-mounted soap dispenser was strange, it was like a shower in a public restroom. The beds were also very small, and I am not a big person.

Reviews.Title: “Incessant survey hounding”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer G
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 5 nights recently at the hotel. I was pleased at first and filled out 3 surveys while on property. The location is good. The rooms aren't bad and it was nice to have a refigerator. The bathroom was dirty, there were boogers on the wall. Housekeeping disturbed me even when the DND button was pushed. My "complimentary" water was not replenished daily and my in room internet did not work. For these "complimentary" services I paid a mandatory $11 fee. Fair enough, as a frequent traveler I write off a lot of little stuff because life is short. The continued requests for surveys and to be prompted for writing a Tripadvisor review reversed my view and I would not stay at this property again. The stay was ok. The hounding for feedback is over the top and has completely frustrated any level of satisfaction I had during any immediately after this stay.

Reviews.Title: “Above and Beyond”
Reviews.Author: WOPP777
Reviews.Content: The rooms are warm & inviting and clean. The pool is very large and has plenty of space to lounge around and enjoy a good book. The hotel staff smiled the entire time I was there and they displayed excellent customer service. If you are looking for a quiet meal you have to go to the Marcelo's Restaurant and order the Flintestone entree, OMG! The name speaks for itself. The steak is a MAMMOTH and the sweet potatoes are delectable. The staff was great and displayed excellent customer service from the time I walked in until the time I left. The chef that night was Delilah and I had to speak to her, because that was the BEST steak I ever had and everything was cooked to perfection the FIRST TIME. One thing that stands out about the hotel was there Sky Deck which displays update information about arriving and departing flights. This was the first time i experience seeing this. Keep up! The great job Florida Hotel and Conference Center.

Reviews.Title: “Helpful & friendly”
Reviews.Author: les444_11
Reviews.Content: Only to willing to help & give information when required ! If they did not know they found out for me .shopping mall right on your door step great would book again. easy reach from Airport west on the 528.

Reviews.Title: “CANAR Conference”
Reviews.Author: James B
Reviews.Content: The hotel made the conference an even greater experience. The staff was friendly and courteous and took care of all my needs. The rooms were great. I even had my boarding pass printed off at the front desk. This is a hotel I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: “CANAR Conference”
Reviews.Author: Curtis C
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff handled our complex conference with the greatest of ease. The technical assistance who helped with audio-visual set-up was great! Really responsive and knowledgable. We had a great conference, due largely to the friendliness and great hospitality of the hotel staff. Rooms were comfortable, and well-appointed. My wife and I would love to plan a trip to Orlando at some time in the future, and we would definitely enjoy staying at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. I do have to say though, that Mears transportation from the hotel was very slow and disorganized -- no reflection on the hotel. Very congenial people! Curtis Cook

Reviews.Title: “Excellent visit”
Reviews.Author: Robert W
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel is well located for shopping, business or pleasure. It is connected to a large mall with a variety of excellent stores and shops. It is clean and all the staff are amazingly friendly and helpful. I recommend this hotel for business or pleasure. Excellent value.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice !!!”
Reviews.Author: giota t
Reviews.Content: Very Nice hotel, the staff was very professional and courteous. I enjoyed my stay and will be back !

Reviews.Title: “Lives up to the glowing reviews”
Reviews.Author: paulyduckduck
Reviews.Content: Just had a nice five night stay and the hotel lives up to all expectations. I would give them a major DING on one significant item of disingenuousness. Be aware they will surchage you daily for an additional $11.00 on top of all other charges whcih they call a "service charge", a cagey way of simply advertising one rate and then demanding additional payment upon arrival with no option to decline. The open lot, uncovered, unsupervised parking if free.. or is it? It's listed on the service charge as are the 2 bottles of water in your room, etc. I just despise this practice!!!!! Really. You're too nice of a hotel to nickel and dime your clientel this way. You wouldn't catch me doing this sort of thing in my own business. I'd feel embarrased. Why deliver such good product only to leave the patron with a bad taste about your business practice? Just state the charge up front as is the practice with other, more directly honest hotels. Five stars for facility operations and comfort. One star for being sneaky with people. Your rating from me is now an average of the two.

Reviews.Title: “Great location is the strongest point for this no frills property”
Reviews.Author: fun1wpb
Reviews.Content: First a warning: even if you reserve a room by telephone and are told you will receive a certain configuration (King Size bed, two double beds, etc.) and even if they send you the confirmation showing that room (like "Deluxe King") be prepared when you arrive to be told that they "never guarantee" room type and that the reservation doesn't mean anything. Of course, they only tell you that after you sign in and go to the room and discover your room isn't what you expect. Then, if you attempt to leave, they inform you that you will still be charged since they have a 72 hour cancellation policy. This was a most frustrating experience that happened to me. The hotel itself is "ok". It's really on par with a "motel". It is no frills--there are no amenities (soaps, q-tips, lotions, etc.) in the rooms. Mounted on the wall within the shower stall is shampoo and body soap. We asked about getting some bar soap, and (I kid you not) were told that they are only available for "VIP Guests". Whoops....I guess we didn't rate. O.k. so room wasn't what was promised, no amenities....Breakfast buffet is o.k.--typical hotel buffet at $17.00--made to order eggs, with basic continental breakfast spread and bacon/sausage/oatmeal, etc. Seemed pricey for Orlando, yet inexpensive compared to a "big city" where this type of spread typically costs upwards of $20. Lunch at the hotel restaurant, however, was low quality. Service was slow, food was bad. I ordered a burger--medium rare--it came out burnt with not a hint of pink and no juice whatsoever. During our meal they were rolling restaurant furniture past us--they were setting up a new area. You'd think they could do it during "off hours" when they didn't have guests--but this place doesn't really value customer service or think about how things impact their guests (at least not their "Non-VIP Guests"). Great part of the hotel is that it is connected with a substantial shopping mall. Lots of great stores--good walking. Don't need to go outdoors to get to it--it's literally connected. If you like to shop, this is a good thing. Nice "walking" for exercise, too. Sadly, the mall isn't open early enough for breakfast--that would be the best. I had to go to this hotel for a work meeting. Given my experience, I would not choose it again. I've stayed at other places in Orlando that are nicer, less expensive, and that offer basic amenities. They also provide the room promised--and printed on the reservation form. I'm particularly fond of Embassy Suites on International Boulevard--nice area of town with plenty to see and do and near outlet malls.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel for retail therapy”
Reviews.Author: linpom
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights at the end of our holiday. The hotel is perfectly placed for last minute shopping as it is in the Florida Mall. Parking is free and easy - right outside the hotel entrance. Our room was large, spotlesslessly clean and very comfortable. There are places to eat within the hotel including Starbucks, and of course the Florida Mall food hall is on your doorstep. We got a good deal through roomsnet and were very pleased with the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service for the Business Traveler”
Reviews.Author: Dallas B
Reviews.Content: Excellent, efficient, and friendly staff for the business/adult traveler. I remained 2 additional days to enjoy Orlando from this central location. The new Marcelo Restaurant's dinners were exceptional and I was pleased to have business associates join me there. Being attached to an attractive and large mall provided easy access to salons and other services. There is a Starbucks in the lobby, along with Crickets Restaurant and Bar that is set up comfortably for the individual traveler to have a meal or for a group to watch a game and for all to enjoy the 2 for 1 Happy Hour that lasts from 3PM -9PM. George, who has been with the hotel for 12 years will make your morning egg dishes to taste, and when catering services were used for business programs, we found the food to be fresh and warm. Enjoy your stay.

Reviews.Title: “Lived up to all the positive reviews!”
Reviews.Author: SussexPeter
Reviews.Content: My wife & I had two stays (4 nights & 6 nights) in October 2011. The hotel lived up to all the positive reviews I had read. It is better suited to business travellers /or couples rather than families with children due to its location & mall shopping. There are good places to eat at the hotel (Crickets - food all day plus half price drinks & snacks during "Happy Hour." There is Ruby Tuesday & also California Pizza within the Mall complex -both good. Within 5 minutes drive are Outback/ Red Lobster & Chillis all good. Staff & amenities (including pool area) all very good.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay and service”
Reviews.Author: Randallan
Reviews.Content: Great accomodations, really comfortable. If you opt to not have the maid clean the room, get a $5 coupon for Starbucks downstairs. Restaurant in hotel has good food. Security is prompt We had a noisey neighbor late one night, within 10 minutes it was completely quiet. Great staff in the Stop N Go store in the hotel. The fitness center was the best I have seen for hotels under $100. Room service was prompt and good quality.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: TheMadDawg
Reviews.Content: Wow. A great stay at below listed advertised price was a nice surprise. Very friendly and helpful staff. Nice relaxing rooms. Comfortable beds. Way too close to shopping however. Lol. For those not used to high end hotels you will think this is the best. Do yourself a favor and call for pricing before you try anywhere else. You can thank me later. "and yes I'm sure u will".

Reviews.Title: “meeting in orlando”
Reviews.Author: ps767_11
Reviews.Content: I attending a continuing education meeting at this property. The rooms were nice, a little pricey at $140/nite, but the place was nice. The escalator was working intermittantly but the elevators were very near. The meeting rooms are nice and the service for meals and snacks was good. Overall a recommend for meeting place.

Reviews.Title: “excellence”
Reviews.Author: Cvhy Y
Reviews.Content: I glad was staying in the hotel very excellent and nice place

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Travis F
Reviews.Content: I just spent a weekend at The Florida hotel Orlando and my stay was amazing. The hotel is Beautiful. The staff was so eager to help and assist with anything that was needed. Of all the hotels I have ever stayed in this one was the most enjoyable. The room was spotless and the bed was very plush and comfortable. The location was great near all the parks and other recreational activities. I intend on making this hotel my only option for lodging when I travel to Orlando. Travis F

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Tolly_007
Reviews.Content: Clean, comfortable, welcoming, friendly and good value for money. Excellent base for all that Orlando and Florida has to offer and the staff really are the most welcoming I have met

Reviews.Title: “Great two weeks at The Florida Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jose C
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel for almost two weeks;since the first day I noticed a friendly staff,very clean,very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Stay at Florida Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Felisha C
Reviews.Content: My work sent me away for 4 days and 3 nights and we stayed at the Florida Mall Hotel. The hotel was very nice and the staff gave us a warm welcome. The rooms were very comfortable. I loved how the hotel is connected to the mall so you did not have to look for parking to go into the mall, you could just walk from your room into the mall. I would recommend anyone to stay at the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: Aming S
Reviews.Content: My Husband always told me what a wonderful hotel he stayed everytime he had a bussiness trip to Orlando. Finally, I took time off from work I went with him in his Orlando trip. We stayed at The Florida Hotel & I LOVE it! I just don't want to go out because the room is so clean,very spacious, big, towels were so soft & smelled VERY CLEAN. You don't have to drive in Florida heat to go shopping. Just come out from the hotel & it's a mall. But I really don't care about shopping that time because I don't want to go out from our room! We had a great stay there & I will recommend it to all my family & friends to stay there when they are in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Great time in Florida Hotel”
Reviews.Author: World_Traveler_TV
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights in Oct while visiting Magic Kingdom and Universal studios. The hotel is located about 30 km from Disney and 10 km from Universal. Also, it is in a huge mall - perfect location. The hotel itself is huge, well maintained and clean. The rooms are big (we saw two types of room and took the one with a King bed) and nicely decorated. Breakfast wasn't included however there was the entire mall in front of us. You can also choose "the green option" which means that you don't need your room to be cleaned and get a 5$ voucher. There is plenty of parking space near the hotel. BTW, the sink in the one King bed is separated from the bathroom. We highly recommend the hotel for exploring Universal and Disney's parks.

Reviews.Title: “Great room, friendly staff, and fairly priced room!”
Reviews.Author: tokenhoyt
Reviews.Content: We were SO impressed with the cleanliness of the room and the friendliness of the staff. A rare combination, it seems. We ordered room service (the food was pretty good and not overly expensive). Our dinners arrived in less than 30 minutes. The server called our room about half an hour later just to see that we were satisfied. We asked for a late chekout to accomodate our flight departure and the request was granted without hassle. What more can I say? We enjoyed our stay and didn't get raped when the bill came!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel connected to the Florida Mall”
Reviews.Author: JDawgTravels
Reviews.Content: Just stayed at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center and had a great stay. The room was pretty big, with two queen-sized beds (I think). At check-in, the front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. I also loved that the hotel was connected to the Florida Mall, although it did mean I did a bit more shopping on my trip than I intended. The only real negative was that a whole soccer team was staying on my floor, so they were a bit noisy one of the nights until midnight. Not much the hotel can do about that, though. All in all a good stay, and I'd recommend the hotel for a trip to Orlando. It was also pretty central to the theme parks, with each being a 20-25 minute drive away.

Reviews.Title: “OK hotel but don't expect any extras”
Reviews.Author: Eric G
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel on Sunday,October 9th,2011.The check in process is quick,and the rooms are clean.They charge you a $12.00 fee when checking in,which I'm still not sure why.There is no turn-down service at night,and nothing extra or special they provide.The flat screen TV is nice,but it only gets about 20 channels.There are rain-fall shower heads in the bathrooms,but the water pressure is next to nothing.Also,there is one role of toilet paper in each bathroom,no lotion,and soap and shampoo is available through a dispenser only in the bathroom.The pool is outside,and a decent size.There is no breakfast,it's $13.95 if you want to eat there.Overall,it's a pretty nice hotel,but without breakfast,the extra $12.00 they stick you with for no reason,and no other amenities,I wouldn't stay there again for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: I had a problem getting the booking sorted however a very helpful lady on the phone sorted it all in a minute. a similar situation in an Irish hotel took days to sort out. When we arrived the check in was friendly and the fastest I have ever experienced. All charges were visible at the time of booking unlike other hotels and the breakfast was excellent. For once the coffee was great (it rivalled the Starbucks next door) not the usual stewed muck served by most hotels. Well done to all concerend

Reviews.Title: “Horrible experience but friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: kcdeadhead
Reviews.Content: I stayed from Oct 1 2011- Oct 6 2011. Let me just start off by saying I'm not too picky when it comes to hotels. I've stayed in some nice hotels and others not so nice. I got a really good rate for this hotel at $72 a night. However this did not include a $11.00 a night service charge. I'm not sure what this is for. I mean its not like they included breakfast. That was $13.95 a person!! I knew this when I booked it but I thought the nice room would make up for it. I was wrong. When I first got there I had to change rooms because I could literally hear everything that was going on in the room next to me. We could hear the TV, phone ringing, and dog barking. Keep in mind this was not early, it was past 12:00am. So we changed to another room with 2 double beds. The sheets did not fit the bed properly as they were too tight and would come off. The room also seemed dated with ugly carpet. The bed was not very comfortable. It did include a flat screen but the remote sucked, the buttons were really weird. I could only turn on the TV but getting up and hitting the button on it. One good feature was the safe which we used everyday. I only gave this hotel 2 out of 5 instead of 1 because the staff was very friendly. I would not stay here again. I wish I would have booked the at the baymont inn and suites which is half the price and virutally in the same location.

Reviews.Title: “Return visit to this hotel”
Reviews.Author: susanj0y
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel many times before and have never been disappointed. This year was no exception. The rooms are large and comfortable and have refrigerator, safe and coffee making facilities. The pool has many sunloungers and pool towels. The foyer opens out on to the Florida Mall which is always a bonus. All the staff are very friendly, especially Joey who gave us such a warm welcome back on our arrival and Teralyn on the front desk who has such a professional and helpful manner. We love our visits to the Florida Hotel and cannot wait to return next year.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome service!”
Reviews.Author: Doris R
Reviews.Content: I was in a Women Conference and everything ran smoothly. Cleanliness of rooms, awesome service were provided by all employees.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Service, Accommodations and Location Convience”
Reviews.Author: Linda R
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival, right off, before parking my car the bellman cleaned off the horrible collection of black bugs from the trip "creamed" on my windshield. What a nice welcome! The service from every contact was friendly and caring. I participated in their "green" plan......I can use a towel more than once......(they gave us fresh washclothes) and gave us $5 each day for participating. (I spent it at Starbucks for coffee and Lemon Pound Cake and in the cafe for breakfast) How nice is that? And, did I tell you the dinner meal foods were exceptional too. And the staff was fun and cordial. Right thru the hotel lobby is the Florida Mall. I forgot to take an item with me from home that I needed so I went shopping....more convience and joy. The hotel is close to most everything in Orlando and yet you are out of the main stream of congestion. The 5 days there was comfortable, friendly and most enjoyable. I will stay there again when in the area, and highly recommend this facility.

Reviews.Title: “Florida Mall Hotel Review”
Reviews.Author: Allan J
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here before and always enjoyed the experience. The staff is very well trained, friendly and helpful. The hotel is shortly to open a bistro which will be a good upgrade. Well situated at the Florida mall with it's amenities. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in the Florida Mall”
Reviews.Author: darren_in_england
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a few days while in Orlando. This is a great hotel. Lovely rooms and great location, if you love to shop, as it's attached to the Florida Mall, which is popular with locals and tourists. The rooms are spacious, lovely beds, pillows and linen. Sofa in room, tv, fridge, desk. Great bathroom, shower over bath, nice tiled surfaces. Very classy. The breakfast buffet is good. The best thing about this is the staff. Very, very helpful and attentive. Full marks! This hotel is popular with the Airline crews. That shows that it is an excellent hotel as crew and airlines will not put up with shoddy hotels and staff. The hotel pool is a little small but gets the sunshine all day long. Only downside really is the location isn't great for the tourist spots. It will take around 10-15 minutes to drive along Sand Lake Road to the International Drive area. Sea World is about 20 minutes away; Disney about 30-40 minutes. The airport is about 20 minutes away. So you'll probably spend the first 15 minutes of your day driving to the I4 interstate to get you to where you want to spend the day. Having said all this, the hotel location is very quiet. All amenities onsite, with the mall attached offering great shopping and dining choices.

Reviews.Title: “Always a great experience!”
Reviews.Author: BrandonG81
Reviews.Content: I stay here frequently for business and always have a great experience! The hotel is attached to the mall if you are in need if some new threads and there all sorts of restaurants around the area. Crickets bar in the hotel has great drink specials and the food is great too! I always stay here when in Orlando! Can't beat the value for all that you get!

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional service”
Reviews.Author: G H
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Florida Hotel recently for three nights and found th staff very hospitable and gracious. The accomodations were first rate. The Hotel is convenient to shopping and attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Not just a trip but an experience”
Reviews.Author: Peggy M
Reviews.Content: I was at the hotel for three days to attend a workshop. The staff worked closely with the workshop organizer and monitored all activities. The catering service was excellant. Our room was well located near the elevators. Of course, being part of the mall was a real plus for the after workshop hours.

Reviews.Title: “Good”
Reviews.Author: Anonymous295
Reviews.Content: clean room, fancy hotel, only complaint is that water pressure in shower could be improved. had dandruff because couldn't get shampoo out of hair.

Reviews.Title: “"you will have a great time here"”
Reviews.Author: floridasunset_9
Reviews.Content: This is the first time we stayed here and I have to say WE WILL BE BACK. The majority of hotel guests stay here for a few days to coincide with conference or for a small weekend getaway. We were here for two weeks and I have to say it was perfect. This vacation was for relaxation and SHOPPING and gosh we did both!! When we arrived, we were made aware that the pool area was closed for the first five days of our stay due to refurbishment. However the hotel had made arrangements for hotel guests to use another hotel pool close to MCO. If you had a car then it was a 10min drive away and if not then busses were placed on for your convenience. I fully understand that hotels have to refurb and with September being a quiet month for Orlando this is why they do it now. it did not bother me in the slightest and the alternative pool was fantastic. Once the pool area was re opened - it is one of the best pool areas I have been too - clean - relaxing music playing at a low level, plenty of sunbathing loungers that are comfortable and complimentary towels. I was a little concerned that we would hear alot of noise from the mall or noise from the highway but apart from the odd UPS delivery van, the relaxing music drowned out any noise. other maintenance was going on throughout our stay but we were advised that they are due to open a new bistro and to make crickets more of a bar area sometime later this year. - circkets is great - we did not eat here but we stayed a couple of hours within Happy Hour - Happy Hour is on from 1600 - 2100 - Buy one get one free from what I recall everyday - NOT BAD AT ALL! Great friendly service in here. The room was cleaned and maintained throughout our 14 night stay. We did not require the room to be cleaned on a daily basis so if you pop down to the front desk and tell them your room number and you dont require your room to be cleaned you can get a $5 coupon to use either at Starbucks or Crickets. What a great incentive. One day I advised the cleaner direct that we did not require our room to be cleaned but she asked if we wanted extra water/cups/towels to ensure we were ok for the day! what more could you ask for. We had a great room on the 11th floor facing the pool and main entrance. You get a clear view of the highway, but there was no noise and on a clear morning you can see as far as the 192- Irlo Bronson (Old town attraction rides) and the Sea World tower. The room itself - was bright and fresh with a comfortable - the only thing I will say is that the bathroom could do with a drawer to store toiletries and cosmetics in - but other than that it was perfect. and the safe and fridge was an added bonus. The staff - like all the other reviews on this site - you ask they help in any way they can - they go above and beyond expecations and I am sure that if you arrive without a car they can help you to make arrangements to get to and from the Theme Parks. We did have a car and it takes approx - 10mins to get to Universal and 20mins to WDW. 15-20mins to get to the Premium Outlets at Lake Buena Vista and 10mins to the outlets on I-Drive. You dont fancy any of the eateries in the food court - try Ruby Tuesdays or the California Pizza kitchen which are both attached to the mall in different locations - the food is served piping hot and served with a smile. You have a car? - go down Sand Lake Road towards I-Drive and you will find plenty of alternative restaurants anything from TGI's to Logans Steakhouse which i have to say was fantastic... I cant rave enough about this hotel, the fact that its attached to the mall has a massive bonus especially to all you "gals" who do like to shop till you drop. Even the Mall of Milennia is only a 10min drive in the car...its so convenient. Looking forward to the next vacation....thanks Florida Hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed It Very Much”
Reviews.Author: gijane02
Reviews.Content: I spent Labor Day weekend here for my family reunion and I enjoyed the little time I could spend in my room, very much. The staff was very helpful and friendly nice decor, I liked the alarm clock with IPOD dock, bathroom was nice. I like the fact that they were being 'green' and you had the option of having new towels everyday or keeping the same ones. Of course having the mall being right next to the hotel was a plus. I would love to come back for a nice weekend with just me and my husband and take advantage of one of their packages.

Reviews.Title: “Unique Stay”
Reviews.Author: sambam68
Reviews.Content: Here's some info on this hotel: -The rooms are average sized and have a refrigerator and safe, but no microwave. -The carpet in my floor looked a bit worn, and needed to be restretched if not replaced. -The internet was solid the whole time, and was usable for on-line gaming. I had no issues at any time with latency (big plus!). -There were multiple elevators and they were fairly high speed (11 floors). -The exercise room was probably the biggest and best stocked I've seen at a hotel to date. -The (outdoor) pool/hot tub area was kept up and fairly large. -I was there for a conference, so here are the related comments: -The chairs were all worn, many stained, and all uncomfortable, as I believe the cushion has long lost its "bounce" (negative). -The rooms came in multiple sizes and each had a good cooling system. I've been to too many where the rooms would get exponentially hot based on the number of participants in them and this was not the case here (plus). -The hotel is attached to a very large mall, so shopping and eating can be done within indoor walking distance. The food court alone had 16 eateries, with many more spread throughout the mall. Overall, I'd say it was a good stay, and worth returning to if in the area again.

Reviews.Title: “Lots of conveniences”
Reviews.Author: ILuv2Travel66
Reviews.Content: Loved staying here. It's beautiful, clean, guest service staff are wonderful. The mall is attached so you don't even have to go outside the building to go shopping or catch a quick lunch at food court.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Excelent Room”
Reviews.Author: Felipe_Delphino
Reviews.Content: There is a mall inside the hotel, or a hotel inside de mall, and in my opinion this is the best thing for tourists. The room is comfortble, we can use the wifi in the hotel or some areas in the mall. The staff were always polite. I recommend the hotel. The only problem was the bathroom with a lot of hair in the bath, but the problem was solved later.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Stay”
Reviews.Author: Camilla308
Reviews.Content: We found it a great place to stay: clean, convenient and considerate helpful staff. I really like the "Go Green" idea and participated in it. Room was close to elevator, which was a convenience for my husband who walks with a walker. This stay exceeded our expectations. It was convenient to the Silver Spurs Arena We will stay there again

Reviews.Title: “Awesome property”
Reviews.Author: UF_Rhonda
Reviews.Content: The staff at this hotel are incredibly easy to work with, making sure all arrangements are made well in advance of arrival. My meeting was seemless... everything to perfection. The guest room was very spacious and comfortable. I especially enjoyed the ultra-comfortable bed! I would not have any hesitation recommending this facility and look forward to going back and staying again. Warning to smokers --- this is a non-smoking facility and to get that morning smoke, you will need to get fully dressed as the designated smoking area is right outside the front door, where motor and foot traffic is constant. :)

Reviews.Title: “Nice, convenient, but...”
Reviews.Author: Noel E
Reviews.Content: We (a party of 3) travelled from Australia and stayed at the Florida Hotel for 5 nights as the beginning of a Disney World vacation. The hotel is very good. The mall being attached is great. My wife and daughter were able to get a lot of their shopping done. We hired a car so we were able to commute to other areas also. The rooms are a good size. The beds were comfortable. The in-room safe is big enough for a lap top and we had enough room to store 3 large suitcases and our daily shopping goods! The hotel is going through some refurbishment though. On our last night it sounded like someone was drilling concrete in the room above us at 11pm which kept us awake until it finally stopped. It turned out to be from the lobby! We were on the 8th floor!! The hotel compensated us with a Starbucks drink each but we had to get to our Disney resort. Also the pool closed for a "facelift" which meant we were not able to take advantage of a hot spa in the evening. The hotel did arrange for alternative hotels to allow us to swim but seriously...who would do that!?

Reviews.Title: “Great business and holidays likewise”
Reviews.Author: Globle-Executive
Reviews.Content: This review is bassed on following a 4 night stay. Sept 2011 The hotel connected directly to the shopping mall, so an ideal location for shopping with a very short walk to your room. But with the added advantage of the hotel being well located to the rest of Orlando. The rooms are card entry and are of good size. They have the basics that you would expect, LCD TV (Hotel TV) Business desk & Lamp, Fridge, Safe. Sofa coffee table. Super king size beds and Radio alarm closck with ipod docking. The bath room has a small size bath with shower, and has a 3 push despenser shower gel etc. Towels are changed daily, together with the room being cleaned. There currently is the option of going Green, and request that you room is not cleaned every day, and in return you recive a $5 gift card to be used in the hotel. The hotel has a fair sized outdoor pool and a well equiped Gym. There are PC's available with free internet usage together with printing and scanning facility. There is a Starbucks and a bar serving Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner, but with the Mall on the door step there is plenty of choice.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Billienetherlands
Reviews.Content: The Florida hotel is located at the Florida mall, close to the airport and (by car) close to the shopping outlets. Very nice hotel, clean, comfortable at Ã  good price. We were with 3 adults and had a very nice stay. Hopefully the pool can be used next time. Starbucks, restaurant, foodcourt are aviable. We had many hotels in Orlando but next time we will book this again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean Rooms, Friendly Staff, and Lot's to Do”
Reviews.Author: travelerman48
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center is located within the Florida Mall. I traveled to this location on business, had some time to kill, and found it very convient to walk out through the lobby into the Mall to pass the time. Not to mention, there were coffee shops, eateries, and other neat places only steps from the entrance. The staff was friendly and on top of their game. I would visit this location again.

Reviews.Title: “I will definitely come here again”
Reviews.Author: Sim B
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel last minute at least on week before needing it. I wasn't too pleased before going because it was not one of my first choices as the others were booked for the convention I was going for. Once I arrived and saw the outside, I was amazed. The outside was clean and well kept, and the inside was huge and as classy as any five star hotel should be. It had some construction going on when I went, but the beauty around that small bit shined much brighter. They did not let construction get in the way of great service. The bed was comfortable and the room I chose was perfect for one person. Very quiet. I enjoyed my short stay and will keep it in the first of my mind whenever I visit Orlando/ Kissimee in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel and Service”
Reviews.Author: Della K
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very clean and comfortable. The staff were super friendly, efficient and helpful. It's attached to a great mall with many restaurants in the mall and within walking distance. Their restaurant Crickets have great happy hour drinks and appetizers. Can't beat the price. I can't wait to go back again!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed Nice Surroundings”
Reviews.Author: Mae0797
Reviews.Content: The front desk service was very professional and attentive - check-in clerk and the front desk personnel when we called to complain about smelling smoke. He said he would have the hotel security to investigate and called back to inform us of the situation and offered to come to our room to take care of the odor. The room was clean. We would suggest just a little more attention to the restrooms. Access to the Mall was nice. We will probably do another weekend vacation in the future.

Reviews.Title: “IT EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS!!”
Reviews.Author: alan e
Reviews.Content: I found the Hotel to be exceptionally maintained and clean. The staff was courteous and extremely helpful. I found the water bottles left in my room to be a pleasure as I entered my room after midnight when the hotel shops were closed. The front desk staff was skillful at finding me a taxi to drive me to Tampa at 3am where I was able to board a direct flight back to Philadelphia just prior to the hurricane hitting in the north. I would eagerly return to stay on my next trip to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Pageant Adventure Success”
Reviews.Author: rlr3184
Reviews.Content: My stay while at this hotel was marvelous. The service was excellent, the cleaning personal was very welcoming and humble and the front desk was helpful in anything and everything i needed. You have the ability of going to the mall that is attached and also your own personal restaurants there in the lobby. Very nice location for everything you need. I will most definitely come and stay there again in the near future. If you look up on the websites you will always find a great deal.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: Travel2Enjoy
Reviews.Content: Our two famlies stayed 5 nights in adjoining rooms over a long weekend and we all really enjoyed the clean rooms and a good night's sleep on the very comfortable beds. The Hotel is truly totally nonsmoking and offers "green" amenities, the best of which were the shampoo, conditioner and shower gel dispenser in the shower, the recycle bin and $5 coupon for skipping a housekeeping tidy (for longer stays seems a thorough cleanup is only needed every 3rd morning). Valet and porter service were exceptional as was the friendly and helpful reception during checkin and checkout. The entrance to the Florida Mall opened up a world of food and shopping. Overall great value for the money. This was our second stay and we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely good service”
Reviews.Author: litlred010
Reviews.Content: The Service was excellent from everyone starting with Front Desk check-in, valet, & especially the staff at Crickets. Will definitely recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service for Family Reunion”
Reviews.Author: ShirleyN34545
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center is a Beautiful Hotel that's within the florida mall. Our family had so much fun at this hotel with all the events it provided for us at the reunion and not to mention all of the shopping .As Family reunion Chairperson, The staff at this Hotel was so easy to work with. They provided excellent service. The conference rooms were setup to perfection. The whole family made very postive comments to me about this hotel and what a wonderful time they had here. We will definitely use this Hotel again!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! special thanks to the Florida Hotel and Conference Center for making our visit memorable. . Gatlin Family Reunion 2011 .

Reviews.Title: “we were very happy with our chill out stay in the hotel, we will be back soon”
Reviews.Author: Jean O
Reviews.Content: We had a very good time in The Florida Hotel , we went there to chill before we left for Ireland , we stated in a house for two weeks , did all the parks , have to say the service we got was Excellent the staff were very friendly all ways had time to talk, listen to you when you wanted to know anything ie shop were to dine , what the weather was going to be like , resured us that Hurrcain Irene would not hit us in florida we felt very safe there

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: Jackie357
Reviews.Content: If you need a place to stay while you wait to go on a cruise or anywhere stay there. They are very helpful their shuttle to where ever you need to go is great. The person that was responsible did an excellent job of getting people place on their shuttle to go where ever they needed to go. Excellent customer service

Reviews.Title: “So impressed with the Florida Mall Hotel - Staff couldn't be more friendly and helpful!!!”
Reviews.Author: Josephine T
Reviews.Content: Would recommend the Florida Mall Hotel and Conference Centre to anyone who appreciates really excellent customer service and hotel staff who go out of their way to be as helpful as they can to make your stay enjoyable. Nothing seems too much trouble. The rooms are great and fabulous facilities with the Mall just straight out of the lobby to shopping galore. I will be back again and again and already planning to stay for at least three weeks next Summer. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rorysmom99
Reviews.Content: Had a very nice stay. Great food provided for breakfast and lunch meetings. Loved being so close to the mall, literally walking right into it from the mall. Comfortable rooms and atmosphere.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Soroyal
Reviews.Content: This place is definitely top notch!! They took care of our every need and even resolved an issue I had with the transportation company I used to get there from the airport. The room was clean and comfortable. It is also a plus that the mall is connected to the hotel so whatever you need is right there. The restaurant is very good also. I must say from the cleaning attendants to management everyone was excellent. I would only stay here when ever I go back to Orlando. Good Job Guys!

Reviews.Title: “An excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Hesham E
Reviews.Content: I am an Egyptian Tourist , spent 2 weeks with my family in orlando in The Florida Hotel and Conference Center what I can say is that the hotel is perfect , from A to Z , staff , cleaniness , location , price , Front desk , etc... everything perfect we would for sure go back again

Reviews.Title: “The Best Service ever”
Reviews.Author: Michol S
Reviews.Content: We have an event on this Hotel that has 165 guest and had a room, The event was Great, The Florida Hotel Did a very good job, more than I expected, the service and people who i work with are excellent and did a very good job. The rooms are clean. I highly recommend this hotel for your Events and to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful service, excellent facility and superior location”
Reviews.Author: Dwashmom
Reviews.Content: We celebrated my son's birthday in Orlando and one of the best things about the trip was the amazing hotel. The room was large and comfortable, the beds were firm and relaxing and the service was great! We also have friends in the area who met us for dinner. They had no problem picking us up because of the central location of the hotel. The location of the hotel was also perfect after a long day of shopping at the various outlets around town. I can't imagine staying any where else when we visit Orlando in the future!

Reviews.Title: “Superb staff”
Reviews.Author: MGF03
Reviews.Content: I have previously reviewed this hotel, which I enjoy very much, but my latest visit was quite unusual for the friendly and attentive service received. Check in is always a pleasure - fast, friendly and courteous. This visit, the breakfast staff and attached Starbucks staff excelled themselves. To receive a free coffee at Starbucks because they were brewing a fresh dispenser was unusual - I had to wait at least an extra minute. The banter was witty and friendly. The Maitre d' at breakfast is unique. The restaurant is being extended so the room isn't the best, but I have never received such excellent service anywhere.

Reviews.Title: “We have stayed here three times and have enjoyed it each time.”
Reviews.Author: Toni818
Reviews.Content: We, my husband, me and our two young teenage daughters, have stayed here a few times now. My husband has work in the area and we sometimes tag along. We really enjoy staying here, because my husband goes to work for the day, taking the car, and we still have plenty to do to keep us busy. We can go down to the pool, workout room, spa or the Florida Mall and not to mention plenty of restaurants without even going outside. The business center downstairs is nice to have for access to the internet as well. The rates are reasonable and we can sometimes even get the company to pay for the visit. The staff is very accomodating and quick to help with whatever needs we may have.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it again”
Reviews.Author: Keneko
Reviews.Content: We really loved our stay here. The hotel was immaculate, the beds comfortable and the staff more than helpful. Its great to be close to the mall for walking, shopping and eating! We will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional service”
Reviews.Author: chelsea s
Reviews.Content: Everyone was so nice and the staff went out of their way to help out in anyway they could, I even had a staff member offer and get ice for my cooler as I was dealing with my small child, so helpful! the Only downside, no complementary breakfast, but there is a breakfast restaurant a Starbucks and a little convenient store downstairs.

Reviews.Title: “Starting to slip a bit.”
Reviews.Author: Dyenamo
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this establishment for several years on business and untill recently really enjoyed it. It has the benefit of being attached to a shopping mall which gives you the ability to visit the mall direct from the hotel. It has conference rooms that we use and caters food ect for these gatherings. It's near the Orlando airport but not near the theme parks which I like. Parking is free and convienent but not covered and if its raining you are exposed. What has slipped is the customer service and food service. It's not bad but it went from good to average. We have complained to the management and will try it again and hopefully I can report an improvement. I want it to be in top form again.

Reviews.Title: “My view”
Reviews.Author: carla p
Reviews.Content: the service at this hotel is awsome, they go out of there way to make your stay memorable, the rooms are so clean, and beds are comfortable, u dont wanna leave your room it like your own little apartment, the hotel it self is beautiful,

Reviews.Title: “Always a Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Forrest D
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center in Orlando,Fl, is always a great plce to stay. The employees are always pleasent and always smiling when you ask for their assistance. I just can't say enough about, I how I feel when I stay there, They treat everyone like they are their number one guest. The rooms are great and it don't hurt to have the mall inside. I look forward to my next stay !!!!

Reviews.Title: “"We enjoyed our extra night at this hotel!"”
Reviews.Author: Prinxessrach
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Florida Hotel for 1 night, when our flight was delayed for 24 hours. We had a lovely clean room, which had a fridge and a safe. Our food was all provided by Virgin, so we didn't really get to sample all the restaurants, although we did drink in the bar!! The hotel is attached to The Florida Mall, and we had a great time shopping during our extra day. There is a great choice of shops and a yummy food court. The hotel had a lovely pool and hot tub, which we got to use, and there was also a gym.

Reviews.Title: “Nice base for shopping”
Reviews.Author: fabiobrsp
Reviews.Content: The title above is something obvious as you will be staying at a hotel connected to the mall. But overall, if you consider the entire city, the hotel is also well located. Maybe not perfect for families willing to stay closer to the parks, but indeed a very good location. Just be aware if you are an internet shopper and going to receive packages. The hotel charges USD5 plus tax for each package. This might be a problem if, like myself, you buy a lot on Internet and, frequently, stores like Amazon split one order in several separate boxes (you will end up paying USD5 for each box received). However, I am satisfied with the level of service in the hotel, as one of the boxes I received did not contain my name on it (yes, the seller did not include my name on it!). They went out of their way and called the carrier, obtaining my name with the seller. Thanks, guys, I appreciate it! One day, the mall's food court was so packed that I brought the food to my room (an only 3 minutes walk, considering the food court is right in front of the hotel/mall access). Will certainly consider this hotel for next visits to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: thaby0
Reviews.Content: Loved the hotel, and the staff were very helpful and informative. Hotel is located approx 20 minutes from the airport and is on the bus route for both Universal Studios and Disney. We used the local busses to get to Universal Studio's, this proved to be easy and very good value. Really liked that there was a large Mall attatched to the hotel featuring good quality shops as the trip we did was partly a shopping trip. There are a few chain restaurants within walking distance of the hotel such as Red Lobster and Chilli's if you want to eat out. Can't fault the staff or the hotel. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: Jo H
Reviews.Content: could not have ask for a better hotel to stay in. the staff went out of their way to accomidated us. very clean and convenient to everything. great for the price. will definetely be back. u could tell that the staff enjoyed their job... (that was nice to see)

Reviews.Title: “Everything was great. We will be back.”
Reviews.Author: James H
Reviews.Content: The employees were very professional. Rooms were great. The best part is the attached mall. I walked my legs off. Very Nice mall. It even has a Apple store!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: Kriss9311
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference that my company had at this hotel. The accomodations were excellent, the staff was friendly & very professional. our breakfasts & lunches & 1 dinner were catered, the food was excellent. I was very impressed. the location is not far from the air port (about a 10 to 15 min drive--I used Mears Shuttle Service at the airport on this trip). I would stay here again if I were to come back to vacation in the area. There is a fitness center & spa at the hotel but I didn't have the opportunity to use them.

Reviews.Title: “Good all round experience”
Reviews.Author: David S
Reviews.Content: Stayed here many times. Consistently good, pretty much to all aspects. The staff in particular have always been friendly and helpful. Easy location to most things in the Orlando area, though attached to the Florida Mall can hurt the wallet!

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean hotel.”
Reviews.Author: sara n
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel after flying into Orlando for our cruise the next day. When we found out our cruise was delayed, the hotel let us stay in our room 3 hours past the check out time for no extra charge. The hotel is connected to a mall, which gives you something to do.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel - great location”
Reviews.Author: MsP59
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel. Have been her several times. LOVE that it is AT the mall. Clean, comfortable. Friendly and accomodating staff. Highly recommended. Will return.

Reviews.Title: “The Can't get checked in hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Sweepygolf14
Reviews.Content: This was a wedding stay at the hotel with multiple rooms for our daughter, her mothers family, our family, along with the groom's family. We were set up to be here MONTHS AGO! They knew we were coming and approximately how many of us. We had a dress rehearsal dinner on 8/5 and many of us had to get to the hotel, get cleaned up and be at the rehearsal by 6:00pm. No big deal, right!!! Wronggggggggg!!! They did not let many of us check in until way past 5:00pm. Some people arrived early and thought they would get in only to sit in the lobby for quite some time. There is escalator work going on in the hotel however I don't feel this is a problem except for the noise of the workers. I just did not understand why a hotel that has a check out time of 11:00am can not get rooms cleaned by say 3:00pm. Hire more help!! I also had a problem with check out and it would do you good to look at your bill that they slip under the door. I was charged $13.00+ for what they called "Crispers" on my bill, a bar in the hotel. I found out later that I was being charged for the "Starbucks" which they list as "Crispers" but they forgot the most important part......I never went to "Starbucks" or "Crispers". I finally went down to the Reservation desk and had them remove this. Not a good experience.

Reviews.Title: “My best friend and I stay here every year. A great girls shopping weekend!”
Reviews.Author: mschmidt251
Reviews.Content: We love this location! It is connected to the Florida Mall and close to many restaurants and shops outside of the mall. It is perfect for a relaxing girls weekend. We will conitnue to make this our yearly weekend shopping spot. The hotel and rooms are clean and comfortable. Rates are reasonable and I look forward to my visits to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Something for us all.. food, shopping, pool & more!”
Reviews.Author: kab00sh
Reviews.Content: We decided to combine a mini-vacation with a back-to-school shopping at The Florida Hotel. We arrived early in the day so after checking in our bags we entered the mall through the lobby of the hotel and spent a few hours shopping until we got the call from the front desk that our room was ready. The room was bright, clean and very quiet. I never heard a sound from the hallway, next door or from outdoors the entire time we were there. We had a small fridge, flat screen tv and internet connection that all worked perfectly. Over the next few days my wife, daughter (10yrs), son (6 yrs) and I had a great time in the shops, restaurants, and of course, the huge, uncrowded pool and hot tub. It was great being able to split up here and there and do things with each other without having to get in the car or drive across a strange city in search of things to do. We did take a short couple minute drive to the outlet malls just to double-down on the deals but even that was fairly simple and effortless. We are from Florida so we weren't interested in hitting the resort parks in 105 degree weather but even so I would suggest staying at the Florida Hotel if you are planning more than a couple day stay in Orlando after visiting Disney or Universal. The Hotel is about 1/2 mile from the Turnpike and at the edge of International drive so you can get in and out of all the major attractions yet just outside the crowded arteries of Orlando. There's even a Starbucks and Quick Mart in the hotel lobby so you're never far from a nice hot coffee, cold beer or bag of skittles. There's also a breakfast buffet in the lobby restaurant that also has a nice omelet bar, bagels, meats, fruits and more. It's starts around ten bucks per person which is fairly cheap considering the prices of everything in the mall food court. The Florida Hotel also has a 'Skycap' in the lobby where you can leave your bags and print out boarding tickets before catching the airport shuttle. They have TV screens there with up-to-date airport departures and arrivals also. We loved our stay.. we can't wait to go back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Katmo65
Reviews.Content: This is a nice property, and had a beautiful work out Facility, My only issue was for the price a complimentary breakfast was not included. rooms were kept very nice, and the sheets were soft and pillows were wonderful. Had a few issues with the wi-fi in the room.

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly and convenient”
Reviews.Author: DaddyPrez
Reviews.Content: I stay at The Florida Hotel regularly for business and find it to be very comfortable and convenient. The staff is consistently friendly and helpful. Being attached to the Florida Mall, with a food court and several decent restaurants is a real advantage.

Reviews.Title: “It was great and definately had a joyous time”
Reviews.Author: farzanaghoor
Reviews.Content: I was chuffed at the service and the feedback the manager on duty gave me. the cleanlines and the staff are great and very warm. There was not once i had an issue of anything such as room or room service or parking or the attendants helping with luggage. My stay was great and again the service was what every one would want which is that smile.

Reviews.Title: “Always a pleasure!”
Reviews.Author: lesleyrosslyric
Reviews.Content: I come to this hotel about five times a year through work. The hotel staff are so friendly and helpful and they have to put up with a lot of conference traffic. The rooms are large, the beds are comfortable, the gym and pool are excellent and although there is limited eating within the hotel (Crickets is cheap and friendly but that's pretty much all there is besides Starbucks), the hotel is next to the Mall, where there's the food court and several franchise restaurants, and the area is surrounded by several other eating establishments. Admittedly the bathrooms aren't amazing but they are clean and the price of the room makes up for it. Easy bus access to the theme parks, and once again, amazingly friendly staff! Brilliant!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: silver_kingUK
Reviews.Content: Great Location, attached to the Florida Mall, great foodcourt for snacks, coffee etc majority of staff very helpful, close to i" drive and attractions, close to orlando int airport All Good downside convenience store extortionate Cricket's grill pricey and ok not great 5* for location

Reviews.Title: “Connected to a Mall!”
Reviews.Author: Takemesomewherenew
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference at this hotel and decided to stay at this hotel because it was convienient. I am glad that I did! The front desk staff were very friendly and helpful. Starbucks in the lobby!! And the best part of all...connected to the mall. I never had to leave the hotel unless I wanted to.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for small or Medium-sized Conferences”
Reviews.Author: Daniel444
Reviews.Content: With an attached large mall, there is never any reason to leave the facility. Many choices for meals. The staff could not be more accomodating. Large rooms with free internet.

Reviews.Title: “I loved it and will be back”
Reviews.Author: msdonaj56
Reviews.Content: Every one was very attentive to our group, the restaurant had full service and enough people to serve us. I have been to other conventions in other states and hotels and this was the best. They were very accommodating, our meeting rooms was very comfortable. Starbucks great!!!! I was so excited about having a starbucks in the hotel. The little convenient store let us use their microwave to heat up our food. The little candy in the store was great because you don't get to see that type of candy anymore. I was very please with my stay at the Florida Hotel and Convention Center.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient to Universal Studios”
Reviews.Author: GA_Lady_Traveler
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for two nights at the end of June 2011 and all in all, it was a decent stay. The goal of our trip was to go to Universal Studios and we were nervous as we couldn't really tell how far/near the park was...it turned out to be super convenient! Just a left turn out of the mall and and two right turns and we were there -- getting on the interstate wasn't even necessary. Because it's close to Universal Studios, it's also close to the waterpark there (Wet and Wild I believe it's called). The hotel itself is located behind a fairly large mall that has everything your typical mall would have, including an Apple Store :-) This turned out to be a life saver when you came in from the theme parks and didn't feel like getting in the car again and driving somewhere--the hotel was connected to the mall. If you want to shop or look around while your friends napped, you can do that without going too far or hopping in the car. There is a Ruby Tuesday, California Pizza Kitchen, Bucca di Beppo and of course the food court (which has typical food court fare). Surrounding the outside of the mall there are also an abundance of eateries like Chili's, Red Lobster (the best I've had in a while--very good!), etc. The rooms at this hotel were pretty good. They weren't great, but they were good. No major complaints really. The carpet could use a shampoo, but generally speaking it was clean in the room. The mattress I found to be quite hard for my taste. However, after a full day at the theme parks, this is a welcome thing, so I didn't mind the hard mattress in the end. The other reviews about the hallways being dirty are a bit true...you will see random debris/room service platters in the corridors (some kid must have spilled raisins on the carpet...we didn't want to investigate too much :-P) But once downstairs or in your room, you really didn't find these kind of issues. The bathroom was fine. Marble (or fake, not sure) countertop, traditional shower with the curtain and good bath products. As this is a convention hotel, parking sometimes was scarce. There is a lot directly across the street from the entrance of the hotel. We had to park in the very last row when we arrived on a Friday afternoon. However, as the weekend came in, the parking lot emptied a bit and we were able to get spots closer in. Also, since this is a mall, it's not like there aren't spaces else where. However, because this mall is so big, it feels like you drove forever around the mall just to get to the hotel. But the fact that the self-parking was free is a bonus. All in all, I would recommend this hotel. I would give it about 3.5 stars out of 5. And I would gladly return to this hotel again, especially for the price ($94/night).

Reviews.Title: “One of the best Hotels in Orlando.”
Reviews.Author: RiBr80
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had a good time in Orlando and we found Florida Hotel a good choice and we recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “I LOVE THIS HOTEL VERY CONVENIENT”
Reviews.Author: lynettebain65
Reviews.Content: My stay at your hotel was much enjoyed, my daughter came with me for company. While I was attending the ESP conference she entertained herself by having unlimited internet access, and the mall was located within the hotel affording ther to occupy her time throughout the day. What I realy appreciated was the staff was very serviced oriented they were prompt on request. I hope to retur early next year. Thanks Lynette Bain

Reviews.Title: “Rock Hard Beds”
Reviews.Author: Terryminator
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center twice for the Silent Weekend. We told them in advance that I have Rheumatoid Arthritis and need a handicapped room and must have a soft bed due to my condition. Both times we got a handicapped room, but the bed was like a rock. We even asked for a padding to try and make the bed softer, but it didn't work. It was hard to enjoy the weekend, when you woke up in terrible pain everyday. The staff was really nice and the hotel is a great location with the food court in the mall available to meet every need. The hotel restaurant is nice, but very expensive!

Reviews.Title: “Great place for bussiness and pleasure”
Reviews.Author: HEAD016
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay. Staff pleasent and very willing to go above and beyond to help make your stay a pleasent one. Will return!

Reviews.Title: “A Great place to stay for shoppers”
Reviews.Author: rpbert1
Reviews.Content: stayed for 3 nights, so Wife could do shopping in the Mall. Alovely hotel rooms big and very clean. Pool area is nice and compact plenty of loungers and very clean although never many at the pool . breakfast in the morning was excellent and location with entrance to the Mall was Great. never used the fitness center, but staff where all very nice and more than helpful, and a Starbucks onsite was nice

Reviews.Title: “We had a wonderful experience and would recommend it to anyone.”
Reviews.Author: louise1904
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is very nice and accomadating, the staff was great, very helpful and friendly, the service was awesome. We will most definitly return for another stay when we have to return to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: Sh0rty68
Reviews.Content: Staff was very friendly, Rooms are spacious and beautiful. Great location to be in the attached to the mall. My 16 yr old daughter loved the fact that she could walk to the mall through the hotel. We will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient”
Reviews.Author: AlexandreaWest
Reviews.Content: The staff was very nice. I, especially, like the staff in the restaurant, Starbucks, and convenience store. They made my day.

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location”
Reviews.Author: ValberOliveira
Reviews.Content: Friendly efficient service, clean comfortable accommodations and convenient location, right inside The Florida Mall. Remember to grab a hot cup of Caramel Macchiato at Starbucks on the way to the stores!

Reviews.Title: “Good facilities”
Reviews.Author: Morehastelesstaste
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 3 nights on a visit to see space shuttle Atlantis last flight. The room was very comfortable and clean. The staff were helpful. We booked through Hotels.com who have never failed us. Price was supposedly a deep discount and was good value for money. Pool was not spectacular, but good, Only negative was the failure at reception to explain how we could get the food credit that was included with our tariff. You need to swipe your credit card when checking in. 25 dollars off 2 rib eye steaks at the in-house Crickets grill on this deal was great. The mall is good.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great price, GIGANTIC rooms!”
Reviews.Author: CanadianGirl99
Reviews.Content: Couldnt have asked for a better hotel! we got a great price (except it didnt include some "convenience charge" for standard things like parking and 2 bottles of water everyday, $7/day) and its connected to a mall that has Macy's, Neiman Marcus and tons of other stores. There's lots of restaurants in the area and its close to the freeway (we had no problem getting to Disneyworld or the Premium Outlets). Our room was really big, very comfortable and clean. We were right across from the elevators but didnt hear a single thing. We went to the fitness centre one night and its well equipped and not busy. Would definitely stay here again if we come back to Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Service”
Reviews.Author: Fabrici0
Reviews.Content: We were amazed by the discrete and perfect service offered by all the staff. I had an injured leg and was offered a nice wheelchair to use privately during the full lenght of our stay. Breakfast food and personell were also excelent. Will stay there on our next trip to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Delightfully and unexpectedly excellent service, very comfortable accommodations.”
Reviews.Author: Cyd1947
Reviews.Content: Attended a convention and expected the usual convention delays at the check-in, check-out desk and in the restaurants. I got neither. The food was superb and the service staff was outstanding.

Reviews.Title: “Top Notch Hotel”
Reviews.Author: sammie1203
Reviews.Content: This hotel is the only place to stay when visiting Orlando, FL. The lobby leads into one of the best shopping malls I've ever been to. Best place in Orlando, FL. M Ferrazano Spring Hill, FL

Reviews.Title: “Hope to return soon”
Reviews.Author: Brooksvillecowgirl
Reviews.Content: We truly enjoyed staying here, especially near a MALL!!! Hopefully we will get another chance to be here........... MAYBE we will win that chance too. Thanks, Florida Hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “A Good Place to Stay !”
Reviews.Author: janskr
Reviews.Content: The Lobby, Conference Rooms, Bathrooms & Hotel Accomodations were very clean. The Front Desk Staff were very helpful. The closeness to a mall was terrific & a good diversion from everyday business. Internet access was very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: WPittman3835
Reviews.Content: My family stayed at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. It was beautiful, clean and the employees were outstanding. I would consider this a 5 star hotel. The hotel was connected to The Florida Mall and you never had to go outside to shop.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional”
Reviews.Author: tajkd
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay. Very close to parks and airport. Clean room, great restaurant, mall is on premises with a food court and other shopping. Fantastic place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Was a great place to stay for a conference.”
Reviews.Author: Vicki0830
Reviews.Content: Clean room, comfortable bed, and an "on-time"room service.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mallaround
Reviews.Content: We had a spendid time there. The staff was over-accommadating and the room was beautiful. The service in the Cricket room was wonderful as well. We did not make it to the pool as I spent my time in the mall right outside of the doors of the hotel. I would highly recommend to anyone this Hotel. It was such a convenient location especially with the mall being there.

Reviews.Title: “Accomodating and personalized service”
Reviews.Author: glendarae
Reviews.Content: My husband is allergic to feather pillows and comforters, and we forgot to mention this when making the reservation. The staff fixed this as soon as I asked for the change.

Reviews.Title: “Very pretty lobby, ok rooms”
Reviews.Author: cookie4rue
Reviews.Content: I think that if you had a wedding or meeting there it would be amazing. For a couples retreat it was "ok." Small showers with lttle pressure, ok rooms.....very much a business hotel. Can't see us staying here again, but I would def reccommend for business people.

Reviews.Title: “Can't believe this is number 4 on the list...”
Reviews.Author: carolj2525
Reviews.Content: We spent four nights there prior to returning home to the UK and booked on the basis of its ranking. What a let-down. When we got to the room it was set up for one person (one paper cup, one sachet of sweetener etc). The room looked 'tired' compared with other places we had stayed during our month long trip. A notice in the room suggested that by not getting the room cleaned one night it wuld be environmentally sound so we opted to decline housekeeping after our first night. We were howver surprised to find that the room had also not been cleaned after our second night and were even more surprised when a housekeeper knocked at our door at 19.45 in the evening asking if we wanted the room to be done! The following morning I complained to reception who gave me a $5.00 voucher for Starbucks - we were entitled to this anyway for opting for no cleaner after the first night - in other words they gave us nothing. I guess this hotel would be okay for one night but I wouldn't recommend it for any longer a stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Facility”
Reviews.Author: holmesdad
Reviews.Content: The hotel was excellent and surpassed all expectations. The hotel being connected directly to the Florida Mall is an added bonus. We did not have to leave the property during our entire stay in order to accomplish all of our goals and service all of our needs.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, Clean, and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: Tampa2011
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay. The staff was friendly and accomodation. Have the hotel located in a mall was a big plus for after work hour shopping and spa treatments.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel especially on a rainy day”
Reviews.Author: Ramblingwelove
Reviews.Content: Stayed here 2 nights in June for a conference. Hotel is literally connected to the Florida mall. Arrived during a storm with hail the size of marbles. Valet was soaking wet but still came out to help with our luggage, held our luggage until our room was ready, was friendly. Next morning realized I had left our binders in the car. Asked the valet if I could walk to car. He wouldn't hear of it. Went to get our car just so I could get our binders. We were starving and ate at the restaurant in the lobby. Great service. Room was great. Spent downtime from conference in the mall. I would stay here again. Especially liked their green take on shampoo, conditioner and shower gel. They use a wall dispenser to reduce waste from individual bottles. Kudos to them for that.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay and eat!”
Reviews.Author: rockwal
Reviews.Content: During a recent stay at the Florida Hotel we had a great time. This was my second anniversary as always we had a fun time. We have stayed here on several occasions and have never regretted it. The hotel is clean and very affortable with all the different packages to choose from. The Florida Hotel is located in the Florida Mall which is great we did not leave the premise the entire stay we had all the shopping right there. The staff were always nice and gracious. Thanks again for a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel for business”
Reviews.Author: DelLewis
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in June 2011 on business, this was my 2nd time at the hotel for business. The hotel and conference center is great! The staff treated me like family, whenever the staff, no matter who they are, always had a smile with a 'Good morning, good afternoon, how is stay, how are you doing today, have a great evening, etc'. They have a great management style, they pass these small gestures to everyone employed - KUDOS to the Hotel! The hotel is attached to one of the largest mall in the area - once you arrive you never have a need to leave until it is time to go home.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for Meetings (and personal travel)”
Reviews.Author: SandyMagyar
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center is a favorite place for my groups to hold meetings. The conference area is large and accommodating. The sleeping rooms are nice with great amenities. The catered food is good. And the Sales staff is great to work with and takes very good care of you.
