An added plus is the attachment to the Florida Mall, which not only has great shopping, but between the food court and restaurants, my group members can park their car and not have to get into it until they leave. Plus they can stay in their allowed budgets. We have been here many times and will continue to come back. On a personal note, I like to stay here at other times when traveling alone as I feel safe and do not have to go back out in the eveing with access to the mall directly attached to the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “We will be back again!!!”
Reviews.Author: nae011
Reviews.Content: After coming to The Florida Hotel and Conf center straight from a Carnival cruise from Port Canaveral. We found this to be a very relaxing hotel, very clean, top notch service from all employees and manager!! We even checked in a little earlier with no extra fee. The most fun we had was the access to shopping at a huge mall that is connected to the hotel. The pool was nice to relax by too... Leaving to go the Orlando Airport was a breeze! Thank you for making our last day and night in Orlando GREAT!!!

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel in the Orlando area”
Reviews.Author: JohnGillespie1028
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at most of the nice hotels in Orlando and this is by far my favorite. The service and the food are the best in town. It is an older hotel so the rooms are larger and more comfortable than most. But although the building is older everything inside is like new. The beds are wonderful. The place is immaculately clean. It is located in the nicest mall in town so you never need to drive anywhere to eat or shop. And it is within 20 minutes of everything, including the airport, downtown Orlando, downtown Kissimmee, Disney World, Universal and International drive. It is close to Route 528, which means you can be at the beach or Kennedy Space Center in 30 minutes. Whether I am in Orlando on business or with my family on vacation, this hotel is always my first choice.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service, Friendly Atmosphere, Shop till you drop”
Reviews.Author: Slugabugsteve
Reviews.Content: Rooms are clean, people are friendly, food is good. This hotel is in the middle of the Florida Mall in Orlando so the shopping is fabulous. There are a dozen restaurants surrounding the mall and International Drive is just 10 minutes away

Reviews.Title: “Hotel is Excellent”
Reviews.Author: quadfuzz2
Reviews.Content: Although I did not stay at the hotel, just attended a week long conference there. I found the hotel to be very clean. The staff was always friendly & curtious.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel was excellent!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Toobless
Reviews.Content: The service was great. We were greeted with a big smile from the the bellman each time we left for an outing...always willing to help with directions and the best eating establishments. Check-in was a breeze...called room to make sure it was to our satisfaction. Room and bathroom were very clean and comfy...plenty of space to move around in. The hotel entered into a mall which was nice and we were about 15 mins from Universal Studios, Wet N Wild, Sea World and the airpoirt but far enough away from the craziness of traffic near the amusement parks. There are many resturants nearby and the hotel does have a bar and grill and a Starbucks (hubsband loves). The grill has a wonderful bfast. There is a resort fee. We love this hotel and will certainly stay again!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very good accommodation for a business trip”
Reviews.Author: deliabward
Reviews.Content: This hotel is attached to the Florida Mall which is very convenient when you are on a business trip and have limited time to shop! The mall had lots of interesting shops and restaurants. The hotel staff are friendly and the rooms were fairly standard but spacious and comfortable. Outdoor pool and hot tub also a bonus!

Reviews.Title: “This is a great facility for busiess meetings. I hope to go back"”
Reviews.Author: DJ254
Reviews.Content: The hotel is "very green" and has a reward for skipping housekeeping. The service in every area was great and the food prices were very reasonable. My only advice is take a sweater. I found the meeting rooms and hotel in general to be abnormally cold.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel, but pricey for any type of conference”
Reviews.Author: Captain_Review_11
Reviews.Content: Overall, a very good hotel. Room was very nice. Clean, didn't smell like smoke (had a non-smoking room so I was expecting it not to), and had a good view of Orlando Skyline. The bed was one of the more comfortable hotel beds I have slept in which was a nice surprise after all day business meetings. Cleaning staff was very good. Breakfast is expensive! Crickets grill is the only restaurant/bar within the hotel, not including a starbucks or a small convenience store, and it serves breakfast lunch and dinner. Food is good, 2 buffet options: Cold or hot. Cold includes some cereal, bagels, fruit, and some oatmeal. Not a bad selection, but is about $9. Hot includes all the cold items, along with french toast, bacon, some type of potato casserole I believe, and omelets anyway you want them prepared by a cook next to the buffet. A good deal except it was $14! Not a good way to start the morning having to pay that much for breakfast. And the selection was always the same. Never switched to pancakes or waffles just to change it up and entice you with something different. Food was good, but WAY too pricey. By the end of my trip I would just get a big muffin from the convenience store for $2. Lunch was always the Florida Mall for me, just too convenient to not eat there. Never did dinner there, but always had a few drinks at the end of the night there. Decent deals/happy hour. A nice thing the hotel does is there is a "green card" in your room that if you do not wish your room cleaned that day, just fill it out the night before and hang it on your doorknob outside your room. Hotel staff will pick it up at night and give you a free $5 to use at Crickets, Starbucks, or the Convenience store (you have to go to the front desk to get the $5 voucher). Worked out really well but realized this at the end of my trip, wish I had known earlier. But seeing as I was there for a conference, I would say that its just like all other hotels trying to make their money off a conference. Internet wasn't free in the conference rooms, but it was in your own room. And to get internet for the conference rooms, the fee was outrageous(in my mind). This includes wired or wireless. The tech support people were fabulous though. They helped us with anything we needed and didn't mind doing something extra if we needed an extra hand. Cannot thank them enough for that.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT PEOPLE ...... PERFECT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: paulremcls
Reviews.Content: Had a great time,(precruise stay) Every Staff member was exceptionally friendly and willing to assist with all needs.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, efficient, clean comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Seamus03
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a week in April 2011. Really great value. For the quality of the hotel I would have expected to pay more. We had a group of 9 including two young children and a wheelchair adult staying in three rooms and no one had any complaints. An excellent hotel. One word of caution if you are from ireland or the UK and have a hired car be careful of the marble pedestals in the curved driveway as you enter the hotel. Jim Walsh, Ireland

Reviews.Title: “Will be staying again!”
Reviews.Author: rcdooley
Reviews.Content: Last minute decision to stay in Orlando, this hotel is beautiful & convenient!! Rafeal in customer service was incredible & super nice! can't wait to stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, rooms just o.k.”
Reviews.Author: LisaB37
Reviews.Content: We stayed Memorial weekend, my hubby, myself and my 3 children. The lobby and grounds are beautiful, check-in was a breeze and the receptionist was very kind. We had booked a double room with a roll-away bed. The room was clean but very small. We really had no room at all with the roll away to even walk around the room. I went to the front desk to ask if there were any available upgrades and was told, by a not-so-friendly receptionist, that to upgrade was $500 a night!! I was not pleased, we have been to many hotels that are more than willing to upgrade for a nominal charge and sometimes for free if the customer is not happy with the room. The mall was great, very crowded but it was Memorial weekend. It was right through the lobby of the hotel. Starbucks was wonderful as well being right there in the lobby too. We enjoyed the pool, it was very crowded as well though. All in all, it is a really nice hotel but I would rate it a 3 star.

Reviews.Title: “Great to be back!!!”
Reviews.Author: Avance35
Reviews.Content: All the staff at this hotel is there to serve you - the guest. They give you every opportunity to tell them what you like and what you don't like on anything from the room to the dining facilities. Staff are warm and courteous, always willing to go above and beyond. I attend an annual confernence at this hotel and the conference was moved last year - we did not like the hotel nearly as much. We were glad to be back and I will tell my friend - Florida Hotel and Confernece Center is where you should stay. Not to mention - walk out the rear entrance and viola you are in the mall - great stores great food what can I say - Try it today - you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “A few rough edges, including the towels”
Reviews.Author: Pamperedtraveler_10
Reviews.Content: The primary appeal of this hotel was it's availability (on short notice), reasonable rates and one of the exits out of the hotel puts you conveniently in the middle of a huge mall, if shopping is part of your agenda. The location felt very suburban and with the exception of the mall, was inconvenient to many popular attractions in Orlando with I-4 and International Drive several miles away. The lobby service was welcoming and when they booked us on the top floor of this highrise, we were encouraged that it was going to be an excellent stay. The room was clean, of average/above average size, with plush bedding and much of what we expected. Two surprises, however, were the scratchy, thin, small bath towels (even the beach towels at the pool were thin and scratchy) and the absence of any mini bottles of body lotion, mouthwash, a shower cap, etc, in the room. On short trips, I normally don't pack toiletries in anticipation of using those provided in the room. The hotel did provide a dispenser attached to the shower wall with shampoo, conditioner and body wash only. Also, because of the hotel's integration in the mall, the swimming pool is oddly located on the front of the hotel, just to the right of the busy main entrance. Although walled, the noise and commotion from cars and people arriving and departing made for a less than relaxing getaway around the pool. We would recommend this hotel primarily to travelers needing to be close to the airport as Orlando International was a short distance away.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant....apart from the hidden charge”
Reviews.Author: Brenmeryl
Reviews.Content: Not far from the airport, its attached to a huge Mall, has a decent pool, food court plus restaurants within walking distance. Great staff at reception.............what more could you ask for? The only quibble was a hidden $11 charge for use of the fridge & wi-fi, even though we didn't use either! Quite annoying.

Reviews.Title: “Very good experience”
Reviews.Author: BarryOrlando
Reviews.Content: Our company had guests in for a sales meeting and several arrived on Sunday. The Hotel location, meaningful upgrades since my last visit (2 years), access to mall, resturants in walking distance and a very Friendly staff made our Sunday travel and meeting a great experience. Upscale experience at a very modest price.

Reviews.Title: “Will be back”
Reviews.Author: Donkeede
Reviews.Content: Great for business trippers and holidaymakers alike. All facilities required are available including free internet! Lively bar area,and god food (numerous major eating chains available surrounding the hotel within 5-10mins if you wish) Staff are great,rooms/beds very comfortable and taxis/busses abound.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay! Great Price! Great People! Great Location”
Reviews.Author: napkat
Reviews.Content: My family and I truly enjoyed our stay at this location. The rooms were clean. The staff was phenomenal - A Special Thanks to Rafael - The Hotel Manager.... The food was fantastic at Crickett's Grille and that manager on duty was awesome as well (Cynthia ??? I think was her name). The location was great and it was very easy to get around the city.... I would highly recommend this place and definitely would return.....

Reviews.Title: “All excellent”
Reviews.Author: Drmansoor324
Reviews.Content: I spent 5 nights there with my wife and my daughters it was superior than our expectation , if I would go back 100% I will go again

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly efficient hotel in a fantastic location in the shopping mall”
Reviews.Author: JackiV
Reviews.Content: Brilliant location and Crickets bar has happy hour from 5-9pm

Reviews.Title: “Wedding”
Reviews.Author: vblic937
Reviews.Content: The hotel is beautiful and clean. The employees were polite and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “So convenient and extras are great!”
Reviews.Author: Jones9168
Reviews.Content: I always choose to stay here for the friendly staff, convenient location,free wi-fi, excellent food,pool,shopping in mall(which is connected to hotel). The rooms are spacious and clean. Just request not to be on the same floor as overnighting flight crews...sometimes a little noisy.( If you are on their designated floor.)

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: trlvr
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel 2 days a month for 6 months, and consistently had good experience. The staff is very helpful and nice, the room is always clean. There were 8 pillows on the bed, which was great because I have specific preference for my pillows and this way I had a selection. I really enjoyed having a pool at the hotel, and the mall too - very convenient. Crickets bar has a great happy hour every day.

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: JPratas
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center is now my 2nd home! A wonderful place to stay with a great staff that make us feel like family. Everything in one place. A big shopping mall in the same premisses, very good food, pool and fitness center. From the owner to the housekeeping ladies, everyone is a friend. Great place for conferences, seminars or vacation. Will be back soon!

Reviews.Title: “BUSINESS AND PLEASURE ALL IN ONE SPOT”
Reviews.Author: Cindyryl
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel is a great place to hold a conference due to the quality of the staff, it's quick response to any concerns or challenges and having WiFi at your finger tips. Having the hotel at the Florida Mall allows for shopping, spa treatments right next door, and it is close to all of the theme parks and International Drive. What better can you ask for!!! How can you not enjoy a place who names its restaurant and lounge, Crickets, after a long tenured employee who continues to work there. That tells me as a Human Resource Director that the Florida Hotel is a great place to work. The Florida Council HR/Finance Conference is held there almost every year,

Reviews.Title: “Always a pleasure to stay at this hotel”
Reviews.Author: DoreF
Reviews.Content: Checking in / out always smooth and staff is friendly and helpful. Rooms are clean, quiet and comfortable. Alternative seating with loveseat and desk. Restaurnt staff is friendly and efficient. Breakfast buffet selections were varied and delicious. Hotel is connected to a great mall - no need to get in car to shop or eat.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful and Relaxing!”
Reviews.Author: mcneij
Reviews.Content: My husband drove down Orlando for a two day stay after completing a conference in a nearby city. We selected the hotel based on their rating and were not disappointed. The hotel is beautiful and well kept. The room was clean and comfortably inviting. I enjoyed the mall and was please with how close it was to the Disney and other sites of interest. We have locked this one into our favorites list! Only complaint......not booking tree nights!!

Reviews.Title: “Army Veterans Enjoy Great Reunion at Florida Hotel & Conference Center”
Reviews.Author: jmazour
Reviews.Content: I recently organized a reunion of US Army veterans at the Florida Hotel & Conference Center. This hotel's staff, Convention Services Manager Barry Adubato (a veteran) and Sales Manager Joanne Banton were a pleasure to work with throughout the preparation and execution of our reunion. I had 52 veterans and 37 spouses/companions for this two-day reunion, and not one person had a negative thing to say to me about this hotel. This is a wonderful property that had everything we needed - good location, reasonable priced rooms, excellent & clean facilities, and great food (I received a number of compliments for the banquet dinner entree choice of seafood tortellini). Our spouses/companions loved the Florida Mall being right next door to the hotel, which allowed the ladies to shop and dine while we veterans swapped "war stories." I would not hesitate to recommend the Florida Hotel & Conference Center to any individual, business traveler or group coming to Orlando. If any veterans group is considering a reunion in Orlando, I suggest you contact Barry Adubato at the Florida Hotel & Conference Center. He will take good care of you. -Jim Mazour, reunion organizer JSA/Panmunjom Veterans Reunion

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: AnnetteLaureano
Reviews.Content: My husband and I, make a combination of business and leisure, for a couple of days, and was wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “Right at the Mall!”
Reviews.Author: soluckytolivehere
Reviews.Content: With two girls 11 and 14 being able to walk straight into a mall was a huge plus! Additionally Red Lobster (my youngest's favourite) and Outback and Ruby Tuesday all in walking distance we really couldn't have picked a better location (no need for a rental car sitting there just to go to a restaurant). Good size room and clean and tidy so no complaints. Front desk staff were great, Starbucks and a convenience store just added to the convenience. We noticed in coming and going to the mall that the conference/business rooms were busy and the selection of refreshments being offered to the attendees seemed quite good - coffee, juices, bottled water, snacks etc. We even left two suitcases when we checked out for our Disney cruise and just came back and collected them after our cruise 4 days later (we weren't even staying there after the cruise!). Will definitely go back here.

Reviews.Title: “No Sleep”
Reviews.Author: albertafamily
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one day/night to shop before returning home on early flight next morning. I booked this hotel based on the high ratings on trip advisor. First let me say the staff here is excellent and will help you out any way they can,top notch. The other plus is the hotel itself is connected to a large mall with a wide variety of stores. After the good comes the bad and trying to get a good nights sleep was almost impossible. The doors of the other rooms let out a loud bang when closing and this happened numerous times during the night and what was even worse was the loud sounds the pipes made every time someone had a shower, I was lucky to get an hours sleep between 10pm and 4am because of all the noise. We had a room on the 4th floor so I don't know if this is common thru the rest of the hotel but I will never stay here again because of this, and I'm not a light sleeper.One other note, although the rooms were clean they are starting to show their age and could use upgrading.

Reviews.Title: “Great for both shopping & attractions nearby as well as comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: dirtdigby
Reviews.Content: Ideal location, friendly staff, large rooms which are clean and well equipt. Free nearby parking. Free wifi in your room. Ideal. I'm only the second day into my stay but very happy. Room 568

Reviews.Title: “The mall hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sandbites
Reviews.Content: Location is far from international drive but has lobby access to th Florisa mall. If you want o go mailing after the sights this hotel is perfect. It has complete hotel amenities bellboy, business center, concierge. Rooms are clean and neat. Security seems okay. A little dated but not old. Staff goes out of their way to cater to your needs. We checked out at 2am and they sent someone up in 5 mins to collect our bags. Impressive!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel with a warm welcome”
Reviews.Author: MGF03
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a favorite with my company. Check in is fast, with a complimentary cookie. The service is always courteous and friendly. The rooms are well appointed with a large comfortable bed. Internet is free in room with own equipment. My only disappointment was the power of the shower - very weak.

Reviews.Title: “Business first than Non Stop Shopping”
Reviews.Author: Kristofel_A_J
Reviews.Content: When it come to do some Business traveling mix with shopping The Florida Hotel and Conference Center should be one of the place that you pick the stay to.

Reviews.Title: “Business and Pleasure”
Reviews.Author: TravelerMay2011
Reviews.Content: The room was very nice and comfortable with a touch of elegance. No microwave though but fridge. Good location with plenty of nice restaurants with 15 minutes. I filled out one of those "green cards" that skipped a day of room cleaning for a Starbucks coffee voucher. The only thing that bothered me was that I had to keep asking to have my room cleaned everyday after that. I would come back late in the day and it was never touched. The staff downstairs in the lobby was very helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommend!! Clean, luxurious and friendly staff!!”
Reviews.Author: Gidget1972
Reviews.Content: 5th time I've stayed there. 'Love it every time!!! 'Can't beat the location (in a HUGE MALL!) and the staff is SOOOO accommodating and friendly! Beds and room are top quality and so comfortable.... Food in restaurant (and breakfast buffet) delicious!!

Reviews.Title: “great pool”
Reviews.Author: graeme021
Reviews.Content: nice hotel , big room , clean and comfortable, great pool area with fantastic sun beds,

Reviews.Title: “Perfect in everyway!”
Reviews.Author: sistah2011
Reviews.Content: I thought the room was a little small and didn't really care about being next to the elevator. I suppose once asleep, I didn't hear a thing. The kids loved the pool and I loved the shopping. Great restaurants to choose from. I would definately stay again!!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Stay”
Reviews.Author: Luvs2cruise45
Reviews.Content: Very 'comfortable' stay overnight getting ready for our cruise. Appreciated having the restaurant available for a late night dinner as well as the buffet the next morning, so we could manage our "time change". We would definitely stay with The Florida Hotel again on our next sailing.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, convenient and entertaining!”
Reviews.Author: listeningstar
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference at this site and found it to be comfortable, convenient, and entertaining. At previous sites we had nothing to do or had to take a bus or walk to eating locations and entertainment. The Mall being attached to the Hotel improved my stay and experience while in Orlando. I found all areas of the hotel to be clean and tidy. Every staff member was personable and went above and beyond to meet my requests. Thank you for an excellent week!!!

Reviews.Title: “Delightful Surprise!”
Reviews.Author: GOGOGOGO888
Reviews.Content: Tall ceilings. Good bathroom lighting. Towel racks in right positions in bathroom. Room table has wheels to move out-of-the-way for more space. Quiet rooms. Empty refridgerator to stock your stuff. Comfortable bed. Love the pillows. Very clean.Excellent blackout curtains. ..............Downstairs - a mall! Pool! Gym!!......nice to see the SkyDesk for those beautiful Virgin Atlantic flight attendants........AND a Starbucks in the lobby! FREE WIRELESS IN ROOM!! All in all it was really impressive. Better than Marriott.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: jgreen92
Reviews.Content: My stay at this hotel was a true pleasure. I have worked in customer service and I must say they(the whole staff) go above and beyond to make sure I was pleased. I would recommend them to anyone who wants a good hotel for a good price!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel and Conference Center is one of the best values in the meetings industry.”
Reviews.Author: gstribling
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center offers a terrific location with access to all of Orlando's attractions and shopping venues at the Florida Mall. In addition, the meeting space provides the opportunity to conduct a great variety of general sessions and breakout meetings in a focused, but relaxed setting. It is one of the great values!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey1953
Reviews.Content: Everything, I mean everything, from my room to Crickets to the "groceries and drinks" provided during our training sessions over the course of an entire week, was awesome!! This is the second year running MOPH used your hotel for our training and the accommodations, if you can believe it, were better this year than last. And I heard through the grapevine that we will be returning for at least the next two years! Thank you for the second great year and I am already looking forward to next year's training session!

Reviews.Title: “Great for Shopping”
Reviews.Author: lil_kate007
Reviews.Content: I frequently stay in this hotel for business and find it suits my needs. The rooms are average, however the location is good as are the staff. The hotel is built in a shopping mall so it is perfect for grabbing a bite to eat or doing a spot of shopping. Crickets bar in the lobby has a great happy hour and do food almost all day. The gym has been renovated and so is much more up to date then it used to be, the only let down for the hotel are the rooms themselves which are very dated and can look shabby and unclean.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location to Visit Orlando”
Reviews.Author: DuaneT
Reviews.Content: Although we've stayed on Walt Disney World and Univeral Studios resort hotels over the past 23 years, The Florida Hotel at the Florida Mall is our preferred choice when we travel to Orlando. It's close the airport and near major freeways to get to Walt Disney World or Universal Studios (12 to 15 minute ride....which is sometimes faster than actually staying on a WDW Resort Hotel or near Downtown Disney and trying to get to one of the theme parks). After a whole day at one of the parks, we have the flexibility to visit and eat at attractions outside. Overall, staying at this hotel is a wonderfule experience. The prices are very competitive, quiet, easy access, connected to the Florida Mall. The staff is friendly, rooms very clean and upscaled. We actually saved time and money staying at this hotel and at the end of our trip, it was a very short 10 minute drive back to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and Pleasant hotel”
Reviews.Author: turnip077
Reviews.Content: Everything was good, the staff were very helpful and friendly, rooms were clean and comfortable, The food was good and service in the hotel restaurant was excellent. The pool was beautiful and refreshing. The value was great, as this was a conference stay, and the hotel was welcoming and cooperative with our group. I especially liked the "green" stuff like shampoo dispenser in the bathroom, and the option to get a five dollar coupon for not having the room cleaned one day. It was appreciated and used in the excellet breakfast buffet. . All in all a pleasant experience, I would reccomend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “BEST HOTEL FOR THE MONEY”
Reviews.Author: hsanta44
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is one of the best for the money, location and atmosphere you are close to every park there are great restaurants within minutes you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Service, Great People”
Reviews.Author: MKT5
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed my stay at the The Florida Hotel and Conference Center. The service was great and every place I went was clean. The fitness center was the best I've experienced at a hotel. Very roomy and more than enough equipment. Access to the Florida Mall was a plus.

Reviews.Title: “A very nice stay”
Reviews.Author: IDHall
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel as part of a conference. The breakfast started @ 7. I always had a cooked to order, 3 eggs scramble with ham and cheese and it was excellent and the service staff at breakfast, superb. The hotel staff servicing the conference did a wonderful job. After the dayâ€™s activities, the happy hour prices at Cricketâ€™s bar and grill were great and the staff friendly and courteous. This hotel is attached to a large mall, so you could eat in the food court or other nearby restaurants. As a bonus, the scenery at the outdoor pool was great because of the steady stream of the British and Virgin Airline employees who take their crew rest there!

Reviews.Title: “wonderful, the stay was great ,everybody was helpful and willing to please.”
Reviews.Author: fran8755
Reviews.Content: the bellmen was very helpful, i forgot my glasses in the car . he said I can get them for you so he went to my car and got my glasses for me. I was so happy .The room was great i was on 11th floor the view was just great. I eat breakfast and tough the service was very good too. the best thing was when I checkout , I know it will sound funny , but when the bellmen got my car and I got ready to drive away I saw a note on abottel of water , that was the greatest.

Reviews.Title: “Love this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Susan_Cape_Coral
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at this hotel during the American Adoption Congress Conference. Our room was spotless, easy to reach from the conference location, and eco friendly. The exercize area is small but state of the art. The pool area is absolutely beautiful, and we had to chuckle because this is the only hotel "i" know of that has a TV in the outdoor smoking area for it's guests. It's an absolute bonus that you can walk out of the hotel and directly in to The Florida Mall, and a good many of our folks had a great time not only shopping, but grabbing lunch or dinner in the mall food court.

Reviews.Title: “A Lovely Hotel - Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: LMF222
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the hotel for a conference. I found the hotel to be very clean, efficiently run and the employees were all very friendly and helpful. Location attached to the mall is great.. We did not have a car, so it was nice to be able to grab a bite to eat at the restaurants in the mall - a good variety. The pool area is very serene with quiet music playing - a nice oasis. I also liked how "green" the hotel is - only replacing towels if requested and dispensers for soap/shampoo/conditioner in the shower instead of all those little bottles. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel and Conference Center: Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: lincoln182
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, room, location and amenities and best of all, warm, helpful staff. Denise Povedano San JosÃ©, Costa Rica

Reviews.Title: “convenient location, quality service”
Reviews.Author: mtalev
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I typically look for on a business trip, clean rooms, convenient location, good service, quiet place. Bathroom is clean, perhaps a bit old but still in good shape. The room price is less than some road side inns/hotels in Cocoa Beach (that's where I stayed on prior trips) but quality is much better. The only reason to give four points is that the "hotel service fee" this is completely bogus...give two small bottles of water and charge $11 USD to use the facilities...I didnot know about this at the time of reservation, customers should be aware.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mervyn1958
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel and pool. Spacious rooms and great staff. Attached to the Florida Mall this hotel is heaven for shoppers. Taxi from Orlando International Airport $25-30. Virgin Atlantic Cabin Crew were staying and sunbathing at the pool during my stay. Happy hour from 3pm-9pm.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC experience!”
Reviews.Author: Simplicitytravel
Reviews.Content: If you're in need of a perfect hotel for groups who enjoy to shop - look no further! This hotel is absolutely perfect! Beautiful rooms, the block was perfect and the staff was extremely accommodating. From check in to their exceptional breakfast each AM.. both myself and the group were extremely impressed! Thanks again for making St. Mary's stay "simply" fantastic! "Simplicity Student Travel"

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to return”
Reviews.Author: Kad2011
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a great location, very central and in close proximity to many of Orlando's best attractions. And let me not forget that it's attached to one of the best shopping malls, even my husband loved this place. The hotel staff was very courteous and eager to help solve any problems or fulfill any requests. I was always able to get someone at the front desk and they helped with any requests, even with attraction tickets. The condition of the hotel was great, well maintained and beautifully appointed rooms, comfortable bed; bathroom was basic but clean and well maintained. The only problem I had was that if you miss housekeeping, the room would not be cleaned unless they are contacted to return at a time requested; they don't just return at a later time. Overall, I really enjoyed my stay and this hotel and would definitely return on my next trip to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful folks”
Reviews.Author: Ajohn845
Reviews.Content: Had a conference here had about 55 rooms booked, the staff was wonderful the rooms super clean. Nothing they could not do, handle each request with class and thoughtfulness. Hotel lobby resturant very good.

Reviews.Title: “The friendliest people!”
Reviews.Author: LCL5403
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel as a chaperone with a group of high school students. I was so pleased by the service at the hotel. Everyone we dealt with was extremely frinedly and helpful. The rooms are large and comforable, and the kids loved being in the same building as the Florida Mall. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “It lived up to the reviews”
Reviews.Author: PKPSU
Reviews.Content: We had an excellent stay at The Florida Hotel. I decided to book after reading the reviews here and it definitely lived up to the ranking. The hotel is nice and location is great (attached to a great mall) but it is the service that makes this hotel. From the front desk staff who let us check in early as there was a room available to the staff at Crickets bar, everything was amazing. Service is definitely where they have put their staff training. The bar had a great happy hours - 2 for 1 from 3:00-9:00 including on appetizers. They were really friendly. The $11 per night resort fee covered parking (not valet), internet, bottled water in the room, etc. It was really a wonderful mini-vacation. The pool area is really nice; pool temp was around 90 so it was very comfortable. My only suggestion would be to somehow facilitate drinks/food to the bar. There is a call box that goes to the restaurant and the bar staff happily gives drinks in "to go" cups but wait staff there would make it even better. I will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, slightly Over-Rated”
Reviews.Author: travelleralamundo
Reviews.Content: Lots of 5' ratings given to this hotel. Relative to other hotels in Florida, its a much nicer hotel and well maintained. Rooms are nice, well appointed, clean and spacious. Bathroom is clean, basic, little skimpy on the toiletries. 5 Star quality, not really, maybe 3.5, I was here on business, very busy hotel with business people and families here on vacation. Location is what gives this hotel high marks, connected to Florida Mall and close to attractions. All and all a good place to stay if your in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Why the surcharge?”
Reviews.Author: tomwiseOxfordUK
Reviews.Content: I was not impressed by their $11 service charge. For what? Is this just an excuse so they can headline a cheaper price? The only newspaper available as part of the service charge was the local paper. This sort of spurious charge makes me think the hotel is ripping me off. The bathrooms had big ugly plastic shampoo dispensers that were filled as cheaply as possible.

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel and Conference Center in Orlando is an outstanding venue for business meetings.”
Reviews.Author: kromney
Reviews.Content: Our organization has returned to the Florida Hotel and Conference Center for our biggest annual business event because of the low cost, yet high quality accomodations, meeting facilities and banquet services. As an added bonus, the convenient location within the Florida Mall enables our employees to to feed and enjoy themselves inexpensively after hours without having to rent a car.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect venue for a first class training seminar!”
Reviews.Author: fvanhoy
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a facility to host a business training seminar, I highly recommend the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. The entire hotel staff are super efficient and friendly, always smiling - Clim and Jean (valet services), Patty Hepburn and Barry Adubato (Convention services), Scott and David (banquet services), Cricket, Brent and Donna (Cricket's Grill and Lounge), Keith Wolling (General Manager), and the many other staff members too numerous to list here. This was our second visit to the Florida Hotel and Conference Center; we're so pleased with this facility that we have already signed on for next year. You will not be disappointed with this facility. Frank Van Hoy, National Service Director, Military Order of the Purple Heart

Reviews.Title: “Great deal and fabulous hotel!”
Reviews.Author: richmondck
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised and pleased with how nice and cool this hotel was! The Florida Mall is a HUGE plus great shopping! The hotel staff were very friendly and the hotel was very clean and upscale. I will definitely be back as soon as I can!

Reviews.Title: “The only place you'd like to stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: monicainjax
Reviews.Content: Perfect all the way! the room is clean and confortable, nicely price, located in the heart of one of the biggest malls in Orlando and centric to everywhere, markets, shops, restaurants, etc. even if you do not have a car it would work, since there is a public bus from the airport with a stop at the mall, grab a guide and go everywhere using public transportation! that if you manage to leave the Florida Mall at all! Do not forget to have breakfast first at Crikett! just yummie

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful stay that exceeded my expectations in all areas.”
Reviews.Author: Mistrspark
Reviews.Content: Very cost competitive. Excellent staff, most helpful. Facilities are extremely weel appointed and kept. Conveniently located.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service makes you feel right at home”
Reviews.Author: CGoNet
Reviews.Content: Great location, only 10 minutes from DownTown Disney, a few minutes from the airport and of course, a few steps from a very big mall ! Service was curteous and attentive in all aspects. The food at the in-hotel restaurant was always great taste with great prices, wasn't worth going elsewhere. Will definitely be back !

Reviews.Title: “Much better choices in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: ann60795
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for a conference. The Front Desk Staff was the best! As far as the rest of the Hotel, go somewhere else. The rooms are in dire need of an update. The bathrooms don't seem clean. The conference facilities were a mess, the rooms freezing, the sound systems way off. You are in the middle of nowhere. Yes a big mall is right there but otherwise that and a great front desk staff this one is a skip.....

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Price -- Excellent Room -- CLEAN!”
Reviews.Author: dlmyvette
Reviews.Content: I stayed in April 2011 for 2 nights. Mostly I was attracted to this hotel because it is attached to the Florida Mall, which I love. It's great to wake up in the morning, walk downstairs, have Starbucks just footsteps away and an entire mall. Just great. We booked our room through Hotels.com and had no issues checking in, it was quick and they were able to accommodate our request for a KING bed when we arrived. Actually it was all they had which was just fine with us, since it was only 2 of us. The room was clean, everything was at it should be and as expected in a room. My only suggestion for those who need a lot of bathroom space is that the sink is outside the bathroom where the shower is located and the counter space is very limited, one at a time......But that wasn't such a big deal. Overall, I will definitely stay here again. The hotel is close to Universal, Disney, all other parks as well. Shopping is great since the mall is steps away. Definitely stay here!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Charming”
Reviews.Author: jhrisio
Reviews.Content: Location and service one of the best for meeting and/or family travel. All associates well versed in customer service

Reviews.Title: “Good value for the money, excellent location, close to shopping and clean.”
Reviews.Author: MameNewfoundland
Reviews.Content: Stayed there while transiting from Cruise. Hotel was very clean, had many amenities to choose from. Great location built on Florida Mall. While having at least three conferences ongoing at the same time, there was little or no waiting time at bar or restaurant. Pool and Gym were very clean and roomy. Staff were very cooperative and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent vegetarian foods, service, location & value”
Reviews.Author: dinelrad
Reviews.Content: I attended a religious meeting and the foods prepared at the hotel for this particular meeting are all vegetarian. Great variety and excellent taste for breakfast, lunch and dinner, which can be difficult to prepare for vegetarian meals. The staffs are very friendly, especially those serving the meals. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: DanH59601
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, friendly staff, clean, great room service. Location is adjacent to the Florida mall which is a plus and access to the airport is easy and under 10 minutes. Room accommodation were oustanding and free internet service a plus. Would recommend this hotel to others!

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for a short or long stay”
Reviews.Author: cityman66
Reviews.Content: We found the Florida Hotel clean and very comfortable. The service was friendly and efficient. The location could not have been better. Close to Orlando International Airport with easy access to the Mall for shopping and eating. Also shops and restaurants within 5 minutes drive. We would return for a short shopping trip or a longer relaxing holiday - the pool was lovely and the sun loungers very comfortable. Definitely a place to return to.

Reviews.Title: “Great option for convention centre”
Reviews.Author: NathanC
Reviews.Content: I booked here last minute as it was midway between orange county convention Ctre and the airport. I had a conference and an early flight so it was perfect. What I found was a nice room, a comfy bed, nice big gym, v warm pool and perfectly adequate pool area and it was attached to mall so good for food options and shopping requests from home. All this for Â£85 a night through Expedia!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding staff and gorgeous hotel!”
Reviews.Author: sunOworshipper
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had a great stay at the Florida Hotel. The staff was absolutely amazing and the service at the restaurant the like. I will definitely stay there again in the future when traveling to Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, excellent service and easy to work with.”
Reviews.Author: Roberta_B18
Reviews.Content: The Sales Mgr and Convention Services Mgr are excellent. All the staff are very friendly and enjoyable to work with. Was not real impressed with some of our meals during the conference. Make sure your entire menu is detailed before your event and don't accept "chef's choice"

Reviews.Title: “Unexpected Surprise for a special weekend.”
Reviews.Author: terlesbrown
Reviews.Content: We had been to this hotel previously and loved it everyone very friendly. It was our anniversary March 20th so this was a special long weekend getaway. When we checked in it was kind of busy, a manager named Dana was helping out. She asked if any special reason, told her why and the fact that we loved eating at Charlie's Steak House down the road. She stated "Let's see if I can do something special for you guys". We thought maybe gift certificate for dinner at Charile's. Go up to the room, it is the Honeymoon Suite that she had so kindly upgraded our king room too. It made out anniversary that much more memorable. Thanks again Dana for a special weekend, hotel staff are super friendly. WE WILL BE BACK!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good Location. Good Stay.”
Reviews.Author: DenverHick
Reviews.Content: I don't really get why they are ranked #2 in Orlando. I had a nice stay but I would think there are much better places. I want to explore more of Orlando in the future. Rooms were nice and clean. Employees were courteous and friendly. Good hotel for those on business.

Reviews.Title: “Nice experience”
Reviews.Author: dwarnold95
Reviews.Content: Everyone was helpful, except I would have liked to have received better information from the desk clerk as to the use of the Lynx bus service ( e.g. a web link/ phone number to check for the proper bus route to my destination). The room was very nice, with good room cleaning, etc.,( the "green card is a great idea) Good central location, especially if you like to shop What I liked best & least: best - good food, refreshments for the conference least - see above desk clerk comment

Reviews.Title: “Amazing place”
Reviews.Author: keyspeople
Reviews.Content: A friend reccomened this hotel as we were traveling the Florida turnpike. We did not want to go too far off that road to spend the night. What a great thing she did for us. It is attached to a huge mall. Starbucks and a grill that is open after the mall closes. Lots of parking, staff was extremely helpful and friendly. I asked for extra blankets at the front desk, went to get a cup of coffee to go and went back to my room. Two minutes later, we had the extra blankets. Summary: Great hotel, convienient location and wonderful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: madelynphillips
Reviews.Content: Hotel Staff was wonderful and very courteous. Cricketts was great!

Reviews.Title: “Seminar in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: petevaff
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here before and allways enjoyed the visit. The hotel is clean and comfortable and the meeting rooms are quite accessable on the 2nd floor.

Reviews.Title: “nice”
Reviews.Author: mimi9107
Reviews.Content: a good please and a good service very nice location for shopping and business meeting

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: patricia_knowles
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice hotel with friendly and helpful staff. I love the close proximity of the mall and the other shops and restaurants in the surrounding area. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. Everyone who I came into contact with went the extra mile to ensure that my stay was the most enjoyable. I spent seven nights at this hotel, it was my first visit and I am looking forward to visiting/staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean Friendly and great service”
Reviews.Author: ncpolak
Reviews.Content: Rooms were clean, staff was helpful and polite. Would recommend it as a conference center for meetings.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, clean & simple”
Reviews.Author: NatureMark
Reviews.Content: Not extravagant, but very convenient, clean and nice! I had a beautiful corner room at the end of the hall. You get a refrigerator, bottled water and free Wi-Fi. There is also a business center where you can use free internet and free printing, which was really nice. The staff and front desk were very friendly and accomodating. The banquet food was typical of a banquet and may have been based on our spending budget! Overall, I would recommend this hotel b/c of convenience and fair price. I wouldn't pay too much b/c its not elegant, only convenient! real close to 528 & turnpike too!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay. Location was great.”
Reviews.Author: BLGrandma
Reviews.Content: Had a very pleasant one night stay before flying home to NJ. Lived up to good reviews and exceeded expectations. An extra "thank you" to Tara (front desk) and Raymond for making us feel welcome and special. We even saw the fireworks at Disney from our window. How cool is that?

Reviews.Title: “ENHANCED OUR STAY IN ORLANDO”
Reviews.Author: jgd058
Reviews.Content: This is the first time we have stayed at this hotel and we have been coming to orlando twice yearly for the past 11 years. I am glad we decided to give this Hotel a try. Our stay was excellent, the rooms are exactly as the photographs show. Very clean, spacious, nice big fridge and safe. Housekeeping services excellent. Coffee etc always replenished along with 2 bottles of water. We used the pool a couple of times and it was hard to believe whilst lying there you are surrounded by a car park. Lovely big pool and the sun loungers have cushions, so comfortable. Staff were very friendly, they always acknowledged you in the hotel. The Cricketers bar has a real buz and the staff exceptionally friendly and welcoming. I would highly recommend this hotel. For us getting around was easy as we hire a car, might be a bit more difficult if you do not hire a car. Transport is available to theme parks for a charge. We had a great time and had absolutely no complaints about this hotel.....................cant wait to come back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great location, and friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: Sportstar9820
Reviews.Content: Housekeeping was very friendly and helpful making sure the room was cleaned at my convenience and I had everything that I needed. Loved the mall location and the shopping and dining options without having to drive. Pool was great and fitness certer and the Starbuck right in the lobby was awesome. Very clean and had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “Wish I had more time!”
Reviews.Author: Boobearer
Reviews.Content: I was only here for one night before heading to Disney, I wish we could have stayed longer. Good location to other business - restaurants, bars, mall & Wal-Mart :). Front desk service was good and the rooms were a good size. Another bonus, the bathroom had mounted containers of shampoo, conditioner & body wash. The only draw backs 1) the face towels were very scratchy and 2) parking during mall hours was horrible!

Reviews.Title: “Great, this is my official Orlando hotel...”
Reviews.Author: jvolms
Reviews.Content: Excellent, the staff was cordial and very attendant. The room was nice, and equipped with a fridge. Also, there is a pool and hot tube, which helps after spending a day at one of Orlando's many theme parks. The location is real close to Islands of Adventure/Universal, and not far from Disney. Lastly, the hotel is connected to the Florida Mall, which I suppose can be a big deal if you're a shopper...

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel with convenient access to shopping and restaurants.”
Reviews.Author: pastorjudi
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel with convenient access to the Florida Mall for shopping and restaurants. Only issue is that the mall hours often make it difficult to find a place to eat after 9pm, and the Starbucks located in the hotel lobby closes early as well. This is the third time that I have stayed in this hotel, and the employees were very friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean and spacious, and the exercise room was clean and had new equipment.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for those who love shopping (like my wife)”
Reviews.Author: al_san_diego
Reviews.Content: My family and I have enjoyed staying at this hotel many times. Having an attached shopping mall is a big plus for my wife, although it provides no advantage for me.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Venue for a Conference”
Reviews.Author: anthonyms
Reviews.Content: We were a large women's group for the weekend. Hotel staff were very efficient in keeping the facilities tidy and stocked. Catering and food was wonderful. Best "hotel" food I've ever experienced.

Reviews.Title: “Shopaholics' paradise”
Reviews.Author: Carol-Bermuda
Reviews.Content: Orlando is the best place for shopping and this Mall is the biggest. The fact that the Hotel is over it is an added bonus. The hotel is great, the staff very friendly and they have a wonderful car company attached to the hotel and the drivers are the best Cannot recommend it enough

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, facilities and with the added benefit of no Mickey!”
Reviews.Author: JanLD
Reviews.Content: Wonderful hotel with very accommodating staff! Connected to a large, upscale Mall complete with Food Court. Service is first class, accommodations are up-dated with spacious rooms, flat screen TVs, in-room safes, etc., etc.....plus it's a green hotel! Nice outdoor pool, and convenient to visit The Mouse, if you must! Staff are exceptionally courteous, helpful and accommodating; certainly a five-star experience! Plus a very cool and hip duplex suite!!! The beds are super comfortable (duvets, none of those nasty coverlets...) and the pillows are plentiful and fluffy...

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: Bernisgarcia
Reviews.Content: Awesome experience, clean rooms, excellent conference rooms, very friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel was beyond my expectations.”
Reviews.Author: TerryHusk
Reviews.Content: I traveled to Florida to go the the Daytona 500. My stay at the hotel was very clean, comfortable and I would recommend this hotel. The food and bar was also excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Clean Rooms”
Reviews.Author: traveler2600
Reviews.Content: After staying in other hotels on a business trip, it was a refreshing relief to get to this one. It was very clean. Everything was good. The staff is friendly and helpful. Conveniently located next to great shopping at the mall. Short trip from the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Always a firm favourite....”
Reviews.Author: Speedbird275
Reviews.Content: I've been staying at The Florida [Mall] Hotel on a fairly regular basis for the past seven years and I always enjoy my visit. The hotel is conveniently located just 15-20 minutes from McCoy Airport and next to the expansive Florida Mall - a veritable mecca for shoppers with absolute everything available under one roof (including one of the best in-mall Food Courts you'll find anywhere!) The hotel itself is regularly renovated - in my seven years there I seem to remember atleast two major renovation projects taking place incluing an almost complete re-model of the reception area which is now spacious and welcoming. The rooms, too, have been renovated and are modern without compromising on comfort and convenience. Additionally, they rooms here are some of the biggest standard rooms I've ever experienced anywhere in the world..... They're huge. The hotel has a nice out-door pool, in-house Starbucks and convenience store (handy, but with the mall connected I must admit to seldom using it). The hotel's bar, Cricketts, has an extended happy hour offering 2-for-1 drinks and nibbles (great bar-snack menu available!! I suggest you try the quesadillas). The staff here are also superb. Very helpful and, one the one occasion I've had a problem, very keen to rectify things. If I was staying in Orlando for more than a few days, I'd be tempted to stay nearer the parks or towards International Drive; but for a few nights in the city this hotel is an absolute must! Particularly good if you have a car, with masses of free parking available. The only strange thing about this hotel would be the location of the gym.... It's just off the lobby and is open-plan, to an extent..... Little strange.

Reviews.Title: “Good facility and friendly service”
Reviews.Author: injuryfree
Reviews.Content: Nice to have the mall attached. Night was quiet - room comfortable and staff friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again”
Reviews.Author: LLash04
Reviews.Content: This Hotel was in a great location for transportation to multiple locations, You could catch the bus or the trolley with easy access to shopping and other attraction sites(ie parks). The staff was overly friendly and made sure our stay was perfect and felt like home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “Luxury. Pure luxury.”
Reviews.Author: Fl0ridavacati0ner
Reviews.Content: When driving up to the facility, with available free parking, we were at aww. With The Florida Mall surrounding The Florida Hotel it was even more impressive. Most of the staff were obviously there to assure your stay was phenomonal. The rooms were accommodating right down to the spa shampoo/conditioner/ body wash dispenser. Slept wonderfully, mainly because it was so quiet. We were there because of MyTravel.com for the Daytona 500. Had a terrific time. Our long days at the track ended with shopping a little crashing in our comfy bed. They even wanted to know how are stay was with a comment card and emailed us thanking us. We did tell them we wish there was a microwave and the complimentary coffee was better tasting. I have confidence if we go back and at least one of these ideas will be implemented.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean and convenient”
Reviews.Author: Twinsmom2006_28
Reviews.Content: We were dropping off family members at ORL, just having driven from Ft Lauderdale.We had booked a hotel thru a service and it offered the Florida Hotel.It was real convenient from the airport, and upon arrival they asked if we wanted a king size bed, that was perfect.The rooms were clean and the hotel was connected to the Florida mall.I would recommend this hotel, if you want to get away from the hubub of all the parks and tourists.

Reviews.Title: “Best Stay In Orlando”
Reviews.Author: yeswelove2travel
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot for business and always appreciate walking into a very clean and well designed room. The Florida Hotel was the best hotel I have stayed at in Orlando. Great facilities and great location!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mikedoss
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference at the Florida Hotel & Conference Center. I was immediately met with the Bell Staff who were gracious and courtious. I was then met with the Quest Registration Staff who too were great. The Hotel was very clean, food was great and all of my needs and wants were met without fail or hesitation!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: keatmon
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at this hotel the night before we flew home to Canada from Orlando International Airport. We originally booked because of its proximity to the mall and airport, and we got it for a great price on travelocity.com, and I will definitely be back. We had a great experience from the moment we stepped into the hotel. Check-in was very quick , staff were very courteous, polite, and helpful. The mall was open so it was very convenient to walk through the lobby and be in the Florida Mall. We were on a higher floor with a king bed, and the room was very nice. The spa shower was amazing and the beds were incredible. Express check-out was great as we only had to call down to the front desk and approve our invoice. I would not recommend this hotel for a family with children on vacation but it was great for 2 adults looking for a hotel that was quieter than the Disney area hotels. Great for a shopping trip, etc. The Starbucks in the lobby is a definite bonus, as it came in very handy in the morning.

Reviews.Title: “Truly an experience that appealed to all the senses”
Reviews.Author: esposito5880
Reviews.Content: The Florida hotels ambiance is welcoming and friendly with all the amenities and conveniences. Upon my arrival I was greeted by friendly the friendly bellman and front desk staff. The rooms are spacious and clean and wireless access a plus. The fitness center is like none other. Large spacious room with all the cardio equipment you would need as well as weights. Outstanding! On the leisure side Crickets bar and grill is the place to relax and enjoy the company of friendly staff and fellow guests. The hotel is conveniently attached to the Florida Mall for those like me who like to 'shop 'til you drop'. Truley a delightful experience.

Reviews.Title: “reasonable hotel - odd location (connected to a mall)”
Reviews.Author: Runnergirlnyc
Reviews.Content: For the price point, this is hotel is good bet. The rooms are decent size, clean and comfortable. There is plenty of parking. The service is fair. There is a small pool but I would not go to this hotel if you are truly interested in a pool side experience. The fitness room was small but clean and well-lighted. There are plenty of amenities for a business traveler, including wi-fi internet access throughout the hotel. It did seem strange that the hotel is connected to a mall, but that proved helpful when I needed to run to Nordstrom.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: trip_desirer
Reviews.Content: The hotel room was extremely comfortable, very soft sheets, and the proximity to the mall and outstanding stores is a shopper's dream! The fitness center was clean and spacious and bright, and a perfect reminder of what we all need to do more of, especially in the winter time!

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a conference or jumping off point.”
Reviews.Author: Okietourist
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a week while attending a conference. The hotel is attached to a pretty big mall, so I was able to get some shopping achomplished. The bar there has great happy hour specials on food and drink and was very good. I think this hotel would be a great place to stay for all the attractions too. It is about 15 minutes away from I drive (I think). The pool seemed nice, but it was too cold to get in while I was there. The only negative for me was if you wanted to get out of the hotel/mall you really needed a car. (Taxis are there for hire.) I travel a lot and like to go to local restaurants and stores. Here, I found it impossible, but it may have been due to the tourist nature of Orlando. Over all I found the hotel comfortable and would stay there again on business or otherwise.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: krafeena
Reviews.Content: During a conference visit at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center my guest and I were very please with the services received from the waitresses. The Tea Party set up was very welcoming and the ambiance was well fit for a tea party. I felt like a young girl again when I walked into the room filled with beauty. I am a tea lover, so to find the multitude of tea selections was very welcoming. I was expecting loads of sweets and cakes, but to my surprise when the waitress brought out the decorative finger sandwiches I was caught by surprise, but welcomed the choices. We had three choices to choose from, but gladly they all became my favorite by the end of the night. I really enjoyed that tea party. The information received, the ambiance, the food and the tea made it all worth while. Highly recommended for your next event.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great rooms, great staff”
Reviews.Author: electric130
Reviews.Content: hotel is convenient to tons of restaurants and shopping. It's connected to a very nice mall.

Reviews.Title: “It's like visiting a close relative every year.”
Reviews.Author: kharth
Reviews.Content: Our annual conference has been held at this site for several years, and every year we same the same familiar faces and experience the same top notch quality of service. Everyone from the front desk to those with the fancy red jackets to those that work at desks in big offices was helpful and available and seemed genuinely thankful for our business. The location is convenient to the airport and has a mall attached. The workout facilities have been upgraded and the pool is truly an oasis.

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: kayoticlaudia
Reviews.Content: This is the third stay at the Florida Hotel - this time for more than one night! Since I am on a business trip that leaves me no free time except in the evenings I find the location of this hotel great. The connected mall gives you the opportunity to shop without being far from the hotel. That is you can drive home from convention, change, shop and then drop into bed! Also there are plenty of other shops located near by that make this a good location: office supplies, supermarket, bookstore (closing sadly), crafts and hobbies, restaurants, ..... to name a few (not by name). And of course if you don't want to get breakfast in the restaurant you can always just get coffee and oatmeal to go! Another big plus is the free parking (unless you need valet parking) and the free wifi! We all know what some hotels charge for wigi usage let alone parking. My friend and I made use of the outside seating (smoking area) to sit and soak up the Florida sun and sip our coffees. Will certainly be back!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: azaaub1
Reviews.Content: All hotel staff were very friendly and attentive. We were there 2 days. The staff was there for your ever need. Room had many conveniences including a refrigerator, iron and hair dryer. Business area conveniently located in lobby.Wy_fi worked good in the room. Fitness room kept clean and tidy. Pool area was great. Restaurant located in hotel served a variety of very good tasting food as well as room service. In addition the hotel is attached to the Florida mall for shopping convenience. Wonderful Hotel!!!!!! Atom oswego ny

Reviews.Title: “A favorite of ours with large, comfortable rooms and fine service.”
Reviews.Author: planelucky1
Reviews.Content: Because the hotel is attached to one of the largest malls in Florida, there is always someplace to walk and great shopping. The staff is unusually polite and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, very nice and helpful personnel.”
Reviews.Author: EVelis
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, very nice and helpful personnel.

Reviews.Title: “A Shoppers Delight!”
Reviews.Author: ShopRyan
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in a great location. It is near the Universal Studios and not far from UCF. We were on a college tour and found it to be about a half hour drive. The room was nice and the lobby is beautiful. It opens into the Florida Mall. The mall is upscale and huge. We really enjoyed shopping until we dropped! The only downside is the toiletries dispenser in the shower. Bring your own shampoo, conditioner, soap and lotion. We did get lotion at the front desk, but you have to ask for it. Next time we will pack the necessities. The price was worth it.

Reviews.Title: “After many visits in the past 12 years, this hotel is better than ever.”
Reviews.Author: luv2travel1934
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center at least ten times over the years for conferences, which was always a treat because of its connection to the Florida Mall. The improvements that have been made, especially in the lobby and ground floor area are far superior to the past, the rooms have been updated and are very comfortable, but the best part is the friendly and commendable customer service. I left a jacket in my room and their response was instant and helpful, I can't thank them enough. I will stay at this hotel every opportunity that I can.

Reviews.Title: “The best choice in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: saviokzam
Reviews.Content: I have been here twice and both times it was amazing.

Reviews.Title: “First experience in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: pastorscm
Reviews.Content: I had a training in Orlando at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. The hotel and staff were great. Very helpful, kind, and willing to go the second mile. The rooms were very nice and clean. Being connected to the Florida Mall was great. Many places to shop, eat, and just window shop. Great for a family with plenty of places to eat within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: ShayneKinsman_Ohio
Reviews.Content: We had an issue with a shuttle service from the airport to the hotel. The check-in associate immediately called the service with our concerns and procured our shuttle back to the airport the next day....at a reduced rate. Great PR, out-of-the way service. It was done with such class. Thanks Raphael.

Reviews.Title: “Correct”
Reviews.Author: FernandoCifuentes
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were looking for a hotel in Orlando that was close to restaurants, theaters,and shopping but away from the family scene of Disney and Universal. This hotel was great! Primarily a businessman's hotel, the pool area was relaxing and not crowded, the rooms were more or less clean and good decorated, the resaurant buffet was good, the staff was attentive and professional, and best of all, the location was perfect! The hotel is literally attached to the Florida Mall, so we were able to take advantage of nearby restaurants, theaters, and stores. The expressways are right by the mall, which made getting anywhere easy, especially the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: classy1758
Reviews.Content: All hotel staff were very friendly and attentive. Conference lasted for 3 days. Food provided for conference was attractively displayed and staff kept entire area free from clutter of used coffee cups etc. Room had many conveniences including a refrigerator, iron and hair dryer. Business area conveniently located in lobby. Fitness room kept clean and tidy. Pool area free from any pests and an abundant supply of towels. Restaurant located in hotel served a variety of very good tasting food as well as room service. Prices of food were very reasonable. In addition the hotel is attached to the Florida mall for shopping convenience. Wonderful pleasant place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel with great service”
Reviews.Author: b12shots
Reviews.Content: This place is a must stay for those who love to shop as it is in the middle of the Florida Mall. Staff are friendly and helpful. Lovely outdoor heated pool and free internet access in the hotel's business centre. Recently had a 23 million dollar reno and it shows. Would definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Hotel with excellent accomodations, great restaurant and easy access to the mall and Orlando attractions.”
Reviews.Author: Ginger6677
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the hotel for three days and two nights was very comfortable, with a pristine hotel room, and accomodations. The hotel restaurant had a wonderful buffet bar and omelet and Belgian Waffles. The service and staff were excellent. We enjoyed the opportunity to spend down time at the attached mall. The exercise room was great as well. We would definitely stay here again in the future. We have already referred the hotel to friends. Thanks for an enjoyable stay. Sincerely, The Robison Family

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service and Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: MSIInstructor
Reviews.Content: The personnel at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center provide outstanding service and support to our course needs. We have for serveral year presented our training course at this hotel. The friendly and compentent staff take care of all of our requirements. We never have any complaints about the hotel or staff. The hotel being connected to the shopping mall is a bonus. It is easy to get our students out of the training sessions and to lunch a timely manner. I can't say enough about the service that we have received over the year from the Florida Hotel staff.

Reviews.Title: “Always a genuine top service and friendly staff at this comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Globalguest100
Reviews.Content: Having staying multiple times in the past, i recently spent another 3 nights at the Florida Mall Hotel. Besides the genuine top service, the staff has always been very friendly, rooms clean and offers overall good quality for a competitive price. Besides the amazing happy hour times in the hotel bar ( till 9pm!) the hotel offers complimentary internet in both the room and lobby. Good sized gym and the Florida Mall is attached to the hotel. During my stay i realised once more why i always like coming back here.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: carlajean618
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great! The service is top, rooms are spacious and clean and a wonderful fitness center. It's also attached to a large mall, which makes it convenient for travelers.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant Hotel for families”
Reviews.Author: charliesmum
Reviews.Content: Great room, great location and great staff. Totally happy at this hotel - with shopping mall on site and decent pool too. Highly recommened if you are travelling with older kids - they can go to the pool and you can shop - perfect! Food Mall also pretty good compared to lots of the food in Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCACATION, GREAT PLACE, BEAUTIFULLY DONE ROOMS WITH ALL AMENITIES.”
Reviews.Author: SavannahZolfoSprings
Reviews.Content: We went to do some serious shopping and the hotel was fabulous due to its location, beside being a wonderful hotel. The staff was excellent, very helpful and warm. Being able to go through the hotel to the Florida Mall (GREAT MALL) was wonderful, especially since it was raining outside. That convenience alone was worth a gold stare in it self. Coming back to the room after a long day of shopping was a pleasure, the room was lovely, the beds were great and the room was large enough that we did not feel cramped. Can't wait to go back. Definitely will stay there again in the future. It will be the hotel we stay at when I am in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and location for shopping.”
Reviews.Author: Elsahreins
Reviews.Content: Friendly efficient service, clean comfortable accommodations & convenient location especially if you are going shopping. 30min from Cocoa beach by car. We loved it.

Reviews.Title: “Mended Hearts Convention--Excellent accomadations & service”
Reviews.Author: ChesterF
Reviews.Content: Very little left to say. we were completely satisified with our stay. The only thing that I can think of is that was only one bath cloth for the 2 of us which we didn't realize until after the fact. Of course the house keeper made that adjustment. Would definately reccommend--this was our 3rd. visit. Chester F.Tankersley

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: BeckyPugh
Reviews.Content: Was here for two nights for a business stay - enjoyed very much the convenience of the Florida Mall - Staff at the hotel were very friendly and helpful - food served @ the meeting was excellent. My room overlooked the mall and was clean and well organized. Enjoyed my stay very much and look forward to a return visit.

Reviews.Title: “Hassle Free”
Reviews.Author: JetRPh
Reviews.Content: Stayed for couple of nights with wife and 4yr old daughter. Distance to Disney parks, Universal, Seaworld etc is not bad, so location is ok, in fact, its great as it is connected to the Florida Mall. Customer service/staff were very courteous, friendly and just exceptional. Check in was a breeze even if we checked in around 11am. I heard before that this hotel is great for business purposes. Found out that its also great for leisure as well...and shopping too! We stayed in a Std King room, had a sofa bed, flat screen, mini fridge, wifi as some of the amenities. All in all, great stay and definitely will come back again. I honestly doubt if there will be regrets after staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent staff and location!”
Reviews.Author: jraz421
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a conferece and found it to be very enjoyable! The fact that it is attached to a mall is a plus!! Also there is a Starbucks in the lobby which is very nice!

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was quiet, staff was friendly, rooms were spotless.”
Reviews.Author: laurieinct
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival, the hotel looks just like it does in the pictures. You can't quite see the M & M store hiding to the right of the hotel. The staff always greeted me with a smile. The rooms were spotless all week. At night, the hotel was quiet!

Reviews.Title: “Thoroughly recommend for business use”
Reviews.Author: Baridi
Reviews.Content: Close to Orlando international airport. Very friendly staff, nice rooms, and loads of restaurants close by. Excellent shopping for those so inclined. Hotel bar is excellent - especially as they had a very good happy hour offer ( 2 for 1 on bar snacks and certain drinks).

Reviews.Title: “hotel stay”
Reviews.Author: jhartwick
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very nice and clean. Service was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “We will be back!”
Reviews.Author: sball67
Reviews.Content: We wanted to stay in Orlando near things to do. We could not have picked a better place the Florida Hotel was perfect in every way, the entire staff was very helpful and really nice. The room was very clean and well maintained. the hotel is connected right off the lobby to a HUGE very nice mall with all the name brand stores you could want. We drove to disney in about 20 minutes. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “â€œGreat for shoppersâ€�”
Reviews.Author: gaia5809
Reviews.Content: The hotel connect to the mall directly,it was a good for the shopping and eating. Free (self) parking was also great The room was adequate and internet access included, although an $11/day fee was mandatory

Reviews.Title: “Lovely, great customer service,”
Reviews.Author: vadoll1121
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay very much. I highly recommend staying here if you are in the Orlando area. I loved that the mall was attached to the hotel. I'm happy to learn that the conference I attended will be holding their event the same place next year.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel! Loved the Location!”
Reviews.Author: SusanFW
Reviews.Content: A beautiful Hotel with extremely friendly staff. We got to our original room and it was too small for my husband, myself and our 22 yr old son and 17 yr old daughter with 2 double beds and roll away bed. We called for help and they graciously gave us another room, basically a suite upgrade at no extra charge! We thouroughly enjoyed our 3 night stay, loved the Florida Mall adjacent and connected to the Hotel and will definitely go back there again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: RonsPicture
Reviews.Content: Conveniently situated for our cruise on Disney and shopping on International drive good value wonderful staff Great hotel

Reviews.Title: “Superior Service”
Reviews.Author: ChrisTrant
Reviews.Content: While we were waiting for our room to be ready, we ate in the lobby restaurant.
