The desk called my cell when our room was available and the bartender/waitress happily checked us in, got our keys, and we were able to quickly get to where we needed to go. I don't think any other hotel has ever done that for us. My son's birthday was that day, as well, so we ordered on of the desserts on the menu and our server found a candle and sang happy birthday to him. It was very sweet. The staff was very friendly and helpful during our stay. We would surely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “What A Wonderful Place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Deb522512
Reviews.Content: The FH&CC is a great place to stay. Easy to find, great location, everything is right there! Restraunts, attractions, shopping (the mall) and entertainment. Cricket's serves a great breakfast and is a nice bar to hang out in and meet interesting people from everywhere. The Grab-n-Go is open late and very convenient. Staff is freindly and helpful. This place has it all and we are repeat customers!

Reviews.Title: “What a Stay :)”
Reviews.Author: jtm06c
Reviews.Content: We had an amazing stay for New years eve and the following night. The staff was more than friendly, the hotel was clean and comfortable, the lobby was well decorated in season, the concierge helped us out with finding reliable rides on New Years eve...etc! Having the mall at our leisure in the lobby was a great experience. The food court provided choices for all the guests within the comfort of the same building. Overall we had a great stay and I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who was looking for a place in orlando!!! Or Florida for that matter :)

Reviews.Title: “5-Star Feel and Outstanding Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: JesusSaves_316
Reviews.Content: My spouse and I selected the Florida Hotel and Conference Center based upon several favorable reviews we read on TripAdvisor. The front desk staff was exceedingly friendly and courteous and when they learned we were celebrating our anniversary, they bent over backwards to assure we had the best possible accommodations. That included a complimentary room upgrade to a large suite with a view of the city to rival all others. The room was clean, well appointed, up to date (in both look and feel) with all amenities one could hope to have. Additionally the shift manager paid particular attention to our stay by ensuring we had personal bath robes laid out for us even before we got our luggage to the room. The location within the Florida Mall complex made our stay even more enjoyable as the access to restaurants and shopping makes it likely that you would never even need to leave the property for anything. We enjoyed a wonderful anniversary that was made many times more enjoyable by the outstanding accommodations and friendly staff. Truly, we had a 5-Star experience!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly, fun... always something to do!”
Reviews.Author: vlaney1
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for New Years. We loved the staff and building. The beds are comfy and the bathrooms are very pretty. Everything is updated! The lounge has excellent food. One of the best parts of the hotel is that it is attached to the Orlando Mall. We were very impressed, especially for the price! I don't know how they do it. You need to stay here if you are going to stay in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Great for shopping”
Reviews.Author: ALEXRASSI
Reviews.Content: Good room , good price , great for shopping , but a little bit far to the parks. Remenber stay away from Orlando in this time of the year unless you like crowds everywhere

Reviews.Title: “Holiday Shopping and Fun”
Reviews.Author: hildebrand92373
Reviews.Content: Loved the location and convenience of the Florida Hotel! We were in Orlando for a wedding during the holiday season and had the added benefit of being able to do alot of Christmas shopping in the attached Florida Mall. The staff were friendly and helpful and our room was quiet, clean and comfortable. Enjoyed our stay very much!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel , service and People”
Reviews.Author: jesus_salgado
Reviews.Content: This is not my first time and not the last to stay in this Hotel, We feel as Home. All service are excellent , restaurant, rooms very clean, Gym installations. Front Desk atention is very good

Reviews.Title: “The place to stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Oneboricua
Reviews.Content: Beautiful hotel, outstanding staff and fantastic location. Stay here for conferences, visiting Orlando or to shop at the mall.

Reviews.Title: “all you need in one!”
Reviews.Author: iissrr
Reviews.Content: it was an amaizing place to stay at bacause it has a mall where you can buy fast everything you want and you can be sure that the hotel is a safe place. In the rooms it was a confortable place and the service was very good. you can go to the fitness center to the mall , to starbucks and the environment will be very pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “This is worth of”
Reviews.Author: meu_papai
Reviews.Content: Beautiful place, quiet and properly for Conferences

Reviews.Title: “BEWARE hidden additional daily fees”
Reviews.Author: Worldramblings
Reviews.Content: I am currently staying at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. I booked via Lastminute.com at a rate of GBP 49 for a huge double room with an extra area for dining and watching TV. We are only a couple, but you could sleep 8 people in this room - it is huge. I rated this hotel terrible because of two things 1) the very poor welcome we received upon checking, which went along the following lines: "hello, give me your credit card I need to bill you an extra $100" and a piece of paper was trust at me explaining the MANDATORY ADDITIONAL SERVICE FEE of $12.38 per day. Apparently this covers use of the business centre (6 rather dirty Internet computers and 2 printers), the outdoor pool area, the gym, your in-room safe and refrigerator ( there is no minibar) and self parking (which is actually the free parking for the shopping mall to which the hotel is attached). I complained to the guest relations manager because I believe that if a fee is MANDATORY it should be included in the published rate. They said it wasn't their problem, and blamed Lastminute.com. 2) the hotel is very dated, giving it a rather dirty feel, even though it is probably clean... It's just very brown. 3)The restaurant is actually in the shopping mall and is fine for a beer and a burger, but it's not the kind of place you would choose for an evening meal.

Reviews.Title: “Will Definately Stay again & Again”
Reviews.Author: ROBTT868
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Florida Hotel For two days before spending our Christmas at a Disney Resort. As I pulled up the Bell man remembered me immediately from my August Trip. he even gave me a hug to welcome me back. Very Friendly staff all round. We had two rooms, both very clean and comfortable. They restock your room with bottled water every day and wifi is free. The hotel lobby is adjoining the Florida mall, you do not have to walk outside. Very convenient as all the major stores are in a 3-4 minute walk from your room. I will definitely be staying at The Florida Hotel again and again.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Outstanding Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Leggy92
Reviews.Content: This is without doubt one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in. Welcoming and helpful staff, superb location and excellent facilities.

Reviews.Title: “Great conference facility with plenty of food and shopping convience at the hotel.”
Reviews.Author: FedSteve
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in close proximity to Orlando International Airport and is attached to the Florida Mall, which provides for ample parking and plenty of shops and reasturants. The hotel staff was friendly and the conference facility was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Best Christmas Shopping Experience Ever!”
Reviews.Author: Lory040861
Reviews.Content: This was my first stay at The Florida Motel and Conference Center. I was so impressed by the professional, friendly staff, from the front desk registration, valet service to the housekeeping staff. It was the most enjoyable, relaxing stay I have ever experienced. I would highly recommend these accommodations to everyone!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: PMedina
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel, very clean, excellent service in restaurant, the have a starbucks in the lobby area, and you dont have to drive to go to one of the best mall's, the florida mall.

Reviews.Title: “Unbelievable Value and a hidden Treasure!”
Reviews.Author: bonandzee
Reviews.Content: In a city where hotels are abound and where 1 star hotels try to pass off as 3 star hotels....The Florida hotel exceeds everything I imagine from a hotel connected to a mall....I was leary the first time I book, but this has become our Hotel of choice when in Orlando.....From the Staff to the rooms and the mall...This hotel offers everything imaginable, except the overrated Continental breakfast all the others offer as a perk! I prefer Quality over a cold Breakfast.....They have a nice pool, exercise room and really almost everything a 5 star hotel can offer....It is near all interstates and to me is in a perfect location.....Best part is the Value! Great room for under a hundred bucks, plus they have a loyalty program...Can't wait to use my 3 free nights in 2011! This place is AWESOME!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Content: The hotel was the hotel of choice for our large conference. The staff was excellent, the service was outstanding. The legends ballroom was the room used for our conference. The room was more than big enough, the hotel staff worked the entire time we were there to ensure we had everything we needed (even down to snacks and beverages!). Check in and check out were a breeze. I would definitely recommend it for business and I plan to use it for personal travel as well. The rooms were large, clean and comfortable. The only downside is the parking. Since this hotel is located right in the mall, parking was not what I expected (actually located across the street from the hotel). But overall----Excellent service!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is a great place to stay for peace, quiet, and relaxation.”
Reviews.Author: passiondoctor
Reviews.Content: The staff was very helpful and the atmosphere of the hotel is very welcoming. I can always count on being relaxed when I stay here. I look forward to returning and taking advantage of the Spa.

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel is fabulous in every way”
Reviews.Author: cindy_roach
Reviews.Content: We arrived to the Florida Hotel late in the evening. The desk clerks were coureous, helpful and very friendly. They suggested places for us to dine for the evening. We chose a hotel restaurant - Crickets. We loved it. The food and service there was great as well...so much so that we decided to have breakfast there the next morning. We enjoyed a small but varied buffet. The highlight being "George", who makes their omelettes. He went over and above with his excitetment and personality. He said that he'd been with them for years and loves his job. PS...The Omelettes were PERFECT! They get 5 stars from us for customer service!

Reviews.Title: “This an outstanding hotel, simple as that!”
Reviews.Author: sigfuso
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center deserves all the good publicity it can get. Its probably one of the best hotels I have stayed in for normal middle income business people, with limited time that need to pick up things for their family. The hotel is short from the airport and everything is very practical. Whats there not to like? Plus the chicken wings at the Lobby restaurant are insanely good!

Reviews.Title: “The Perfect Location With Great Service”
Reviews.Author: marchbaby0330
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfectly located in the Florida Mall located in Orlando, Florida. Just right to have a great day of shopping or attend a business conference with style!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Trip and nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: nice53
Reviews.Content: The room was very comfortable, very good service and the location for shopping is perfect, the food at the restaurant very good.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice accomodations.”
Reviews.Author: 2546Bob
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the hotel for two nights. Accomodations were clean and well maintained. Service was very good from check-in to cleaning staff to check-out. Convenient valet or self park. Polite, friendly and helpful. Attached regional mall had great shops and restaurants. Located just off Florida's Turnpike.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, modern and wallet friendly”
Reviews.Author: Ayanna_B
Reviews.Content: I needed to pick up my mother from the airport and then do some shopping in Orlando. I don't know the area well, so the Florida Hotel and Conference Center was almost perfect. It was a little difficult to find, even with my Tomtom, but it was so easy to get to the airport. It was close enough that a taxi ride would be less than $20 to the airport. And it is attached to the Florida Mall, which meant we didn't need to go far to get our shopping done. Also room service went until 11pm. Fantastic for us night owls! The room was clean, spacious and modern in facilities and furnishings. And the customer service was polite and helpful. I had a good time and would stay there again. I would HIGHLY recommend paying for Valet parking. My car got dinged by somebody in the free parking lot. That's super annoying, and more expensive to fix now than the fee for three days of valet parking.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: DPennington
Reviews.Content: I travel frenquently back and forth to the Orlando area on business. That being said I have stayed at numerous hotels in the area. This hotel was one of the nicest and most affordable. Service was top notch, not one employee walked by without saying hello. Definitely would recommend and will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Out of Country Guests? Stay Here!”
Reviews.Author: Actagon
Reviews.Content: Great! We had a small but important (and highly visible) conference booked at this hotel. Not only was the hotel great, but it was well suited to all of our needs. The pool and Gym were large, and the the staff bent over backwards to get us anything we needed. They were continually dropping by to just see if our needs were being met. Our "customers" (those being the invited Partner Nation reps) were thrilled at the location. In fact, we specifically asked them where they'd like to have the meeting the next year, and everyone one of them said not to change the venue! That's our plan!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Garywalton1
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed out short stay. We were treated first class the way. Great rooms and friendly staff. We would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for Black Friday shopping”
Reviews.Author: kristipacetticushman
Reviews.Content: We stayed there on Black Friday shopping, the rate was 69.00 which was sent to be my email prior to Black Friday, very convenient, comfortable beds, great staff. New Black Friday tradition, we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Friendly, Convinient, highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: PaulAFC1983
Reviews.Content: I 10 days at this hotel for my honeymoon. All the staff were fantastic, willing to help with whatever we needed and made you feel welcome. Very reasonable prices. I definetly recommended this hotel to anyone whether for leisure or business, for whatever reason. I myself will be staying again the next time I visit Orlando Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for shopping!!”
Reviews.Author: dogbox
Reviews.Content: Have stayed at the hotel many times before. The hotel staff are efficient and friendly. Nothing is a problem for them. Free and reliable wi-fi, and free mineral water daily in rooms. Gym is well equipped, with machines that work! For the ladies it's location at the Florida Mall is shopping heaven, and there is even a spa located next to the hotel, in the mall, to pamper you. Great choice.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value Hotel !”
Reviews.Author: valynadine
Reviews.Content: During our Florida trip , we wanted to spend some time to do some shopping and to see some theme parks. At the first sight, the Florida Hotel seemed to be perfect.... And it really was ! Just built next to the Florida Mall, a few miles away from the theme parks and very close to the famous International Drive. Big Rooms, clean, nice pool and a fitness center. Great hotel !

Reviews.Title: “WATCH YOUR STUFF, ITS NOT SAFE!!!”
Reviews.Author: cdooley91
Reviews.Content: So I understand the hotel isn't responsible for my stuff, specifically my cell phone. But there are 8 signs in the lobby saying that I'm on camera all the time. Additionally, I have to use my key card to get into the gym. Very safe right? I leave my cell phone under the camera in the gym for a few hours and its gone. The members of security told me a variety of things ranging from "some of the cameras are fake" to "we looked and the camera feed was inconclusive." This is a large phone left in a gym where the lights are motion activated late at night. So either that camera isn't real, or its only taking a picture every 10 minutes or so. Take your pick. Mall guests can walk right up to your room door. No key card required. They had cops standing in the lobby. (maybe that will make up for their lack of good cameras.) Had to beg for maid service, door was sticking closed and toilet was leaking. Stay at your own risk.

Reviews.Title: “High level of service for the price”
Reviews.Author: Jmacq92
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel, which is connected to the Mall, based on T.A. reviews. The level of service is surprisingly high for the price. Rooms are large and the hotel was quiet. However, be aware of a â€œresort feeâ€� charged upon departure: we didnâ€™t really see the point of charging for amenities that are free in many other hotels. Is this a way to attract people with a low upfront price tag?

Reviews.Title: “Great for stop over”
Reviews.Author: sdcv3
Reviews.Content: Just the stop for a stop over after holiday before going to MCO to catch flight. Located right in the Florida Mall so last minute shopping easy, good food outlets.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the location and the staff was very pleasant”
Reviews.Author: ESCAPE66
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here, he had meetings to attend at the Orlando Airport area and I wanted to stay where I would have things to do,because he had to have his car. The Florida Hotel was our best choice and I am very glad that we decided to stay here. It was close to his meetings and close to SeaWorld which we were able to enjoy one afternoon. While he was at his meetings I could casually come and go from the hotel to the mall. The mall was great, over 250 stores gave me plenty to do while he was away. I would definately stay here again next time we are in the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Vickyc007
Reviews.Content: I went to this hotel because of the reviews on TripAdvisor and was not disappointed. It is in a perfect location and has an entrance right into the Orlando Mall. The rooms were great, clean and very big and the King bed was very comfortable. The place must be good as all of the Virgin Cabin Crew stay there! They also have a direct link to Orlando's airport info so you can see if your flight is on time/delayed etc. Really good place - would recommend for all who don't want to be on top of the Resorts as they were all within reasonable driving distance.

Reviews.Title: “A very unique hotel location”
Reviews.Author: mpelekan67
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located within a "mall" which was very unique as well as convenient! The accomodations were excellent and I will definitely visit this location again when in the Orlando area. The only thing that left something to be desired was the bar and restaurant area. The service was friendly, and the food & beverages were good, however, the service was very,very slow.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: gipsy1221
Reviews.Content: A very professional staff and the very comfortable conference areas, made my stay a very pleasant one.

Reviews.Title: “A very nice evening retreat after a tough day.”
Reviews.Author: carolyn5607
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel because it offered a special to attendeees for a local class. I basically chose it blindly not knowing what to expect. Much to my surprise, I found a relaxing,clean and comfortable room. I chose to stay in and order room service in the evening and again, was glad I did. I highly recommend the bruchetta....awesome! The staff was attentive and friendly and kindly showed me the entrance into the shopping mall right in the lobby.....and I did find some time to check that out. Should I attend another class and know I will, I plan on staying here again. I highly recommend this hotel. The only negative is that there is not a complimentary breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “My Experience at Florida Hotel and Conference Center”
Reviews.Author: JohnCroffet
Reviews.Content: My experience at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center will always be with me. The room (361) was comfortable and neatly kept. The bathroom was also very neat with enough towels for each day. The wardrobe is also beautiful and spacious. The electric iron was very well situated and the ironing board was just right. The telephones are well situated in the room and the bed lamps are fine. On the other hand, the room was quite cold when one enters from outside, the air conditioning could be set more moderate. We could not operate the TV. It would be good to have two arm chairs in the room instead of one. The housekeepers did a great job. The staff in the dining room were great and friendly. I enjoyed the breakfast at the Center. That is the only meal I took. The staff working in the washrooms did an excellent job (at least for the Male washrooms). The front desk staff were very polite and friendly. The guys helping us check our luggage in and out of out rooms did great. They worked as though they loved their job. One jokingly said he did all his work out carrying bags. And this I felt showed a positive attitude toward his work. I am glad I came to your hotel and hope to come there again.

Reviews.Title: “I Feel Like A Guest of Honor”
Reviews.Author: RolandSouthFlorida2
Reviews.Content: It has been quite a while since I have been able to stay at the Florida Hotel and even though I was attending a conference elsewhere during the week, I always try to enjoy my stay with a night at the Florida Hotel when possible. First, the rooms are the most comfortable I have enjoyed anywhere in the country. The hotel is attached to the Florida Mall so both my wife and I enjoy having some major shopping options just downstairs. Most importantly, I don't think I have stayed anywhere else with a feeling that I am a very special guest of honor. From the valet parking attendants on up, everyone is genuinely welcoming. The Sunday buffet brunch has the chef making fresh omelets, housekeeping keeps all well stocked, etc. Great rates on top of everything else.

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST HOTEL AND STAFF EVER!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kimikat4
Reviews.Content: I travel 7 hours twice a year just to stay at this hotel. It's connected to a fabulous mall so it's convenient to shop and then just go to your room.The staff go out of their way to help you. If there's anything you need they'll get it for you.The rooms are always clean and up to date. The housekeepers here are the best. I would highly recommend this hotel and can't wait to come back. I was only supposed to stay 3 nights and ended up staying 5!! A+++++++++++++++

Reviews.Title: “a great place at a great price,very friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: tgramstorff
Reviews.Content: we stayed two nights to see the space launch, It didnt go off but stayed anyways due to the great service,also very nice lounge,awsome people thank you to cricket!!! we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: dramdon
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed the stay at the hotel. The service was very good. My teenager son enjoyed staying at the hotel because it is attached to the mall and he was able to do shopping. the hotel also had amanities that met our needs. We enjoyed the restaurant and bar. The employees are very friendly and nice. We would stay again at this hotel anytime.

Reviews.Title: “Top notch in every way!”
Reviews.Author: blackbearmomma
Reviews.Content: I visited the hotel for both business and pleasure. The hotel accommodated both very nicely especially since it is attached to the Florida Mall. The conference rooms were spacious. The hotel room was very nice and comfortable. The pool and hot tub were outstanding and quite enjoyable. I would absolutely recommend this hotel and will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!!”
Reviews.Author: Kate_910
Reviews.Content: From the time of our arrival to the time of our departure everyone was very friendly and helpful!! The hotel is placed in a very convenient spot, a bus stop is located right outside the hotel giving you access to all the theme parks in Orlando and the shopping mall in which the hotel is found is perfect for shopping for every taste!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best value for your money.”
Reviews.Author: IrishPrincess60786
Reviews.Content: I came to the Florida Hotel and Confernece Center on Nov. 4th and 5th for a Conference for where I work. The room was very clean and well worth it. I had never seen an shower gel, shampoo, and conditioner dispenser on the shower wall before. That was a nice surprise. I would stay there again. Where else can you sleep and shop all in the same place?

Reviews.Title: “The time of my life”
Reviews.Author: england11032010
Reviews.Content: This hotel was without the best hotel I ever stayed in on the east coast. I travel a lot and have booked this room again for my stay in December.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel accomodations”
Reviews.Author: rosanajcmsncom
Reviews.Content: Great customer service. It is a very convenient location. I am always glad that I can go shopping for bargains as soon as I am done with my meetings and/or conference.

Reviews.Title: “Service with lots of smiles”
Reviews.Author: zonkertally
Reviews.Content: The staff was great and renomvations since I'd been there a few years ago were top notch. Group meals were very good and service here excellent as well. The connection to shopping mall was a great placfe to walk after a day of meetings. Many of us on staff are hoping we have more meetings there.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable and clean”
Reviews.Author: Urskibear
Reviews.Content: Stayed at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center while attending a conference. I found the hotel to be very comfortable, clean and well maintained. The conference rooms were very nice and the staff very friendly and helpful. The rooms are quite large, have WiFI, great beds and very nice bathroom. Also enjoyed the convenience of having a great mall attached to the hotel!! Really enjoyed my stay there. Will definitely be back

Reviews.Title: “A superb hotel for airline crews”
Reviews.Author: Grilla_10
Reviews.Content: As a pilot with a major UK airline, I really appreciate the superb service we get here in absolutely every respect. A quiet comfortable environment in a safe location. All departments of the hotel have just the best staff anywhere.

Reviews.Title: “A very comfortable hotel with great employees who are always cheerful and ready to serve”
Reviews.Author: SuzanneTaylor
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very well placed in The Florida Mall. Not only is it great for shopping but all the theme parks are easily accessible by cheap local bus service. Staff are eager to please and are friendly and helpful, nothing is too much trouble for this professional team. The rooms are clean, well equiped and very comfortable. Beds and pillows are soft and promote a good. cosy night's sleep. The pool is always clean and sunbeds and towels are plentiful. This hotel rates very high in all areas and is a complete joy to stay in.

Reviews.Title: “Day Conference”
Reviews.Author: bnthetao
Reviews.Content: Clean and well staffed with friendly and knowledgable staff. Starbucks in the lobby so there is plenty of bad coffee. No wireless internet in the conference room - somewhat of a problem when taking a class but otherwise enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “Good, clean, comfortable, nice foodcourt, slow internet, no laundry.”
Reviews.Author: fastruman
Reviews.Content: This is a nice hotel. Very clean, great service, lovely beds and bathrooms. But the INTERNET IS EXTREMELY SLOW, as mentioned in other reviews. If you need to get serious work done on the internet, it will be extremely frustrating. its pretty convenient to have a food court in the same giant building, with Starbucks, Subway, and then a whole bunch of other places. Nothing special or very good for you, but convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Doesn't Live Up To Its Rating!”
Reviews.Author: nclerie12
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel based on the high ratings and reviews on TripAdvisor, along with the low price offered. I was very disappointed in this hotel. The room was in need of much maintenance - the light fixture was falling out of the ceiling; the bathroom sink did not drain; the shower made a loud buzzing noise the entire time it was on; and the bed was very uncomfortable and creaked with the slightest move. I would not recommend this hotel, nor would I stay here again. The photos also make it appear like a luxurious hotel - quite the contrary! They are definitely "strategically" taken to make the hotel look a lot nicer than it is! The location is convenient, however, located right inside a mall and close to Universal Studios. I have stayed at much better hotels at this same rating and price point.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you :)”
Reviews.Author: Svensbo
Reviews.Content: We were supposed to come out and see the Shuttle Launch - but it keeps getting delayed... The friendly reservations staff were very accommodating and did not charge me the one night penalty fee. I am hoping we will be able to fly out later this week to see the launch - and when our plans are set, we will definitely be staying at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center!

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel and Conference Center has it all.”
Reviews.Author: theconsultant30308
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel on multiple occasions and found it to be a wonderful place. numerous places to shop, eat, and get necessities. It is the only hotel I pick when I travel to Orlando (which is often). It is located so that a traveler can easily get to all sorts of establishments quickly - if desired. Great place to take a family and have fun too.

Reviews.Title: “It feels like coming home”
Reviews.Author: Kerstin-01
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here four times before, and we realy longed for this stay. Everything is superb, nothing is missing.

Reviews.Title: “Service is outstanding”
Reviews.Author: IcecreamJean
Reviews.Content: My husband , son , and I stayed here for two nights while we were at a conference at the hotel. From the time we stepped into the lobby, staff went out of their way to be friendly and helpful to us. The room was neat and clean. There was plenty for our 16 year old son to do such as the workout room, pool,gift shop, Starbucks, and the mall.

Reviews.Title: “this hotel is fantastic cannot fault it!!!”
Reviews.Author: danni_918210
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this hotel evrytime I visit orlando. There is free wi-fi and cable TV the staff are very helpfull and friendly the location is in the mall and very handy for shopping trips this is a overall fantastic hotel and I hope to visit the hotel very soon. The receptionist - Neisha is very proffesional and helpful The staff in the small shop located oppsite the bar are very nice - Eurina and star!! Thanks for always making my stay enjoyable. I would definatly stay at this hotel over and over again. Its like my second home.

Reviews.Title: “What more could you ask for!”
Reviews.Author: jenbaker11
Reviews.Content: We had a great experience at this hotel. The service was outstanding! The room was clean, appealing to the eye, and the beds were comfortable. I loved that this hotel was connected to the mall - we spent the weekend shopping and it was easy to go back and forth from the hotel to the mall! The front desk was helpful and friendly. We were given a great recommendation for dinner that made our night enjoyable! I would definitely stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel!! The service was outstanding”
Reviews.Author: adavid100
Reviews.Content: The Florida hotel makes you feel like family. From the moment you arrive they treat you like a king. The room was large and comfortable and the service was exceptional. I will return

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfortable, Convenient”
Reviews.Author: laketravishill
Reviews.Content: I was staying at another Orlando hotel on International Drive, but wanted to be away from all the activity. I found the Florida Hotel online with a $99 per night special (which ended up being about $125 with taxes). Although it is attached to a mall, the hotel is very quiet. The rooms were a decent size and very clean. Nice flat screen television, desk and sitting area. The beds were very comfortable. The Florida hotel has a nice, casual restaurant and a Starbucks in the lobby. The mall is attached and has great shopping and food court. The business center is convenient, and the hotel also has a top of line gym - great equipment. If you have a rental car, all the attractions are a short drive from the hotel. If I'm back in Orlando, I will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Location, Extraordinary Staff and Committment to Service.”
Reviews.Author: ahindman
Reviews.Content: The staff of the Florida Hotel and Conference Center exceeded all expectations for the Florida Department of Juvenile Justice Faith and Community Symposium. Meeting rooms were set up and furnished with AV equipment as planned, the food was excellent, staff was always accessible for last minute changes or needs, and their ability to help manage attendance at the meetings was exceptional.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel is colean and the staff friendly”
Reviews.Author: DiamondBahamas
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference is home away from home. I booked a stay for two days and ended up staying for almost two weeks. I visited Orlando to attend Doctor and had to extend my stay. I informed Mrs. Dana Martinez that I was having surgery and requested that she check on me to ensure that I was alright. She di indeed, but she had to leave, but she left instruction to have the staff on the front desk to check on me, which I thought was exceptional. The staff was concern and they cared that I was alone in the hotel room after surgery. The Florida Hotel and Conference Center is the place to stay when visiting Orlando. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. Regards, Erma M. Campbell

Reviews.Title: “This was a faultless hotel experience with comfort, ease and service guaranteed.”
Reviews.Author: piedaterrier
Reviews.Content: Check in was easy and fast with a circular desk in the grand lobby. The staff was always friendly and went the extra distance for me and my associates when we needed something special. The room was nicely appointed with a quiet AC, Fridge, and even free bottles of water. The pool and hot tub were nicely appointed in a beautiful and private outdoor space. The hot tub with night sky was wonderful. The hotel restaurant was convenient and had good food at reasonable prices. Their two for one appetizers (enormous proportions on some) was quite the deal. There is a Starbucks next to the restaurant, a convenient hotel gift store that is more expansive than most. One step through the far end of the lobby leads to an enormous indoor Mall with every store, including large department stores, imaginable. For economical eating there is a food court quite close to the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel - location, facilities, service, and value for money”
Reviews.Author: WGSpeirs
Reviews.Content: Very enjoyable experience. The staff in all areas were excellent. The facilities were superb - fitness room, pool, bar, restaurant...and even a Starbucks"" The best thing - the beds...oh what a wonderful sleep we had on their Sealy mattresses!! Hotel is very well situated for the airport, and for all the attractions. We loved our 8 days there! Any negatives? Yes, thought that pay-per-view movies were very expensive at up to $14 + tax.

Reviews.Title: “Work and Play”
Reviews.Author: Bridangel
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel has a very relaxed atmosphere. It is a lovely setting with the convenience of a gym and an entire mall at your disposal. The staff was helpful and pleasant. Our meeting rooms were organized and ready for us each day.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable Hotel in the perfect setting!”
Reviews.Author: jpeterson6
Reviews.Content: I am a soccer coach and our state convention was held at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. Lucky for me because the service was excellent, hotel extemely clean and the rooms were very comfortable. Not only that, it is attached to the Florida mall and also surrounded by many quality restaurants that you are used to. While I have traveled to the Florida Mall (from Gainesville) many times with my teenage daughters and knew that there was a hotel attached, I never thought of making a day trip turn into an overnight stay. Well my daughters are excited about the next trip to Orlando because we will be staying staying at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center and making a day trip urn into a shopping spree.................. and when I get tired I can just walk to my room! :) EXCELLENT STAY!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “I would highly recommend this Hotel !!!!”
Reviews.Author: Jinki
Reviews.Content: The Hotel has a beautiful setting, welcoming you the minute you pull up in front, you are greeted by the valet service. WHen you walk in to the lobby and register the front desk bends over backwards to assist you. The rooms are very nice and clean equiped with a coffee maker and refridgerator plus many other things. Crickets restaurant is AWESOME, the food is priced to be able to afford to eat there everyday. The Hotel is attached to the mall for shopping convenience and many choices for dining in the food court. I look forward to our next trip to Orlando and will stay at this Hotel no questions asked!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Combination expierience "Hotel / Shopping Mall / and feel safe and secure for the whole family.”
Reviews.Author: Kenneth245
Reviews.Content: Nice and comfort Hotel with valet parking as option and with luxury rooms and right away into the Florida Mall. Very safe (a poilice car parked infront of the parking lot 24 hrs a day. Nice and friendly service. Great house keeping personnel and alot more... to much to mention, but highly recommened to serve theire web page and to see it for your self. (If I had to say it in some words I would just say "Keep it up")

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: spiritswn1
Reviews.Content: I attended a week long national Conference at this hotel. Everything about it was first class. The conference room, the accommodations, the SERVICE, the Cricket bar and grill, the excellent location. A definite winner.

Reviews.Title: “The location worths it all”
Reviews.Author: Testa_Family
Reviews.Content: Besides the requirements you would need from a hotel, the location is probably the best feature of this one. Almost every points of interest in Orlando are within just a few minutes away, so you can easily reach Theme Parks, outlets, malls, good restaurants and the best is: when you don't wanna spend too much time at The Florida Mall, members of your family can choose between resting at the room while others make a quick visit to its stores (e.g. when you are about to leave and you realize you've forgotten a certain gift to someone). The staff is mainly pleasing (from housekeeping to the bell captains). And even though a few employees from the reception could be kinder, some of them are Outstanding. In 2010, it was the 9th time we went to Orlando, and ever since we stayed at this location (in about the year 2000, it was called The Adam's Mark), and there's no doubt we are gonna repeat that. Writing from Santo Andre, Sao Paulo - Brazil

Reviews.Title: “Good Location”
Reviews.Author: curt1480
Reviews.Content: We were there for a convention and our stay was pleasant. It is not a ritz, but simply a convention hotel. It is in a central location so your not too far from other things in orlando.

Reviews.Title: “An amazing bargain”
Reviews.Author: CanalFan
Reviews.Content: My wife and I booked a single night at the Florida Hotel at very short notice, simply as a stopover between staying with friends in Fort Myers and visiting the Kennedy Space Centre. I don't know what their usual rates are but we paid slightly less than Â£50 and were somewhat apprehensive about what we might find when we arrived. How wrong can one be? The lobby can best be described as palatial and we had one of the nicest rooms we have yet stayed in - spacious and with a huge bed even by American standards. The reception staff and those in the small restaurant were very helpful and their pool looked superb, though we didn't have time to try it. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel in GREAT location!!!”
Reviews.Author: lferezy
Reviews.Content: My friend and I took our 6 year old children on a last minute trip to Magic Kingdom. She is a huge "research" type of person and boy did she do good on this one! Not only was the hotel easy to find, it was clean, the staff was friendly and how bad could it be walking downstairs from your room and walking straight into a really nice mall!!!!!!!! We are shoppers and this was just awesome!! Driving to Disney was probably about 10 or so miles but very easy driving directions. I would definately return to this hotel, next time with my husband and other child and I know my friend plans to go back as well!

Reviews.Title: “Partly tacky, partly updated”
Reviews.Author: wheezeew
Reviews.Content: It is a hotel that is trying hard to be more than it is. There is a tacky neon sign at the top of the building, but a much better sign at the front of the drive. This theme continues throughout the property, in some ways it feels like a two-star, but there are parts that have been improved and are more appealing. The pool is warm, but big enough for a decent swim workout. Two warnings, there is a "resort fee" that isn't disclosed until you check in, and it is very difficult to walk or run in the area. If you come from a place where drivers defer to pedestrians in crosswalks, don't expect that here. While this isn't a great hotel, it is fine for a business stay, and better than anything else in the immediate area.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed my stay!”
Reviews.Author: Nickolbee
Reviews.Content: Had a very nice stay at the The Florida Hotel and Conference Center. Facilities were clean and nice. Food at the Banquets was very good. Dance floor was even. I would definitely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Clean & friendly!”
Reviews.Author: CarJulTampaBay95
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay. The friendly staff all worked very hard to make us feel welcomed and appreciated as customers from check-in to check-out. We were with a fairly easily identifyable group/convention and one that was getting a discounted rate, but I NEVER felt like we were getting discounted service or attention. The hotel property was VERY clean, conveniently located for our purposes, well maintained, and our room was a very nice size. The fitness center has been expanded and improved recently, which was also an big plus. We'll be back!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and convenient”
Reviews.Author: PRPARENT
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff could not do enough for you. We were there at a conference and the meeting rooms and banquet facilities were clean, comfortable and the food was excellent - no rubber chicken dinners here! The rooms were well equipped with a coffee maker and refrigerator, comfortable bed/bedding and beautiful granite bathrooms. The Internet access was good and the business amenities were very convenient. The mall was connected to the hotel lobby and provided a welcome distraction during our stay. The convenience of local Orlando attractions was good. Have stayed at this hotel several times and always have consistent service and an enjoyable stay.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel was comfortable and relaxing, even for a business trip!”
Reviews.Author: sammonsk
Reviews.Content: Comfortable, clean, quiet, friendly, close to a mall! Starbucks in the lobby! What more could a girl ask for!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was great!”
Reviews.Author: jptwinz
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed a this hotel for 3 days. The location was perfect. It was rainy one day but that didnt stop us from going out to dinner. The Florida Mall is attatched and in addition to a variety of food the food court has to offer there are many nice restaurants as well. Our room was always clean and made up upon return from our long days and the staff was great with our 5 year old twins. The pool area was very clean and had plenty of clean towels available to guests. Overall we loved our stay and recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “All in One Number One Place to Stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: VickinPatNoland
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay if you are ever in Orlando, the hotel is situated right in the middle of the Florida Mall, so there is lots of things to go and do. And there is Crickets Grill right there at the hotel, great staff, top bartenders and wonderful food cooked by a outstanding kitchen and a top cheff. Yes, of course there is a pool but there is also a outstanding fitness room with everything in it you need so you wont miss a single workout. You are really close to all the theme parks, and your room? well it rocks, with even a great vanity and fold out makeup mirror, oh yea, this is deffinitely the all in one Number One place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “The number 1 best place to stay in central Florida.”
Reviews.Author: patandvickinoland
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel accomodations. They go way above and beyond what any other place would do to take care of their family (customers). Cricket and Crickets Grill are great. Service is exceptional. And, of course being a part of Orlando's best mall, The Florida Mall, has its advantages. Thanks to everyone there for a wonderful time every time we visit.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: dproscia
Reviews.Content: The rooms, restraunt, health center were all really great. The staff could not have been more helpfull.

Reviews.Title: “Convience and Class all bottled up.”
Reviews.Author: twilliams1202
Reviews.Content: A great hotel attached the mall, it doesn't get any better than this.

Reviews.Title: “From check in to departure, you won't be disappointed.”
Reviews.Author: Capt2639
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at this hotel for over ten years off and on. i have played a role in scheduling conferences with over 700 people. They bend over backwards to accomodiate you in every way possible. Centrally located to all major attractions to include Airport (ORL), convention Center and just off the main throughfare going West, East, North, or South. Thirty minutes from Cruise lines at Port Canaveral. Another twenty minute to NASA and the home of the Space Shuttle.

Reviews.Title: “Love the FL Hotel”
Reviews.Author: charlenefudge
Reviews.Content: The rooms are spacious and very clean. We loved the fact it was attached to the mall. We stayed during rainy season so it was great to take the kids to the play area in the mall. We also loved the restaurant and bar in the hotel. With a 4 year old and a 3 year old it was nice to not leave the hotel to eat. The staff was great with the kids and very friendly! Also they have a great gym in the hotel. I used it all 3 days we stayed!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: CopenhagenSkov
Reviews.Content: We went back to this hotel where we have stayed 6 times before. We visit Florida each winter and stay always at this hotel when we arrive from Denmark and departing Florida going home after cruising Florida in our winterhollidays. The staff are very very nice and helpful, requesting guest service, after only few minuttes the service requested are available. We will back February 2011. Lilian & Jens Gram, copenhagen Je

Reviews.Title: “We wish all of our hotel experiences could be this wonderful.”
Reviews.Author: Bronxgirl13
Reviews.Content: All I can say is that I have a husband who doesn't like to travel and our daughter lives in Orlando, several hours away. This is the first time in almost 40 years of marriage, that I ever heard him say, "When are we going back to that hotel?" By "that hotel" he means the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. Not only is the room clean, modern, and luxurious, but the super friendly service is the best that we have ever experienced. The huge plus is that this hotel is IN THE MIDDLE OF A FANTASTIC MALL! Ladies, need I say more? I can finally shop to my heart's content, my husband joins me for short periods of time that he can tolerate, and THEN to his great pleasure, he goes upstairs to "relax, watch TV, etc.". Finally, a vacation that we can both enjoy. Thank you Florida Hotel and Conference Center!!! P.S. You can find internet deals on this hotel, and they will honor it!! I haven't paid full price yet. :=)

Reviews.Title: “Top quality hotel with first class amenities and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: gholz
Reviews.Content: Elegant, modern & clean. Fitness center comparable to health clubs. Outdoor pool is clean & pleasant. The breakfast buffet is top notch and excellent quality. Have not had dinner so can't make comments. Bed's to die in!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome! As usual....”
Reviews.Author: BandDMacdonald
Reviews.Content: We are never dissapointed with the Florida Hotel... You can't beat the location, dinning choices or overall value of the hotel. Beautiful lobby and rooms, great pool and workout room. You MUST eat at Crickets, the hotel's Bar and Grill... from 5-9 they have Buy On Get One drinks and appetizers! Get there early because by 7:30 - 8 the place is packed. We would eat there every night next time. The Mahi Mahi Sliders are fab!

Reviews.Title: “I totally enjoyed everything about this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: MaryAnn27511
Reviews.Content: This hotel was wonderful. Sleeping rooms are nicely decorated. I stayed almost a week ... beds are great ... made for perfect sleep. Hotel is connected to a large mall ... very convenient. I've stayed here several times and would definitely go back again and again. Hotel staff are very friendly and will go out of their way to accommodate your needs. Also has indoor pool and very nice Fitness Room.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal Orlando Location”
Reviews.Author: fmmpmm
Reviews.Content: We decided on this hotel because of it's ideal location inside Florida Mall. We could shop at the mall without having to drive anywhere. It's 10 minutes to Universal and Citywalk and you could really go anywhere around the Orlando area within 15 minutes. We ate at their resturant 'Crickets' - sports bar feel with excellent food for dinner and delicious buffet breaksfast. Staff couldn't do enough for you at the resturant. Will be making this our hotel of choice when we come to Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel deserves a five star rating with its professional staff and excellent service.”
Reviews.Author: trinimom17
Reviews.Content: The Florida hotel is in a perfect location in Orlando. It's in the Mall where shopping is easily done,but it facilitates quiet secure areas for coferences and meetings . Signage in the lobby area is well done and professional, well informed staff are all around to guide you to your area of interest.

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient and comfortable!!”
Reviews.Author: Wendi_leigh
Reviews.Content: I always try to stay at this hotel when I have an occasion to be in the Orlando area. Everything is there in one location, resturants, shopping and entertainment plus they have a full gym. The staff is happy to assist you with any need that may arise!

Reviews.Title: “hidden fees order of day”
Reviews.Author: franceosia
Reviews.Content: Charged for meal and never set foot in restaurant called crickets manager told me what i wanted to hear only to arrive home and see credit card charged. Do they compare my signature with the one i check in and sign out with for verification.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent business, leisure combination”
Reviews.Author: Cakesman
Reviews.Content: Mall, business, convenience at your finger tips while sheltered and pampered in a resort like hotel. Florida Hotel and Conference Center makes business easier and turns it into leisure. Nice, nice pool and lobby. Excellent fitness center. The staff make everything easy and convenient in every aspect. I will return and I will go back to this hotel. They rank high in every category in my opinion but the do best in customer service. Everyone staff person gave me total respect and made my stay the best. These nice people go above and beyond, all the time. You will not go wrong with them. You have some of the best beaches within an hour east or west, as well as, theme parks. Have fun.

Reviews.Title: “ALWAYS THE BEST PLACE TO STAY”
Reviews.Author: kkaz28
Reviews.Content: The staff is always courteous and eager to help in any way they can. This is our third stay and there has been no problems. We are pleased for the valet service that is one of the reasons we stay there. Having the abilty to get to the mall right from the hotel is most convenient - we can eat at the food court and shop for anything we may have left at home. Just a most enjoyable stay always. I would have to reservations on recommending this hotel to anyone or a large group, accommodations are excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: HectorGato
Reviews.Content: The room was good sized and clean. All of the staff were friendly and very helpful. Being attached to the Florida Mall was an added bonus - with several restaurants and good shopping. The only negative for us was that other hotels in the price range and location offered complimentary breakfast, here it was $9/person. But that's only a minor complaint, everything else was good.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks for great Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: NArroyo
Reviews.Content: We went for our Convention, so we did not spent a lot of time at the hotel,but still it was delightful the stayed. Thanks to all the staff that makes this happen!! :)

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and clean in a great location”
Reviews.Author: claire87d
Reviews.Content: This hotel is especially good for business travellers and people who are on a short stay. The facilities are excellent and you really do not need to leave to hotel and the attatched mall, unless you are visiting the parks. The staff are friendly and helpful although there is usually a queue for the front desk! They have a great swimming pool and gym and business centre, all of which are well maintained. Most importantly, the rooms are spotless and really comfy. The beds are massive although they are quite firm, but some people will like this. The hotel is always the right temperature indoors. I have stayed here so many times with work and had no problems with staff, service or cleanliness.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: giahedgeman
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had heard how great this hotel was, so we decided to stay. We had a very good experience. The hotel was very convenient to the activities we had planned in the Orlando area. The Hotel was very clean, and comfortable.The Staff was friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful location for large and small conferences”
Reviews.Author: Mike_USA47
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center and was quite impressed. The staff was extremely friendly and seemed to pay attention to detail. The rooms are a comfortable size and well maintained. The conference rooms are clean and easily transformed from a large room to several smaller rooms to accommodate the customerâ€™s needs. Additionally the Florida Hotel and Conference Center is located near several attractions in Orlando. I would certainly recommend Florida Hotel and Conference Center .

Reviews.Title: “Impossible to get nothing better”
Reviews.Author: mariaclara002
Reviews.Content: Great , warm and perfect. For bussines or vacation. IÂ´ll come back soon.

Reviews.Title: “First time, great experience!”
Reviews.Author: coachj2
Reviews.Content: We have been taking our kids to Orlando for years at the end of summer to shop for school clothes, Disney, just enjoyment but had never stayed at the Florida Hotel at the Florida Mall. This year my wife and I both retired and decided to treat our 15 year old granddaughter to the "shopping experience" she loves and stayed at the hotel. It was great being able to leave our room and be IN THE MALL, both my wife and granddaughter being the shoppers just loved this part of the experience. We got a great price through my AARP and were totally satisfied with the cleanliness of the room and the soft top mattresses were a welcomed touch as we are not accostomed to that when we normally travel. It was just a totally enjoyable experience and one that we will repeat. The rooms were nice and clean, the atmosphere was great, I would certainly recommend this stay to anyone interested in a relaxing "adventure".

Reviews.Title: “Nice Facilities for a Conference”
Reviews.Author: chrismyersleedap
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center is located in the center of Orlando, and is conveniently attached to the Florida Mall. The amenities are nice, with a large workout room and swimming pool designed for lap swimming. The conference rooms are spacious and facilitate all your conference needs. The staff is courteous and friendly, and the bar/restaurant has exceptional value for the quality of meals provided. The rooms were large and spacious, and the beds were welcoming. I highly recommend this hotel for persons of business and for conference organizers.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay as always”
Reviews.Author: RemysJaday
Reviews.Content: This was our second time and we loved it. Always friendly staff. The pool and hot tub are great. The room was very clean and comfortable. We were on the 9th floor and loved the view. Perfect location!!!!! Great place to go shopping. Close to restaurants. We will definitely be back in the future with more of our families and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: mkj32
Reviews.Content: The Florida hotel and conference centre is well located at the Mall. The hotel staff make you feel welcome from the time they greeted you from the coach until you leave. Nothing seem too much to any of the staff and their attention to details is fantastic. I love going to the Florida Hotel and conference centre because I feel like home. Many thanks to All the staff who have been looking after me and my colleagues for a long time. Good work and many happy customers for the future.

Reviews.Title: “Superb Hotel with excellent amenities”
Reviews.Author: carol_rowntree1
Reviews.Content: From the moment we walked into the Lobby we felf welcomed and relaxed. The staff were friendly and happy and no request or query was too small. The Hotel room was light, airy, clean and VERY comfortable. The bathrooms were beautiful and clean with plenty of towels. As a family one of our joys of visitin the USA is shopping so this Hotel had everything on it's doorstep for us. Restaurants for a more formal meal or takeaways for a snack. ABSOLUTELY LOVED IT AND WANT TO RETURN.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff & great facilities...”
Reviews.Author: LCL73
Reviews.Content: Stayed many times at The Florida Hotel and will continue to stay at this hotel in th future. The staff are extremely welcoming and always willing to help and assist. Great gym and pool area, and the hotel is always busy with business conferences - so I suppose that speaks for itself. Crickets bar is not only used by hotel guest but also by locals, creating a better than normal hotel pub atmosphere. (Happy hour is applies to appetisers as well as drinks).

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service and accomodations. Warm and friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: MIACPA
Reviews.Content: Our attendee review feedback was 100% positive for The Florida Hotel & Conference Center. The food was excellent at all of the Hotel events and at Crickets Restaurant. Very friendly staff and easy to work with. Rooms were comfortable. Their rates were reasonable. The closeness of The Florida Mall, parking and food made their leisure time in Orlando a welcome environment. We will definately be back to host other functions. Our attendees will come back to the Hotel the next time they are visiting Central Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to have meetings and enjoy the stay.”
Reviews.Author: annaroberts38
Reviews.Content: Make sure to pack a good pair of walking shoes you will enjoy the hotel and mall, eat alot of great food and get plenty of excersice and not worry about gaining weight.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: pjones850
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed my stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center in Orlando. The Hotel was very clean and the Staff was very pleasant and willing to help when ever asked. I will stay here again during my next trip to Orlando, FL.

Reviews.Title: “The ENTIRE staff are professional, friendly, efficient and hospitable. They know how to serve their gusets.”
Reviews.Author: jngrone
Reviews.Content: From the friendly, personal efficiency of checking- in through the house keepers to the dining experiences the satff at the Orlando Hotel and Conference Center know what is needed to make a professional comfortable and able to 'feel at home'. Due to my very positive personal experience I am seriously working at this facility for an international conference in 2013 AND a regional conference 2012. I have already recommended this facilty to colleagues and friends. Gerri Jackson Master Reiki Alliance

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but too far from sights”
Reviews.Author: clano76
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying that the hotel is nice, clean, comfortable. All the things you would want......except the location. It is the first time I have ever felt slightly left down by the Tripadvisor reviews I must admit. The location is too far from the sights, I drive, parks etc. You will need a rental car. (taxi to I drive is $22 each way). There is not much within walking distance at night either if you want a beer or a glass of wine with dinner. There is a couple of restaurants at the mall but anything else involves a long walk across deserted car parks and quiet roads which is not ideal. No problems with the hotel, room quality, staff etc. In particular the guy that runs the restaurant in the morning is very friendly and welcoming. The pool area is nice too. Its just a pity about the distance to all the Orlando sights!

Reviews.Title: “Something for everyone”
Reviews.Author: PEZL
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Florida Hotel with my son while he attended the Florida Youth Council conference for disabled youth. Everything at the hotel was wonderful. The room was extremely clean, the bed was comfortable, and most importantly, the staff went out of the way to be sure we had everything that was needed. The fact that the hotel opens up to the Florida mall is a big plus. Parents can shop while the kids swim.

Reviews.Title: “Once again the Florida Hotel has done it again.”
Reviews.Author: Jester91
Reviews.Content: We stayed the weekend at Florida Mall for the district convention. Great staff, any concerns were resolved in minutes. I love the fact that the shampoo/ conditioner are now in dispensers. A microwave would be my only request for the rooms. You will sleep soundly on the mattress. Staff provides reassurance and support when needed. And I love being able to store goods in the refrigerator. Thanks again for your teams hard work.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous hotel & great location!”
Reviews.Author: princessaheart007
Reviews.Content: Perfect stay every time, rooms always ready on time, The hotel is connected to the mall, which has a starbucks, bar and nail salon within 2minutes walking distance, also lots and lots of shops, outside the hotel is a huge target store, bed, bath & beyond, lots of restaurants including; red lobster,ale house, the outback steakhouse and more. The rooms are lovely featuring 2 queen or 1 king bed, small wardrobe, writing desk, & office chair, flat screen tv,coffee making facilities, fridge and en suite bathroom. The only thing I would say is that the having stayed there on many occassions, the only bad thing is on my last visit the toiletries have changed from bath&body works minitures, to an eco friendly one in dispensers on the wall, glasses have been replace d with plastic throw away cups, and coffee from starbucks filtered to a brand that wasn't very nice. I just feel it lets the hotel down, when its such a luxary hotel? It's a must place to stay, where you can shop till you drop and catch a bus to the theme parks too.

Reviews.Title: “Florida Youth Council Conference”
Reviews.Author: migdiamond
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean, the staff was very helpful. My son is in a wheelchair so we were concerned about space. But the room had a King size bed and a pull out sofa bed which was very comfortable. The room could have been a little bigger. But we had two wheelchairs which made it a little cramped and we also had our sons Canine Assistant Dog. But the hotel was very clean and it is attached to the Florida Mall which made it very convenient when it was raining to get something to eat. It also made it very convenient to go shopping while my son was involved in his conference.

Reviews.Title: “Beds and Pillows were very comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: annonymousFlorida
Reviews.Content: Rooms were clean and spacious. The beds and pillows were comfortable. Thus I had a good night sleep.

Reviews.Title: “High class service.”
Reviews.Author: mikeboard
Reviews.Content: We visited the hotel as a break from the beach during a 3 week Florida holiday which covered both the Atlantic and Gulf Coasts. The setting is great, with direct access to the mall, and the service was superb - from check-in, to the restaurants and bars and room service. A really high class hotel and a great stay

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant stay. Very nica people.”
Reviews.Author: Felipe_Santos
Reviews.Content: people like Jorge in the front desk and Joey in the bell services really made my vacation a great one. We had a little girl in our group that spent her 14th birthday there and the hotel let us use a the breakfest room for a little party for her that was great and i wanted to thank evererybody responsible for that. it was special for her. i alredy recommended the hotel to friends and i'm taking my family there in our next vacation.

Reviews.Title: “SOFL ATHLETE LEADERS LOVE THE FLORIDA HOTEL and CONFERENCE CENTER”
Reviews.Author: LAppleton
Reviews.Content: Once again we had a great conference at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. The service on every level and for every aspect of our stay was professional, courteous, friendly. We were made to feel welcomed throughout the weekend. The rooms were relaxing and inviting. The food service was great. The conference rooms were kept clean and well supplied with ice water. The staff was well informed and helpful. Looking forward to many more years at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. Thank you all!

Reviews.Title: “What a beautiful place! NICE, pleasant...”
Reviews.Author: Bitakay
Reviews.Content: What a beautiful place! NICE, pleasant staff. The public restrooms were a bit odorous at times, but other than that the place is very well maintained. I was there for a conference, stayed three days, enjoyed the pool and restaurants. I would definitely go back, especially if not on a Disney oriented trip with the family

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, especially from the front desk staff.”
Reviews.Author: dpaxton1
Reviews.Content: Unusual concept having a hotel in a shopping mall but my friends and I thoroughly enjoyed both the very comfortable stay and the mall stores.

Reviews.Title: “Maloy Family Reunion”
Reviews.Author: RHON099
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay. The rooms were very nice and clean. Room service was great , the front desk was very nice and made you feel right at home. This is my second stay here and I will be staying again. You can go shopping without leaving the hotel it all in one.

Reviews.Title: “Great value Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ritam40
Reviews.Content: Stayed her for two weeks with my family, I love shopping so for me it was fine but did not have a game room for the kids. I used the gym most mornings and it had a swimming pool outside. It was a lot of army and airhostes staying at the hotel. It only had once restaurant(but Florida Mall has a big foodcourt but dont open until 10. Had a small shop and a coffeshop. The staff was very nice we even got a chocolate box sent to the room. I would love to stay here again on a shopping trip with my girlfriends however its a little drive to Universal and Disney but we had a rental car so it was ok .

Reviews.Title: “"Success"”
Reviews.Author: SamS38
Reviews.Content: In the business world one must be diligent to their surroundings making sure all is in order and working to the advantage of their customers. My stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center was all that and more. I was impressed with the freindliness of the staff and the cleanliness of the hotel, especially the restrooms. I would recommend this Hotel for all your vacationing and business needs.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Vacation Stay”
Reviews.Author: Chrislyn1
Reviews.Content: My husband and I first stayed at the The Florida Hotel and Conference Center 6 years ago for our honeymoon. Since then we have returned every year for our annual vacation. We travel from Bermuda and are not to comfortable with driving in the U.S. This hotel is centrally located to shopping and dining and the friendly and helpful staff make our stay even more enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “THis place was great!”
Reviews.Author: Keneko
Reviews.Content: While we go to the Kissimme area every year this was the first time we stayed here. What a delightful surprise! The rooms were very clean and comfortable. The staff couldn't have been nicer. The convenience of having the mall off the lobby was great. It was convenient to places we wanted to go and very conveninet to the turnpike. Will definitely come back again!

Reviews.Title: “This is my home away from home”
Reviews.Author: pelusa01
Reviews.Content: I love this hotel, it is clean the service is great the staff is helpful, and I love the fact the mall is so close.. if you forget anything is right there.. That is just so convenient.. I love this place so much I have stayed here 3 times and I keep coming back..

Reviews.Title: “THE DINING STAFF ARE THIS BEST KEEP SECRET OF THIS HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: ELLEN3530
Reviews.Content: I can not say enough about the staff of this hotel.During our meeting the dining staff provided great service. They were attentive, efficient and very friendly. The staff at the front desk were very helpful. They took the time to make sure I knew where to find my company meeting room and to discuss the services offered by the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “memorable stay”
Reviews.Author: Fatimah_19
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Convention Center is an ideal place to stay, especially if you are staying for more than a week. This is because it is attached to Florida Mall which housed 7 major department stores and 250 specialty outlets. There is a food court and a few restaurants that you can choose from for your meals. I stayed with my daughter who accompanied me for my business trip, and she absolutely liked it because while I go for my meetings she keeps her self occupied by shopping and window shopping most of the times. On top of that the hotel's staff are very helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Big Hotel with a Personal Touch”
Reviews.Author: one4ubrenda
Reviews.Content: After driving from Tallahassee 4:00 was a long wait for chech in when my sessions started at 9:00 am, so I inquired about early check in and was told to check back. I was happy after checking back to get into by room by 12:00 noon. New to the area I ask for directions at the desk and was graciously given a map quest with turn by turn directions. I had great interactions with the staff from the bell man that secured my luggage and took it immediately to my room as soon as it was available to the clerk that went above and beyond my expectations to help me. I just wish I had a longer stay to enjoy the mall.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service, Rooms and Conference Roooms”
Reviews.Author: cindyshoaf
Reviews.Content: I was there with over 300 very well behaved secondary students. Staff was polite and quite friendly and professional - treated them with respect, treated them as adults. Wear a jacket in the conference rooms (as you normally would elsewhere).

Reviews.Title: “Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Besos1949
Reviews.Content: Starting from the Welcome and friendly smiles, we knew that this part of our Florida trip was going to be fantastic. Although the hotel was far from previous hotels we have stayed at, the relaxation and ambiance made the entire stay pleasurable. The Cricket was pricey as was room service, and $5.00 for a coffee and dried bagel at Starbuck's was ridiculous and was everyone's main concern - a walk through the mall was no better - you either had McDonald's or Taco Bell. Rent a car - well worth it for dining out. Pool and exercise room were great.

Reviews.Title: “An Elegant Hotel With Great Service”
Reviews.Author: weissingr
Reviews.Content: The hotel is conveniently located a few miles from the airport. Rates are reasonable. During my two week stay, I enjoyed a nice clean room and slept in a comfortable king bed. The staff was helpful and friendly. The hotel has a nice outdoor pool with a privacy wall around it. A large shopping mall is connected to the hotel which makes shopping very convenient. I found many nice places to eat nearby. I would suggest it strongly.

Reviews.Title: “Florida Hotel - Amazing, and super clean”
Reviews.Author: wilmarys
Reviews.Content: The staff was amazing, super friendly, the hotel itself is so clean and peacceful. I recommand it.

Reviews.Title: “Average for travellers, Excellent for shoppers”
Reviews.Author: Gl0balFlter
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is a short distance from Orlando International airport, which after the process of clearing immigration and then having to recheck luggage to a secondary collection you really wouldnt want to travel too far before falling into your bed. The hotel reception is efficient and the staff friendly, once reaching the floor you are staying you notice the very 80's decor though clean. when I got to my room the magnetic key didnt work, I asked the maid for assistance but I had just have well gone to spain as she "no understand English" so all the way back to reception to have it reset... Luggage in tow. Eventually reaching the room it was average mass tourist type hotel.. more a charter holiday type than the big brands.. yet clean and well equiped.. free internet is nice and a big lcd tv are good ways of passing your time... if you are on a quick stay for business then there is not much else to do if you are not a shopper and dont have time for the parks. The hotel does feature a outdoor pool the the beds get snapped up quickly, The hotel has a nice bar though watch out if you leave a credit card for the tab... I got the bill and there there was a space to leave a tip... I signed this with a tip and thought it was more expensive than the menu (remembering the taxes are added) it turns out the actual bill had a auto service charge added but i only saw the card receipt so effectively double tipped, The bar staff apologised but I cant help to think this is a common scam! Back to the room, the bathroom was nothing expected of a quality hotel, the complimentry amenities were poor and there was a communual type dispenser for shampoo and soap in the shower with no mention of brand or fragrence etc.. also the tap ran the same time as the shower and the curtain was a nice beige colour and a aromour of damp. The hotel is good if you want budget and beats the howard johnsons and travelodges but nothing more. Im happy to stay on business there but would consider for a main holiday.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay with convenience plus...”
Reviews.Author: jpmusic
Reviews.Content: A beautiful hotel with top notch staff. Has all the amenities. The hotel is an exceptional place for conferences. Since the hotel is connected to a large shopping mall with multiple restaurants, a guest doesn't have to travel in a car for anything unless they are going to a theme park.

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel in a great location would stay again”
Reviews.Author: luckylime
Reviews.Content: The location was great. Close to the main road, and a lot of restaurants nearby. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. I wish there was a complimentary breakfast. Call me cheap, but for the price of the room, a breakfast would have been nice. I would stay there again though.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel. Customer Service A HIGH priority! Beautiful Room, Excellent Accomodations!”
Reviews.Author: Krehbiels05
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel is the perfect place to stay while your in Orlando. Just minutes from the airport, next door to a HUGE mall, and within 30 minutes from Disney. It was an excellent hotel, staff was great, very helpful and friendly. Rooms were spotloss, very large and very up to date. High speed internet was good, not excellent but your sharing it with how many other people? Overall great hotel! Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: freedeluge
Reviews.Content: Clean, in a high building. Has a ice machine in every floor. Quiet, the service counter is on the first floor. has a mall connected to this blding

Reviews.Title: “Great !!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: honeybun111263
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the hotel for comfort and location. It was a pleasure to stay here and will stay here again and again !!

Reviews.Title: “Better than what I thought”
Reviews.Author: robnmartha
Reviews.Content: It was for sure better than what I thought. Was not expecting the flat screen tv and the modern feel to the room with granite tops in the bathroom. The Gala type lobby is very romantic. We went for only one night, but will try to visit again to get a good feel of the other services. Maybe if it had a continental breakfast included in the price would be an excellent value to those who are on the quick up and go days. Overall it was very good.

Reviews.Title: “needs makeover”
Reviews.Author: chickeyman
Reviews.Content: The hotel service is good, friendly and helpful.
