The hotel was musty smelling with a lobby that was always dirty.. entrance to hotel was old and in need of paint and pressure washing..the rooms are spacious and updated with fridges and safes an flat screens..the hallways a/c was non-existant. and in need of shampoolng, I give this hotel a solid 2.5-3.0 stars. The gym was very nice but the pool was mediocre.

Reviews.Title: “Accommodating staff, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Lizily
Reviews.Content: I attended the 31st Silent Weekend, held at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center. This is a conference of American Sign Language users, Deaf and Hearing alike. There is a strict "no talking" rule for the entire weekend. This affected the staff of this hotel greatly as they had to work with people refused to speak with them. Every staff member I encountered from the check-in desk to waiters at the restaurant to the cleaning staff were incredibly accommodating and willing to work with us. Surely without this wonderful attitude from the staff, the weekend would not have been unique experience it was meant to be.

Reviews.Title: “The staff made me feel at home”
Reviews.Author: mike_0161
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center made me feel at home away from home. The staff was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Great service and location”
Reviews.Author: Miami_FloridaSandy33
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for two night while visiting Universal. It was 15 mns drive to Universal, and they don't have a shuttle service for the parks, but You can choose to take the city buses to go to the parks, the stops are a ten min walk away. Also the hotel is not easy to find at first, you have to go way back behing the mall to find it. Other than that everything was perfect. They have direct access to the Florida mall so you can go there if you're bored. There is a Starbucks on site and the grill had great breakfast and our evening meal there was very good, service was excellent there also. The people in the lobby were very welcoming and gave us all the info we needed on directions, amenities etc. The pool is very big and the towels are free. They also have a gym but I did not try it. News papers in the morning and two bottles of water are included in the service fee ($11 per day, this is added to your final bill). Rooms are quite big and clean. TV screen may be too small for some people's tastes...they were ok for us. All in all I think it was a great hotel for the price and if you are looking for a basic, clean, service-oriented hotel.

Reviews.Title: “What a unique hotel located at the Mall!”
Reviews.Author: bulldogJacksonville
Reviews.Content: I was there on business but my wife was their for leisure. She had a wonderful time shopping the mall. She said that she didn't even get to finish visiting all of the stores. She never made it upstairs at the Mall. Our room was beautifull and clean. The small sitting area was cozy and the room was large. It was convenient having a refrigerator in the room. My wife was there when the cleaning staff showed up to clean and she said that they were personable and nice. The meeting rooms that we were in were comfortable especially as far as the temperature went. We look forward to visiting again. Every staff member we met was eager to help and glad to see you.

Reviews.Title: “What a great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: kirschggk
Reviews.Content: The room and service were excellent; the staff were all friendly and seemed eager to serve.

Reviews.Title: “I was very impressed with the training and attitude of the staff”
Reviews.Author: ilambano
Reviews.Content: All the little things I asked for, the staff was able to provide me with. They had an extremely accommodating and friendly attitude. I would have liked to have had the opportunity to spend a few nights and enjoy all the amenities that your lovely hotel seemed to provide. Unfortunately, this trip was just a day-long conference. I look forward to my next visit in your area when I'll be able to enjoy the pleasure of your hospitality. Thank you very much

Reviews.Title: “We LOVE the Florida Hotel”
Reviews.Author: jmgoose
Reviews.Content: We visit Orlando about 4 or 5 times a year for the theme parks. We've stayed in a lot of different places, and this is by far the best. In fact, it's one of the best I've ever stayed in, all together. The rooms were spotless, the pool was beautiful, and the staff was helpful. Also, we ordered room service pretty late at night, and to our surprise it was delivered very fast ... and the food was great!!! It may be a little out of the way, as far as the theme parks are concerned, but it's walking distance from the mall, and overall just awesome!

Reviews.Title: “I have them booked through 2020 for conferences”
Reviews.Author: drasl
Reviews.Content: With 500 to 600 attendees at my annual confernce "The World's Largest Silent Weekend", I consistently choose The Florida Hotel and Conference Center. Reading through hundreds of pages of evaluations, my participants consistently tell me The Florida Hotel is their favorite! Myle Gray and Marcia Burts are a delight to work with! Organizing more than 120 hours of classes with more than 20 presenters is a piece of cake with their careful attention to detail. In fact, they have brought up points I overlooked such as pool towels for early bird yoga classes, placement of vendor tables, etc. My budget conscious attendees loved the adjacent Florida Mall with its huge food court offering alternates to the hotel's excellent Cricket Grill (which had some nifty two for one specials including drinks, appetizers, and entrees). I had Myle pencil me for every year through 2020 and beyond. You can see a video I made of the conference by going to www.DrSign.com and click the link video.

Reviews.Title: “Good experience”
Reviews.Author: Corfman14
Reviews.Content: Very nice and clean hotel. The restaurante "Crickets" was also very good and a great value.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel connected right to the Florida Mall”
Reviews.Author: eth0710
Reviews.Content: I never stayed in a hotel that connected right to a mall. The staff went above and beyond their call of duty and were extremely courteous and helpful. We didn't like the original room that we were placed in and they immediately moved us a much nicer room.

Reviews.Title: “Supervisor Conference”
Reviews.Author: FRASER0687
Reviews.Content: Great Hotal and staff and the service was great. The location was great and I am planning visiting again

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in a wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: Diamonddave66
Reviews.Content: This place was so nice. We were there 5 nights to see Disney and Universal. It was so nice during the heat of the day to be able to go to the nice pool or to go shopping in the attached mall. Truthfully, I think the kids would have been just as happy to stay at the mall all day. Starbucks and a restaurant/club in the lobby and large food court in the mall meant not having to drive to eat but if you did want to go out there was any kind of food you could imagine within a few miles. Would love to stay there again the next time we go to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous hotel and great value!”
Reviews.Author: JaquelineA
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the The Florida Hotel and Conference Center for eight nights during our recent holiday in June. From the moment we arrived, the staff were extremely helpful and were always friendly (from the front desk staff to the cleaning staff). We ordered room service on the first night as we arrived quite late. It arrived to our room on time (by a very friendly waiter) and was a really great meal! Additionally, the hotel restaurant (Crickets) had great food and exceptionally friendly staff. It was so good that we ate there every night! As for the room, it was really quite spacious. The bed was exceptionally comfortable, the bathroom more than sufficient and the room was exceptionally clean. Two bottles of water were always left when the room was cleaned (which given the rather warm weather, was very much appreciated) and the hotel also offers free internet connection. The hotel is located about 15-20 minutes from the major theme parks (by car) which was a positive. Given it's also connected to a shopping mall, there was always something to do! If we were to return to Florida, we would have no hesitation in staying at this hotel again, or for that matter, recommending it to friends. A truly great hotel! Jaqueline A & Jason S (June 2010)

Reviews.Title: “Extraordinary service and Friendliness throughout the Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: AMBB809
Reviews.Content: This is a very special Hotel. It is conviently located in the largest mall in Florida. The rooms are nice, but it is the customer service that stands out and makes this one of the best hotels I have stayed at. We travel quite often and have stayed at some of the best and most lavish hotels, but it is the People that makes the difference. Florida Mall Hotel is a 5 star hotel in this respect..

Reviews.Title: “I could not have chosen a better place to stay with my boys"”
Reviews.Author: Monicamarinm
Reviews.Content: The staff was beyond corteous and helpful, my boys had a wonderful time going back and forth to the mall and I could relax knowing they were safe and having fun, of course there are pleny of choices regarding restaurants and shopping, definetly making the Florida Mall Hotel and Conference Center our prefered place everytime we go to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it! Would go back in a heartbeat!”
Reviews.Author: NYCGirl777
Reviews.Content: Just me and the hubby decided to go to Orlando for a week and this is where we stayed! The hotel is in a great location! Attached to a nice mall...Near other great shopping and dining options...and close to Disney! Employees were helpful and friendly. Hotel was quiet and professional and not over run by loud and/or rowdy kids/teens...which was important to us. We had a wonderful stay and plan to stay there again when we return to Orlando next year!

Reviews.Title: “The best place to sleep in all of Florida”
Reviews.Author: Totigirl
Reviews.Content: The service in the hotel is the best I have experienced anywhere. The employees all deserve Employee of the Month awards. Nothing is too much trouble. This hotel has a great Fitness Centre which is really important to me. Location is convenient for the office and I like the fact that being joined to the Mall means a choice of where to eat, plus proximity to great shops when I find the time!! I have recommended that all my team members and my colleagues stay here when visiting the US office.

Reviews.Title: “Holding meetings and training at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center is a breeze; they handle everything perfectly.”
Reviews.Author: FloridaJacki
Reviews.Content: We've held our annual meetings at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center for several years and the excellent relationship we have with the hotel is consistent over time. We plan with them at least a year in advance. Their sales staff are most helpful from first contract to final payment; they anticipate things that will make our meetings more effective and enjoyable. Every hotel employee that I have worked with makes you feel as if they are there just to help you and make your day better. That means alot when you have hundreds of people coming in for meetings/trainings. The hotel is clean and attractive from bottom to top; it always looks newly decorated. The food that we serve at our meetings is well prepared and attractively served; it's very tasty and delicious. If you're a business looking for a place to hold your meetings, I recommend this hotel. They will accommodate your meeting needs and you and your company will be happily satisfied. Yes, we're planning to hold our meetings there again in 2011.

Reviews.Title: “It was great to see how everyone was so friendly”
Reviews.Author: connieromero25
Reviews.Content: I love the feeling of being at this hotel it's as though I never left home, only better---Room service.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place for the whole family...”
Reviews.Author: triumphsf79
Reviews.Content: I wish I had brought the family and had more time. Hotel is located in a very nice mall with many nearby attractions...

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel with wonderful amenities”
Reviews.Author: workingmom57
Reviews.Content: The hotel had spacious, clean rooms, a comfortable bed and wonderful amenities. The morning newspaper, free in room internet, two complimentary bottles of water in the room, fitness center, pool and whirlpool were wonderful, as well as the delicious food and friendly staff at the Crickets Bar and Restaurant. The hotel is attached to the Florida Mall, a huge benefit for the business traveler needing to buy gifts for her children!

Reviews.Title: “Fantasic hotel with superb staff and of course the mall attached”
Reviews.Author: aylinginthesky
Reviews.Content: have stayed at the Florida Mall Hotel many times over the past few years. it simply is a great hotel. rooms are spacious, fantastic beds and very very clean, fresh sheets and towels all the time. it has a great facilities for me...eating and drinking the main ones! great bar and grille `crickets` with friendly staff and good food, both evenings and breakfast, plus a starbucks next door and a small but fantastically friendly staff. starbucks in particular...headed up by Donna....they will do anything to make your day a better one...good for me as always crabby in the morning...they always make me smile with a great coffee and bagel! front desk staff are second to none and will always help in times of need..marcus is a gem as is Neisha(spelt wrong i think) on the sky desk...she is truly a great lady who will bend over backwards, sideways and do handstands to make sure that you get your flights sorted. i simply cant find fault....well maybe one tiny grumble....tv ...which is on a great flat screens.....is too news orientated.....a movie channel such as hbo or similar would be very greatley recieved.....but thats the only thing i can have a moan about! stay there.....you will love it! The owner should be very proud of his hotel and his great staff!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to relax”
Reviews.Author: pfullerton
Reviews.Content: This hotel is top of the line, very helpful and friendly staff, great location, rooms are large and comfortable, I highly recommend this hotel to anyone planning a trip to the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, nicely appointed rooms, great staff and efficient check in!”
Reviews.Author: kmclean1
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at this hotel and found it again, to be an all around great deal. The hotel is very convenient to get to and near the airport. It's proximity to the Florida Mall made it very helpful for preparations for the wedding we were attending, the staff was friendly, efficient, responsive, and the amenities were of high quality.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: R6julie
Reviews.Content: Quiet, clean, comfortable. Couldn't fault our stay here, would definitely recommend. Handy for the airport and exactly what we needed for an overnight stay after the flight. Just park, check in and then stroll into the mall. Plenty of places to eat to choose from...

Reviews.Title: “an excellent hotel with a mall, but no shuttle to and from Orlando Airport”
Reviews.Author: pppk
Reviews.Content: i stayed in the hotel for only 1 night, so may not use all facilities. everything i used is perfect except below: 1. there is no hotel shuttle from and to Orlando International Airport (MCO). so i decided to took a bus to save some money, but the bus stop is far away. i need to carry my baggages through a parking lot and mall to reach the hotel. otherwise, take a taxi is an option, will take probably $20 - $30. 2. a total of $12.38 additional service fee (tax included) was charged whether you use internet, pool etc or not.

Reviews.Title: “Business Trip with a Vacation thrown in for free”
Reviews.Author: Avance35
Reviews.Content: The staff are exceptional - at your service from the moment you pull up to the front until the time you depart. The hotel has a great workout room, swimming pool, shopping with unforgetable stores, and excellent restaurants all within walking distance - and all under one roof!!! Yes you may have to attend some conferences and business meetings between 8 and 5 - but the rest of the time is vacation time - from the speciality coffee shop - full breakfast buffett - to room service for desert - or bring something back for a late nite snack like Tiramisu from Buca de Beppo!! I look forward to my conference every year!!!

Reviews.Title: “beautiful hotel and very accommodating”
Reviews.Author: jtkrause
Reviews.Content: Hotel is very beautiful and staff very helpful and accomodating for an early check in. Particularly liked the Cricket retaurent and access to shopping mall. Hotel is about 10 miles from the Orlando airport.

Reviews.Title: “What a Fantastic Find!”
Reviews.Author: floridagirl3
Reviews.Content: I had to make a last minute business trip to Orlando on June 2, 2010. My search led me to this hotel and what a glorious find it was. The decor was very, very nice, the room was great and what a wonderful nights sleep I had because the bed was so comfortable. My husband came with me and asked for a low floor which put us with a view of the parking lot, not too crazy about that but the service, and the friendliness of everyone more than made up for it. Brandon at the front desk was especially accommodating. He called about 15 minutes after our arrival to inquire if everything was good. When I needed a taxi, they got me one right away from the front of the hotel. The other great thing about this hotel is that is is attached to the Florida Mall, which was fantastic! We did not rent a car which turned out great because we could just catch the bus right outside to the airport which saved us a good deal of money. Downtown Orlando is approximately 15-20 minutes away. We did not eat at the hotel so I cant comment on that. Also, go to the pool, and use the business center (no charge) if you need it. If you want a great hotel, take your self to this one and I doubt you will be disappointed. We will definately be back!

Reviews.Title: “At this hotel, I feel like home.”
Reviews.Author: HelenaRiodeJaneiro
Reviews.Content: Perfect stay; safety, peace and quiet; cozyness; IÂ´ve been staying at this hotel for years and never regreted my choice.

Reviews.Title: “Always a great experience”
Reviews.Author: dsoto77
Reviews.Content: I am a frequent business traveler to the Orlando area and always stay at the Florida Mall Hotel . Late check-in is never a problem. I have always found the rooms to be spacious and clean. You can't beat it's convenience as it is adjacent to a mall and has many nearby restaurants. The staff is always friendly and willing to assist, not to mention their honesty; as I have left behind items of value when I have checked out and have always been able to retrieve them because they have been turned in. I highly recommend staying at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel has the friendliest staff I...”
Reviews.Author: Toeringdiva
Reviews.Content: This hotel has the friendliest staff I have ever encountered! The rooms were exceptionally clean and the beds were lush with comfort! Crickets serves up a yummy breakfast buffet and Asbert will cook up your FRESH eggs to order along with a huge waffle and a bubbling personality...Tell him I say Hi! The late night bar has great drinks at a reasonable price and serves until 1:00 am. The hotel was a little bit on the beaten path and the view was only of the parking lot however I was comforted by the more then reasonable cost of the room and the wonderfull staff! Oh did I mention the enormous mall attached to the lobby! Every womans dream! I will most certainly return! Thank you for the hospitality! Brittney

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and comfortable for business”
Reviews.Author: maxisley
Reviews.Content: Hotel is attached to a great shopping mall and convenient for businesses in the area. I had a noisy A/C that was fixed same day. Staff was professional and courteous. Will stay again when I am in that area.

Reviews.Title: “Over all we had a great stay!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: itsawinner
Reviews.Content: Are stay here was one of the best. It is one of the best hotels we've stayed in. And joey was the best ever helping use with are luggage.

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel did a fantastic job with my Son and "new" Daughters wedding!”
Reviews.Author: MFlodin
Reviews.Content: We had a short time to plan and pull off a rather large wedding. The Florida Hotel did a great job making sure all the out of town family and friends were taken care of. Last minute room additons were no problem. Friendly staff (Front desk and valet folks were great!), great pool, just a good all around experience.

Reviews.Title: “A RELIEF FROM THE TOURIST TRAP”
Reviews.Author: aliceisacat
Reviews.Content: An oasis in the sea of Disney! If you are traveling to Orlando and not by chance visiting the mouse, you will find this hotel a very welcome relief! The rooms are spacious and immaculate and the location can't be beat. Just 6 miles from the airport and connected to a terrific mall which proved invaluable when I needed a nicer dress shirt. Staff couldn't have been nicer, we arrived quite late and were checked in with no problem to a lovely room. Would highly recommend this hotel, an excellent value in a touristy town where rooms really can run quite high for what you get.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and Clean”
Reviews.Author: Yosef78
Reviews.Content: The biggest thing I look for when traveling for business is convenience, cleanliness (a must have), and service. This hotel is convenient with a average mall attached. Service was good and the rooms were clean. I was attending a conference so I only left the hotel once and that was for dinner one night. There are several dining option a short walk away. For business this hotel completely satisfies and I would recommend. Only one small restaurant and bar though. Breakfast was good but a little expensive for what they offered. Service in the bar/ restaurant was average at best. However if traveling for vacation or with a family it is probably not an ideal location. No view, a good distance from downtown/attractions. Very much designed for the business traveler which in my case worked our perfectly.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL ,GREAT VALUE.”
Reviews.Author: DaveTLondon_England
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here at the beginning and end of our holiday in Florida. The staff couldn't have been more helpful. The rooms are big and very clean, with a big T.V, Fridge and a free safe. It is connected to a huge Mall with plenty of free parking spaces. There are plenty of restaurants in the vicinity and I would especially recommend an Italian one called Buca Di Beppo, where we had the best meal of our stay in Florida. Marco, the hotel night manager ,even gave us a 10 dollar discount card, which made the meal great value. I would have no hesitation in returning to this hotel, anytime that I,m in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Staff and Facilities made my conference enjoyable and a great success”
Reviews.Author: Achuck
Reviews.Content: The meeting room was as described and a great value. Staff made me feel at home and their assistance with set up and tear down was very helpful. The room was very comfortable and allowed a good nights rest after the meetings.

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel helped make our trip to Disney truly MAGICAL!”
Reviews.Author: Serenejrh
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I traveled to Orlando to celebrate her 4th Birthday, this trip was just Mommy and daughter and I wanted it to be so very special! It was, I had mentioned upon checking in how special this trip was, they set me up with a car service for the week that was not only punctual and courteous but after taking a cab home from the park one evening I realized the car service was HALF the COST, the savings from transportation allowed me to add extras to areas that made a difference. The next evening we returned to find a balloon and note attached to our door. The note was to call the desk, we did and cookies and milk were promptly brought to us. My daughter thought this was the BOMB! We had room service almost nightly and could not have asked for better food or service. Staff was great and the HUGE pool and hot tub even better. I would certainly recommend this hotel for any reason corporate meetings, they certainly did a great job for just the two of us so I can only imagine how great they would be for larger more important groups! Oh, having the mall so close saved us from forgotten items!

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable and convenient stay”
Reviews.Author: loves2travel79
Reviews.Content: Hotel is very well-kept up and clean. The hotel amenties were a nice addition to an otherwise business trip. It was very convenient to have shopping and dining readily accessible with plenty to choose from as it is connected to a very large mall with Food Court. All staff were pleasant and eager to please.

Reviews.Title: “Elegant clean rooms & bathrooms plus indoor walk to fantastic stores!”
Reviews.Author: rosalinazaid
Reviews.Content: I love, love, love staying at the Florida Mall Hotel in Orlando. Not only are the hotel room rates reasonable (thus repeat stays from me!), but the rooms and bathrooms are actually clean and nicely set up. I have stayed here at least 3 to 4 times in the last few years and have never been disappointed. On top of all that, you just walk through the hotel lobby right into a mall full of fantastic shops, which include your usual national chain stores plus some specialy stores, in many price ranges so there's something for everyone. It's right off the expressway, too, so it's very easy to get to once you realize you have to drive around the mall to get to the back, where the Florida Mall entrance is located (just look for the tallest building in the mall parking lot and head for it!). The $11 required daily add-on fee pays for internet svc and 2 bottled waters (can't remember what else).

Reviews.Title: “A very pleasant experience at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center”
Reviews.Author: C_J047
Reviews.Content: We experienced outstanding service by all levels of staff. The location of the hotel, connected to the mall and close to major roads, lended itself very well to our attendees. They appreciated the dining choices. We have used this location for our meeting for a few years and noticed we now know most of the staff.

Reviews.Title: “A nobrainer...best stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: marianalockett
Reviews.Content: We picked this hotel because of it's reviews and also because family has stayed here before. It is definately a GREAT hotel, not so close to the main attractions, but it is completely renovated, clean, great customer service, great gym(fully equipped) and you have direct access to great shopping since is located at the Florida Mall. We are Florida residents and we have visited Orlando several times, this was our first time in this hotel, but from now on this will be the hotel we will stay at everytime we go back. You will not regret your stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Location, comfortable and inside Florida Mall”
Reviews.Author: HPCAO
Reviews.Content: Comfortable hotel, just 25 min driving to Disney Parks and inside Florida Mall.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: Leencarter
Reviews.Content: We selected this Hotel from review on Travelocity and were so pleased withteh cleanliness and service. My family was looking for a convenient spot to stay over after a day at Universal Studios. The Hotel was conveniently located and accessible without a long drive. Also because the hotel has acess to the mall there were options for shopping and dining that wold not have been available without driving had we stayed elsewhere. The mall turned out to be a saving grace when we left a hairbrush at home and broke a flip flop at Universal! I would not hesitate to stay at this hotel again!

Reviews.Title: “A relaxing stay at a clean, friendly hotel with some great staff!”
Reviews.Author: Sarah1439404
Reviews.Content: We visited The Florida Hotel as a central base for our Disney trips. The shopping mall it is attached to, is fantastic with a huge variety of shops, much better than staying on International drive! It was clean and fairly modern, although the decor could have been a little more up-to-date. Most of the staff were really friendly and provided excellent service. The pool was clean and warm! It also had a lovely hot jacuzzi to soothe those aching muscles after trekking round the Disney park with a 2-year old!

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel to relax in between the hustle and bustle of your vacation”
Reviews.Author: Goodmorning2
Reviews.Content: The work out room was spacious and bright. The pool was large, clean, cool and relaxing. The staff in all areas were accommodating to our needs. Like most all hotels though the outside hall noise was an issue if you want to get yourself an early night rest. But the beds are comfortable and it was easy to fall asleep exhausted from a day at Wet-n-Wild, Universal or a full day of volleyball at the Convention Center.

Reviews.Title: “Granddaughters spectacular Vacaction”
Reviews.Author: Bobmacjr01
Reviews.Content: My Daughter and Grandaughter Visited for Mothers day this year, We decided that we would stay over night in Orlando, before moving on to Tampa We made the decition to stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center because of its location , with the Mall attached it was great, After a long day at the universal studios we went to the hotel. As we entered the lobby, my Granddaughter was in ah by the chandilers hanging from the celing the bright lights and the furnature was like entering a castle to her at four years old. The service at the front desk was great Qiuck and pleasent great after spending a long day at a park with a four year old who now is getting tried. The room was great, clean and cool, we asked for extra coffee for the little four cup coffee pot thats in the bath room, the hotel sent plenty of extra coffee and everything to go with it. Our trip here was great I would go back as often as i can even though I am 52 years old, I too like staying in a Castle like my granddaughter

Reviews.Title: “The most accomadating and friendly hotel I've stayed at in 13yrs!”
Reviews.Author: DaddyStu
Reviews.Content: I was staying at the Florida Hotel and Conf Centre when the dreaded 'Ash Cloud' closed the UK airspace and so I was stranded in the USA for a further 8 days past my schedule. Obviously I was in the same situation as thousands of other people, however, the hotel staff made me feel like I was home. They made every attempt to help me and my 14 colleagues feel at ease, updated on the latest situation and were also very helpful to one girl who had missed her own Hen Weekend due to the canceled flights. One of the receptionists even took her to her own hairdressers to cheer her up and get her ready for her big day. The girls in the Starbucks concession were offering to do peoples laundry at home, refusing to accept any payment ... in all they staff were AMAZING. The hotel is situated within the Florida Mall and is bright, comfortable and very clean (which is always welcome when you travel as much as I do!). An ideal hotel to stay in whether a few days shopping or a holiday or even need a base abroad when on business. I travel abroad 5 times a month and have been for over 10years and have never been looked after so well - I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service and well run”
Reviews.Author: nishnik
Reviews.Content: Superb service and attentive staff. Very clean and efficient. Would definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: GillianC54
Reviews.Content: Stayed here overnight again.The last time we were there the hotel was being upgraded but it has been worth it.Lovely room,very helpful and knowledgeable staff at both check in and check out.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “A phonecall changed my mind”
Reviews.Author: CoachDub
Reviews.Content: I recently wrote a review criticizing the guest relations, but I would like to recant after the hotel called me after that review. They are going to refund my money, and they have recently made some changes to their phone system to keep patrons from rolling over continuously. The hotel understood my special circumstance, and they extended the olive branch, and I would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: colin186338
Reviews.Content: We used this hotel when we were stranded in Orlando and stayed for 3 days. They looked after us so well , we were part of the British Airways group being put up in the hotel. , They went beyond their duties to make sure we were well looked after, even arranging a pool party which the children loved. The pool is lovely , the shopping mall amazing, the bar staff friendly along with the hotel staff. The lady looking after our group she was hotel management was fantastic. Would stay at this hotel as part of our next vacation to catch up on the great shopping and its nice and close to the rest of the resort. Thank You Florida Mall, we never felt stranded once !!

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel & Conference Center...a great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: FOCUS95
Reviews.Content: When staying at a hotel, there are always going to be some things that aren't just right,b ut my stay at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center in Orlando was excellent. The staff was very courteous and helpful and being adjacent to the Florida Mall was perfect. There was just enough free time to walk around the mall and do some shopping without having to manuever around Orlando. While Cricket's Grille may look fancy, the staff, friendly atmosphere and prices were just what we needed.

Reviews.Title: “,”
Reviews.Author: imchris
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed this particular hotel. They had a great location and very convenient to the Florida Mall. It is a great location for those that are not interested in being right in the heart of tourists.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kittycatkaren
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed here for a conference and had a very pleasant experience. The hotel is lovely, comfortable and well maintained. The conference facilities were also very good. I wasn't crazy about the food but I am a very picky eater. It is attached to the Mall of Florida which is huge and gave me much to do on my free time. I would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Florida was a very clean, convenient stay with decent quality and value.”
Reviews.Author: djkendall
Reviews.Content: I went to Florida Hotel for Beta convention and the staff were very courteous. The rooms were very clean and I have no complaints other than the room service was extremely overpriced, but to go to the food court and back is only five minutes so unless you order something at 12 o'clock at night, it's no problem.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you Simone and all at the hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Amytomsam
Reviews.Content: We were one of the 'distressed British Airways' families placed at the Florida Mall by BA during the volcanic eruption in Iceland. The hotel staff were truly wonderful and provided us with 3 meals a day, clean accommodation, friendly staff, supportive ears and lots of attention given our unique circumstances. The hotel is clean, tidy and staff wonderful. My only criticism is that the floors in the bathroom are REALLY slippery when wet....nothing else bad to say about the hotel AT ALL! If you are looking for a great place to stay, this is it and deserves its place as a great hotel! A heart felt thank you to all staff. I can't comment on the value for money aspect of the hotel as BA were paying the bill.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the location and being able to shop at the mall where I stayed”
Reviews.Author: chellebelle25
Reviews.Content: I found everyone to be very helpful during my weekend stay. The accomadations were excellent and comfortable. The only thing that I would recommend would have been free internet and not limiting it to just 24 hours.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good staff.”
Reviews.Author: dbelam
Reviews.Content: Fantastic hotel, very clean, nice staff, and very good location. Highly recommended to others

Reviews.Title: “We found this hotel by accident but would stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: ClarebirdLondon
Reviews.Content: We were booked into this hotel by British Airways during the disruption to flying following the volcanic eruption in Iceland. It was far nicer than the hotel we had been staying in! I can't comment on value for money as I don't know what the typical room rate would be, but the location was great (close to Sea World, convenient for the airport and adjacent to a massive shopping mall), the staff were excellent and there is a nice, larger-than-average outdoor swimming pool. The air conditioning was quiet, the rooms were comfortable - it was a nice play to be marooned!

Reviews.Title: “A hotel AND a mall - my dream come true!”
Reviews.Author: fw1957
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, lobby opens up to a large mall. Plenty of places to eat, browse, relax. Room was nice, beds comfortable. I got the room at an online "bidding" site, and was very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: “Sleep Like a Baby.”
Reviews.Author: happy123Parkcityut_
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for the second time in two months. The staff checked me in right away and I had time for a quick workout in the workout room. Everything at this hotel is about convenence. The beds are very comfortable and the rooms overlook the city. If you are traveling overnoght or for a vacation I strongly recomend you take a look at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Overall it was great!”
Reviews.Author: lynn_lindsay
Reviews.Content: This was a great hotel. Everyone was friendly. Room was very clean. Always had fresh towels and room was always made up. Between 10-20 minutes away from all major attractions. Would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, helpful staff, great location for shopping.”
Reviews.Author: Oliver045
Reviews.Content: The service at the hotel was brilliant, all the staff were very helpful and friendly. The hotel bedrooms were very clean and large. The Florida Hotel and conference centre has a large outside pool which was in the sun all day. The location of the hotel is fantastic if you like shopping as the Florida mall is next door.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel, wonderful staff and great location.”
Reviews.Content: My husband had to go to Orlando for a conference so I accompanied him. I had days of shopping (shopping center attached to the hotel) and evenings of great food. You can find every type of restaurant in the area. The hotel staff was very accommodating and helpful. The rooms were spacious, clean and with everything needed.

Reviews.Title: “Justifying your stay...”
Reviews.Author: AftabFromVBeach
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference held in this hotel and loved it. The hotel is right at a huge mall and one entrace of the mall connects to it directly. The hotel staff is very courtreous providing prompt service. I had some noise in one of the phone sets. It was fixed within seconds of placing a call. The housekeeping staff is very nice. I requested not to put decaf coffee in my room. Apparently, they forgot whether it was defac or regular that I didn't like - they put 2 of each for the whole stay! The lobby restaurant Cricket's has the most courteous staff at the bar and in restuarant that you ever meet. To top it off, they give two-for-one deals every day (during my stay, at least) for drinks and dinner from 3-9pm. I needed wireless Internet after I had checked out (because the event was still going on) and the fronk desk gentleman gave me a code for that. I look forward to staying here again for a family vacation. One thing I forgot - the mall has an Italian restuarant (forgot its name) with again really nice staff and food. Must have a look at their kitchen.

Reviews.Title: “Great for conferences with fantastic, well-maintained facilities”
Reviews.Author: Travel_girl_0102
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel has comfortable, spacious rooms (with doorbells at each door!). Despite the various conferences going on for all ages, my room was perfectly sound proof. I couldn't hear any noise from the hallway at night. The pool and workout facilities were quite spacious and enjoyable as well. Perhaps the most helpful to me was that the bathrooms near our conference rooms were extremely well maintained. I did not have time to rush to my room during our breaks, and I used the public restrooms at various times each day. They were all well-maintained, and the trash seemed to be constantly emptied. There was never any water or mess around the sinks, either. As a plus, the hotel is only minutes from all of the major theme parks. Disney is the farthest away, and it's only around 15 minutes from the front door of the hotel. Sea World and Universal were about 10 and 12 minutes respectively.

Reviews.Title: “Do not waste your time and money!”
Reviews.Author: lovydove
Reviews.Content: Me and my friend stayed at this hotel for 2 nights before going on a disney cruise. We booked there cuz the reviews where great on tripadvisor! what a dissapointment. First of all, the staff were almost rude to us and they didnt know anything about the area.... Really, they coudlnt answer any of our questions. The hotel is not far from airport but from everything else....OMG...you must have a car cuz theres no shuttles and taxis=$$$$ We spent so much money to get around orlando. The room was nicelly decorated but it stuck...Smelled like food in there...was really discusting. the damn pool closes a 10 pm (wtf!!!!!) The only thing we likes was the easy acces to internet and the shopping mall.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: mmccook
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed for 3 weeks I was on business, she took advantage of the mall.Our stay was outstanding. I would highly recommend it to anybody for business or vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel! Will stay again while in Orlando.”
Reviews.Author: tycpearce
Reviews.Content: We have been to Orlando many times, but have never stayed at The Florida Hotel. We decided last minute to go to Orlando and booked our rooms at the hotel. We were quite surprised at how clean the hotel was and how nice the rooms were. It was great to set our teenagers loose in the mall. Gave them lot's of stuff to do. We will be staying at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “My stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center was outstanding.”
Reviews.Author: ramccalla
Reviews.Content: The gym and pool facilities were very nice. The Hotel's bar/restaurant were definitely an A+, especially the service. The employees were all very helpful and friendly. The location in the mall facility provided convenient access to the numerous shops and eateries. I would most definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded my expectations!”
Reviews.Author: Blkdmndz
Reviews.Content: I stayed for a week. I am normally a very pick person when it comes to hotels. It was very clean! Staff was very helpful and friendly! Located near lots of great restaurants adn shopping! The bus stop was very close! I will certainly stay again without any hesitation!

Reviews.Title: “BE PREPARED FOR EXCELLENT SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: jjackson5
Reviews.Content: This is my family's favorite and frequency visited hotel. Where the Valet is waiting to greet you and at the front desk- excellent service. When you arrive in your room its comfortable and inviting. Plus room service is a call away-quick too. ENJOY.....we did.

Reviews.Title: “the hotel was very enjoyable and lots of fun.”
Reviews.Author: wiggie81
Reviews.Content: The employees were kind and the rooms were clean and beautiful. The location was great. Did not use the Exercise room or the Pool. The resturant was great.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: zappycamper
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here on several occasions, both on business and vacation and have always been more than satisfied by the accommodations. My most recent stay, two days in early April, 2010, were fantastic. The staff was extremely helpful and friendly and the rooms are comfortable and clean. It is actually located at the Florida Mall, which in my opinion, is an added bonus. If you need of anything, all you have to do is walk through the lobby and you are in the mall. They hold conferences and large weddings and the lobby is always bustling, but the rooms are always extremely quiet. I paid $109 per night which is a steal considering what you have to pay at any of the resorts or international drive. Clean, safe, reasonable, and close to everything- I recommend without reservation.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Relaxing and Great Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: BigMisho
Reviews.Content: We stayed four days and three nights on the 11th floor, so it was quiet and peaceful. The room was cleaned everyday. We enjoyed the breakfast (specially the omelet, made fresh) then spent all day in the parks, at night we had dinner in the Florida Mall food court (next to the hotel), then back to our clean and comfortable king bed :-)

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: suz409
Reviews.Content: We liked the hotel very much and will stay there again. Clean and everyone working there very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Great job”
Reviews.Author: cbart72
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center for a week in March. My company held our yearly training meetings ther that take all week. The hotel was in great shape, very clean, and hospitable. The staff was very friendly and willing to answer any questions or preform any task that would insure the customer was comfortable and cared for. I would say that our training event was a great success and that the Florida Hotel did everything possible to see that possible.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Experience!”
Reviews.Author: ScheissKopf
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff was excellent! They are and were accommodating in every way possible, I felt like a VIP at all times. The location is prime, close to all of the attractions, the airport, and most importantly, it is co-located in the Florida Mall in Orlando..... My stay here was for business but, I can assure you, I will definitely stay here again in the future while on vacation/leisure travel. I recommend any one traveling to the Orlando, FL either on business or leisure that they stay at this hotel you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience... would definitely stay again!”
Reviews.Author: April010
Reviews.Content: This hotel definitely exceeded our expectations in every way. Clean room, nice pool, great buffet breakfast and friendly staff. Shopping is so convenient as the hotel is connected to the Florida Mall. There are many restaurants within walking distance. Great value for the money! We have already recommended this hotel to friends.

Reviews.Title: “It was an awesome visit.”
Reviews.Author: goingplaces307
Reviews.Content: I would not stay anywhere but the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. Loved the Hotel and loved the Florida Mall. Great place for family getaway while visiting Disney.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to all the members of your family. You will love to be near the mall.”
Reviews.Author: amparangel
Reviews.Content: Very good facilities. Very good room service and food. Confortables and clean rooms. Very nice location. Great spaces. Wonderful idea to be in the mall.

Reviews.Title: “Would go back!”
Reviews.Author: lali4
Reviews.Content: I liked the cleanliness and the helpfulness of the staff.I have talked up this hotel since our return!

Reviews.Title: “Summerville, SC .... Great location, well kept rooms and comfortable beds, can't wait for next break...I recommend (FHC)”
Reviews.Author: Highlyfavd
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is located at the Florida Mall, my family & I have spent the last 3 to 4 years at this beautiful hotel, when it was formally named the Adams Mark Hotel. Excellent Staff, the rooms are well - kept and the beds are comfortable. Also it's affordable...My teenagers enjoy the pool. Will recommend to the President of the U.S. But don't just take my word for it....try it for yourself and I am sure you want be disappointed...

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, Clean good location”
Reviews.Author: SidFlorida
Reviews.Content: Expedited check in. Friendly attendants; pay for parking;,additional $10.00 fee for whatever?

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel attached to awesome mall.”
Reviews.Author: husni76
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel was a very pleasant surprise. It's connected to one of the largest mall's in the South East and located in a part of Orlando that's close to the attractions, but yet, it was very quiet once inside the confines of the hotel. The room was very good, everything was comfortable from the bed to the bathroom.

Reviews.Title: “Very convinience to everything”
Reviews.Author: Jdep1973
Reviews.Content: My wife and I with our 3 children was looking for a nice hotel near a mall and this jotel was it!!! the room was very clean and the staff was excellent all around...we let our teenager walked around the mall by them self to go shopping for 5 hours and they had a blast! the hotel is connected to the mall so whenever we got hungry we just went to the food court and ate there...we would definitely stay there again in the future!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: stillsmilin2775
Reviews.Content: The Entire Staff are there for you. This was my second stay and I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Magax4
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay here. Everything was clean and orderly. We were greeted with professional, but warm smiles and attitudes. If we asked for something we got it. It wasn't noisy which I liked a lot. VERY convenient to everything in Orlando. We have stayed here before and will continue to use them!

Reviews.Title: “Everything you hope a hotel will be, but never really believe you can find out there!”
Reviews.Author: lori046
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful hotel in every way! It was clean, affordable and every single staff member whom we interacted with was friendly and accommodating. In my experience, it is practically impossible to get such great service and clean and new facilities in addition to an affordable price. But we found a gem! I will be going back here again and again whenever I come to stay in Orlando. Also, it was so much fun having the hotel open up into the mall. We had a blast!

Reviews.Title: “Good choice”
Reviews.Author: LarsXL
Reviews.Content: For the price, they are offering a good service and some great rooms. The ammenities are great too, but you have to pay an Extra $11 "resort fee" for getting the benefits that others include (like wifi, business center, fitness) but taken together with the low room rate it balances out and still is a good deal.

Reviews.Title: “Not to bad of a hotel but great location.”
Reviews.Author: CandS2009
Reviews.Content: We decided to go to Orlando for the weekend for a get-a-way ( we live in Florida ) and did our normal online searching. This hotel was located half way between down town and Disney which worked perfectly given we were going to a basketball game Friday night and Disney on Saturday and Sunday. If you read other reviews about this hotel and the odd smell this is true. It is not necessarily bad but a overpowering detergent smell. The rooms were pretty basic but clean. The $11 a day fee was a little misleading and made the $79 room rate $101 with taxes and fees. The staff was nice and we did not use any of the other amenities.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic, Friendly, Professional Staff especially Clim”
Reviews.Author: jemjemjem
Reviews.Content: What a great hotel and the staff are excellent. I enjoyed my stay very much and will always stay at the Floria Hotel whenever in Orlando and have reccomended it to friends. Great location within a Mall. And Clim, what an amazing employee!!

Reviews.Title: “Will make it a priority to stay here when in Orlando again”
Reviews.Author: frequentfed
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff and accomodations were excellent, room was large and quiet. Great location with lots of dining options within walking distance and in the Florida Mall. In-hotel restaurant/bar featured 2 for 1 specials during Happy Hour.

Reviews.Title: “The best experience we've had in Orlando!”
Reviews.Author: ABACC
Reviews.Content: I've spent a lot of time in a lot of Orlando hotels and conference centers, but The Florida Hotel, by far, has been the BEST experience. The sales and event staff are amazing, far better than anyplace else we've ever been. My attendees, according to our surveys, like this hotel better than anyplace else too! I highly recommend The Florida Hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great room, friendly staff and next to a shopping mall !”
Reviews.Author: Gatwick74
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Florida Mall Hotel for 5 nights after a short stay in Tampa Bay as our hub for trips to all the theme parks, etc. Check-in was smooth and we were very pleased with our Deluxe Room. It was of a nice size with a sofa area (that we could chuck our suitcases on). The daily 'service charge' included 2 bottle of water a day and also free wireless internet in the room itself which was a godsend to keep in touch with family at home without building up large phone bills. The room was always very clean, the bathroom a nice size and the television had plenty of channels. The fridge also came in useful too in storing water, drinks, etc. Breakfast (which was part of our package booked direct) was very nice indeed and off the 'eat as much as you can variety', e.g my wife having fruit and a couple of eggs and me stuffing my face. All the staff we encountered were very friendly and apparently keen to impress which we noticed with the requests to fill out comments cards every day. The facilities at the hotel were very good. A well kitted out gym and also a nice sized outdoor pool (with towels) to allow you to unwind at the end of the day. The Florida Mall itself was very good with a large variety of shops and also a few places to get your odds and ends, ie the CVS pharmacy for water and snacks. The food court was great as well as there was a lot of choice and handy if you were too tired to venture out to a restaurant. The location of the hotel was better suited for those just coming to Orlando for shopping as it was about a 15-20min drive to I.Drive/Sea Worl / Disney but then again it's pluses out-weighed it's minuses and we would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: KatieBR549K
Reviews.Content: I saw this hotel on the internet and saw that a mall was connected so I stayed just to check it out. I was impressed with the hotel and the sure enough it is in a mall. I loved it and I will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “$11 Hidden Fee”
Reviews.Author: bna_ks
Reviews.Content: One drawback of this place is the mandatory $11 fee you get assessed upon checking in for use of the Business Center, Fitness Room, Pool, two bottles of water in the room, and a newspaper (even if you don't use any of these). $11 is not very much but it's just not right based on principle - if you don't use the services, there should be no need to pay for them. I've never had a hotel pull this sort of hidden charge and it just reeks of greed and manipulation. Just to get my value for the fee, I swam in the pool the following morning in 56 degree weather with moderate rain. Good times.

Reviews.Title: “My new second home!”
Reviews.Author: ReenieT
Reviews.Content: I am here a lot with work and although we only stay one night at a time all of the employees are extremely friendly and always welcoming. The new gym is great and on sunny days the pool is perfect for a cool down. If the weather disappoints the easy wander into the mall makes shopping just a little bit too easy! A great hotel that feels like home!

Reviews.Title: “a pleasent stay cope my desires”
Reviews.Author: lumierevene
Reviews.Content: The hotel absolutely, fulfilled what I was looking for, very close to airport, price offer 4 days a pay 3 great deal, the rooms comfort and cleanness so important to me, very nice hospitality, kind and friendly service, walking distance Close to shops, even for me that I was not driving I was able to handle by myself walking for dinning and stores, I stay 4 nights, nothing to regret. I will use this hotel if needed again.

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel and Conf. Center is equal if not better than some of the top Hotels in Japan”
Reviews.Author: Adak4rst
Reviews.Content: Short distance from the Airport but yet zero air traffic noise. The main entrance is inviting and comfortable on the eyes. The staff is always smiling, very friendly, and very observant. Room decor is simply luxurious with fine details. The bed is very comfortable as well as the couch and desk chairs-Bravo. The Hotel is attached to a super Mall making it easy to remain on the Hotel grounds. Free Internet access was a plus as a long distance traveler. Conference rooms are spacious and well lit. Gym is well equipped as well as a nice clean refreshing pool. Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in the Hotel Bar and Grill is outstanding. Kudos to the Chef and overall management of The Florida Hotel and Conference Center - Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Quality and Excellence for Business and Leisure Travelers”
Reviews.Author: minbeard
Reviews.Content: I travel to Orlando multiple times a year for business and frequently stay at this hotel. No matter what time of day or night that I arrive, the service is excellent, the stay is comfortable and my needs for a quiet and purposeful environment are met. It also helps that the Florida Mall is located adjacent to the property so that I am able to provide a return gift for my daughter. I would rate this as an excellent hotel for business and leisure travelers to the Orlando area. International drive is just a few miles away and anything that you could ask for is at your fingertips. Thanks Flordia Hotel for your service to this repeat business traveler.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: BucksOConnor
Reviews.Content: Great hotel. All staff encountered polite and helpful. All staff encountered polite and helpful. This hotel is located in the Florida shopping mall, so shopping is a breeze. On top of the I4 so getting around is easy.

Reviews.Title: “It takes your breath away!”
Reviews.Author: jjonadlais
Reviews.Content: Once I located the hotel (because it is in back of a shopping mall) when I entered it, the beauty of the hotel just takes your breath away. The lobby is in a circle with an escalator on either side. The business center was located by the check in desk. Two elevator banks - when you get up to your floor the elevator area was shielded in by glass - wow! The rooms were very spacious and very comfortable. The staff was excellent and very attentive to your needs. I wished our group stayed more days than we did. Really a GREAT experience staying at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center!

Reviews.Title: “Great getaway for just hanging out.”
Reviews.Author: AbiPeach
Reviews.Content: This was so nice. My husband wanted to nap a lot and I wanted to shop a lot and lay by the pool. We could both do what we wanted because the Florida Mall is attached to the Hotel. I was able to just go downstairs and get a massage, mani and pedi and go back up and take a nap while I was still relaxed. So cool. The restaurant was very good and had good specials on drinks, appetizers, and dinner. Such a friendly place. I would go at least once a month if I could. It was like being at a resort without paying resort prices. Great deal for the money, too. Great linens on the bed and I am picky about that. Very nice overall experience.

Reviews.Title: “Honesty”
Reviews.Author: DiamondBahamas
Reviews.Content: When I trael to Orlando, I stay at the Florida Mall Hotel. My Father lives two hours away, but I still choose to stay at the hotel and I go to Orland almost every two weeks. On my stay in February, I had checked out and was on my way to the Airport, when I realized that I did not have my Rolext watch and other jewellery on. The I remember I left them in the safe at the hotel. I hurried back and my jewellery and Passport was exactly where I had left them in the safe. The security let me in the room and made sure that I found everything before he left. Now that security and honesty. The staff is exceptionally friendly. Anyone visiting please ask to meet Mrs. Dana, she is in charge of House Keeping and let me tell you she is Awsome! Erma Campbell

Reviews.Title: “Staff is exceptional”
Reviews.Author: KRyanCt
Reviews.Content: The staff was very courteous and helpful. I was not happy at being checked into my room late but the staff was helpful and very apologetic. The location was close to locations for touring and the mall was very convenient for shopping. The conference center was well suited for our needs and again the catering staff was cheerful and gracious in their service. I would recommend this hotel for either a conference or a family stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel- very convenient.”
Reviews.Author: tbiscuit
Reviews.Content: Very pretty hotel. Right next to a mall, so there are several places to eat close by and if you like to shop, you're already there. Good fitness center with top notch equipment. comfortable room. The restaurant at the hotel was pretty good too. The breakfast buffett wasn't the largest ever but they had good grits and my eggs over easy were cooked right. Coffee and water in the room- you pay a "service fee" but I used it all, so worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service.”
Reviews.Author: wolfmanfla
Reviews.Content: Excellent service. Attached to the mall so you can go from the hotel lobby directly to the mall. If there is a problem it is taken care of immediately.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent find,hidden jewel”
Reviews.Author: Roberto58Gainesville
Reviews.Content: After searching hotels by or at the Orlando mall we made reservation at one hotel that was deceptive advertising,after arriving at the hotel we book on line,we found out that the website was misleading so off we went looking for another hotel close to the mall.We came across the hotel and from the minute we drove up until the minute we left the next morning it was like we were at a six star hotel and conference center.The kids had a ball checking out the mall,and the thought of not having to go anywhere after a shopping spree to a room that was impeccable,with a king size bed,sleeper sofa and because we were in town for kids sporting event we had 5 people in the room.Called down to housekeeping and requested a roll out bed,extra towels and etc.Everything arrived in less than 5 minutes.I myself slept on the roll out bed and had the best night sleeps in months.I wanted to buy it.Great place to stay and the price was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “The price we paid was excellent and the nice part about it it's right in the mall:-)!”
Reviews.Author: love4eva
Reviews.Content: Nice room everything is upgraded & very clean! The front desk staff were excellent & friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel & Location”
Reviews.Author: srkend
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at this hotel and I would not hesitate to stay there again. Rooms were very clean and nice and being connected to the mall was a bonus. You also are only 6-7 miles from the big outlet mall and several other popular destinations.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location for shopping”
Reviews.Author: deanodoggy
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel for two nights while on a shopping trip. The hotel was spotless, very comfortable and staff very friendly/helpful. Location at the Florida Mall is second to none. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: j13h22
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a sporting event and the hotel was very convient and a all around nice hotel. We would definately stay again.

Reviews.Title: “They were very helpful, happy, and courteous.”
Reviews.Author: silkiesue
Reviews.Content: Our service was excellent. Check in was fast. The room was clean and neat. Restaurant food was very good. Everybody had a smile on their face and was very helpful. That is what I enjoyed the most. The least was our tv acted up a little and the price of the meals were a little high.

Reviews.Title: “Great for a business trip. One stop shop.”
Reviews.Author: Army4Me
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel is great. Direct drive to/from airport is approximately 20 minutes. The hotel resturant offered great happy hour deals. The buffet breakfast was great and had a large variety. The hotel is adjacent to a large mall and the food court made is easy to grab a quick bite for lunch. For dinner, there are chain resturants if you want something a little less fast food. Some had rental cars and there are many resturants near by to choose from. The hotel room was very nice. The refridgerator was a plus, only thing I could have used was a microwave. Internet access from the room was great. During the conference sessions. some times connection was at a minimum. Those with air cards were better off than me.

Reviews.Title: “TOP Notch Service”
Reviews.Author: pstyle777
Reviews.Content: I do not typically write reviews but I felt compelled to share with others my experience at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. I was there for business and pleasure last weekend and I have to admit that the facilities and the staff were terrific. Being attached to the Florida Mall made it a plus and there were some very nice restaurants in the immediate proximity. The room was very nice, it was tastefully done, clean, comfortable and truly made me feel like I was at home. Not all hotels can accomplish this feat, but I was completely comfortable throughout the entire weekend. They even had a shower dispenser with shampoo, conditioner and soap in the shower, just like I have at home. The hotel in general was very well set up... There was a starbucks in the lobby and the mall was attached to the lobby as to you didnt have to walk too far to get to the food court if you wanted to grab a quick bite between meetings. The conference rooms were spacious and extremely accommodating. Best of all the staff was great, everyone went above the call of duty to make sure I was taken care of. From the moment I walked in to the point I left, the valet, bell hop, counter staff and maids were all exceptional. Especially the maid and the valet!

Reviews.Title: “It was a wonderful experience!”
Reviews.Author: VivianAviles
Reviews.Content: Everyone at the hotel was curteus and respectful. They truely go above and beyond to accomodate the needs of the There are several restaurant to choose from. The restaurants are not only in the hotel but in the mall that is adjacent to the hotel. The amount of shops to choose from is exeptional!

Reviews.Title: “choose room carefully”
Reviews.Author: BruceFromMT
Reviews.Content: The hotel and conference center was a great place to stay and meet with one exception. I traveled from Montana in February hoping to enjoy palm trees, green grass, and water that wasn't frozen. The outside of the hotel promised all that. My room, however, looked straight across to a plaster wall of another building only about 20 feet away. No other rooms were available. Bummer. Other than that, everything was great.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Hotel - Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: bir909
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful hotel. I was most impressed, however with the staff. They were extremely courteous and friendly. I had my wallet stolen at the airport, although I had no idea at the time where it was stolen, and the staff did everthing they could to help me. Also, I was just beginning training to be certified as an online instructor on the same day I arrived for a business conference, and I needed to spend hours, rather than fifteen minutes, on the hotel computers, and somehow the manager arranged for me to do that for two nights in a row. I was very appreciative.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: Delran
Reviews.Content: I thought the location was great. I like the connection to the mall.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, convenient and a good value.”
Reviews.Author: raljr1
Reviews.Content: This hotel offered a very nice room at an attractive price. The service we received was second to none. All of the staff members went out of their way to make sure our stay was pleasant. Being adjacent to the mall was a benefit.

Reviews.Title: “best in orlando”
Reviews.Author: jimi179
Reviews.Content: great hotel, outdoor pool ,with a huge mall,3 miles from the airportl

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Comfortable business hotel, Great Price”
Reviews.Author: TraceRegister
Reviews.Content: Had business meetings in Orlando and waited until I got there to find a good price hotel (budget). Drove past the soulless motels and hotels and saw the Florida Hotel above the Florida Mall. Got a great price, a really good room, good facilities, excellent service. Thought it might be a tourist hotel but turned out to be a good quality business hotel. Also it is attached to the Florida Mall so you have some distractions right on your doorstep. And a Starbucks in the lobby. What more do you need. I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, relaxing, great hotel ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: monaMiramar_Florida
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay in this hotel, i went especially for some R&R With my bestfriend. From the moment we entered the hotel lobby we felt welcome, Sigrid, the front desk attendant was very informative and pleasant, everyone was very attentive. The rooms are clean and spacious and rest was just awesome. The greatest thing about this hotel was; we did not have to leave the hotel if we did not want to, exit the lobby and walk right into the mall, yeah!! shop and shop, went back to the room rest and then more shopping. can't wait to go back!!

Reviews.Title: “Trust betrayed”
Reviews.Author: mickey35
Reviews.Content: My colleagues and I stayed at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center for a week on business. The majority of the hotel employees was friendly and performed their jobs with pride. However my college mistakenly left valuables in the lock safe inside the room which was opened after checkout. To make a long story short, allegedly the security employee claimed that the valuables were no longer there. Hummmmmmmmm......

Reviews.Title: “It was a good time thair”
Reviews.Author: 1setfd
Reviews.Content: First time going daytona speedway i wount four get whair i stayed frank cerrone

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Value, Location, Service, Accomodation and Quality”
Reviews.Author: Englishlaw
Reviews.Content: My title says it all. Stayed for eight nights. Being used to the highest standards of hotels and suites all over the world a standard room at this hotel did not disappoint. The staff really could not have been more professional, friendly and accomodating. It is fantastic for shopping and access to all sorts of other entertainment (including Theme Parks), restaurants and shops is easy. Could not recommend the hotel highly enough.. Will definitiely stay again on any future visit to Orlando. There are good reasons why this is so highly rated on Trip Advisor - they care.

Reviews.Title: “Race Travel”
Reviews.Author: Pinkatin
Reviews.Content: Our accommodations (room, etc.) were very good. Having access to the mall and local restaurants was great. Stayed at the hotel as part of our Daytona 500 NASCAR experience. Staff were very accommodating. The only recommendation I would make is having access to and from the airport. We searched the local telephone directory and ended up finding our own taxi but it would have been helpful to have recommendations or the service provided through the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “welcoming and good value for money”
Reviews.Author: laura9886
Reviews.Content: I thought the hotel was welcoming and friendly, with good attention to detail. The amenities are good however there is limited room service with not much variation of choice on the menu for healthy options, as much of the food in the food court in the mall is unhealthy, it would be nice to have a healthy choice of food for room service. The Pool area is clean and well kept, there are always enough towels which is great. The Mall is great to shop with an excellent location to the hotel, very handy. Service at the hotel has always been polite, i would recommend this hotel to a friend.

Reviews.Title: “air conditioning doesn't work in cool weather!”
Reviews.Author: wb6vic
Reviews.Content: ...and the windows don't open... The desk staff and maintenance staff explained that when the outside temperature drops below 55F, that the air conditioning cannot function. The maintance man inspected the room, and assured me that our "valve" was open but that the system produced no cold water when the outside temperature was too low. The room was somewhat too warm at night, but passable. During the day when it was clear and cool after a cold front, and there was full sun, the south facing room with the big picture window heated up like a greenhouse! The hallway was warmer, still. The desk staff were comfortably cool in the lobby. Apparently, the lobby a/c works, fine.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: corvet
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our first stay here on arrival in Orlando from the UK so much, that we later booked to return at the end of our visit to Florida. The room was large, on the corner of the 9th floor with 3 windows, very comfortable,, and with great facilities including large flat screen TV. The staff were very helpful and efficient in a friendly manner. As were the staff in Cricket's, the restaurant. The food was good and not expensive. On our return, we asked if it was possible to have the same room. It wasn't but they organised a similar one - "no problem". It is always reassuring to see airline staff using your hotel! Good hotel - good value.

Reviews.Title: “Standard busienss hotel”
Reviews.Author: MichiganSkip
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel is part of the Florida Mall complex. It is a clean, efficient, and comfortable choice away from the busy International Drive area. The hotel staff is very accomodating and offers effective assistance. This is a business hotel more than a tourist choice. There are ample services and restaurants in the immediate area. The large regional shopping mall (Simon) has a food court and several chain restaurants. As is too often the case with hotels of this sort, the restaurant was not particularly good. The wait staff was a little thin, the kitchen slow, and the food just OK. But this is Orlando, after all, so expectations are low to start with.

Reviews.Title: “fun fun”
Reviews.Author: mcarlson10
Reviews.Content: its a good time! lots to do! fun people, friendly and safe!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, convenient hotel; beware of hidden surcharges”
Reviews.Author: acoswano
Reviews.Content: Told at Front Desk there were no additional fees or charges. Yet, when we checked out there was an $11 a day plus tax surcharge added to our bill. Bathrooms need updating. Take all the bottled water you can get. You pay for it.

Reviews.Title: “Luxurious Stay”
Reviews.Author: FidzBeirut
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel is one of the best hotel i stayed in, the services were great and what i liked the most is that there is a Mall in there too.

Reviews.Title: “nice, clean, hotel”
Reviews.Author: maltaFlorida
Reviews.Content: my daughter and i stayed at this hotel for one night and we liked it. It is attached to the mall, starbucks in the lobby (a plus) and the beds were comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Very professional and convient”
Reviews.Author: buyurhouse
Reviews.Content: Joey was very helpful with bags coming and going. stayed with my wife until I checked in.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel and location”
Reviews.Author: porscheboxter
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here with family members twice once in 2005 and again in 2009. You cant beat the fact that its connected to the largest mall in central Florida. Nice rooms. Pretty clean and serice good too.

Reviews.Title: “The accomodations and staff make the Florida Hotel home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: steelergal16
Reviews.Content: From check in to check out, this hotel is simply a 5 star facility. The staff are so friendly and accomodating. Sigrid, at the front desk, was especially attentive. I brought my daughter and her friend to the hotel for my daughter's 15th birthday gift. She chooses this instead of a big party with lots of friends. She loves this hotel and we have made it our annual birthday celebration for her. We live in the Orlando area, but this is something so special for her. Having the Florida Mall at our disposal simply enhances the whole experience, as my daughter would rather shop more than anything else. We feel safe in your hotel, and well cared for. Thanks for an always wonderful experience!

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service at Its Best”
Reviews.Author: rdccard
Reviews.Content: During my stay at the hotel, I found the staff to be extremely helpful and courteous. The wait staff serving our meals was very professional and went out of their way to meet our needs (including getting pineapple juice when requested).

Reviews.Title: “Love this hotel and mall”
Reviews.Author: FLQueenBee
Reviews.Content: We were here for 4 days 3 nights for a beauty pageant and the hotel staff was always a great help with anything we needed. We needed a walk in clinic and they had all the info and a map how to get there. Our room was very comfortable and loved having a refrigerator in out room. The hotel is connected directly to Florida Mall so when we were done with the pageant we went shopping and eat at the food court. We cant wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel, where 'welcome' means 'welcome'.”
Reviews.Author: BobUniontown_PA
Reviews.Content: My recent visit was both business and pleasure and the staff and amenities at the Florida Hotel augmented both. The services were exactly what I needed and were administered with a generous attitude and a helpful smile. It was amazing to see people take the time to actually discern your problem and respond accordingly rather just use the band-aid approach. From Lila, the housekeeper to Eurina at the Grab & Go, I felt comfortable and content.... in other words....welcome. Thanks again and I'll be back. Bob DeBord

Reviews.Title: “Focus on receiving positive feedback detracts from the hotel”
Reviews.Author: alkylidyne
Reviews.Content: Decent hotel, nice rooms, flat screen tv, internet access, cable, etc. all included in the $11/day service charge. Non-front desk employees were great. Front desk not so much; seemed to be busy doing other things than helping customers. And it has been quite annoying that the hotel has solicited me twice, to post positive feedback about my stay. The employees also seemed to encourage positive reviews on the comment cards which wasn't annoying at the time. On the bright side, it means service is a priority but the I believe the hotel's methods for obtaining feedback need some work.
