If I wanted to post feedback I would have, hence the 3 overall but 4 in other categories.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, generous rooms”
Reviews.Author: LondonKazza
Reviews.Content: Used this hotel for a couple of nights at the beginning of our trip to get over jet lag and do a bit of shopping. The rooms are really nice, very comfortable beds and good sized bathroom. Good quality TV and internet services. The staff were nice and helpful. The on site bar/restaurant (Crickets?) was good. We had appetisers at the bar which were tasty and big portions. The hotel is literally attached to the Florida Mall, so not near much else without a car but fine for shopping. It was a 15-20 mins drive to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “From check in to departure 5 days later i never felt i needed to go anywhere else to find enjoyment.”
Reviews.Author: toofguy
Reviews.Content: From the first glance of the hotel arriving in the dark it looked really inviting . I loved being attached to the Florida Mall ,there was so much life and entertainment and all the amenities, like the apple store,a 2 story Starbucks in the center of the mall. I met so many new people there ,when i had time to lounge. When i return to Disney World for vacation this hotel is on top of my list of places to stay. My 4 girls might enjoy the mall while i relax with my wife in the spa??? Did i mention the 2 story Starbucks! Yes im from Seattle.

Reviews.Title: “Excecllent facility in a competitive market”
Reviews.Author: ColonelBangkok
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center was recommended to us through an event we were attending in Kissimee, FL. The hotel was modern, well-maintained and provided a safe and comfortable atmosphere. The rooms were large and well appointed. The bar/grill was top notch and competitively priced. The best feature of the hotel was the attitude of the staff. From the valets to the front desk to the F&B staff everyone had a smile, and a customer first approach to business. I would stay there again if I could get the same prices as this stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good package deal!”
Reviews.Author: SkySoldier
Reviews.Content: This was my 2nd week-long stay at the hotel for a conference. The staff was still as personable and responsive to needs as last time. The folks at the adjoining Starbucks and convenience store (and restaurants) were likewise friendly and customer service-oriented. The fitness center was more than adequate with several treadmills and circuit training equipment. Direct access to the adjoining mall and it's food court was a huge plus, and several restaurants were located in the mall or walking distance from the mall. Proximity to the airport was good. Great place, good vibe, with an international assortment mostly of foreign flight crews passing through. Other conferences were occurring simultaneously and the general clientele here seemed to be more upper scale (that's a good thing).

Reviews.Title: “A great experience - would definitely stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: pahredhead
Reviews.Content: Wonderful service, knowledgeable personnel, and adjoining the Florida Mall.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and location and value for money.”
Reviews.Author: aussieanneSweden
Reviews.Content: My family of 5 stayed here on Christmas day. We arrived in orlando around lunch time and could promtly check-in early. The reception staff were extremely friendly and efficient. Our room was modern, nice and clean and so was the bathroom ( I am extremely fussy). In the afternoon we went to downtown disney and Cirque de Soleil, a show not to be missed. Dinner at Planet Hollywood was not up to our expectations, very highly overrated. We had no problems getting to and from the hotel or finding our way around. The next morning we ate a hearty breakfast in the hotel bistro (a little expensive but great service) and then spent 6 hours in the mall!!!! My oldest daughter was standing at the mall doors when they opened at 7:30am! Best of all was that when my husband and son had tired of the mall they just went back to the hotel room and relaxed while we girls continued to shop in shopping paradise. The reception also allowed us to keep our room 2 hours longer and no extra charges. The starbucks in the lobby was also another major plus. We will absolutely return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Best of the best”
Reviews.Author: Thomsende
Reviews.Content: Would recommend this hotel and conference center to my closest professional collegues and personal family members. Great experience,!!!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic accommodations and service!”
Reviews.Author: wipeout202
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center is a great place to stay in Orlando. Great accommodations and awesome service are just two reasons why one should choose to stay here. The rooms are spacious, comfortable, and always clean. The food was outstanding as well. Not to mention the location. Since the hotel is connected to the Florida Mall, there is always something to do. It is also extremely close to many attractions such as Universal Studios and Walt Disney World and the city of Orlando. I cannot think of any reasons why you should not choose The Florida Hotel and Convention Center as your next destination area in Orlando, Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: 4JDAD
Reviews.Content: Great service, great location, great room. Plenty to do there. Everything you want to do is there or real close. Wife is a shopaholic and had her fun. Wish the spa was part of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Always There”
Reviews.Author: cwefla
Reviews.Content: I stay in many hotels through out the year and The Florida Hotel and Conference Center far exceeds my expectations everytime. It is one of the best conference centers that I stay. My wife loves to tag along for the shopping experience. Thanks again for a great meeting place

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: garridomadruga
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my stay and this is my favorite hotel in the USA which I come about twice a year from Brazil

Reviews.Title: “Great Service!”
Reviews.Author: julfrench71
Reviews.Content: My husband and I attended a conference at this hotel and were very pleased with the service we received. All the staff is extremely helpful and very friendly. We had wonderful meals with our conference - nice variety. But the best was the last night banquet! It was set up just like a wedding reception with white linen...even covering the chairs! The candlelight was the finishing touch! This is one of the nicest convention centers I've stayed at. I highly recommend it for your next convention! The attached mall is wonderful for shopping!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfortable, Safe”
Reviews.Author: HappyWanderer77
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center in Orlando, FL. The rooms are comfortable and clean, the amenities are nice (in-room fridge, easy to use safe), and the staff are very courteous, helpful, and friendly. I especially liked the availability of hand sanitizer stations throughout the facility, and the frequency with which the hotel cleans public areas such as restrooms.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for the money, clean, with great staff.”
Reviews.Author: kartmom151
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel on two different occasions, and both were great experiences. Our room was nice, clean and quite spacious for the great price we got. I love being attached to the mall, especially nice on a rainy day. The cricketter bar & lounge downstairs have great deals and a welcoming staff. Would stay again in a minute if we are in the area.

Reviews.Title: “The customer is always wrong here”
Reviews.Author: LovesDisneyworld
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the beautiful Florida Hotel on a Saturday evening and were greeted after about 5 minutes by a pleasant bellman. We went to our lovely room and went to sleep. My mother pointed out a suspicious brown spot on our bed and mentioned a foul smell on her bed she was sharing with my son. The next day, my son became ill with a stomach flu, to which we attributed to the filthy sheets on his bed. He missed one day at Disney costing me $50. Then my mother became ill and she is missing a day at a conference costing her $500! I expect to become ill and lose a day at the conference and Disney costing $600. When I approached both the front desk manager AND the general manager, my claims were dismissed by saying that the documentation of a maid checked out that the sheets were changed. I rarely complain, so I feel justified. Also, I own my business and I know employees falsify paperwork. Whatever happened to the customer is always right? I feel slighted and I am thoroughly disgusted. I would go just down the road to the Radisson at Sandlake, but I don't want to lose anymore money from this terrible situation.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, Beautiful, & Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: SCARDONNE87
Reviews.Content: This hotel is connected to the Florida Mall! It is very nice and close to everything. Its less than 10 min from Universal, there are plenty of restaurants to choose from, less than 5 min off the turnpike. Each room had a Lg flat screen tv and you can order some movies that are still in theaters on your tv! Awesome gym room with all equipment hooked up to a flat screen tv! For the price this hotel will definitly have my business for a long time to come.

Reviews.Title: “My wonderful stay at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center”
Reviews.Author: tmmurray
Reviews.Content: I atttended a Christmas Conference with Campus Outreach Ministries this past December which was hosted at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center. Everyone at the hotel was very helpful and the cleaning ladies were wonderful. I enjoyed my stay very much and was glad that all of the ammentities the hotel offered made me feel right at home, actually better than at home. The mall is connected right to the lobby of the hotel which made everything convenient. If I go back to Orlando I will definitely consider it my top choice.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, perfect for shopping!”
Reviews.Author: Malousweden
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in! the mall wich makes it so easy to drop of the bags in the room and continue shopping! Just by the entrance there is a nail and day spa who makes GREAT manucure and pedicurees, they are very nice too. We got the best service from the desk personell at the hotel, they recomended Charleys steakhouse. It was so good, that I cannot find the words..! It will be the firtst resturant I visit next time! Also the italian reestautant inside the mall was fantastic!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice”
Reviews.Author: uwspheath
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased with the room and amenities. The best part was the excellent value for the great quality.

Reviews.Title: “Want a great place to stay?”
Reviews.Author: legaleye
Reviews.Content: My family and I have stayed at this hotel many times and we keep going back. The rooms are very comfortable. My husband and I alway get the deluxe king as I like having a sofa to set on and nice table and chairs. The hotel is very quiet and the service is always excellent. Very easy to get to all the local attrations and some excellent resturants close by. My family likes it the most because it is connect to Florida Mall one of the largest and nicest in the state. I have to go to Orlando a number of times each year and we alway stay at this hotel. Try this hotel and you will alway go back when you come to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel with mall access”
Reviews.Author: JX1
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel for the week of Christmas and I was very satisfied with the service I received. I booked for $69 a night which is very reasonable for a 4 star hotel. The staff was very friendly and I was able to do an early check in with no problems. I highly recommend this property and if you can get a deal, donâ€™t hesitate to book it while the rooms are available.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: poohlova08
Reviews.Content: The staff are very nice and makes sure you stay is fine and dandy. Not one rude employee at all. I highly recommend this hotel to any and everybody.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: VApeople
Reviews.Content: We stayed over Christmas and had a great experience! The rooms are larger than average and spotless. Love the flat screen TV's. Staff is super nice and friendly. Disney parks are an easy 20 minute drive. Being connected to the Mall is very convenient for shopping and eating. You must have a room key card to get to your room floor - so no worries about people wandering in from the mall. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “shop, eat, drink, work out and sleep!”
Reviews.Author: DJDTP
Reviews.Content: Girls weekend in Orlando. Did lots of Christmas shopping. LOVE that the hotel opens up into the Florida Mall. Brought wrapping paper and went up to the room after a few hours of shopping and wrapped gifts! Went out to dinner and then back to the hotel bar. Great drinks and bartender! Great room, great sleeping! Got up had Starbucks (right in hotel lobby!), worked out,(great new, big gym in lobby!) shopped more, wrapped again and then checked out. PERFECT! We'll do it again next December...but stay more then one night!

Reviews.Title: “Great for Business or Pleasure Getaway”
Reviews.Author: tripsfun
Reviews.Content: We've been to this hotel twice for a mom-daughter bonding/shop-til-you-drop weekend. The hotel staff is very friendly. Florida Mall Hotel is always neat and well run. It offers great package deals (be sure to sign up on their email list for last-minute specials). Unlike most hotels in the area, this hotel is well built and the rooms offer privacy, peace, and quiet. We never hear our neighbors. The staff members are courteous and always go out of their way to help you. The mall is great fun and offers an eclectic blend of stores. Be sure to ask for a coupon book at guest services--great deals in there. The hotel bar/restaurant has great specials--like 2 for 1 drinks and appetizers--much cheaper and far more enjoyable than eating in the food court. Several conferences going on each time we stayed--the patrons were all very happy with the conference amenities too. We'd definitely go again for business or pleasure

Reviews.Title: “very good”
Reviews.Author: BrazilDeki
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very comfortable, clean, and clear. Near from everything we needed.

Reviews.Title: “great oportunity”
Reviews.Author: cmtemarco
Reviews.Content: Good location great breakfast very clean kind and polite peolple

Reviews.Title: “A hotel that makes you feel at home from the time you enter until the time you leave.”
Reviews.Author: adultstemcellwealth
Reviews.Content: From the moment I arrived, and was greeted at the door, the service was genuine. The people at the front desk to the waiter at the restaurant-Said Benhddou gave impeccable service with a smile.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel and great location!”
Reviews.Author: yesaccasey
Reviews.Content: Right in the mall. Food court is really close. Also, close to Mall at Millenia.

Reviews.Title: “The Hotel service is amazing”
Reviews.Author: khernandez
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff was always attentive of our needs and they made sure all of them were met.

Reviews.Title: “lovin it”
Reviews.Author: mattwarddublin
Reviews.Content: Had a fantasic time in this hotel ,location was brill and the service was excellent , crickets bar and dinner was great value the best i have seen. Its my sixth time to Orlando and this was by far the best experience i've had, Ideal location for shoppers but also has all the facilaties you need for your relaxing holiday needs, i must thank all the staff in crickets and the star bucks cafe for a lovely welcome every time we went in for beers and coffee " and no we are not with the airline lol" This Hotel is not on idrive but must say all you need is right here once again thanks for a fanastic time and look forward to returning some day soon all the best from matthew ward dublin ireland

Reviews.Title: “Delightful Location and Staff”
Reviews.Author: DonnaDoJerseyShore
Reviews.Content: I was in town for a convention and didn't want to stay at the convention hotel as it was pricey. Instead of sharing with colleagues, my husband was traveling with me. My colleagues at WOMEN Unlimited recommended the Florida Hotel and Conference Center in Orlando. It's located adjacent to a Mall so my husband could have eateries and could walk around while I was conferencing. Too bad it rained the whole time we were there because it is conveniently located to Disney, Kennedy Space Center and TONS of golf courses. It's a reasonable alternative in a pleasant area.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Port St Mary, Isle of Man
Reviews.Title: “Gone downmarket”
Reviews.Author: capt16841
Reviews.Content: The staff at this hotel, whether at reception, in Crickets Bar, at breakfast or in the evening, are amongst some of the friendliest and courtious I have ever met. The rooms are always kept spotlessly clean. However, the choice of fruits at breakfast has dwindled down to almost nothing, and the fact that the area for the breakfast buffet has been pushed into a side room, where it gets crowded if there are are more than 3 guests inside undermines the good work that the long-suffering staff manage to achieve. Also, the bathrooms, although clean, have had all soap and shampoo removed, to be replaced with one dispenser over the bathtub. As there isn't even a small bar of soap to wash your hands with, you get the impression that this is a cut too far! The hotel management, when told of this, state that it is their way of helping reduce waste and helping the environment. However, those of us who used to stay there as of choice will only stay there now because someone else (our employers) are paying.

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful Experience”
Reviews.Author: GalsTrip
Reviews.Content: We choose to stay at the Florida Hotel for the convienience to the Florida Mall. We did not know it was attached TO the Mall. We traveled over the Thanksgiving weekend to take advantage of the super sales at the mall, but found the expereince at the Hotel was much more the center of the trip. We arrived later Thanksgiving evening and chose a late dinner at the Cricket Resturant and Lounge. We were served at deliciuos meal quite promptly and had outstanding service from the wait staff and bartenders. We met other guest while dining and ended up spending a fun filled time w/ them at the lounge until early the next morning. We enjoyed a very clean, spacious, well appointed room and bath room. Our beds were comfortable and room temperature perfect. We were distracted in the early morning by other guest from neighboring rooms leaving early, but that was the only flaw, no faulf of the hotel. We stayed a total of two nights and dined at the Cricket a second time and enjoyed that dinner equally as well. The waitress was so kind and considerate, making us feel like family or old frinds who had come in town for a visit, suggesting places of interest that may make our visit more enjoyable and it did. I enjoyed the internet service provided in the room as well as the internet cafe outside of the lobby. The amenities were too numerous to mention and could not enjoy all that was provided in the short time of our trip. I will definitely stay at the Hotel again and suggest it to friends and family who may be traveling to the Orlando area. It was very convienient to all the attractions as well. The stay at your facility was the crowning touch to our fun filled shopping spree in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience!”
Reviews.Author: kfloy002
Reviews.Content: Everyone at this hotel is VERY nice and helpful. It is a beautiful place to stay! We had a wonderful time staying here. I recommend this hotel to everyone making a trip to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent overnight stay pre-cruise”
Reviews.Author: Roots10
Reviews.Content: My son and I stayed here for one night prior to leaving on a cruise. It was the least expensive choice of the hotels the cruise line offered, so I wasn't expecting too much. I was pleasantly surprised. The hotel was located very close to the Orlando airport, we registered quickly ( and received several very tasty cookies during registration) assisted by a very friendly and informative desk clerk, Kevin. The hotel lobby is connected to a shopping mall, so after leaving our luggage in our room, we visited the food court for dinner and looked in a few stores. There was also a restaurant at the hotel that we decided not to try, but the menu seemed to offer several nice choices for dinner. Our room was comfortable, clean and decently sized. We checked out early the next morning, so I can not comment on a lot of the amenities of this hotel, but I thought it was an extremely nice place to stay during my limited time there, and would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “This is the place to stay to get away!”
Reviews.Author: GateFan
Reviews.Content: Awesome hotel, great service, gorgeous rooms & bathrooms (I'm very picky about bathrooms), a Starbucks...and attached to a mall with an enormous food court and plenty of shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Thanksgiving Stay at Florida Hotel”
Reviews.Author: DuaneT
Reviews.Content: I travel to Florida 3 or 4 times a year on business and ususally once for Vacation. Over this past Thanksgiving day weekend, we stayed at the Florida Mall Hotel. I've stayed here at at least once year and decided to write this review. It has remained a good hotel although I would say it was a great 1st class hotel 5+years ago. Since the hurricane season of 2004 and 2005, it maintained a great staff, hotel rooms were in tip top shape. So when we checked on Thanksgiving eve, I was suprised to find the few minor changes they made to cut costs, were obviously tied to the lowest prices I've ever paid to stay here....I'll blame that on the recession. But I wouldn't rate it "plush" at this time. The hotel is in a great location. 1. Close to the Airport. I don't need to make a mad dash through the maze of freeways, tollroads, and surface streets that I normally have to map on paper or on my navigator to make sure I don't get lost. 2. Connected to the Florida Mall. The Florida Mall is very upscale and I've seen it through it's renovations over the years that made it better and better. The food court has a nice variety and you can always find great restaurants next to the mall or across the street. 3. Proximity to all Resorts. I actually clocked my driving time from the Hotel. It was actually faster for me to drive to Walt Disney World Epcot and Magic Kingdom from the Florida Mall hotel as compared to staying at one of the downtown Disney resorts and driving through all the stop lights. Likewise, returning to the mall, even on Black Friday (day after Thanksgiving) was a breeze and I even ended up finding a packing stall next to the hotel entrance). Areas of Improvement: 1. Bathroom toilet was very slow to flush. Room smelled a a littly musty....it was like that after the hurricanes hit in 2004-2005, but there were no hurricanes that hit orlando this year. 2. Condiments. I used to love collecting the soap/shampoo, but they've gone "green" and decided to install a shower dispenser. I did ask the maid if I could get a bar of soap which she did provide each day of my stay. SUMMARY The staff was friendly and courteus, and we got a nice room. We had some noisy neighbors/kids the first night, but I don't blame the hotel on that point. But I will continue to plan and stay at this hotel. It's away from the hustle and bustle of the resorts yet it has easy/fast access to all tourist locations.

Reviews.Title: “5th stay & it just keeps better every year”
Reviews.Author: lshuster
Reviews.Content: I attend a yearly conference at the hotel every year. The front desk staff were just awesome & funny. The room itself was spotless & smelled clean. I love the shampoo & soap dispensers in the shower, why don't other hotels do that? Of course the conference rooms are well maintained & the location just can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: “IT WAS A VERY NICE STAY WITHIN AN EXPECTATION”
Reviews.Author: dcspiloto
Reviews.Content: Everyone are friendly and prepared to host world citizens. I'd like you have different values for us and our family on hollidays.

Reviews.Title: “review of the Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Guest51509
Reviews.Content: I appreciate the stay and the environment of the Hotel. Staff are very kind and eager to help. Because it is close to the mall it facilitate shopping thus save taxi fees and other subsequent charges. The room service is timely done and those doing the room service are of high integrity.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Ruby_RedDog
Reviews.Content: My first encounter was with the valet/bellman, who knew how to unlock the trunk of my rental car. Every employee with whom I had contact was far above average in courtesy, friendliness, and willingness to be of assistance. The room was handicapped accessible for my sister, who noted the shower/bath was the first in many hotels that actually suited her needs. It was clean, comfortable, and provided everything we needed. Our conference room was well kept, and the room temperature actually was comfortable for the entire time of use. The room rates for what was provided were competitive. The in-hotel grill had excellent prices, and the food was superb. Our breakfast omelets were made on the spot at the buffet and were delicious. This hotel is a perfect choice for either the single traveler or a family. It rates at the top of my list, and I'll stay there again when in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Luxury at an affordable price.”
Reviews.Author: David_7397
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel. Great location at the Florida Mall with Starbucks right in the lobby and great shopping in the mall. Beautiful decor both in the hotel lobby and in the room. All of the staff were extremely courteous and helpful...including the valet parking atendants I had contact with. The only negative I found, was a dirty glass in my room with what appeared to be dried orange juice pulp inside that perhaps didn't come off in the dishwasher. Otherwise everything else was perfect. I was especially fond of the security of having to use a room key (card) on the elevator to get to your respective floor.

Reviews.Title: “9th Visit”
Reviews.Author: TinaPalmer
Reviews.Content: This November was our second visit for the year and our ninth in the last 7 years. We live in the Caribbean and often come to Florida to shop and relax, and Florida Mall has become a favourite of my whole family as it appeals to everyone. The girls can shop 'til we drop, the guys can shop at will, then either go to the bar or the room to relax, there is a fabulous gym to work off the food you will eat! It is great to have not only the mall literally at the doorstep, but there are so many restaurants and shops in the outlying area around the mall that you could literally get there and not have to leave. The proximity to Orlando Airport is great as well as it is literally ten minutes away for the reluctant flight home. in nine visits we have never once been disappointed by either the staff or the hotel, I cannot reccomend it enough.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and the best location for shopping!”
Reviews.Author: curlywilts
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel many times with work, the staff are always fantastic and the location is great for shopping and resturants. Always look forward to returning to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional, responsive service;comfortable, convenient, user friendly.”
Reviews.Author: GretaGirl00
Reviews.Content: I attended a five day professional onference and was made to feel Welcome and comfortable.. Breakfast , lunch or dinner at the Grill was a pleasant experience: Good food, quick service and reasonable prices. The hotel staff were responsive and room service was courteous and efficient. I have been referring family and friends to stay at this hotel. I also enjoyed time in the International Mall. Altogether, I plan to go back to this hotel for pleasure. Thank you for a memorable conference. Ms. Elser

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Review from Operations / Logistical Planner”
Reviews.Author: PlanningManager
Reviews.Content: I am the Operations Manager for a large and successful training organization and I coordinate all of our travel events. The Florida Hotel is one of my favorite places to book our training sessions as the staff is outstanding! They are extremely accommodating and always helpful! The location is excellent as our client's are able to fly into Orlando International Airport and taxi to the hotel and not have to worry about needing a car once they get to the hotel. Everything is centrally located and having the Florida Mall adjoined to the hotel is an added bonus! I would highly recommend this hotel for any event!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous!!!”
Reviews.Author: mayradr3
Reviews.Content: Unlike my other experiences in the Orlando area whether I have found personnel to be rude and uninformed, my stay at the hotel was impressive. The cleanliness (I am a stickler for that), the appearance, the attention and the professionalism. I would definitely recommend my family, friends and business associates to stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great conference center and attached to the Florida Mall.”
Reviews.Author: GatorGirl64
Reviews.Content: The service at the hotel was very professional and I had nothing but positive experiences with the staff. The room was comfortable and clean. The hotel has a great location (near the airport) and is attached to the Florida Mall, which allows you to shop and eat without ever driving off the property. There are many upscale shops and good places to eat, including a nice breakfast buffet in the hotel's restaurant. I enjoyed my stay and would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a reasonably priced, clean place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Business Atmosphere and Great Shopping”
Reviews.Author: FeeInFlorida
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed my business trip to the Orlando and The Florida Hotel and Conference Center. To start with, second business trip at The Florida Hotel. The first time was great, as well as this time. Great atmosphere, the people are great, and the mall is great. Had a great time working, dining, shopping, swimming, exercising, etc. Everything was perfect - No complaints!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Smooth Sailing in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: CoolCarter
Reviews.Content: A week long training experience with superior service. No Problems, and complete training and guest accomodation by all the hotel staff. We were all treated like family and made to feel right at home. The rooms were clean and maintained and the hotel attache d to the Florida Mall is a shoppers delight. Area restauraunts are close, accessible and provided the desired fare that anyone might like. I thank all the staff for making our meetingsa very pleasant travel , work, experience.

Reviews.Title: “I will stay here again”
Reviews.Author: worlandj
Reviews.Content: Service was top notch and the rooms were clean and very comfortable. Next time I am in Orlando I will definitelty plan on staying here.

Reviews.Title: “This uplifting venue met all my personal and business needs - and more!”
Reviews.Author: TORRIQueensland
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center provided a "breath of fresh air" in contrast to so many other experiences I have had around the world during my long professional career. Everything I needed was right there, either in the hotel or in the adjoining, upscale shopping mall. There were in-room amenities that I value, such as Internet connection, hair drier and extendable make-up mirror in the bathroom, iron and ironing board (for those creases in linen we women love to wear), and an easy-to-use entertainment center for after-meeting opportunities to kick off shoes and relax on a lovely, firm queen bed - with good-quality pillows!. I particularly wish to cite the friendliness, trustworthiness and professionalism of staff. They individually applied resourcefulness in response to my specific information requests and personal needs. Without exception, they seemed to genuinely enjoy helping out a traveller from Australia (me). I confess that I made that very scary mistake of leaving a major credit card in the room in my hurry to check out and make connections. I rang the Florida Hotel on a Friday night and was immediately transferred to "Luz" in the Security Department. She reassured me my card had been found and turned in. She then followed my instructions precisely to ensure I received my credit card in a very secure manner at my next destination. It "worked a treat" as Aussies say! I love this hotel and can recommend it unconditionally. There is a beautiful spirit in that place, and I am going to return one day to give them all a big, thankful hug. Torri Tringa

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: petraosb
Reviews.Content: I had a Art teacher conference that was held at the hotel and could not have been more satisfied. The first night my room was warm, I called the front desk the next morning and asked for help. Within ten minutes there was a knowck on my door and the service man replaced the motor. Great service and a clean comfortable room. Being attatched to the mall was an add bonus!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good location, easy to find and nice people working there”
Reviews.Author: Kerstin-01
Reviews.Content: Nice rooms, always clean and tidy. King size or two queen size beds, and bottled water waiting for us. The service is excellent, personal in their gift even recognized us from last years visit.

Reviews.Title: “Fl Art Ed Conf 2009”
Reviews.Author: kjonz
Reviews.Content: As in the past years the Florida Hotel was a wonderful place to stay. All of the employees are quite nice & and my fellow art teachers and I really enjoyed our visit . The room we presented our workshop in was great !!! Kudos to all !

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT Service! Location attached to a major Mall, One of the best locations for ANY Conference!”
Reviews.Author: KCravens
Reviews.Content: The absolute best place to stay because you have a seamless connection to an Incredible Mall with a GREAT food Court and Sit down restaurants, VERY Economical because you donâ€™t have to ever leave the Hotel and no need to get a rental car! Rooms can be pricey if you donâ€™t get a group rate but it is a NICE hotel with nice rooms COMFY BEDS with nice quality linen and EXCELLENT SERVICE all the way around...Suites are nice with upstairs and downstairs...hotel Security...HELPFUL and AWESOME...I liked that you cant use elevator to go to rooms unless you have a room key. Very Clear signage for finding your way during your conference. Conference rooms were average one larger ballroom had a somewhat musty smell and needed to have the lighting and ceiling dusted. For the most Part itâ€™s a quick easy fix that I am sure they will address. Shuttle service...I could go on but I think you get the picture, I hope this is where we have our early convention from now on! I am recommending to my school and military organizations!

Reviews.Title: “we loved this hotel”
Reviews.Author: PoorKia
Reviews.Content: Incredible value, incredible staff, incredible gym/fitness centre. Adjoins the Florida mall with places to eat and shop. Lovely bar. Spacious comfortable rooms. Loved it. Not nextdoor to any of the Orlando theme parks, but with car all are reasonably close. Bus stop nearby too, which services them all for only a dollar per trip! Look at the Lynx website. If you have booked this hotel then look forward to it. There is no way that you will get better value in Orlando than what you get here

Reviews.Title: “It feels like home”
Reviews.Author: tamSaoPaulo
Reviews.Content: Very nice experience staying at the hotel, in all the ways...

Reviews.Title: “Excellent and Helpful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Adjel1
Reviews.Content: Very helpful staff went out of their way when my reservation appeared to be lost. They helped me stay calm and gave me great advice and service. The location of the hotel -- inside a mall -- is unique to me, and very helpful at keeping a young teenaged daughter entertained.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel but cool ...”
Reviews.Author: JLIParis
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel, but Air conditionning to cold in facilities (I caught a cold) with respect to the external temperature in September Security measures in using lifts are too constraining: as soon as there are 3 people or more living at different levels, it is impossible to program the lift with different keys !

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding customer service!”
Reviews.Author: CutlassOne
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center in Orlando. Mine was a business trip. The hotel location adjacent to the Florida Mall is very convenient. The rooms are large and the hotel has a restaurant, quick-shop, and a Starbucks inside. But the thing I was most impressed by was the customer service. I needed help with some business documentation and both the front desk and catering center staff were eager to help me. It was memorable because they actually seemed happy to help. The front desk staff were remarkably friendly and very happy to answer questions. I even found the cleaning staff to be uniquely friendly and happy to be of service. I am looking forward to visiting again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, will defenitely stay again”
Reviews.Author: patou552
Reviews.Content: The hotel/conference center is adjacent/connected to a large shopping center so all you need is right there. The conference and catering is excellent and the staff very accommodating. The room was very nice, recently updated and clean. There is a non-optional $11 charge which cover internet, training facility and a couple of water bottle a day. Overall a nice week long stay.

Reviews.Title: “Few problems, basically good”
Reviews.Author: MtB3366
Reviews.Content: The rooms are nice, although there are issues with getting the temperature in your room right. Theories are that they cut the air when you're not in the room (motion sensors). I did have an issue with the "tub" (handicap accessible room) where is leaked on the floor. Although I asked twice about it, nothing was done to correct it. The location is very convenient, I did not have to go outside if I did not want to. Our conference was held there, there is a mall attached and there is a Starbucks and a bar on the main floor. With our negotiated conference fee, the $14 a day "convenience fee" was waived. This fee is for 2 bottles of water in your room every day and basic amenities that should be included anyway. VERY expensive to have a conference there. 30 bottles of water and 30 cans of soda with 12 dozen cookies was $600 - hard to keep a conference fee down with charges like that. The staff was VERY nice - from front desk to housekeeping to valet parking. Self parking is available and easy to get to. There are several restaurants close by - one even walking distance. It has quick access to the Bee Line parkway (528) - if you follow the signs carefully it is simple to get there. All in all the biggest benefit was having the conference there and having the mall attached.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel + Shopping Mall”
Reviews.Author: Sliema8
Reviews.Content: WE booked this hotel for a night before boarding our cruise. I told them it was our honeymoon so they gave us a big sized room with a very big bed on the 11th Floor with a landscape view. Room was very nice and airy. Very nice and clean Bathroom and good size lcd tv. If you're into shopping, it's perfect as the florida mall is within this hotel so you could buy stuff and go to place them into your room and then go back to continue your shopping. There is an additional 12 dollar or euro when you check in apart from the price you paid online. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for shopping”
Reviews.Author: austriasolotraveller
Reviews.Content: It was the third time I stayed in this hotel as a solo traveler. I enjoyed the sun (poolside), the new fitness center (very large and good equipment) and the shopping! Hotel is connected to the mall, stuff is friendly, starbucks is located in the lobby. Its perfect for a little vacation and selfendulgement or with friends or family. I will definately come again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel for conference meetings, close to airport, convenient to shopping”
Reviews.Author: tripper10101
Reviews.Content: Roomy and airy spaces, good breakfast and very nice well kept rooms. One discontent is the American way to set the aircondition to arctic temperatures, actually not in sync with the requestnote in the room to save the environment by conserving energy in mentioning only 3 sheet changes a week .

Reviews.Title: “Good location, room was small, no frills, and dated, great staff, would stay again short term”
Reviews.Author: aufan4ever
Reviews.Content: This hotel is alright, the room was a little dated and small for a long term stay, but the staff was great, the Cricket restaurant was great and being connected to the Mall was nice. Pros: LCD TV was nice with in-room movies, bed was good, location was great close enough to attractions and connected to the mall, the Cricket restaurant was great ate there multiple times, staff was friendly, very nice fitness center and pool, and great business facilities Cons: No balcony, limited views, small rooms, needs updating, room had an odor, shower needed a lot of work, internet connection was bad, parking was challenging, only had one small bar/restaurant casual with no nice restaurant

Reviews.Title: “Satisfied !”
Reviews.Author: AnjoMoycano
Reviews.Content: I'm glad to write this, 'cos the accomodations are very nice and fine and everything's that I requested was done ! Congratulations I'm very satisfeid about the all commoties.

Reviews.Title: “A business oriented hotel with an attached mall for shopping”
Reviews.Author: sherlock100n
Reviews.Content: The hotel is attached to the Florida Mall which is quite large with a number of high end shops as well as the usual mall stores. The hotel has a number of meeting spaces, both large and small. Support staff seems willing to help when called upon. I was not directly involved with arrangements, but second hand info was favorable. hotel rooms are pretty standard. Ethernet access in the rooms is free, but wireless is an additional charge, but wireless is free in lobby and some other areas (but not the conference rooms - extra charge there). The only restaurant in the hotel is the Crickets Bar and Grill which does offer a breakfast buffet (for a fee) as well as items for lunch and dinner. Menu is pretty limited, but there are a lot of fast food places in the food court at the mall. (all the food court places seem to offer the same teriyaki chicken under a variety of names!). One other note: HBO, Cinemax or other premium movie channels are not avaiable in the rooms. The usual pay-per-view are! If a Motel 6 can have HBO why not this hotel? Our conference had catered breakfast buffet outside the conference room which was generally pretty good with some interesting choices other than danish and muffins usually found at these things. On one occasion, the coffee tasted burnt and the food ran out on another. Our conference did not have a catered lunch or dinner so I cannot comment about that. Although the hotel is reasonably close to the airport (it is heavily used by airline pilots and flight attendents), there is no free shuttle. RT shuttle is $28. There are no tourist attractions within walking distance so a car or cab is necessary. The pool and outdoor jacuzzi were well maintained, but limited to daylight hours. The fitness center is open 24/7 and has the usual assortment of equipment.

Reviews.Title: “The entire hotel employees treat you as if you are their most valued customer!”
Reviews.Author: baccarter
Reviews.Content: This hotel makes you want to come back, for the way they make everyone feel, as others expressed to me, is that they go above and beyond to make you feel at home, even though you are not.

Reviews.Title: “It is so enjoyable staying here.”
Reviews.Author: grace1972
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for 4 nights. Everyone was super nice and professional. Our room was very comfortable. We were close to everywhere we wanted to go. We enjoyed using the entrance to the Mall and Starbucks. One night we used the Vallet service. Everything and Everyone was wonderful. The bed was the best. Leaving was the worst.

Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel- fab location, fab rooms, fab staff!”
Reviews.Author: enielle
Reviews.Content: It seems like there are a lot of negative reviews of this hotel and I don't know why- stayed there two nights in september this year and loved it. The rooms are large and comfy with big tvs and nice bathrooms, and with it being right on the mall there is so many options to eat, drink and shop! There is also a very nice pool, weather permitting, as it is outside! I heard there is also a very nice gym which I did not visit. A colleague had some trouble with no bottled water being supplied in her room but this was easily resolved by the reception staff. While there we also asked the staff for some details regarding local bus services, and they have a useful print-out showing you the bus routes to get to all the local attractions. The reception staff were very helpful indeed about this. High speed wireless is also available for free in the lobby which was great. Ordered room service while there and it was very nice, well presented and tasty. They also followed it up with a call to check everything was okay which was nice. The only annoying thing about this hotel is the staff constantley asking you to fill out feedback cards about them! We were only there 2 nights and ended up doing about 8 or 10 of them! Apart from that i loved this hotel and it's easy access to the mall, stay there!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Accomodations and Staff”
Reviews.Author: woody160
Reviews.Content: I am very particular about where I stay. Hotels need to be clean and comfortable in order for me to even be able to think about staying at them. I had never stayed at the Florida Hotel and Conference Centre before but would definitely stay again. My daughter and I went for a 4 day get - a - way and shopping trip and we enjoyed every moment. The staff are the most curteous of any hotel I have stayed in throughout North America and the Caribbean. The accomodations were top notch and every request we had was met with speed of service and a smile. Congratulations to the staff and management on a job well done. We will be back

Reviews.Title: “Another enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: johngant
Reviews.Content: This was a repeat stay and we were not disappointed. This as a large hotel, but the staff still manages a personal service. All the staff are polite and helpful, rooms are spacious and well kept and excellent value. This is our choice hotel when staying in Orlando. This hotel epitomises the old adage, â€œ Good service is easy - employ nice peopleâ€�.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, clean, efficient and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Diversion2
Reviews.Content: Excellent location for shopping and for places like Wet and Wild. Rooms are clean and spacious, Crickets Bar offers good deals on bar food and draught drinks and house wine. Smack bang on the entrance to the Florida Mall. You can fall out of bed straight to the shops. Target is nearby. Internet can be a bit sporadic at times but it's free so ok.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Slimone
Reviews.Content: The room was clean, with lotsof space, quiet and family friendly. Priced great worth the money .

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: Rockee1
Reviews.Content: This was the 3rd time we stayed here so obviously they are doing something right. Not only my immediate family of three, however, my parents, sister/husband, brother/wife, I could go on and on. I'm amazed with the fact that even with the big groups they cater too, they still treat you as if you are the only family staying with them, as if everyone else doesn't exist. There is no way, shape or form you can complain about the location...helloooo you're already in the Mall:) If there was one complaint, it would be the parking situation, but with the service you get, you forget all about it! Yes, we will definitely be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Just Perfect”
Reviews.Author: IsraelAraujo
Reviews.Content: For sure, the best of Orlando. Very nice surprise. The staff very helpful, the check in took less than 4 minutes, the location couldn't be better. I did stay for 7 days and me, my wife and my sister in law. We all recomend this place to all kinds of travelers!

Reviews.Title: “Novelty Hotel. Okay, but overrated.”
Reviews.Author: donaldrees
Reviews.Content: In no way does this hotel deserve to be #3. There is nothing wrong with it, but that doesn't meant it deserves to surpass the ratings of over 300 other hotels in Orlando. Yes, it's neat that the mall is right there. But the room is a plain Florida room. Look at pictures. Nothing exceptional. In fact, many things that aren't even really okay. Bathroom amenities are a joke and substandard, bathroom itself needs a redo. The room was small, particularly for Florida where space is usually not an issue. Customer service was pleasant. The coffee pot in our room was broken and the way they've installed the new flay screen tv's is downright lazy. (take a look behind the screens to see what I mean). No balcony and the windows don't open. Gym was very nice. I just can't see this as #3 when the hyatt at Orlando airport, portofino bay at universal and all of Dineys resorts are vastly superior, even at their higher cost. Stay somewhere else, somewhere special - and rent a car to shop.

Reviews.Title: “A very enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: Doctor57
Reviews.Content: I travel a great deal for business and stay at a number of hotels. I try to stay at chains that I am comfortable with and where I know the rooms will be clean and comfortable. So when I travel on leisure with my dear wife, I have definite requirements. Our recent stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center was an excellent experience. This was our first visit and from this visit I know we will stay again when in the Orlando area. Right from the Bell Hop assisting to unload our vehicle and bringing it to the room, to the final check-out, everyone associated at the hotel was courteous, helpful, and generally friendly. When we ordered Room Service, we were told it would be delivered in 30 minutes and yet, in 15 minutes there is was nice and hot in our room. Outstanding service. I would definitely recommend the Florida Hotel to business and leisure travelers alike. Sincerely, Dr. Dale Fielders

Reviews.Title: “A Great Value Hotel :)”
Reviews.Author: Torbjoern
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 18 nights at this hotel in august 2009. It was an enjoyable stay :) A very nice hotel with great and kind staff. The location is very good. Not far from the different parks (disney, seaworld etc...) and the hotel it self is connected to the Florida Mall :) One great feature for the folks who stay there longer than a couple of days is that you get a decently sized Frigde to keep your stuff inn :) Its also a small freezer there. Our room was spacous and really nice. The bathroom looked nice and there was a 32" LCD tv on the wall :) One thing we really liked was the car service the hotel had :) A company called VIP Inc. drove the customers around in nice luxury sedans and vans :) The prices was about the same as a normal taxi but the QUALITY was that of another world :) We used this service all the time and got to know a really nice and friendly driver called Carlos :) He had a lot a great tips about eating and shops :) Some recommondations: Shopping: The mall is quite expensive compared to the different "Outlets" you`ll find in the area. There are mainly two places for "Outlets" - You have the Prime 1 Outlets at the North of the Int. Drive and there is also a place at the far South of the Int Drive - think the last was called Premium Outlets. Both places you have outlets for most major brands and they do GREAT prices, This reminded me of something we call factory sales here in Norway. My girlfriend was in heaven anyway and managed to buy clothes to fill TWO suitcases ;) For eating there is LOTS of places to go. In the mall you have the food court for simple junk food. >But there is also some resturants. Its an American diner style place called Ruby Tuesday witch have the BEST burgers we`ve ever tasted :) We also have a pizza place (California Pizza kitchen) and an Italian place. Both the pizza place and italian is quite good but our favourite is Ruby Tuesday :) They are located next to the main entrance to the mall :) For breakfast we can recommend going to the bagle place called Panera. Its located in walking distance from the mall. When you are at the main entrance just go straight forward and on the other side of the road you`ll find Panera. They have freshly baked bagels every day and they serve typical breakfast/lunch dishes. Good prices and nice food. Highly Recommended. Eating breakfast on the hotel is kinda a waste. At first we wondered about why the breakfast venue was so small. But its because noone eats there ;) Its pricey (think it was 15-20 dollar pr person) and the selection is not impressive. Nice service though. Go to Panera instead. For the longer stays go to Publix (high end grocery store) and buy food :) Its great for filling up the frigde with drinks and simple foods :) General tip: Orlando is HOT with HIGH humidity. Remember to bring lots of "non-warm" clothes. I actually brought a ton a long sleeve shirts witch was no point at all ;) To quote Carlos our driver " When it got cold once I had to search my entire closet to find a jacket. " ;-) Enjoy your stay :)

Reviews.Title: “The Greatest Hotel Ever”
Reviews.Author: regiluswedding
Reviews.Content: I would like to say that by far Florida Hotel was the greatest I've ever had the pleasure to stay in. My wedding day/night was enhanced by the wonderful staff beginning with the catering Manager (Jessica Perez and her banquet Captain, and even the server (Alex) was top notch. If i had a personal choice this hotel would be the only place i would stay when ever visiting Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel, for conference and business”
Reviews.Author: aioceres
Reviews.Content: I went to the Starburcks at the Florida Hotel, There is one Employee did a excellent job to us with a smile there was a long line she get every body out so qauick. her tag name was Alherte Hyppolite since that morning she keep me comback at the place me and my collegue she's a plus for the Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Will go again”
Reviews.Author: POOLSBEACH
Reviews.Content: Was going on a cruise with sisters... i flew in a day early took a taxi to the hotel checked in and shopped for a swimsuit and found one i love and more.... I will go back again. It was so nice to shop and put things back in the room, rest and go again. Would be perfect for Christmas shopping. Room was comfy, felt safe.. The bed was great, bath room nice but a nothing fancy....breakfast is overpriced and nothing great.

Reviews.Title: “The Emerald City Comes to Life!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: poohbearb23
Reviews.Content: I recently traveled to Orlando with a coleague/friend and her husband to attend a meeting. I am not one to be easily impressed with a lot of 'bling' BUT, I fell in love with the service and friendliness of the staff at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. We had a gorgeous meeting room, a scrumpcious lunch (rare for meeting fare), and the facilities were clean and well-maintained. When I come back on vacation with my family, I will most certainly book a room here. Great experience and beautiful grounds...it was like the Emerald City had come to life from my childhood imagination! Heather from Chipley, FL

Reviews.Title: “It is a beautiful, clean hotel with a very attentive staff.”
Reviews.Author: RuthieFlorida
Reviews.Content: I was a delegate to the Jehovah's Witness convention held in Kissimmee and I stayed at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. The accomodations were beautiful and the staff was wonderful. I lost the keys to my car on the very first day I was there. Fortunately, I had a spare. However, I was concerned that if someone found the keys all they had to do was click it till they found the car and drive off with it. The young men at the valet offered to valet park it at no charge so that it would be safe. The concierge was in daily contact with security looking for my keys. The night before I left, they had them for me. A guest had turned them in. I was so happy, I cried and from the smiles on their faces, they were happy, too. I very much appreciated their concern for my plight. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Experience”
Reviews.Author: Algarian
Reviews.Content: From the moment we arrived at the front door we were treated with exceptional courtesy and friendliness. Every staff member we interacted with did their very best to make our three night stay as pleasant as possible. The hotel was very clean throughout. The exercise facility was way above industry standard. The rate was very competitive. We will definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experiance with accomidating nice staff.”
Reviews.Author: suprfrek96
Reviews.Content: The experiance at the hotel was like nothing else. It had the convinience of being in a mall with a LOT of choices for shopping and eating. Once you got there, you really didn't have to leave. The staff was curteous and accomidating to any request made. I would reccomend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for a relaxing weekend”
Reviews.Author: jennifer511
Reviews.Content: My college friends and I meet in Orlando once a year to have fun and catch up. This year we stayed at the Florida Hotel. It was a great hotel - it was immaculately clean, the service was great, and it's in a great location. I really liked that the hotel was attached to the Florida Mall because we could eat at the mall restaurants and shop as well. We ate breakfast at the restaurant in the hotel and had wonderful made-to-order omelets at the breakfast buffet. We will definitely stay there again next year.

Reviews.Title: “excellent friendly service.accomodations were pleasant”
Reviews.Author: menzaqueen
Reviews.Content: a friendly cuteous staff with comfortable accomodations-

Reviews.Title: “The best place to be in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: fernandocosta330
Reviews.Content: The Florida hotel is one of a kind type of hotel, no other hotel I have been on the last years have what it takes to be a great hotel, like The Florida hotel has it. As a pilot for TAM brazilian airlines, in many many years, Ive been in all kinds and types of hotels and lodges all around the would; you name it, Paris, Madrid, Miami, New York, Buenos Aires, Santiago, Frankfurt, Milan, I mean, in the huge universe of hotel chains all over the world, some of them even famous named, like Hilton, Novotel, Holiday inn, NH..., the Florida hotel is unique, cozy environment that makes me feel like I'm home, even after hours of international flights. The crew of Florida hotel is something else, always ready to help us out at any moment in any way, giving us a real feeling of importance and care. And the rates are affordable and reasonable. The Florida Hotel in Orlando is my hotel when I'm in town, no doubt!!!

Reviews.Title: “Looking for a FABULOUS workout facility?”
Reviews.Author: redheadAtlanta
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center has just opened their new fitness facility. When you travel to Orlando in the future, don't spend a minute worrying about how you will keep up with your exercise plan. Their new fitness center is absolutely better than most private gyms that I have used in the past. They have a wide assortment of various types of equipment and have multiples of the most frequently used. You're going to love the cleanliness and overall environment of this fitness experience. It just makew working-out fun!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay and accommodations at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center”
Reviews.Author: mpotter1908
Reviews.Content: From valet parking to check in - the staff was wonderful. Wait time for check in was at a minimum. Rooms were relaxing and spacious. Conference rooms were centrally located and easy to find. I had a great stay at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center.

Reviews.Title: “This is a vistor friendly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: gary_floyd
Reviews.Content: The staff at your hotel were outstanding. At every event during the FACTE Conference the employees were friendly and smiling at the guests. At all of the meals and gatherings the staff took excellent care of the needs of the guests. The hotel was clean and very well maintained. This is the first hotel I have seen that was attached to a mall and your security was great. I hope to be back at the Florida Hotel for another conference in the future.

Reviews.Title: “I Would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: KayesPlace
Reviews.Content: Although there was an hour and half wait for the in-room internet to be fixed, it was free so i can't really complain. If the mattress was a little softer and the sheets were made to stay on the mattress for the duration of the night, I wouldn't have anything else to complain about. check in staff were very pleasant and willing to please. Room was clean, Ample amenities and good value for money if you can get one of the special offers. (i.e Under seventy) I would stay here again as its location it great for a weekend away and some retail therapy in the HUGE attached Florida Mall.

Reviews.Title: “Very convinient location, great rooms”
Reviews.Author: deniserriver
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very clean and nice, and the beds are very comfortable. The thing that I liked the most is the convenience of the location. The fact of having the mall across from the lobby was awesome!! Also the coffee shop and restaurants made our vacation worry free.

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel experience we've had in a long time.”
Reviews.Author: pinkysarasotafl
Reviews.Content: Everything was perfect. From our first day to the last we enjoyed everything about our stay in Orlando. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful and convenient”
Reviews.Author: Glopro
Reviews.Content: My first stay at the Florida Hotel was just a few days after they completed the gym. This gym is so nice, with bikes, treadmills, free weights and machines. All equipment has individual TV's with headsets for entertainment when you are hitting that wall. Just outside the gym is the very large pool and a great whirlpool. I especially enjoy the whirlpool to sooth my aching muscles. The convenience to the airport and any shop for last minute purchases is great, or if you want to do lots of shopping, it is part of the Florida Mall. The staff is quite nice and accomodating and always sporting a smile. I would surely recommend this hotel to others.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel, Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: kingzmill
Reviews.Content: Having spent a few days in this hotel through work I was very impressed with the hotel, not only is it connected to the Florida Mall (which is obviously handy for shoppaholics) but the staff were absolutley amazing. Glad my work choose to put me up in this hotel and will definetly return on pleasure if not buisness.

Reviews.Title: “Girls Weekend”
Reviews.Author: kstiff
Reviews.Content: A great place to get away and still have all the comforts of great restaurants, the pool, and of course shopping. The breakfast buffet was awesome and the customer service was impecable throughout our stay. So much to do nearby in case you venture out of the hotel ... but you don't have to.

Reviews.Title: “what a great experience we had at the hotel and the surrounding stores and attractions.”
Reviews.Author: map3341
Reviews.Content: the first day we got there the staff was friendly even though we had to wait a little while to get our room. the mall had a great assortment of stores and restaurants. the room of the hotel was to our liking. the only bad experience was that we got lost twice to the assembly activity we had at the silver spur arena both thursday and friday. but till the end of our stay we mostly had a good time. the children loved the pool area. sorry to say there was no game room to enjoy.

Reviews.Title: “I always feel comfortable at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center”
Reviews.Author: cahillrealtor
Reviews.Content: I always feel comfortable at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center... my company, Keller Williams Realty, has its North Florida leadership headquartered in Orlando. I am grateful that the leadership chooses to host us at the Florida Hotel. The hotel rooms are always superb, the location is convenient, and the staff is very attentive. The conference facilities are impeccable, the food service is timely and the selections are delicious. The public areas and restrooms are spotless. This is a comfortable and relaxing environment for brainstorming, masterminding, and growing.

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: TechMom74
Reviews.Content: Everything was as expected. The hotel room was very clean and the staff was friendly. We loved the fact that it was attached to a mall where we could go shopping and relax between amusement park visits & the pool was also great. The location was perfect because it was within a few miles of the amusement parks and attractions but not too close. Free (self) parking was also great. There were plenty of restaurants around (fast food and fine dining) that were close to the hotel. We would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service & Beautiful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: rnsupermomx3
Reviews.Content: Attended a conference here and it was outstanding. The staff, food, and surroundings were awesome. Would love to come back here for business or pleasure.

Reviews.Title: “Nice conference center”
Reviews.Author: eliseaorlando
Reviews.Content: I just stayed at the conferences. I really liked the conference rooms and all the employees there are really nice.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, Clean, Great Facility”
Reviews.Author: FloridaLadyTampa
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I spent a wonderful weekend at the hotel. Front Desk Check In was quick, effecient and most helpful. Catered food was good. Conference rooms nice. Located with access to the Florida Mall can't be beat. Hotel room clean with plenty of space and flat screen TV. Our room had a very very firm mattress. We would return.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing, enjoyable time in a very clean, well-cared for, classy hotel.”
Reviews.Author: MissingtheSouth
Reviews.Content: I thoroughly enjoyed my hotel stay at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center this weekend. The hospitality we received from all of the staff was wonderful. They were quick to help us out and were always friendly. The room was very comfortable and clean. The continuous supply of complimentary bottled water was a huge plus! The fact that the hotel is attached to a great mall is just an added bonus!

Reviews.Title: “Can't be beat for business conferences.”
Reviews.Author: ConfPlanning
Reviews.Content: Iâ€™ve had more than my share of terrible service planning meetings at hotels. From rude staff to registration mix-ups, my experience has taught me to start a new hotel relationship with extreme caution. However, from the moment I began working with Jessica and her team at the Florida Hotel & Conference Center, I could tell this was going to be different. The sales staff was friendly, knew their stuff and very responsive. Barry stepped in beautifully even while Jessica was away so we could keep our planning on schedule. They were very flexible with my rooming and event needs and never made me feel like I was inconveniencing them. I had unconventional room layout needs and they were more than willing to work with me on those. Coordinating 350 people from 22 states into 2 days was not easy, but they make it look that way. The banquets team was also especially helpful, not making us wait more than a few minutes to follow through on room changes. Kudos to Verna for running such a sharp and well run machine! My only regret is that this team canâ€™t follow us when we do events in other states! All hotels can learn much from the open communication, friendliness and commitment to customer satisfaction that the Florida Hotel & Conference Center Team have. If youâ€™re planning an event and want it to be a success, make them your first choice.

Reviews.Title: “The staff was great!”
Reviews.Author: kara7395
Reviews.Content: The staff at this hotel are so friendly and accomodating! It is a great location for shopping and eating... Many very good restaurants attached the the hotel/mall and in the vicinity. Close to airport and nearby attractions. State of the art fitness center! Wonderful breakfast buffet at hotel restaurant.

Reviews.Title: “This is a very elegant hotel conveniently located at the edge of the Florida Mall.”
Reviews.Author: Liz-I-is
Reviews.Content: I love this hotel! It's a beautiful, upscale hotel that reminds me of the hotels of old. Gorgeous lobby with a huge crystal chandelier and very attentive staff, both at the desk and outside. The rooms are immaculate and lovely. It's so nice to have the mall right there too! We hope to stay here every year. We love it.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: travelprof35
Reviews.Content: I am sorry but I have to say that this is one of the worst hotels I stayed in so far (35 years old prof). First of all, everything in this hotel is oriented around tourists. The hotel people are nice only if you are a tourist who is looking to go to a restaurant, buy a ticket for parks, or asking for recommendations (in short - commissions). Rooms are nice, king bed, nice LCD TV. There is so much noise coming from AC units of huge mall located next to the hotel that you will have difficulty to sleep. Not anybodyâ€™s fault but noise is noise. After all, you are supposed to get rest. In addition, they forgot to send room service every single day (to clean the room, make bed etc). Not one day, but two days I stayed there. I had to call twice (seriously) to make sure that they clean my room. (#1508) We had a conference there. Conference rooms are nice. Second floor is a quiet place. No complain about that. Ok now, you get free parking â€“ except valet parking â€“ same place. Now my story; somebody broken into my car by breaking the front driver. Second morning, I wake up and go to my car to get my folder and see that windows is broken and glasses everywhere. Now rather than getting angry, I said myself; this is just a bad day, it can happen to anybody. I went to from desk and explained what I found. I then asked (only) for a portable vacuum cleaner to clean the broken glasses so that I can catch the conference. (I did not ask for anything except a portable vacuum cleaner.) I was going to clean the car, and place a towel temporarily so that I can get it fixed later at the service. They said, "We do not give out vacuum cleaners. They sell those in the mall. You can purchase from thereâ€�. Please do not assume that I was faced with another person who is also having a bad day. There were 2 other front desk people (1 female, 1 male) during this conversation. There were no questions about "what happened? Why happened? Is everything all right?" I suppose it is a common thing thereï�Š Being shocked, I went to the mall and purchased a vacuum cleaner, cleaned up my car and went to Wal-Mart to place plastic wrap on the windows and later that week I got it fixed. This means I missed the first part of the conference. Thank you for this experience Florida Mall Hotel. (This is my real experience nothing added, nothing removed. July 2009)

Reviews.Title: “Best Conference I Ever Attended!”
Reviews.Author: mrsmac203
Reviews.Content: I spent 4 days at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center and from the moment I walked into the lobby until the moment I checked out everything was absolutely perfect. Each and every staff member was friendly and helpful. Each request was answered promptly. Staff members greeted me whenever they passed and when I must appeared lost offered help. The Florida Hotel and Conference Center certainly added to the pleasure of my conference. Can't wait until next year. Nancy McClelland

Reviews.Title: “Special Olympics Florida Conference 2009”
Reviews.Author: Special1Tampa
Reviews.Content: This is the third year I have attended the Special Olympics Florida Conference held at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. My experience at this hotel has always been excellent. The rooms are supurb and the beds are the most comfortable I have slept in at any hotel. The service at the restaurants and bar are execellent. The Banquet food and service is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “Successful Annual Conference because of hotel staff and level of detail.”
Reviews.Author: FourSeasonsFL
Reviews.Content: We had a great conference with over 600 attendees and the hotel staff and crew were amazing, accomodating every request and new item that came up. Great feedback from folks staying at the hotel and just attending the training sessions.

Reviews.Title: “Superb, and Personal Attentive Services!”
Reviews.Author: Sandia_Cher
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotela nd Conference Center is an excellent hotel for business and family. It has been my hotelof choice for many years. The staff and management are very attentive to guests needs and go out of their way to assist with requests need. I have been recommending this hotel to family and friends for many years and will continue to.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel with friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: roxy009
Reviews.Content: Ideal hotel for whatever your purpose in Florida. It is great for everyone. Fantastic new gym just opening. Easy reach to the parks and outlet malls and the hotel is attached to the Florida mall for more great shopping. Nice outdoor pool if you want to relax.

Reviews.Title: “Exclusive hotel at an affordable price!”
Reviews.Author: lexus1971
Reviews.Content: A great hotel , very clean and in a excellent location minutes away from every hot spot in Orlando, and attached to the Florida mall how can you go wrong . Go shopping untill you can't shop no more and then rest in a hotel room that screams comfort. You must try Crickets resturant located just downstairs from the hotel the food very good and the staff very friendly , also you must try the breakfast made to order omelets sooooo good. In all a very enjoyable stay at the Florida Hotel you wont be dissapointed.Oh yea they also have a Day Spa and a Starbucks Excellent!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very Professional, Courteous, and Responsive Staff, Accomodating, Met all our conference needs!”
Reviews.Author: MargaretRZ
Reviews.Content: Personable Staff, delivered what they said they would and more. Personal service. Looked to accomodate all our conference attendee needs. Went above and beyond -replaced my reading glasses that I lost at the conference by loaning me a pair until some could be purchased.

Reviews.Title: “A+”
Reviews.Author: SECURITYFORCE
Reviews.Content: Even though the Hotel is getting older, it still has a lot going on for itself. Excellent location to attractions and Restauraunts. Wonderful meeting rooms with a great staff providing refreshments.

Reviews.Title: “Expect the Best”
Reviews.Author: TravelingFamily67
Reviews.Content: Fast check-in, Beautiful inside and out. All employees were very friendly. Rooms were very clean and comfy. The location is excellent. My daughter loved the doorbell at every suite. Very secure, must use room key for elevator to go above 2nd floor. Hotel opens up to the mall, for eazy access.

Reviews.Title: “excellent accomodations”
Reviews.Author: topfpdoctor
Reviews.Content: The personnel at the hotel, restaurant and taxi driverwere all very helpful and friendly. It was an wonderful experience.

Reviews.Title: “Courteous staff and very clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: sunset7Florida
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference at the hotel. It was very clean and the staff was courteous and accomodating. The hotel rooms were nice and also very clean. The conference rooms were very cold the first day, but were more comfortable the second day. I would recommend bringing a sweater or light jacket. I enjoyed the convenience of being able to walk out of the hotel lobby and right into the mall.

Reviews.Title: “This Resort exceeded my expectations”
Reviews.Author: breezybeachwear
Reviews.Content: My husband and I always try new hotels when we visit the Orlando area. Expedia had offered a great deal for this resort hotel and it had wonderful reviews, so we gave it a shot. We were incredibly impressed! The hotel is a close drive to all of our favorite activities (Disney, Sea World, International Drive, etc...), and is attached to the Florida Mall, so shopping is a breeze! The staff were professional, courteous and welcoming. The lobby area is just breathtaking and the rooms are wonderful. We requested a high floor, and when we arrived, we found ourselves on the 10th floor and a 180 degree view of Orlando. The bed was very comfortable and included soft sheets and a fluffy duvet. We tried the room service our first night and were very pleasantly surprised. It was one of the best club sandwiches we had ever had - and came with homemade ranch chips! The pool is very nice and is great to lounge in or do laps. They offer towels and magazines in a shaded area for guests. A great hotel always keeps busy. And we noticed the staff up and around constantly. Even while at the pool, the staff came out to straighten chairs and check on guests. This is truly a resort that cares about its guests. Overall, it was one of the best stays we've had in Orlando and we will definitely stay there again and recommend it to our friends and family!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location For Business And Leisure”
Reviews.Author: LocationReviewer
Reviews.Content: Our annual conference was held at this hotel and it was a fabulous experience from the beginning. Everyone involved at the hotel - the Sales Team, Convention Services Team, Audio/Visual Team - was a delight to work with; professional, knowledgeable, responsive, supportive and helpful in every possible way. The meeting rooms were ideal; the hotel guest rooms were of a very high standard of comfort and cleanliness, as was the entire hotel. The food served in the Grille & Restaurant and for room service and the conference food and beverage catering was excellent, as was the service received. Great Hotel amenities, excellent location for all the local attractions, and leading into the Florida Shopping Mall. What more could anyone ask for? I have already contracted with the Hotel for a future event.

Reviews.Title: “fun in florida”
Reviews.Author: frenchfringe39
