Reviews.Content: the florida hotel and conference center is an all inclusive stay. if you love to shop over 250 shopping stores. dillards, saks fifth avenue, macys and nordstrom and wonderful florida stores sirens and other little stores to enjoy. the restaurant at the hotel crickets offer fresh high quality food. hoping to see you again in florida.

Reviews.Title: “Never fail to impress”
Reviews.Author: RLGDahlonega
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this location many times over the last three years. They have never failed in any of the services expected from a hotel.

Reviews.Title: “One More Night”
Reviews.Author: BackanForth
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this wonderful hotel out of necessity, waiting to move into my new home in Orlando. From my first trip to Florida I've wanted to stay here, and It was everything I expected. The hotel was clean and the staff was wonderful. I needed to stay an extra night and they were able to accommodate me, even though they were completely booked. Being attached to a very nice Mall is also a BIG plus. I enjoyed my stay and would recommend it to anyone

Reviews.Title: “Great time while being treated well and surrounded by friendly and smiling people.”
Reviews.Author: brettina143
Reviews.Content: We were at the hotel for 3 nights and it was all good. Check-in/checkout were very fast and all staff that we encountered were friendly and gave us help within a few minutes. never waited for anything. We were with the Special Olympics Convension and it was one of the nicest ones I have attended. The food was out of this world.

Reviews.Title: “well deserved rest spot!”
Reviews.Author: kestral1
Reviews.Content: after working all the way over the atlantic with a full A/C of happy passengers its a welcome feeling to be on the right side of good hospitality, from the second we arrive it feels like the day is over and rest period has started. check in is very quick and the free water an cookie is much appreciated. All the staff are polite from the bell hop to the front desk and the cleaners, and the room is just what you need wether its after a hard days work or trolling round the disney parks you'll be grateful to open your bedroom door. this hotel is a welcome stop over on my roster and the local facilities are excellent for shopping and bars.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: HypnosFlorida
Reviews.Content: The hotel proved to be of a high quality. The room was very clean and comfortable. the staff were friendly and helpful. I have stayed in the hotel befor and have always found the highest quality.

Reviews.Title: “Stop Your search here,”
Reviews.Author: nad_khan
Reviews.Content: i am frequent traveler to united states,and in Orlando i always was not satisfied with hotels because most of them are not up to there rating ,as they look good in pictures ,but at spot they were totally different. This time as usual i picked new hotel " Florida hotel and conference center"which really impressed me .As his hotel is unbelievable in price ,staff friendly, rooms were more than clean,bed sheets ,plasma tv,washrooms with granite,and if you are travelling wth family ,florida mall is on door step from lobby.breakfast was really good.if you request them you can also get desi chai,Remember to with [Hotel.ca] .prices are are great.airport 10 minutes and close to Disney. Precisely you are getting Mercedes Benz in Toyota price ,what else you can get. Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: “A true vacay”
Reviews.Author: KCJF529
Reviews.Content: This is the best hotel around. Everything is superb from facilities to room to food. The staff is extremely kind and helpful. Any issue was dealt with in a timely manner and it is obvious they enjoy their jobs. The stay was wonderful I wish we could have stayed longer!

Reviews.Title: “Second Stay - Won't Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: Picky_Picky111
Reviews.Content: The first time I stayed here I thought it was ok. Second stay about a month later - not so good. My colleague got bitten by bedbugs. ICKY! Also the room seemed worn out. I won't stay here again. There are many alternatives.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Geego
Reviews.Content: Good experience with a great location for shopping and entertainments especially on those rainy days. Staff are so friendly and hotel is clean. Only one restaurant in the hotel, but not to miss the great chef in there.

Reviews.Title: “If you have a stop over or want to shop, then you just have to stay here.”
Reviews.Author: Nids2217
Reviews.Content: As usual, when booking over the internet, you never really know what you are getting yourself into. I had a lay over in Orlando for the night and needed to take a few gifts back for the family, so I decided to stay at the Florida Hotel. I was pleasantly surprised upon entering the lobby, it was spacious, clean and organised. Everything from check-in, to my late check-out was hassle free. The Crickets restaurant served excellent meals and their friendly and efficient staff were most accommodating and went out of their way to make you feel welcome. With the hotel literally on top of the Florida Mall, it was quite easy to stroll around the stores, then return and relax by the pool. I will definitely be staying here should I find myself in Orlando again.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: MariaBogota
Reviews.Content: Thios hotel works only for airline staff, always when you asked something they say they are running to be ready for the airlines poeple... so bad.... we are clients too!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, and attached to a mall. What more can you ask for?”
Reviews.Author: k2riser
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel with a number of teenagers. The hotel was clean with excellent service. We had a delicious breakfast every morning and the hotel opened breakfast earlier than advertised for us everyday. They were very accomodating. Since we were there with a number of teens for a regional volleyball tournament, staying at a hotel attached to a mall was a blessing. They had no complaints at all. Overall, it was a great weekend!!

Reviews.Title: “Glad we were there”
Reviews.Author: AtlantaWilliam
Reviews.Content: stayed at the hotel for a conference and took the wife along for a little rest. hotel was clean and the service was over the top. Let me explain over the top just to let you know what I mean. while I was attending the conference my wife was out at the pool enjoying the Florida sun. well at 102 degrees she started to over heat and left the pool area heading back to the room to cool off a bit. While on the way the heat over came her and she collasped in the hall way just down from the room. one of the cleaning personnel saw her and notified the hotel staff right away. the staff was prompt in rendering her aid and getting her in the room and placing ice pack on her and giving her plenty of water. they then located me in the conference area so that I was well informed as to what had happened. when I arrived in the room there were at least 6 hotel employees there making sure she was okay. I had to return to the conference after staying with her for awhile but the staff members came back to the room every 30 minutes to check on her and bring her ice and water. this to me was over the top as I knew she was well taken care of and i was able to continue with my meeting with out worrying about her condition and for that I am grateful. That evening as we left out to go to dinner the front desk clerk on duty asked us how she was doing which let me know that it was not just the staff that had come to the room that I needed to thank but the entire shift on duty that day.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, great rate.”
Reviews.Author: phishjeremy
Reviews.Content: Got a room there for less than $60 a night. It was easy to get to the airport, and having the mall attached was convenient. The room was a little cozy, but we had all we needed a TV, ethernet connection, frig, safe, iron, etc. It was an easy check-in and out as well.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent large-venue meeting place”
Reviews.Author: WernerMiami
Reviews.Content: This hotel offers a good array of meeting rooms in close proximity to one another. The attractive, inviting lobby opens to the mezzanine where the meeting rooms are located. This airy configuration cuts down on the claustrophobic nature that accompanies many convention-style venues. The rooms themselves are comfortable and well-appointed with complimentary wireless service.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel was most efficient and great for a conference”
Reviews.Author: Flltravelman
Reviews.Content: The hotel and surrounding areas provide a variety of services that are most convenient for business and pleasure. The hotel and mall provide for a good mix of food options.

Reviews.Title: “Welcoming and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Bigbasso
Reviews.Content: Very conveniently placed hotel, close to major airport and attractions. The staff are all frendly and helpful, with a particular mention for Elim, Moe and Joey on the Belle boy stand, Raja in the Crickets Bar and Brandon in Reception. Warmly recommend the hotel for both business and leisure travellers

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel and the location is fabulous!”
Reviews.Author: ymbenton
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very clean and the entire hotel was spotless. The convenience of being connected to one of the largest malls in Florida was great. It made eating and shopping very convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great value, great employees”
Reviews.Author: Steeleco
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay. My husband attended a convention and I got to shop!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, very professional and friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: comms_guy
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed my stay at the hotel. The room was clean and in good condition. Your staff, including the server staff at the hotel restaraunt were very friendly and very professional. The only complaint that I had was that there was no souvenir shop in the mall to purchase my grandson a trinket. Other than that, I could not have asked for a nicer place to stay. We did have difficulty with the wireless internet in the meeting area but the internet in the room was great.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, room ammenities, and super nice staff”
Reviews.Author: FLres_9
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here for 3 years, and at least 10 visits. I love that it is close to the airports as well as all the attractions and is inside a very nice mall. You can check in, rest, shop, and dine without going outside! The staff is very attentive and the prices are amazing for the quality of the room. They also do great specials, and I have put all of my guests who come to visit here.

Reviews.Title: “I'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: JillyBelgium
Reviews.Content: I've already been here 4 times and in November will be my 5th. This hotel has everything u need. Beautiful modern rooms, a big pool, entrance to the mall, free internet and a lot of parking space. Its only 5-10 min from the airport (but the is no sound pollution). We did want to try other hotels in the area, but this hotel has it all for us. Thats why we keep comming back. But there is 1 minor thing. The queen size bed is horrible to sleep in with 2 persons. And the pool maintenance can be better! Im not saying its disgusting to get a swim but there shouldnt be green stuff at the bottom and the side of the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Great time at conference”
Reviews.Author: sharkladySH
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very impressive. The room was spacious, modern, and clean. The pool and workout room were also very nice. I would stay again in a heart beat. The conference rooms were also very nice and the staff extremely helpful.

Reviews.Title: “This was an excellent place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: texanhillcountry
Reviews.Content: I stayed here 3 nights and was comfortable the whole time. Quietness ensured a good night's sleep, so I was ready for my conference every day. There were plenty of good places to eat and the attached Florida Mall was a good place to walk for exercise. I didn't feel the need to leave the facility during my stay.

Reviews.Title: “What a marvelous and conveniently placed facility”
Reviews.Author: BigDogDad
Reviews.Content: I have a group which is having an annual meeting. The Florida hotel is so convenient and comfortable, it is the best venue we have had in seven years in orlando. The hotel and meeting rooms are wonderful, but being part of the Florida Mall was so convenient, our members will talk about it for years. A variety of food in short walking distance as well as other attractions. You cannot beat the value.

Reviews.Title: “Recent stay at Florida Hotel”
Reviews.Author: islandgirl5324
Reviews.Content: The hotel lobby is clean and well staffed. Excellent access to shopping and dining as it is attached to large shopping mall complete with food court. Centrally located in Orlando and near airport. Accomodations were nice, very roomy, big well-lit bathroom. Plenty of space and comfort for business and recreational travellers alike.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay and wonderful staff.”
Reviews.Author: terlesbrown
Reviews.Content: I stayed at The Florida Hotel & Conference Center for a educational weekend seminar along with my husband. The room was spacious and inviting, large comfortable bed with adjacent sitting area. Plenty of space to move around. Bathroom clean and plenty of room with lots of large plush towels. Staff go out of their way to answer any questions that guests may present to them. I GREATLY RECOMMEND this hotel regardless of your purpose in Orlando. It also helps that there is a great MALL attached to Hotel. Try out Crickets Bar/Grill, great food and drinks, they make a killer Marguarita.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Practical!”
Reviews.Author: delgadomv
Reviews.Content: Visited this hotel for a work related conference. The hotel is clean and has updated ammenities. Most importantly for this type of work related trip is that it is adjacent to a beautiful mall. The visitor never has to leave the premises. Entertainment, shopping and great places (and affordable) to eat are plentiful.

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel is affordable luxury with a friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: TLH1987
Reviews.Content: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center. Even though I was there for an educational conference the convenience of the hotel to the Florida Mall, many shops, restaurants, and entertainment venues, allowed me to have a great time. From the moment I checked in I felt welcome from the friendly staff. My room was very clean and comfortable. In addition, the hotel is environmentally friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel, Brilliant Staff and Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: Mstnorris
Reviews.Content: I am cabin crew and I stay at lots of hotels, I stay at the Florida Hotel roughly once a month if not more and I have always had a great experience. The rooms are great, staff are very friendly and couldn't do more to help. Location is great, the lobby is attached to the mall, what more could you want?

Reviews.Title: “Meeting Planners' Heaven”
Reviews.Author: MeetingPlanners
Reviews.Content: Beautiful, updated, functional and friendly. Used this property every year for the last 20 years for large and small meetings, and every year is better than the last. Reason: They stay ahead of the renovation curve, meeting space needs, and they care about their guests. Sleeping rooms are very nice and extremely comfortable ... pillow-top beds, flat screen TVs, refrigerators, safes, high speed internet, make up mirrors and good lighting in every room. Beautiful, new heated swimming pool and fitness center. Wonderful restaurant, lounge and Starbuck's Cafe. Location is great, attached to the Florida Mall for a wonderful shopping experience. The service and staff are the best anywhere ... and the value is great! Everything you need for successful meetings! I have 4 more meetings booked in January ...

Reviews.Title: “WORST HOTEL EVER”
Reviews.Author: DISAPPOINTED086
Reviews.Content: I booked it online through 1800 reservation and got a good price. But beware everyone, when you get there they charge you for an extra with so callled service tax for services they should offer in which Any other hotel would offer you like using the pool, toiletries, etc. it's kind of deceiving so be careful and also when we ask if they have a toothbrush and toothpaste they said we can buy it at their store and the shaver is so expensive cost $5.00 without shaving cream. Better stay at hyatt place you have everything you need for no cost plus a breakfast, the price is even cheaper than The Florida Hotel. The 2 beds where not really a big it is just a full size bed. We were very disappointed with our stay and we will NEVER STAY AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay, great location, friendly service”
Reviews.Author: sdenier
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay and felt that for the price and the convienient location we could not have done any better. Everything we wanted to visit was pretty much within 15 min. traveltime. The room was clean, the only thing we didn't like was that the sheets did not fit the bed very well and kept on coming undone. The Snackshop was a god sent, every thing you could think of they had, including breakfast items which saved us some money. Also enjoyed that the Mall was connected, even though we didn't come to shop, it was nice to have it right there. The staff was super friendly which is something I pay very close attention to. It was a little tricky getting to the hotel the first time, even though there are signs it is kind of easy to miss.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel - met all expectations.”
Reviews.Author: gotfamilywilltrvl
Reviews.Content: Updated, clean, quiet rooms, flat screen tv, friendly staff, convenient location attached to large mall. Heated pool, hot tub, exercise room. Mall opens early so you can walk before stores open. Hotel resaurant very good with appetizers, sandwhiches to full course entree. Also a 2 for 1 special and was open on Sunday night after the mall closed. Hotel has Starbucks and mini store in lobby that's stocked with groceries. Hope to return for a mini getaway - even my teen wants to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Thumbs Up”
Reviews.Author: LSB9
Reviews.Content: Convenient to airport and comfortable. A VERY personable and professional staff. Extra in-room amenities for the business traveler (computer friendly and nice seating/desk set-up) Comfortable conference rooms (nice ligting,decor and comfortable temperature control). Room service delivered promptly and hot. Pleasant pool area. Nice having direct access to the mall. Security presence made me feel safe as a business woman traveling alone. Definitely a thumbs up for a place to stay for a conference.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff”
Reviews.Author: ukflyboy
Reviews.Content: Fantastic location, staff very friendly and helpful. Rooms very good size, and beds quite comfortable. Lots of free tv. channels Free wired internet in room. Also connected to an excellant mall so plenty of choice with eating etc... lots of resturants and takeouts nearby. Only visited bar once, good happy hour with 2 for 1 on most drinks and appetisers. Universal studios 15 mins away, disney about 20.... All round a great location....

Reviews.Title: “plesantly surprice”
Reviews.Author: prtsmus
Reviews.Content: i arrived at the hotel and was greeted by the parking attendant then my check in was quick and friendly;the room was very clean and confortly decorated. the restaurant i visited for happy hour and breakfast ,the service was great same as the food. i recommend this hotel to all

Reviews.Title: “Pleasure and security”
Reviews.Author: mkj32
Reviews.Content: I am travelling on business with my company and we always stayed at the Florida Hotel and Conference center. The location is fantastic and you can combine business and pleasure at the same time. The security at the hotel is very good and the staff is ever so Helpful from the time you check in until the time you check out. Please carry on the good work , and thanks to all of your staff.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: socialworkChicago
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed for 4 nights, and this location was perfect. A Mall is attached to this hotel and provided us time to shop. Excellent location to get to amusement parks.

Reviews.Title: “This is a friendly, clean, well-appointed hotel perfect for a conference.”
Reviews.Author: RoseMarieOhio
Reviews.Content: All the conference attendees seemed to agree that the location and the facilities, including comfortable and clean rooms with refrigerators and coffee makers, met our needs quite well. All but one of the meeting rooms were on the second floor, right off the elevators and an escalator ride up from the lobby that led into the food courts in the attached, gigantic mall. The only drawback was lack of outdoor, nature space. The staff was always pleasant and helpful. To enjoy Orlando, you might want a car. If you are there to enjoy the parks or swim, this is probably not your hotel. If you want to stay away from families visiting Mickey, than you will enjoy this hotel. There is a nice happy hour from 5 until 9 that was a more than sufficient dinner our first evening. Transportation options seemed limited and cabs were expensive, although many nice restaurants line Sand Lake Rd. Try Christini's for exquisite Italian---at a price. Fishbones had a great steak, also pricey. The best pizza was at Flippers, not so close by. $40 covered and extra large pizza and 4 beers, less than half the bill at the others.

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded every expectation!”
Reviews.Author: Grandad_9
Reviews.Content: We had booked this hotel as the villa we were staying in for our holiday was not available until the following day and it was suitably located for us. We have previously stayed in several Orlando hotels on our visits from the UK, some of which were considerably more expensive! From the moment we arrived at reception to the time of our leaving we could not have asked for better service, everybody we dealt with was friendly, polite and efficient. The rooms were nicely appointed and spotlessly clean, everything that you could expect (plus a little more) was provided. As we could not get into our villa untill late in the afternoon we asked if we could keep the rooms a little later " no problem, you may keep them until noon" was the response. Breakfast in the restaurant was perfect and at reasonable cost. As explained we had only booked this hotel as a one night stop-over as a convenience but both my wife an I agreed that when we return for another vacation on our own we will book the hotel for the duration as we were so comfortable and pleased. The only word of warning is that it opens up directly into Florida Mall and as we spent some time there the following morning, WC Penny's jewellery department is now richer and I am much poorer -enough said!

Reviews.Title: “Central to activities and quiet hotel”
Reviews.Author: OsloMoose
Reviews.Content: Hotel is close to conference and shopping. The staff was very quick and serviceminded. Room was big with good desk and high speed internet. Will recommend this hotel both for business trips and shopping - you are located in one section of a big mall!

Reviews.Title: “HIgh quality comfortable hotel with helpful staff, next to a shopping mall full of shops”
Reviews.Author: Letchworthian
Reviews.Content: The Florida hotel was excellent for our conference. Staff were friendly and efficient. It has its own bar/restaurant serving good food - and a Starbucks - and a convenience store - but is also joined on to a large shopping mall that sells more or less all you would need - lots of food place, jewellry, clothes, drug store etc.

Reviews.Title: “Excellnet place to stay”
Reviews.Author: mara21mieklo
Reviews.Content: This Hotel is located within the Mall. Everything that you could possibly need is just steps away. First of all I would like to start with the hospitality, which was awesome. The Valet was there with a umbrella even tho I wasn't having the rent a car valet park he still offered to let me borrow the umbrella. Once I came into the hotel the staff in the lobby was very polite and once I got to my room, it was very, very clean and the beds are out off this world, very comfortable. I had booked the package of Bed and Breakfast and that was also awesome. I rented a car and one of the things that I enjoyed the most was that I didn't have to pay extra for parking nor did you have a hard time looking for parking. There was transportation buses that were near by the hotel. If you are picking as I am about hotels, this is one I would highly recommend to stay at. I'll be back to stay here again soon.

Reviews.Title: “TIme saving place to be.”
Reviews.Author: Periscopy
Reviews.Content: Due to the situation at the mall it is very easy to do some shopping (bring a little present for the family at home). The foodcourt is also very convenient for a quick bite. The hotelstaff was very friendly and easy to access. Rooms were clean and cleaned very well every day. Everything you need was at the hotel room (iron, safe, fridge, Tv, Radio, wake-up alarm, telephone) The only thing I missed was an adapter for my European recharcable equipment (laptop, camera). This was not available at the front-desk. Fortunately it was available in the mall. The breakfast accommodation was also very good. The staff over there is also friendly and the food was very good. And at night, you could have a drink in the same place till late.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Host a Conference - All Amenities Immediately Available w/fun for the families while you work!”
Reviews.Author: wtf_0ver
Reviews.Content: Hotel, Accomodations and Services available were all outstanding. All personnel, from check-in to check-out were friendly and attentative. I took advantage of several eateries and most notable was Cricket's Bar&Grill and the service provided--and, they had the BEST pot pie! The local area offers something for the entire family. I would utilize this facility for business or pleasure (or both)!

Reviews.Title: “Unlike any other hotel you have ever stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: pop1rj
Reviews.Content: Don't pass up the chance to stay in a hotel with exceptional service from the moment you arrive until you depart. Their attendants were prompt and concise. Room service is above great and the connection to mall makes even more grand. You will not be disapointed because it is just not possible. RJ

Reviews.Title: “Has hidden costs that they don't tell you about until checkout”
Reviews.Author: lovingjesus4life
Reviews.Content: This was A nice hotel because it was located it the mall, that is if shopping is A big reason for your trip. If not I suggest staying some where else. The housekeeping was not that good. THey charge you 11 bucks a day for service fees for their pool use and what is supposed to be complimentary water as they advertise. The tax is $6 for state $6.50 for county per day as well. The cab fare is about 20-25 bucks from both universal and sea world but the busses that go there come to the mall as well. We just took the bus there and taxi back. there are not many resturant selections, only one if you let the mall close. There is a little complex accross the street but you have to walk clean across the mall parking lot unless you cut through a department store but if the mall is closed you are in for a long walk. for the price you pay you can stay in a hotel closer to the theme parks. they are on the main streets and have many resturant selections all around in walking distance. unfortunately I discovered this while on the bus to the theme parks. The rooms have internet on the t.v. but it costs. They do have a business center that you can access the internet but keep in mind it's for all the guests.

Reviews.Title: “My time at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center was very pleasant.”
Reviews.Author: mkatrina
Reviews.Content: The staff was very prefessional and the facilities were clean and updated. The proximity to the mall and food court were especially helpful for a quick lunch with great choices.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel for business travel”
Reviews.Author: DaddyPrez
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at The Florida Hotel several times in the last few month and have been very pleased. The location in the Florida Mall makes it very accessible and provides many walkable eating and shopping options. The staff and management is clearly service oriented and have worked hard to accommodate the needs of our company.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, directly on the Florida Mall”
Reviews.Author: Phalanx1973
Reviews.Content: I spent a few days (too few) on the Florida Mall Hotel, located in Sandlake Road while joining a conference in Orlando. The Hotel looks quite expressive when you approach it, and very visible in the area. At the front desk we were received by and taken care of by a very polite and nice staff, and quickly we were checked in and got our room keys. The entire hotel look very nice and clean, and all of the staff I met was very polite and smiling, especially the staff in the Crickets Bar and Star from the "Grab and go". The room had a very nice view, very good size, and was in total very nice. For those who are in for some shopping, the hotel is located geniusly as it is connected to the Florida Mall :) During the week we were good taken care of, and I really appreciated that I was contacted by the chief of housekeeping to check if I really didÂ´nt want housekeeping the day my "do not disturb" button was activated the entire day. I also really appreciate that I was contacted by the hotel after my stay, telling that they had been reading the guest feedback card that I had completed. This tell me that this is a hotel that really does their business and is a highly seriously hotel. I will really recommend the Florida Hotel and Conference Center for those who are going to Orlando, and I really hope that I will have the possibility to stay at this hotel again in the future. Thanks for now, hope to see you who are the great staff at this hotel again soon :)

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Experience”
Reviews.Author: bcasuso
Reviews.Content: This was a woderful experience. i was given great customer service at my arrival and the entire stay. It was very pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Well worth the stay!”
Reviews.Author: MrJones54
Reviews.Content: Friendly, helpful staff, a great position right in the heart of the Simon Mall and inexpensive facilities make this hotel a great choice for the occasional traveler looking for more than just theme parks in Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel with Great Benefits”
Reviews.Author: msladydon
Reviews.Content: This hotel was comfortable wtih great amenities. The rooms are modern and tidy. Its nothing fancy, but it was very good. Great value. EXCEPTIONAL staff.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel In Florida”
Reviews.Author: kilojm
Reviews.Content: I am most fortunate that I stay at this hotel regularly on business. Apart from its central location to all the main attractions and shopping, I find this hotel to be one of the best in Florida and why?? The staff are just absolutely wonderful. They just cannot do enough for you to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. I stay at this hotel at least once a week and the staff make you feel as though it is your first time staying there. So jovial and amazingly friendly without being over the top. For value for money, amenieties and friendliness of the staff. I vote this one No.1 in Florida. You will not be dissappointed in any way if you stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for Conference”
Reviews.Author: SteveG99
Reviews.Content: Attended a 4 day conference here. Rooms were very clean. Appreciated free Internet and Parking. 15-20 minute ride from airport, although not all taxi drivers seem to know direct route. Located in giant shopping center and several chain restaurants outside mall are also walkable. Good value for money. Is probably 30 minute drive to Disneyworld (no traffic).

Reviews.Title: “A GREAT PLACE TO STAY FOR ANY OCASION”
Reviews.Author: VEDOC
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center is a perfect place for us to stay when we are in Orlando for my husband's meetings. The Hotel is has a great staff all of them, including the bellhops. I could shop while my husband does his meeting. I love to shop, and so I go down to the Mall and do my shopping. We have been staying at this Hotel for many years when it was called the Florida Mall Hotel. We will always check you guys first when checkin for a hotel reservation. Mr Robert and Rose Marie Cruz

Reviews.Title: “My wife would love this place!”
Reviews.Author: Mr_HVirginia
Reviews.Content: I arrived into Orlando after dinner and had called the hotel earlier in the day to arrange for a ride and to check the weather forecast. The thoughtful young woman said the weather was going to be beautiful and suggested their Platinum service for transport. The price was compatible with a cab so I opted for the service. I was met at the airport by a man named Louis with a black escalade and he drove me to the front door of the Florida Hotel. I entered the luxurious lobby with cascading staircases and beautiful lighting where I checked in and went up to my room. The room was great. I came down to the lobby and took a walk around the mall, the biggest I have ever scene. I thought, my wife would love it here, and for my son there was even an indoor pool. But I was here for business so between meetings I enjoyed the excellent service in the lobbies restaraunt. I finished up my business and did some gift buying at the mall and had Platinum Transport take me back to the airport. I was so pleased with my visit I would definately come back with the family. Mr Hughes from Viginia

Reviews.Title: “Connected to the MALL!”
Reviews.Author: mmarro2001
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean and the employees were extremely friendly. I especially enjoyed the fact that it was connected to the mall. I was able to eat at the Food Court for breakfast, lunch and dinner.....all very quickly and economical. This is defintely a location that is very conveient, especially if you don't have wheels! The price per night is a bit over $100. Good for families and excellent for business travel.

Reviews.Title: “Great facility, room and service. Recommend...”
Reviews.Author: gawilcox
Reviews.Content: I was at the Florida Hotel for a conference. Conference facility, room and services were great. Hotel was attached to Florida Mall and in an area where there were plenty of resturants. It was a very good experience. The only issue I had was with an unexpected service charge. The total rate was still excellent -- just, unexpected.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: khrubes
Reviews.Content: did not have to leave the hotel for food or anything as the hotel is attached to the mall. very convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Do Disney on a budget - close to all theme parks at a fantastic value.”
Reviews.Author: Rich2525
Reviews.Content: Located within a 15 to 20 minute drive to all the theme parks and a great value. The rooms were clean and had everything you would want (including flat screens). The hotel has a family friendly pool, restaurant, and staff were polite and professional. I went with my wife and our three children. The in-hotel restaurant had two for one appetizer and drink evening specials. We ordered, went back to the room, and ate well at a great bargain. The kids loved the two for one chicken tenders and the adults loved the two for one draft beers! In addition to all the hotel had to offer it is connected to the Mall, which offers shopping for the whole family and several dining choices. Etremely convenient! I go to Disney every year with my family and know of no better way to do Disney on a budget without sacrificing quality.

Reviews.Title: “The Florida Hotel & Conference Center is a Conference Director's dream”
Reviews.Author: FSHAconfdir
Reviews.Content: Our experience with this hotel was seamless when planning, executing and wrapping up the Florida School Health Conference 2009. Staff kept me updated and informed throughout the whole experience. It was the first time in 13 years of being Conference Director that myself or my Board did not receive a negative comment from our participants.

Reviews.Title: “PREFECT”
Reviews.Author: CtSmiley
Reviews.Content: My girlfriends and I stayed a couple of days, we found it to be the prefect place. The hotel was close to everyting. The service was excellent and rooms were nice and clean. We took full advantage of the pool and hot tub. Great place to stay. I will be staying again on my next visit to Florida...

Reviews.Title: “Great location for conventions and casual get-togethers!”
Reviews.Author: lunadancer9
Reviews.Content: Very nice, quiet hotel located in the heart of Orlando. Very courteous staff and clean rooms. Ballrooms for convention use are bright and spacious! Being connected to the mall means that the shopping and restaurants are great as well. Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place - Avoid weekends?”
Reviews.Author: Joykin
Reviews.Content: My partner and I stayed here for a Saturday night - first impressions were good but there were a lot of children around the lobby messing around it was quite off putting. Even though we arrived an hour after check in they still didnt have our room ready and we were asked to wait an hour, but it wasnt a problem as there was the mall to explore and the staff were polite about it. The room was great - clean, stylish and an easy to work air con system. Unfortunatly we didnt have a good nights sleep as there were kids running up and down the corridor the whole night and screaming and shouting well after 1am, the rooms werent very soundproof as we could here was was going on in the room next to us (if you know what i mean.....) hehe but all in all a pleasant stay, lots of space in the carpark and apart from all the schoolkids it was a very positive experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for the Money”
Reviews.Author: cic123
Reviews.Content: The level of customer service is wonderful, and the fact that it is right at the Mall makes it easy to shop - even for those loast minute items that is needed. It has a complete conference center, and the rooms are spacious, clean and well organized, I would definitely stay here again, and recommend others to do so.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant place”
Reviews.Author: dantasbr
Reviews.Content: If anyone look to spend some time with confort, security, fun and very professional standarts, the Florida Hotel and Conferencce center is the perfect spot in Florida. Defenetly I recomend it! It always a very enjoyable time for me personaly....

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accomodations”
Reviews.Author: TexasBaxter
Reviews.Content: excellent accomodations,close to the office,close to shopping , close to restaraunts

Reviews.Title: “Loved that it is part of the Mall”
Reviews.Author: TampaSweettee
Reviews.Content: The front desk gentleman was very polite. He went the extra mile to look up the closest Dunkin Donuts for my husband to get coffee from. The rooms were clean, but nothing fancy. No microwave in the room. Drink the 2 bottles of water!!! There is an extra fee you pay when you check out, that ends up being around $11.00, and part of that fee is for the water, whether you drink it or not!! Loved the fact that it is attached to the mall. (Talk about the perfect place to stay for a girlfriends weekend away ) Lots of restuarants close by to eat at.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel attached to a mall......what a great idea!”
Reviews.Author: tclaycomb
Reviews.Content: We had a great experience staying at this hotel. The rooms were comfortable and clean and any staff that we encountered were very helpful. I enjoyed being able to go to my conference, then go shopping and to dinner without ever touching me car!

Reviews.Title: “Unlike any other hotel I've seen.”
Reviews.Author: nunnms
Reviews.Content: Attended a one-day seminar. The hotel was beautiful, with an added feature unlike any other, it was connected the Florida Mall. We were able to go to the shops while on lunch break and enjoy the food court. Would highly recommend to companies looking for an off-site meeting place.

Reviews.Title: “The friendliest and most comfortable place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: VacaDreamin
Reviews.Content: We travel to Florida every year and always make a two day stay at the hotel and mall. Convenience of location and everything needed to purchase is right there. This has the most comfortable beds and linens that the 5 of us could ask for. We can't wait every year to go to bed!!!

Reviews.Title: “Magnificent!!”
Reviews.Author: jesuslovesbpmca
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference there last year for the 2nd year in a row. With the exception of the air cond. not working part of the time, I enjoyed my stay.I think that having a group of ladies going to a conference there and being able to go shopping right there was just an added treat!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible!”
Reviews.Author: twin33
Reviews.Content: My family stayed here and we were very disappointed. We have stayed here two times before and did not have a problem. This time was much different! Our room was not ready until after six oclock. We had traveled all day and was very tired. The older man at the front desk acted liked my family was second class citizens because I was a single female. Very unorganized and they DO discriminate against females! SAD! SAD! SAD! NEVER EVER AGAIN!

Reviews.Title: “best place to stay in orlando”
Reviews.Author: larrytekokake
Reviews.Content: we where in florida mall hotel this year and last. we find it great for shopping and is central to get to all parks , As well as the airport. great place to stay larry and rita ireland

Reviews.Title: “It doesn't get much better than a great hotel inside a wonderful shopping experience!”
Reviews.Author: gracierose50
Reviews.Content: I come to this hotel after thanksgiving for almost a week of fun, relaxation, AND heaving Christmas shopping. I also come back in the spring for a few days for shopping and theme parks, and restaurants before continuing on to Daytona Beach Shores. I love this hotel for its' location, style, quiet rooms, and shopping!

Reviews.Title: “The service is great and there is a lot of thing that can be done here.”
Reviews.Author: Enchanted80
Reviews.Content: If you can include complementary breakfast a very modest price, I probably rate you excellent overall.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel & you can SHOP if you haven't already dropped”
Reviews.Author: nitamemaw
Reviews.Content: My room was clean (BIG PLUS) and very roomy. The hallway was quite with no running and screaming children or grownups at all times of the night. Very pleasurable stay and I really enjoyed being able to shop without having to get in a vehicle and drive to another location. Wish more folks were this considerate.

Reviews.Title: “home away from home”
Reviews.Author: jilly54
Reviews.Content: The staff was very friendly and helpful. Rooms are quiet and i like the layout and the fact that there's a mini fridge. Room service is always fast and friendly and the food was delicious.

Reviews.Title: “I only stay at the FL Hotel & Conference Center when I travel to Orlando.”
Reviews.Author: icequeen164
Reviews.Content: I've been a frequent traveler to Orland for the last couple of years only for business and the Florida Hotel & Conference Center was recommended to me on my first trip in 2004. I was so impressed by the friendliness of the staff that even after renovations due to the hurricane seasons in 2004, 2005 and 2006, I stayed there. The hotel went out of their way to minimize disruptions and if I hadn't seen the construction crews accidentally, I would never have known they were there.

Reviews.Title: “Eexcellent location, close to my bussiness and good for my wife shopping”
Reviews.Author: nino91
Reviews.Content: Best alternative in Orlando, close to the city and attraction area. beside the facts is in one of the biggest mall in town.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: travlerbugg
Reviews.Content: This has been my 2nd stay at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center. From the second you walk into the door to the second you leave, you have hotel employees helping you with your baggage, storing your luggage if your room is not available. I trust this hotel for a few reasons. Since I'm on business, I have to take my laptop computer with me most times. I have left it out on the bed or the desk without worry about it going missing. One of the other highlights of this hotel is that the Florida Mall is attached to it. Its so nice to have access to all the shops and amazing food court. I highly recommend this hotel for business or vacation.

Reviews.Title: “If you like shopping this is an ideal hotel”
Reviews.Author: Carol-Bermuda
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel 4 times in the past year and have had good and bad experiences. My last visit was good but only because I had a serious complaint from a previous visit and the management went to a great deal of trouble to make this stay memorable. One major complaint I have (and this happened on previous visits) is that the maids move all your personal items - one moved my medication and put it in a drawer I went crazy looking for it.

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: CD7Bermuda
Reviews.Content: You could not stay at a better location with regards to shopping. The front desk check-in was a breeze, and the clerk was extremely polite. The hotel's gate is shut down a little earlier than the entire mall closes (the actual time escapes me) but they inform you of this at check-in. I think the hotel itself could use a restuarant that sells food past 9 pm. We could barely get tea and I believe croissant/ muffin, after shopping until mall closing. Another note, my family is in the hotel industry so this seemed odd to me that when we were checking into our room after 5pm that day, the maids dirty linens and carts were still in the hallway. It was a little disturbing to see housekeeping still going on at that hour of day. There was even some tattered and old armchairs at the end of the hallway. The rooms themselves where nicely done in soft contemporary colors,average size room the bathroom had beautiful granite countertops, although the bath tub was starting to show a little signs of age (rust spots), and I am being picky there, but overall I was happy with my stay and would definitely return. We had to catch a early morning flight and the clerk managed to carry out his request promptly at 5am with a smile. Walmart and World Market a 2min drive away.

Reviews.Title: “Improvements”
Reviews.Author: SUZYBermuda
Reviews.Content: Have stayed in this hotel for many years, when it was Holiday Inn, Sheraton and the previous owner Adams Mark. One thing that stands out is the promixity to shopping and restaurants if you are just there for a little R & R. If you want to visit the parks it's a bit of a distance away. But during the December you will find hotel a bit too noisy as there are often school groups visiting for big games held in Orlando. If you don't mind the noise it's a clean and upgraded location to place your head at night. Lastly the restaurant is not up to the standards of the previous owners as they are not using the facilities once offered and it's changed to now accommodate large wedding parties of Indian descent.

Reviews.Title: “I WILL REPEAT”
Reviews.Author: Kareaga
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff if you are traveling with a baby. Like to shop? This is the place.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value Hotel with excellent location and facilities”
Reviews.Author: CoralDublin
Reviews.Content: Several experiences stayingin this hotel. Choose to return for great location toall parts of Orlando, plenty of local restaurants. Very good facilities and swimming pool etc. Rooms weel fiited out and very clean. Very good and friendly service overall with every need catered for. Reasonable value roon rates. Good bar with friendly staff. Can be very busy at large conference times. Only negative was not very many children staying, as a result no children's facilities. Will stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location, very good hÃ´tel.T”
Reviews.Author: Bolleman
Reviews.Content: This hÃ´tel has the ideal location for shopping : you are immediatly in the shopping mall. The staff is very friendly and they speak French,which is very agreable. The rooms are quiet and comfartable. The pool is relaxing and sunny. The breakfast buffet is excellent. Nice place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “First class all around with a Friendly touch”
Reviews.Author: Brett0163
Reviews.Content: I was at the hotel to attend the RPG and DB2 Summit. The first thing was the friendliness of the staff at check-in. It was efficient and yet personable. The cleaning staff kept the room very clean. The food was excellent and wait staff were also professional but also personable. The bell staff cared for my bags on the last day of the conference and had them ready quickly when it was time to leave and also arranged for transportation to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “A really nice place to stay! You can't go wrong!”
Reviews.Author: wlmatthews
Reviews.Content: Rooms were nice, beds were commfy, pillows were awesome. Nice flat panel TV, lots of good cable stations. In room internet (ethernet, not wifi, so good speed). Nice fridge, AC worked good too. Service was excellent, everyone was just super, super friendly! Hotel restaurant was very good, staff there was very accommodating. And happy hour every night 5-9, two for one drinks and two for one appetiziers. Each appetizer was a whole meal. Bring a friend to share!!!! Also very large clean warm swimming pool and comfortable lounge chairs. Private and secure too! And since it is connected to the Florida Mall, it has easy access to plenty of shopping!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely the best deal in town”
Reviews.Author: muffala
Reviews.Content: The price was very reasonable, the room was beautiful , great bed and bedding. A nice flate screen tv , very very clean. The bathroom and the bedroom beautifully decorated. The pool area very nice. The Cricket's bar was a great deal two for one drinks and appetizers . Everyone working there couldn't have been more helpful and courteous. I can't say enough I would defintely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel, I would go again!”
Reviews.Author: Coe35
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent hotel with great amenities. Very helpful staff... Rooms were great, but bathtubs could use upgrade. Great overall visit, I would go again!

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: what2buy
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed the hotel and all it had to offer. being poolside was great. the conference rooms were big and well laid out. staff was very nice and helpful. the location is perfect. being attached to a mall, to me it can not get better than that. the bar was nice and comfortable. the room were spacious. I liked having a safe in my room for my valuables. housekeeping did a great job daily (I stayed for 5 days) and last be not least there is a lady was works in the store right at the entrance to the mall who is the nicest women you can ever meet. she make you feel like you are a regular customer the moment you walk in and you leave feeling good.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, accomodating, excellent staff”
Reviews.Author: Susi1159
Reviews.Content: The location in Florida, with the mall attached to the hotel was great. The individual rooms as well as the meeting rooms were all you could want. The whole facility was super clean. The staff went above and beyond. They were all so friendly and ready to help with anything at all that was needed.

Reviews.Title: “Overall Competance”
Reviews.Author: nyhrgrl
Reviews.Content: I visted and stayed at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center on business in April. This is my second stay stay with them and their service seems to excel each time. My company uses them ocassionally to handle various conferences and during these times we utilize rooms for our out of town visitors. The staff was extremely helpful and the food delicious. The hotel provided all the normal efficiencies like in-room internet access, refrigerators and more. The convenience of it being located right in the mall was extremely wonderful for our out of town visitors and those in town as well as they had the excessbility of browsing the mall during down times during the day. I would definitely recommend them to others and encourage use of this hotel again for our future conferences. I plan on bringing my kids with me on a social visit soon as I am sure they will enjoy this mini getaway as well.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel with ubelieveable atmosphere and amentities”
Reviews.Author: tazquedg
Reviews.Content: I was totally impressed with the hotel from the parking lot to the toliet! unbelievable experience...i am a world traveler and have to rate this hotel on the top 5 list of all business hotels in the continental us...with the amenties. I will always stay at this hotel if I ever visit Orlando business or pleasure...Main reasons...Staff friendliness and value and amentities...

Reviews.Title: “MY STAY AT THE FLORIDA HOTEL AND CONFERENCE CENTER”
Reviews.Author: Jeseldya
Reviews.Content: My Sister and I took our kids here for a getaway for a night, this is s very nice hotel and would love to visit again in the future, service was great from the time we got there until the time we left. The rooms were nice and clean, the only thing I had a small problem with was the Bar do not stay open long enough, other than that it was great.

Reviews.Title: “Omega Psi Phi Fraternity 7th District Meeting”
Reviews.Author: MightyDog
Reviews.Content: When you meet a staff person without reading his name tag and after some conversation, you learn that he is the Manager, it shows that the staff is concern about how you are enjoying your stay. It was a great stay and the servers at all three meals were outstanding. They were very professional and took care of all request that I observed.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!!!!”
Reviews.Author: NJHarleylover
Reviews.Content: Beautiful hotel with a great location to shops and attractions. I loved that it was part of the mall. Room was great, very clean, and staff was really nice. I will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “A perfect place”
Reviews.Author: FlyingDolphinLondon
Reviews.Content: Since you walk in staff are there and they know you arrive. A professional welcome. Rooms are spacious and relaxing; well acoustic isolated and clean. Swimming pool (my favourite!) and Jacuzzi accomplish the SPA services and the location is just GREAT. Everything you need is there. Valet/Bell staff very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel...Geat Location..Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: FloridaMark2009
Reviews.Content: I and my family enjoyed an excellent stay at this hotel. Clean...good service all around. Great location...attached to a Shopping Mall. Not far from major Orlando attractions. Plus a moderate price as well. The room was clean and very pleasent...a step above many hotels in Orlando. I would return here..and recommend to anyone to try it out. They also have excellent Conference facilities...which I have utilized with my business previously.

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: nbwii
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful experience at the Florida Hotel and Conference Centre. Hotel is very conveniently located (near many of the theme parks) and enters directly into a large Shopping Mall. The staff were friendly, courteous and helpful. The Rooms were nicely decorated and clean. The

Reviews.Title: “Experience of a Lifetime at the Florida Hotel, Orlando, Fla”
Reviews.Author: OmegaMan10
Reviews.Content: I was extremely pleased with the entire experience during my stay at the Florida Hotel. The service and attitudes of the employees was tremendous. The setting is beautiful and the accomodations were supreme. I would recommend this venue to all my friends and business associates. Thank you, Carlton Buckhanon West Point, GA

Reviews.Title: “Off the beaten path but attached to a mall! What more could a wife want?”
Reviews.Author: vbspykr
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very clean and up-to-date with flat panel screens, fridge, and Internet. Parking was free and check-in was quick. There's a nice restaurant downstairs for a breakfast buffett or happy hour and a Starbucks next to it so you can get your coffee fix.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel ! ....love the mall”
Reviews.Author: jackgiii
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center ....... the room was spacious, and it was clean! .... the property exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: “Impressed from the start”
Reviews.Author: twtymema
Reviews.Content: I was impressed with everything. The workers were all very polite. The rooms were clean. I actually stayed an extra night. I would definitely choose to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Nearly Perfect for Business Travellers”
Reviews.Author: catazure
Reviews.Content: The hotel is attached to the Florida Mall, a large mall with great stores like Sephora, Williams -Sonoma and other high end retailers. The rooms are comfortable, bedding is nice and not scratchy ( a problem I run into all too often) and the light in the bathroom was bright enough for these over-forty eyes to see to apply make up by:) Another great thing about the hotel was the hallways and public spaces. Too often hotels economize by inadequately heating or cooling these areas. The Florida Hotel's hallways were perfectly cool so I got to my meeting looking as fresh as I did before I left my room. Wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “A surprise”
Reviews.Author: tennis0228
Reviews.Content: I booked one night with this hotel after reading other Trip Advisor reviews. Because of the room rate was so inexpensive and not what we are used to, I was still somewhat hesitant. We were really pleasantly surprise. It is connected to the Florida Mall and there are numerous restaurants close by. First of all,there is plenty of parking. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful. Floor hallway was a bit cool.The quiet room was clean and spacious with generous desk space. LCD tv mounted on the wall giving more surface room. The sizable clean bathroom had granite flooring and counter space. The bathtub faucet could have been a bit cleaner. Beds were comfy. We had the breakfast package and found it to be a fairly good value complete with lox, waffle and omelet stations. Service was attentive even with ordering the buffet. Would we stay here again, absolutely!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for conventioneers”
Reviews.Author: Coalbie
Reviews.Content: If you are planning a conference, the Florida Hotel and Conference Center is a great location to hold it. Their facilities are nice and their service is great. The guest rooms are very comfortable. The pool was also a big hit.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed my stay”
Reviews.Author: tgojgo
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for a business meeting. The entire staff was accomodating, professional and friendly. When you walked down the halls, they immediately stopped what they were doing to greet you and move out of your way. The catering staff was also very attentive during the breakfast and luncheon meetings. Every where I went, the hotel was clean....public restrooms, lobby, pool area, gym, and meeting rooms. I had a very pleasant experience at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal hotel for overnight stay”
Reviews.Author: Kelhoo
Reviews.Content: Booked hotel for 1st night of holiday having arrived Orlando International mid afternoon. Ideal choice good clean hotel and convenient location far enough from airport and close enough to International Drive etc. The elevators proved to be an excellent place for making friends with room card security key confusing all comers ( a case of technology too far). The Cricketers Arms within the hotel provided a good place for a drink but would not have been in my opinion a good setting for an evening meal. We went to Carrabas Italian which was not far away. With hindsight the food court within the Florida Mall only 50 yards fro hotel would have been beeter option. Staff very friendly and helpful. Hotel available on Air Miles provides good budget accomodation. Rooms very clean, beds comfortable and parking no problem. An excellent choice for overnight short stay.

Reviews.Title: “Helpful and accomodating”
Reviews.Author: brian4brian4
Reviews.Content: I found the staff to be courteous and nothing was too much trouble, the room was excellent and in particular if I had a problem it was resolved quickly. Better business centre this time and having the mall next door was brilliant (for my kids who expect me to return home laden with goodies!) Late or early check in or out would be better if you could book in advance, overall Excellent

Reviews.Title: “If you don't need to sleep, choose this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Elpacoguapo
Reviews.Content: Pillows were terrible: small and hard. Bed was terrible: hard (thank goodness for the cover put over the bed which made it a bit better). I did not sleep all week. I probably would have slept better on the pavement with the curb as my pillow.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to have a conference.”
Reviews.Author: BC_Eagles_15
Reviews.Content: Overall a nice play to have a conference. Plenty of restaurants nearby, and being connected to a Mall/shopping area made it pretty easy to stay put. Plenty of free parking, and the staff was very helpful with good restaurant recommendations, and knowledge of amenities. The catered food and room service was also excellent. It was evident that service was important to all staff.

Reviews.Title: “They provided all the necessary amenities for this business conference--would return.”
Reviews.Author: Lucky1441
Reviews.Content: Very clean rooms. The TV wasn't properly working and they sent maintenance personnel within 10 minutes. There was a light in one of the conference rooms blinking and they fixed it before the next meeting in that room. Very attentive to the needs of the guests.

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: raick13
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very nice, located in the mall. Great helpful staff, clean nice sized rooms. I would stay there again if only all hotels were as nice as this, and a great rate from hotels.com!

Reviews.Title: “Great location and staff”
Reviews.Author: vlwBirmingham
Reviews.Content: I thought the staff at the hotel was very personable and professional and the rooms were well maintained. The conference center facilities were also very nice. I enjoyed have the mall accessible for shopping and a variety of meal choices.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient mall hotel”
Reviews.Author: bbcreg
Reviews.Content: Overall this is was a great experience. There was one negative experience. We came back to our room at 5:30 and it was never cleaned. We checked to make sure we hadn't accidentally left the "Do Not Disturb" sign on but we hadn't. Housekeeping was apologetic and took care of it that night but it shouldn't have been missed in the first place. We were out of the room by 9:00am. If it wasn't for that experience the whole thing would have been perfect. Everything I look for was there-friendly staff, good service, cleanliness, attention to detail, and pleasant decor. The hotel is connected to The Florida Mall so it is a natural location for anyone interested in shopping. There are great restaurants and shops of all types and price levels. The M&M store was fun. It is about 10 minutes for the airport and close enough to all the major attractions. They are more focused on business travelers for the conference center part of the hotel and shoppers.

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, good restaurant, good staff...”
Reviews.Author: Guyinthesky
Reviews.Content: Well, the hotel is great. I could not experience much more of the hotels services, because my stay was too short, but in general it was good. I wish the bath towels in the room were biger, i got them too short, concerning the hotel category. Last time i was there, i needed to make a call for a number in USA, i called the front desk, but nobody could tell me how much i would pay for the call, per minute... So, i had to use my cell phone...As i do not live in USA, i ll have to pay so much for that calling. The breakfast is great, thanks the hospitality of your staff and good food.

Reviews.Title: “Our group loves this hotel”
Reviews.Author: ntreasurer
Reviews.Content: Our group has held it annual winter meeting at the Florida Hotel for several years and we just extended our contract to 2012. The guest rooms are perfect. The meeting rooms are ample. The staff is very accomodating in every way.

Reviews.Title: “Great Conference Location”
Reviews.Author: JayDubCalifornia
Reviews.Content: This was my second time staying at this hotel for our annual conference. It is an excellent location for both the quality of the rooms as well as the conference facilities. The staff was very helpful and we enjoyed our stay. It is a great value with a great location. The hotel is attached to an indoor mall which is a wonderful bonus. Many great restaurants are close by. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Nascar-Daytona
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff were very helpful, especially Joey the concierge who was at the outside entrance desk. Daily he gave us directions and was extremely helpful when our keys were locked in our car! We can't thank him enough for calling a locksmith. Thanks to Joey we didn't miss our flight going home.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, courteous, and convenient”
Reviews.Author: FL_Chipmonk
Reviews.Content: We appreciated the security of room pass options on the elevators, pool, and business center. Staff was very courteous and helpful with suggestions and service. In particular we liked the convenience and size of the shopping mall. Food and service (particularly the breakfast) at Cricket's bar and grill in the lobby was excellent. Parking was no problem, and rooms were made up promptly and cleanly. We would recommend it very highly.

Reviews.Title: “The mall was great!”
Reviews.Author: TravelinmanOlympia
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel for a conference for 5 days. The facilities were very clean including the pool area outside. The staff was helpful and friendly. I brought my son with me and the mall was a great feature to add to the amenities. We did not have to leave the hotel to enjoy some free time drinking Starbucks and walking the mall that is attached to the hotel. When we had more free time, The Millenia Mall a upscale shopping mall a few miles away was another great outlet and had many fine restaurants. Other features close by were Universal Studios, Epcot, Golfing and much more......

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for Business and Pleasure”
Reviews.Author: con10t
Reviews.Content: My trip began as business related and all aspects were outstanding. The meeting rooms were tastefully decorated and the catering was delicious and professional. I have stayed at 5 Star + resorts (in and out of the United States) and found the atmosphere and amenities at the Florida Hotel to be equal. My room was large, luxurious with everything I could ask for. I must also comment on the staff. EVERYONE was so amiable and professional - they made me feel as though I were their sole priority. They truly know their customer service. The fact the Hotel opens into an enormous shopping mall with more stores than I could visit during my stay, only makes it that much more fun! I plan to return with my family to enjoy the sunny pool and hot tub, as well as the excellent food and shopping. If you are planning to visit the Orlando area, you owe it to yourself to stay at The Florida Hotel and Conference Center. (They also have shuttle service to WDW).

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: send2elise
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center January 28-31'09 I was attending the PGA Show. Called the hotel to ask about transfortation to the hotel from the airport and they pointed me to the right direction. They suggested the service that the hotel uses and that turned out to be a great idea. I ended up using that for the duration of my trip. I didn't have to worry about traffic and parking. Checking in and out was no hassle because everybody was so helpful and accomodating. It was fast too. Front desk people very helpful even pointing me to restaurants and places to eat. The hotel is clean and quiet. After a long day at the Convention I'm able to walk to restaurants and shops and back at my hotel room and do some work quietly. Room is always clean and everything I needed in the bathroom are there. Location was great too because I am away from the craziness of International Dr. where almost everybody who attended the convention stayed. I can't wait to come back for a leisure trip and bring my family. I am sure my daughter would love the idea that the hotel is directly connected to the mall.

Reviews.Title: “Did not expect extra charges...”
Reviews.Author: philo128
Reviews.Content: This is mainly a criticism of the Fla. Hotel AND Priceline. After being in the Orlando area 5 days visiting family as well as business, we "pricelined" a 3-4 star hotel near the airport in preparation of an early morning flight. The Fla. Hotel accepted our bid, with a Final Charge made to our credit card at the time of reservation, before we knew the identity of the hotel (using Priceline). Arrived at 9 PM, check-in, lobby, personnel, room were fine; except an $11.00 mandatory charge at time of check-in. When I pointed out the that Priceline had already given me a "Final Charge" which was paid, the desk personnel stated this extra charge was for in-room safe, refrigator, and (?) bottled water. I asked them to change us to a room that did not have these items or remove them, and they would not. The personnel were unfailingly polite, and as I stated the 6 hr. stay was just fine. It is extra charges that appear, when one believes that an item or service is completely paid for, that annoy me. Priceline states that one should call the hotel to see if these charges exist, however, one does not know the name of the hotel before the reservation is made; thus your credit card is credited (non-refundable) before the hotel can be queried. Thus, one is obligated to the hotel whether or not they charge extra fees upon arriving. I do not know if this practice is widespread, I have not run up against it in the larger US or European cities; but it seems oneous. To their credit, when I contacted the hotel regarding this instance, they credited the extra charge off my card. I firmly believe that a hotel (or any service, item, etc.) should have an agreed upon price at the time of purchase, and further charges should not be added at the time of check-in; be they $1.00 or $100.00.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great hotel”
Reviews.Author: kayoticlaudia
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel to stay - esp. if on business. Free parking and free internet! The location is good - easy to find and not far from the Int'l Airport or Orlando. The rooms are wonderful and clean. I was amazed at the price that I paid! The Florida Mall is connected so you can shop after work. Dining at the Florida Mall is also an alternative to the hotel restaurants. What can I say? I will certainly consider this hotel on my next visit to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Fun Time”
Reviews.Author: CookeInc
Reviews.Content: Service was great. Check in was very easy. Conference facilities were first class. Service at the restaurant was excellent. Facilities were clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service at Great Location”
Reviews.Author: mountaiwnave
Reviews.Content: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center has it all: great location, friendly staff, and reasonalble price. Hotel is located less than 10 miles from all major locations such as airport, major attractions, and shopping centers. Mattater of a fact, hotel is a part of one of great mall (The Flordia Mall). If you desire to stay closer to Disny World and same time shopping at a quality mall, the Florida Hotel and Conference Center is the one. I enjoyed staying and looking forward to visit again.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice Centrally located Hotel with Shopping”
Reviews.Author: djfdjhfdjhd
Reviews.Content: Nice Hotel that is well situated in the Orlando area. Situated in the Florida Mall with easy access, there are a number of upscale stores as well as mid level stores to shop at. All from just walking out the entrance. The other mall - Millena Mall - is just down the road. Disney is just down the road with shuttle service. Universal is just down the road with shuttle service. Many upscale and medium restaurants are in the mall or just down the street. Breakfast is very good at the Hotel. The airport is very convenient and many airlines set up their stop over stays there. We usually stay a night or two, see the sights, shop, and eat well. A nice place to hang your hat.

Reviews.Title: “It started on sour note”
Reviews.Author: MichaelonLI
Reviews.Content: We are finding our way down the hall and see we have been assigned a corner room (I think it was 961). I get excited, because I have often found corner rooms to be larger, or have a second window or some other benefit. We opened the door to find a completely different experience. It was akin to walking into a cabin on a cruise ship. It was obviously a tiny room. On a cruise ship you conclude; it's small, but it works. This room did not work. The door cleared one of the beds by a few inches. The bathroom was tiny. The sink provided virtually no space for supplies for a single person, not a chance for two. There was a chair up against one wall facing in the opposite direction of the TV, as there was no where else to put it. There was a desk, but no connection for the computer. This room might have worked if there was only one bed, but two made it a cramped mess. There was also another small table. Beneath it was a mass of wires, cables, and computer stuff. It was jumbled up in a huge ball. It looked like an explosion in the back room at Radio Shack. We were trying to hook up a lap top, but could not make sense of this pile of wires. We called the front desk and they promptly sent a tech man to the room. He walked in and shook his head in disbelief. He looked at the electronic pile of spagehetti and said this was unacceptable. He called the front desk and asked for a different room. He walked us to the new room and let us in with his pass key. The new room was fine. Spacious, comfortable and well laid out. It was a flawless stay from that point forward. Two points: First, it annoyed me that they would assign a clearly inferior room when there were better rooms available. Two, presumably there are few of these rooms on each floor. There are probably a couple of dozen of them throughout the hotel. You don't want to get the luck of the draw and end up in one of these substandard rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel at Orlando”
Reviews.Author: TommyRol
Reviews.Content: The hotel is a great place to stay, in my case it is located a walking distance from our ware house at La Quinta, also to go on shoping to get someting for the family is great, you have Best Buy, Ross, Target to get great deals, and also have the Main stores in the Mall. The service at the Hotel is always great, the rooms are very confortable and the people there is always ready to help you even if they donÂ´t speak your lenguage. This was my second stay and I always return there is bussines even now IÂ´m thinkin comming back whit my family.

Reviews.Title: “Great Girlfriend Weekend!”
Reviews.Author: RNinFL
Reviews.Content: Totally recommend staying at the Florida Hotel and Conference Center if you are looking for a "girlfriend getaway". The Staff was exceptional; very friendly and helpful. The rooms were very clean with down pillows and comforters as well as a flat screen TV and in-room safe and refrigerator. The Cricket Bar and Grille had a very reasonable Happy Hour, with drink and appetizer specials as well as a breakfast buffet. The wait staff was also very accomodating and friendly. The big bonus is that the hotel is attached to Florida Mall for great shopping. The Camilla Day Spa is in close proximity for any spa service you may desire. The Camilla pedicure will make your feet feeling like a million bucks! Had so much fun...will be planning a stay again in the near future.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for a conference”
Reviews.Author: daniel_l_roberts
Reviews.Content: My company used this hotel for a conference. The accommodations were great and the hotel staff was wonderful. They worked within our budget and provided great service.

Reviews.Title: “Great Conference Facility”
Reviews.Author: LarryDTBG
Reviews.Content: Just returned from business conference at The Florida Hotel. Conference room rate of $169 was reasonable. Room appointed nicely with king bed, very comfy sofa, flat screen TV and spacious work center with wireless connection. The upper floors offer outstanding views through large picture windows out over the Orlando area. The HVAC system was easy to operate and very quiet. Public areas very inviting for informal meetings, adjoining coffee shops and day spa. Outdoor pool is heated and well sited for catching a little sun between meetings. A bonus was the Business Center set up to print airline tickets and boarding passes. A big draw is the location, adjoining the Florida Mall, a large regional mall with major anchors including Macy's, Nordstroms, Old Navy and many upscale specialty retailers, along with abundant restaurants. The hotel lobby actually opens directly into the mall interior. The only drawback is that this entrance is gated after 9 PM.

Reviews.Title: “excellence”
Reviews.Author: Fazuvi
Reviews.Content: excellence in location service room personal reception comfortable rooms .......... WELL EXCELLENCE HOTEL

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: hudge08
Reviews.Content: The service was great. We had a wonderful house keeper, great service for breakfast, and a convienient business room. The room was very nice but a little shy of what I expected but it did not diminish the stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for business travel”
Reviews.Author: pheonixt777
Reviews.Content: I'm a frequent guest of this hotel and am pleased as usual. My business partner and I stay at this hotel for a week two times per year. My experience in January 2009 was the most pleasant to date. The rooms are consistently clean and spacious. The hotel has recently "gone green" which I appreciate. They provide recycle containers and most recently they turn the air up and turn the refrigerators in the rooms off when not in use. Upon arrival I turned the air on and the room cooled very quickly as did the refrigerator. The pool is clean and big enough to swim laps. The staff are courteous and respond to my needs. There is one little touch that I truly appreciate. They have bathtub mats you can place in the tub. It is a GREAT hotel for my business travel. I'm not sure if I would recommend it as vacation hotel.
